Summary: Checked into room 3622 yesterday.  This resort is beautiful BUT walls are paper thin.  We listened to girls screaming and shrieking and to what sounded like furniture rolling across the ceiling all night. I tried calling front desk from 10pm to 11 with no answer at all. The noise above started again at 530am. After several attempts for assistance and physically walking to front desk the manager Holly finally called.  Our only option is to check out at 10am and hope for quieter accommodations at 4 pm, but no commitment. When  I made this reservation I tried to request a handicapped accessible room and I was told no room guarantees are made until checkin.  I am here on the property with people coming and going. Nothing makes sense.  We have no respit but will hope to get a good
Manager Response: Jean, we apologize that there were noisy guests in the room above yours and that the noise kept you from having a more leisurely morning.  We hope that your new accommodation will be more suitable for you and that you have a more enjoyable stay.

Summary: This is a beautiful resort with so many features you could spend a week doing different things and never leave the property. A gorgeous pool with a marvelous view of the ocean.  The staff was outstanding. The room very nice!!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your stellar review.  We are very pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay and our staff were outstanding! We hope to welcome you back on a return trip!

Summary Heading: Nice Property, no daily housekeeping and a fee of you want more frequently
Summary: This property is part of Marriott's time share program.  The property was nice.  The room we had had 2 bedroom plus 2 pull out sofa's, 2 bathrooms, full kitchen, refrigerator, and washer & dryer.  The only issue is that if you are staying less than a week they do not provide any housekeeping services.  Even as a  non-owner if booked through Marriott Central Reservation, or the Marriott App.  If you want housekeeping services more frequently there is a $150 fee.  You want more towels or a refresh of towels that's $50 fee each time.  There was no advance notice that I was able to find either on marriott's website or app, and this was told to us as we checked-in.  They do give 3 packets of laundry detergent to wash your sheets and towels if you choose to do so...
Manager Response: Hi, thank you for your review of your recent stay at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. We apologize that you were not made aware of the status of our amenities and housekeeping services prior to your arrival, this information is on our website through a "Click Here" banner. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to hosting you again on a visit in the future!

Summary: Great Location between Newport Beach and Laguna. One of my favorites, however, rooms are showing wear- looking tired, but still clean. Great amenities throughout the resort. Staff very professional and friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review.  We are happy to hear you enjoyed the amenities ad location. We appreciate the recommendation and cannot wait for your next visit!

Summary Heading: Love the property, not the level you'd expect from a large hotel chain.
Summary: We booked through a Marriot Platinum Elite with VRBO.  We are gold elite.  We requested a high floor with a nice view.  We have stayed about 30 times. We got a low floor with a view of the parking lot and we had a family with small kids booked above us, we also had construction going on right beside our building which made parking spots very limited, we walked through a construction zone to get to our room. I'm thinking that unless you are a timeshare owner with this property, you get the worst room available.  Even within off-season, we still can't seem to get a room near what we request.  One of my issues with this property is that it is wood with thin floors. You can hear every step or bag or kid running back and forth.  I wish they would keep larger families on lower floors
Manager Response: Hi, thank you for your review and feedback at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. We apologize for the room location you received during your stay. We do our best to accommodate all owner/guests' requests, but it can be difficult to place everyone in desired room locations. Please note that owner stays will have priority with room locations and as a vacation club property, we do not participate in the Bonvoy elite benefits, such as late checkout. We have shared your comments with the appropriate leaders to address. Thank you for staying with us and hope your next stay will be enjoyable!

Summary Heading: Decent enough 2BR condo with many amenities and great views.
Summary: Great views. Comfortable large 2BR plus 2 bath condos with balcony. Quiet. Walkable to beach and Crystal cove. A bit noisy due to 4-6 lane highway 1 below. Main pool was closed and quite a hike to either smaller pool on north or south side. Very windy in the afternoon. Basic kitchen.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review, Thomas. We are happy to hear you enjoyed the view and the large 2-bedroom accommodation. We appreciate the recommendation and cannot wait for your next visit!

Summary: Huge thank you to Judith at the front desk. Seeing I had children under 7, gave us a beautiful villa right next to the pool. The gorgeous ocean view room accommodated every need a family with children would look for. The fabulous heated pools made poolside so much more fun. Plenty of activities for the family to do here.
Manager Response: Thank you for your stellar review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!  We are very happy to hear Judith provided a gorgeous 2-bedroom ocean view to accommodate your family!  We hope to see you again, soon!

Summary: This was a great experience! 5000 building, excellent 2B / 2B room with full kitchen. Recommend grocery shopping nearby as there aren’t food options at night in the Villas. Staff at lobby / front desk was great! Shoutout to Blue in Security for your help back to my building. Coffee shop opens at 6am but they don’t receive their pastries until 7-7:30am (just in case you’re looking for morning coffee & pastries like me). Housekeeping was excellent. Will return!
Room tip: Parking available in front of building, must have a car & recommend driving anywhere you need to...
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your stellar review.  We are very pleased to hear you had such a great time and we will look forward to your return trip!

Summary Heading: Sorest experience ever in Marriott’s not even a five star hotel service and quality
Summary: Worst experience stay ever compare to others Marriott Vacation Club resorts.   We are celebrating birthday trips and we request to the resorts in advance. However, nothing was done by the hotel. No setup amenities, no bathroom appliances, The A/C was making weird noise. Even we close the bedroom door, we still can hear it. And when we check in to our room.   Linens is dirty and mark on it. Also We found there’s garbage in front of the room. What a awful experience during our stay.
Manager Response: We apologize for your disappointment with your stay.  If you are still on premise, please contact our Front Office Management to discuss your concerns by calling "0" from your room phone.

Summary: This hotel has gone downhill.  We usually love staying here, but we were sorely disappointed when we arrived in our room and everything smelled like a dog including the pillows and bed sheets.  Staff was notified and they sprayed a light perfume only to have the dog smell come back the following day.  My son who was sleeping on the pull-out bed had a few bites the first night, then by the time we left there were over 30 bites from fleas or bugs.  In the last few years, cleanliness has been super important and Newport Marriott Coast Villas obviously are not taking it seriously. Management was unsympathetic and to be honest quite rude when they were made aware of the issue.
Manager Response: Hi Kanderwin, thank you for your review and feedback at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. We apologize for the opportunities you experienced while staying with us. You are welcome to contact our Customer Advocacy office at 800-860-9384 and speak to a manager. Thank you for staying with us and hope you will give us another chance!

Summary: The Villas are in a good location for a family gathering, reunion, or couples getaway. We have stayed here in the past many times, however, this last stay was not as pleasurable for the following reasons.   Normally when you arrive, you have some latitude as to preferred location of your villa. We were told we did not have a choice as computers were down and were given our room keys.   When we arrived to our room, the keys did not work. We returned to the front desk and were told there were no other keys, then were told a worker would come to our unit to "fix the lock." In the meantime, our plans to go out for dinner were basically on hold, and we had to leave our door propped open so we could come and go to unpack. Three hours later, a technician arrived and did something to
Manager Response: Hi, thank you for your review of your recent stay at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. We are sorry to learn that your keys did not work and had to wait for our engineering team to arrive. We apologize that we were unable to provide a preferred location as we do our best to accommodate all guests' requests. We appreciate your feedback and hope you will give us another opportunity in the near future!

Summary Heading: I should have gone somewhere else
Summary: We are brand LOYAL To the Marriott brand and have stayed at several MVC properties because we love the amenities that we get while on vacation. We  planned our vacation around this location over 7 months ago because we were excited about the vista that we would have from our room of the Pacific Ocean. Imagine our surprise when we checked in and were told that we would have views of a tree. I submitted our choices 2 weeks before arrival and was told by the staff that I should have submitted them earlier even though I submitted my choices the same exact day that I received an email from the resort. We were also told by Jacob that only 25% of their rooms have actual ocean views. What a letdown. Save yourself the disappointment and book somewhere else where you can actually get the
Manager Response: Hi, thank you for your review and feedback at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. We apologize for the room location you received during your stay. We do our best to accommodate all owner/guests' requests, but during high occupancy it can be difficult to place everyone in desired room locations. Please note that owner stays will have priority with room locations.  We have shared your comments with the appropriate leaders to address. Thank you for staying with us and hope your next stay will be enjoyable!

Summary Heading: Another great experience with Elliott 's help at the front desk and overall great property!
Summary: We visited for the second time in late November/early December 2022 and we had another lovely end unit in Building 4400 on the third floor.  It makes all the difference to call the property ahead of time and ask about the layout, even print out a property map to get a sense of the place.  And when you're three weeks out from your arrival date, you can speak to the Pre-Arrivals team and make requests for building location and floor location.  And make sure you give them several options to work with - in that way you're likely to get what you want or pretty close to it.  Check in went smoothly, and we got to talk to Elliott when we got there and he's who I had spoken with this time a few months prior to ask questions about the property and he was super helpful and friendly.  The
Manager Response: Thank you for your stellar review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!  We are very happy to hear that you had great experiences with our resort prearrival team and that your check-in went smoothly!  We will look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit!

Summary: Booked the two bedroom villa for 3 nights and it was an absolute dream! Beautiful property with lush landscape views. The villa was so clean and spacious! It looked newly refurbished and bright!  Definitely living up to Marriott standard as a property. The service provided by every staff we encountered were excellent. The check in process was a little lengthy especially after a long wait, probably due to  the timing we arrived. It also took some time for someone to drive us into our villa but all was worth because we scored the ocean view.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review. We are happy to hear you had a wonderful stay and enjoyed the view of the ocean! We appreciate the recommendation and cannot wait for your next visit!

Summary Heading: All the comforts of home, and then some
Summary: This was my second stay at the Villas and overall it was a great trip, although my luck finally ran out (read on).  What can be said of this location that hasn't already been mentioned? It is situated in one of the most exclusive enclaves in the entire country, and the nearby restaurants and shops reflect that. Our unit in the 2600 building afforded us a view of the ocean from the patio, which was divine.  The property upkeep was excellent as were the conditions of the pools and hot tubs.  How did my luck finally run out? I've been a Marriott owner for over thirty years and have stayed at dozens of properties, but this was the very first time that I was assigned a room next to a building (2700) that was undergoing a major renovation and the noise was unbearable at times. On the
Manager Response: Hi, thank you for your review of your stay at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. We are pleased that you had an overall great trip. But we are sorry to hear about the room location that had construction. We appreciate the feedback, and we look forward to welcoming you back, again!

Summary Heading: This May Be The NICEST Facility WE have ever Stayed at.
Summary: Yes, you pay for luxury; and this is it. Spectacular property with lush landscape and beautiful views. Our room was a spacious 2 bedroom with a patio and a slight view of the ocean .Lots of activities for the family. You can walk to the beach and there is a shuttle that takes you to great places. HIGHLY RECOMMENED! The very best of Southern California. P.S. Lexie provided a wonderful check in experience.
Manager Response: Thank you for your stellar review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!  We are very happy to hear that we are the nicest facility you visited and also enjoyed your spacious 2-bedroom villa!  We hope to see you again, soon!

Summary Heading: Good for Marriott Vacation Club Owners; not so much for marketing preview packages.  Pool area not cleaned daily.
Summary: We are MVC owners who bought a marketing package while staying at  the property in February 2020.  Our current stay had to be rescheduled repeatedly due to the pandemic.   We did not know when we bought the package that we would not be treated like owners during our stay, but that’s the way it went.  We received a basement  (first floor) villa in Building 2000 that overlooked the fire lane behind the building.  We had little privacy and did not feel comfortable sitting out on our patio very often with people walking back & forth.  Recommend against purchasing these “Encore Packages” that appear to be an inexpensive way to return to a great MVC property - you get what you pay for.  We won’t do it again.    On a positive note,  our villa was very clean, fully stocked, and recently
Manager Response: Hi, thank you for your review of your stay at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. We are pleased that we have been your vacation destination for several years as an owner. But we are sorry to hear about the room location you were provided on the Encore package. We appreciate the feedback and will share your comments with our leadership team to ensure our main pool area are being cleaned. We look forward to welcoming you back, again!

Summary: Love this hotel. The pools are beautiful. The apartments are huge. Beds are very comfortable. Rooms are very clean. Staff is very friendly. There is complimentary rum punch in the afternoon. And activities for kids every day. Ping pong, fuseball, volleyball, golf, basketball all fun. Fire pits available until 11pm. The location is amazing. So close to the beach.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your great review!  We are thrilled you liked our pool and staff as well as the activities we provide daily!  We hope you have an amazing and memorable vacation!

Summary: I had a suite that took 30 minutes to locate. Parking is easier on the streets in NYC than at this place. The lady that checked me in was wonderful. It went downhill from there. The line to check-in was a 25 minute wait. There was no place outside to park while registering. I had never stayed at a Marriott time share villa and did not know they do not recognize your Marriott status whether it be Cobalt or Lifetime Titanium Elite. I have spent thousands of nights in Marriott's across the world and spent almost $1mm dollars doing so. I have certain expectations and not one was met at this property. Maybe it is different for owners, but for me, nothing was met. Very disappointed in Marriott.
Manager Response: Hi, thank you for your review of your recent stay at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. We are saddened to learn that you waited 25 minute to check-in. We apologize that you were not made aware that we do not participate with the Bonvoy elite benefits. This information is on our website through a "Click Here" banner. We appreciate your feedback and for giving us a try!

Summary Heading: Less and less each year - such a shame
Summary: When we first purchased at Newport Coast Villas we had room service every day.  Now there is no service during your stay. Now you also have to wash your own pool towels and keep track of them throughout your stay. When I travel I don’t like to do laundry. It’s just a matter of time before you have to bring your own linens and sheets.
Manager Response: Hi, thank you for your review of your recent stay at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. We are saddened to learn that you did not enjoy your stay with us. We apologize that you were not made aware of the status of our amenities and housekeeping services prior to your arrival, this information is on our website through a "Click Here" banner. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to hosting you again on a visit in the future!

Summary: This has been our home resort for 23 years now. We’ve seen changes,some good and some not. Really did like the old Mediterranean theme but it’s progress.  The staff is always pleasant and accommodating. Really like the new pool upgrades and as always the Vista bar and servers are wonderful.  Beautiful setting and close to everything. Also the trolley is conveyor the beach.  Our unit was clean and only one negative that the furnishings need to be updated. Arms on chairs worn.  Quiet unit in the 2700 building near smaller pool.  Loved our stay. See you in 2024
Manager Response: We appreciate your great review! We appreciate your 23 years of loyalty, and we look forward to many more enjoyable stays!

Summary Heading: Needs updating but still very good
Summary: The property has been our destination for several years.  This time our villa was in 5000 building.  While the layout is pretty standard for this place, the assigned villa really needs refurbishment and  update.  Some appliances were replaced, from GE to Hotpoint.  Unfortunately the microwave oven has noisy fan and the dishwasher leaks and  one of the rack falls off the track.  The caulking around the shower was carelessly applied.  The cushions for sofa  have heavy signs of worn with edges frayed.  This property has been excellent but it has gone down hill due to difficulties caused by the after effects from COVID-19.   I highly urge the Marriott management  to update the villas and to bring this property up to the high standards of MVC.  Some positives:  excellent staff, pools
Manager Response: Hi Albert, thank you for your review of your stay at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. We are pleased that we have been your vacation destination for several years. But we are sorry to hear about the noisy appliance and outdated villa you were assigned to . We appreciate the feedback and will share your comments with our leadership team for future consideration.

Summary: Beautiful views. Well maintained. Near ocean and state park. Close to John Wayne airport. Great place to stay! We have stayed there several time and thoroughly enjoyed every visit. One of our three favorites. The other two: Marriott Surf Watch on Hilton Head Island and Village d'illi de France (near Paris and Disneyworld Paris.
Manager Response: Thank you for returning to Marriott's Newport Coast Villas! We appreciate your review and we hope you have another memorable visit!

Summary Heading: The Villas ar beautiful. Ask for a lower level close to pools for best accommodations. especially in summer.
Summary: What a beautiful property and enjoyable restaurants and shops. We have been to Newport several times and not stayed here. Try it and you will stay forever at the Marriott Villas. The staff was pleasant and attentive. A little slow for requests and under paid according to a source. They should take care of their hard working employees better.
Manager Response: We appreciate your great review and thank you for choosing to visit with Marriott's Newport Coast Villas for the first time!

Summary Heading: NEEDS BETTER ONSITE FOOD AND POSSIBLY A FULL RESTAURANT!
Summary: We love the views and layout of the units. The only thing lacking is an onsite place to go for breakfast!  The pool bar occasionally made breakfast items, but that seems to be a victim of Covid.   you definitely need to have a vehicle at your disposal.  Pool bar food has improved somewhat.  The "Marketplace" is cramped, understaffed and overpriced.  Trader Joe's is just down the road, buy food there.
Manager Response: Hi Victoria, thank you for your review of your stay at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. We are pleased that you love the views and layout of the villas, but we are sorry to hear about the lack of on-site food options. We appreciate the feedback and will share your comments with our leadership team for future consideration.

Summary Heading: Great propery and location; you may need a little patience
Summary: This is a beautiful property in a great location. The 2-bedroom villa was spacious with 2 full bathrooms, a full kitchen, washer & dryer, dining area, living room, and patio that table and chairs. The landscaping is lovely and there are ocean views from some parts of the property. There are multiple pools (the one furthest from the center was much quieter than the ones next to the lobby) and lots of sports courts.   The check in process is a bit lengthy and there was a moderately long line when I arrived. It also took a while to get a staff person to drive to the villa on a golf cart from the lobby. If you need a golf cart ride from one part of the large property to another, then be sure to plan in advance. The property has a shuttle that goes to Crystal Cove (near the
Manager Response: Hi, thank you for your review of your stay at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. We are pleased that you enjoyed the spacious two bedroom villa and the location, but we are sorry to hear about the check-in process. We look forward to welcoming you back for another stay and hope to provide you with better service.

Summary: This place is fabulous! The most perfect location tucked between Corona del Mar and Laguna Beach. We had an ocean view with a sunset nightly. Great food and drinks at the pool with quick service. 4 pools that were heated perfectly. Lots of activity for kids like ping pong, basketball, tether ball, mini golf. Spread out enough if you didn’t have kids you wouldn’t be on top of kids all day long. Fire pits for s’mores, barbecues at every building. Our room had everything we needed including washer dryer. No maid service but a phone call brought new towels, more pillows. Our room was fresh and semi updated. Enough to be comfortable. Definitely returning next 4th of July. Not on the beach but a shuttle to Crystal Cove State Beach park every 1/2 hr. Eat at Beachcomer while on the
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review. We are happy to hear you had a wonderful stay and enjoyed the pools that were heated perfectly! We appreciate the recommendation and cannot wait for your next visit!

Summary Heading: Great location. Service, amenities need improvement.
Summary: Great location, service and amenities need work. Family is longtime Marriott timeshare owners and reserved three villas for late arrival. We checked with the manager at least once before we arrived to note that it would be a late arrival (ie 11pm - midnight). Check in process was bungled - wrong keys, confusion over our reservation. If you are arriving late here - good luck. No restaurant on property means you fend for yourselves for food - be prepared for that too. Location is beautiful but for manager did say they are having problems hiring, keeping good staff. It showed.
Manager Response: Hi Deanne, thank you for your review of your stay at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. We are pleased that you like the location but we are sorry to hear about the check-in process. We look forward to welcoming you back for another stay and hope to provide you with better service.

Summary: Had a tremendous family vacation in this popular resort. Beautiful newly decorated villas and lots of activities. Staff on pre arrival and checkin were great. there is a shuttle to local attractions which is really handy to avoid driving. A wonderful place to stay.
Manager Response: We're so thrilled that you had such a memorable and wonderful family vacation! Thank you for choosing to visit the Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the future!

Summary Heading: Needs a cafe or true takeout type spot
Summary: Huge place, limited amenities. For a little city (the place is huge) they only have a gift shop that has a Starbucks  amd snacks & sodas. The pool bar is also small with only like 10 bar stools. Staff at both are phenomenal. Lines in the am for coffee are ridiculous. It blocks the checkout desks and could use some real improvement.  A small restaurant or true Cafe type place would do wonders. Main pool is great. Had a DJ today as well. Very pleasant and upscale Great views from the hillside location.
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to share your review.  We're happy to hear you enjoyed our main pool and we hope to welcome you back on a future visit!

Summary Heading: Great views and comfort at the 2-bedroom suites in Marriott Newport Coast Villas
Summary: The property offers 2 gyms, multiple swimming pools and hot water whirlpools. We really enjoyed the shuttle to the Newport Beach and to the Laguna Beach. The store near the lobby offers fresh made hot food as well as general merchandise and even some important general over the counter medications. The staff were courteous and friendly, and always helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review. We are happy to hear you had a wonderful stay and enjoyed the shuttle services to Newport Beach and Laguna Beach.  We appreciate the recommendation and hope to have the pleasure of hosting you again!

Summary: I have stayed here a few times as a hotel guest. Those visits were always nice and no issues. We decided to accept the Marriot offer for discounted stay to attend their sales presentation to possibly join. We received a very dirty room in a very awkward location. The grounds here are no longer clean, trash everywhere and absolutely no customer service. We tried to get another room or seek help for the dirty room from the front desk and management; hair in bathroom, unclean toilet, garbage disposal full of debris, patio has beer cans and trash, the list goes on. But they will not offer any help. I'm wondering how they expect to sell a timeshare opportunity when the staff, grounds, and rooms are just awful. So sad for what used to be a nice destination. There is no loss of
Manager Response: Hi, thank you for your review and feedback at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. We apologize for the opportunities you experienced while staying with us. We have shared your review with the appropriate leaders to address . We thank you for staying with us and hope you will give us another chance!

Summary: We just returned from a weeklong stay at the Newport Coast Villas.  This was an exchange through Interval International.  The resort is beautiful and quite large.  We had nothing but good experiences with everyone at the Marriott starting with check in where we were given a rum drink and a small bag of saltwater taffy while we stood in line.  The wait was not too long and the young man who checked us in was extremely personable and helpful.  We received a lovely unit in a quiet upper location with a wonderful ocean view.  We definitely recommend buying the wrist bands that act as your room key, it is so handy for easy entry to your room and all the gates to access the pools, etc.  You can keep them and use them at all the Marriott Vacation Villa resorts.  We actually got ours at
Manager Response: Thank you for your stellar review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!  We are very happy to hear that you had great experiences with our resort team and that the service you received was efficient!  We will look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit!

Summary Heading: Spent a week there recently. Over the years one thing has proven consistent: the amenities continue to shrink...
Summary: and the service continues to deteriorate. I remember when daily maid service was provided. Now there is none unless you pay a steep price for it. I remember when the shuttle took you to the local Trader Joe's. Not anymore. I remember when the staff were there for more than a few months. I recognized no one from previous stays. I remember when a full service kitchen was provided. Now place mats are 'on request' as are shower amenities since what's provided would not be enough to wash a cat. Early checkin? Good luck. Being encouraged with a few useless Marriott Bonvoy points to check out early? Absolutely. Noise from the loud cars speeding up and down the highways a constant din. In the small shower there is no place to put even a small bar of soap let alone anything else. The
Manager Response: Hi, thank you for your review and feedback at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. We apologize for the opportunities you experienced while staying with us. We have shared your review with the appropriate leaders to address . We thank you for staying with us and hope you will give us another chance!

Summary: This place is gorgeous.  The location is beautiful.  We rented two 2 bedroom units.  Both were in excellent shape.  The beds were comfortable as well as the pullout beds.  The resort is very big and hilly.  The pool is beautiful.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review. We are happy to hear you had a wonderful stay and the accommodations met your needs. We appreciate the recommendation and hope to have the pleasure of hosting you again!

Summary: Hotel is nice we had a great view. The only thing was service. Throughout our stay the service was inconsistent. Some times it felt like they were going out of their way and other times it felt as if our request was a bother. Definitely something that needs to be worked on.
Manager Response: Hi, thank you for your review of your stay at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. We are pleased that you had a great view but we are sorry to hear about the inconsistent services. We look forward to welcoming you back for another stay and hope to provide you with better service.

Summary Heading: BEWARE OF MARKETING OFFERS FROM THIS RESORT
Summary: BEWARE OF MARKETING OFFERINGS!!!  A one rating was more than generous for this visit.    We visited the resort on a $1K “marketing package” that was offered as we are original owner in the resort.    While the resort is typically great, this visit set the mark for horrible room and support from guest services.      The location of the room, 3734, is suitable for a storage closet as it has no view and sit next to all the buildings AC units so it close to impossible to have a conversation on the patio (see pictures).     The front desk, and all their management, gives the pat answer that not their issue and passes the buck to marketing dept (that is avoiding contact)  Owners,  you are probably good but marketing guest, or probably paying guests, BEWARE THAT YOU MAY GET A ROOM THIS
Manager Response: Hi, thank you for your review and feedback at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. We apologize for the room location you received during your preview package. We do our best to accommodate all owner/guests requests, but during high occupancy it can be difficult to place everyone in desired room locations. Please note that owner stays will have priority with room locations.  We have shared your comments with the appropriate leaders to address. Thank you for staying with us and hope your next stay will be enjoyable!

Summary Heading: A lovely villa and helpful and friendly staff
Summary: This place is beautiful.  First, when we checked in, we waited in line for forty minutes.  The people checking us in were very helpful and made sure that we got a villa overlooking the Pacific, in a nice, secluded area of the resort.  All of the staff was very helpful and friendly.  The resort was full, but it did not seem crowded.  Lots of things to do, and located close to great attractions.  The villa was spacious and comfortable.  I would come here regularly if I did not live so far away.  One little tidbit that speaks volumes:  My wife wanted an apple fritter which becomes half priced after 400 PM at the on site store.  The first day I asked for one, they had all been sold.  The next day I came back, looking for my wife's apple fritter, and the young lady behind the counter
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review. We are happy to hear you had a wonderful stay and the accommodations and location met your needs. We appreciate the recommendation and hope to have the pleasure of hosting you again!

Summary: This is our third Marriott hotel in three weeks and we have been most unhappy.  As a platinum elite I would’ve expected more consideration with the placement of the room to begin with none of my preferences were noted on arrival this isn’t the way to sell us a timeshare.  When we checked in in the evening we asked for an upper floor in a quiet area and were placed directly on the busiest street when we asked to move we were given a ground level unit which is in a quieter area that is filled with ants, ants filled my daughters bathrooms which made it unusable we have called three times spoken to two managers and the most we were offered was let’s pack up again to move to a different unit for the remainder of the stay which is only two days. engineering has come in three times now
Manager Response: Hi, thank you for your review and feedback at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. We apologize for the opportunities you experienced while staying with us. We have shared your review with the appropriate leaders to address with Engineering. You are welcome to contact our Customer Advocacy office at 800-860-9384 and speak to a manager. Thank you for staying with us and hope you will give us another chance!

Summary: Fourth time to Newport Coast Villas and will keep returning.  This place is beautiful with immaculant grounds.  The views are spectacular and the pool areas and rooms are all very nice.  Hoping the shuttle service locations and duration will return to what it was prior to COVID 19.  Thanks again for the stay!!
Manager Response: It's fantastic to read that you had a great time with us! We're pleased this is your fourth visit and continue to enjoy our beautiful and immaculate grounds. We appreciate you taking the time to provide a five-star review and we cannot wait to see you again!

Summary Heading: Beautiful property wonderful stay with grandkids
Summary: Stayed with grandkids (7&8 years). The two bedroom is spacious with 2 bathrooms, washer/dryer and full kitchen.  Our room was near canyon pool. Much quieter than the main pools. Ping-pong table, corn hole and shuffleboard were fun. We did s’mores at fire pit.  Lots of space for kids to play and lots of opportunities for long walks including beautiful ocean views. We easily drove to beaches and about 1 hr away from safari park . All staff we encountered were friendly and efficient. We are MVC owners and appreciate Marriott vacation clubs are consistently perfect for family vacations.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review. We are happy to hear you had a wonderful stay and the accommodations and location met your needs. We appreciate you being loyal owners and hope to have the pleasure of hosting you again!

Summary Heading: Our preferred stay but service lacking
Summary: This place is one of my favorite places to stay in California. It's hard to consider staying anywhere else when the Villas are an option. We stay here even though our activities of interest are quite a drive away. We love it that much! But after so many years and multiple stays, we have noticed a consistent lack of service and guest consideration.  The front desk is usually nice, but don't expect any sort of special accommodations if you have an issue with your room. Such as a loud and disruptive machine room near your room or disruptive guests around you. They don't do much to help you for issues out of your control, even though they could help to provide a solution.  Also, as a note of caution, avoid any situations with Security. They don't seem to have any training or
Manager Response: Hi, thank you for your review and feedback at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. We apologize for the opportunities you experienced while staying with us. We have shared your review with the appropriate leaders to address with Engineering and our safety and security team. We thank you for staying with us and hope you will give us another chance!

Summary Heading: A gorgeous property on the property with a pleasure of a messup
Summary: This resort is  always our go to resort when we stay here. This resort is very very gorgeous. We got a canyon/ partial ocean view room. However there were cons. You need to do a better job of privacy as music was turned on during overnight hours. Music needs to be turned off during overnight hours because it is disturbing guests who are staying near the lobby. Also the tub’s cold facet was broken as that was the way it was given to us. Also there was also no housekeeping due to our rate we got. However I really enjoyed our stay here. I can’t wait to be back soon. I highly recommend this place if you want a place to stay at here in Newport Beach
Manager Response: Hi, we appreciate you providing your review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. We are glad you enjoyed our resort and view from your room. We appreciate you patronage and hope you will visit us, again!

Summary Heading: Marriott needs to listen to its member.
Summary: The worst experience we have ever had as Titanium members. I'm writing this review after reading the other posts by Marriott members. Our experience was at the start of the pandemic June 2020. We had stayed at the Marriott NewPort Coast Villas 5 years in a row, after purchasing a vacation package in 2019 and booking our stay a year in advance, in 2020 were staying at the Pelican Inn across from Newport Coast our next reservation, when we received a voice recording that our vacation package had been canceled without any warning, no reimbursement compensation would be forth coming, and we would have to rebook in the 2021 year.   I immediately went to the Marriott app and was able to book a Villa either using cash ($783/night) or 60,000/ points, we used points which made no since
Manager Response: Hi Mr. Sheppard, thank you for your review and feedback at Marriott's Newport Coast. I am truly sorry the villa you received was dirty. I am sorry the requested dates to use your promotional package wasn't available, but glad you were able to secure the dates using Bonvoy points and eventually was refunded the package. We regret that you will never stay with us, but we thank you for giving us a try!

Summary Heading: Bug in my hair & smoke detector with flashing light
Summary: Staff was great and accommodating.  This vacation club is currently fixing up a second pool in front of the main building.  There was some noise but it wasn't bad.  Things were okay in the room.  There are lots of angles & corners in the room.  On our last morning, after just got off the bed and going to wash my face, seeing myself in the mirror, there was a bug crawling in my hair!!  I caught it and put it in the bag as proof.  My husband showed it to the front desk and was told a sorry but there was no other offer (you should at least deduct one night for bug crawling in hair!).  There are restaurants that the Vacation Club is offering 15% off but the ones we called are booked with reservations or don't accept the general public.  I wonder why the front desk person Catherine
Manager Response: Hi, thank you for your review and feedback at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.  We apologize for the opportunities you experienced while staying with us. We have shared your review with the appropriate leaders to address with Engineering, Housekeeping and our Marketing team. We thank you for staying with us and hope you will give us another chance!

Summary: From time to time, when I don't want to travel far, this is one of the places I would just come back again and again.  This resort does not disappoint.  I was able to stay at the main building this time. The sunset view was amazing!  As usual, the staff was very accommodating, and professional.  Over the years, I have met some really great staff.  The room iself is always to perfection.  I like the special corner light next to the TV in the master bedroom that I could leave on at night, but it's not too bright.  Never seen this before so not sure if this kind of light is in all the building. Love this resort, clean and charming.  Too bad they did away with the large size chess board by the main pool.  Otherwise, everything is GREAT!
Manager Response: Hi, thank you for your review of your recent stay at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. We are delighted that your stay with us was amazing!  We hope to welcome you back soon for another great vacation!

Summary Heading: Super dated and not close to “luxury”
Summary: This hotel must have been beautiful in 1991 which is when the decor and musty smell suggest it was built.  It is now so dated I can’t believe Trip Advisor describes it as luxury. Putting the unbearable musty smell aside, I was told at my 9PM checkin there was no way to get a bottle of water (not saying free, just no way to get a bottle of water at all- seriously???)  The showers take 5 minutes to get hot. This property just needs to be torn down or undergo a truly massive remodel. Also the gym was super dirty. the 2 stars were for the location and the friendly employees who did their best to be helpful- including at checkin when I was switched to a more conveniently located room when I mentioned I was leaving first thing in the morning.
Manager Response: Hi, we appreciate you providing your review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.  We are disappointed to hear that you found your accommodations super dated.  It is great to know our front desk team was helpful. We do value you as a loyal Bonvoy member, and hope you had an enjoyable visit in Newport Coast, California!

Summary: Generally not a big fan of hotel properties, but this location and development are set apart and above the others with great views and tasteful use of the topography and environment.   Just above the pacific ocean and pch.
Manager Response: Hi, thank you for your review of your stay at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. We are happy our accommodations met your vacation needs, and you like the villas and views. We hope you will come back and visit us again!

Summary: This was our third visit here....and it will be out LAST.  We started out, as usual, in the low rent district of the resort- wonderful view of bushes and the roof of the building below us.  But we are used to that.   They closed the main pool without any warning and moved the restaurant to a satellite pool where you would order and wait on the regular restaurant to make the fool and then ship it down to the satellite restaurant. On our second full day, we were to take our "tour."  Before we went, we were in our unit and I thought I heard water running.  I checked all the faucets and they were all closed.  I kept hearing it and went in the bathroom and brown water was pouring out of our bathroom vent fan.   It took three calls to get any action and finally some of their
Manager Response: Hi Charles, thank you for your review and feedback at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.  We apologize for the many opportunities you experienced while staying with us and the misinformation given. We have shared your review with the appropriate leaders to address with Engineering and our Food & Beverage department. We thank you for staying with us and hope you will give us another chance!

Summary Heading: Great resort overall if you get the right front desk person at check in
Summary: We got this resort on an exchange through Interval International and we really enjoyed the property over all.  The villa was immaculate, and the condition of the overall property was beautiful.  A few glitches brought down the experience a few degrees.  First off, I made multiple calls to the property pre arrival to make requests for a top floor full ocean view unit.  We've stayed at other Marriott properties and this is the first time a pre arrival unit request was not honored, so when we arrived at check in we were assigned a partial ocean view and not a top floor unit.  Thankfully, Aaron at the front desk made a call and got us assigned to what we had asked for in the first place.  When we got to our unit's floor, someone at the unit two doors down had decided to leave their

This property is phenomenal from the scenic views, location, the activities and the accommodations offered. It has everything you could want on a vacation and the staff have exceeded all expectations. A bellman helped with our excessive luggage to our villa, a very well managed resort. I travel and stay at MVC properties frequently and find this one to be top notch.
Manager Response: It's fantastic to read that you had a great time, from our phenomenal views, convenient location and activities at our resort! We're pleased that the resort staff has provided exceptional service and appreciate you taking the time to provide a five-star review!

Summary: As a Titanium owner here at this resort  you’d think I’d love it but I’ve been disappointed every time so I’m finally giving up on my hone resort. Due to foliage on the property there are very view rooms (even though I own a view room, I’ve never gotten one).  I’ve gotten the most god awful rooms and as a titanium member shouldn’t have to complain or move after a night to get a decent room. This trip the fire alarm went off three times during the stay and we never even received an apology or explanation. My money and points are much more appreciated at the Hawaiian resorts, Arizona or New York resorts. This resort has a lot of bad rooms, due to the set up of the buildings (too dark, near smoking areas, noisy road, etc).  There are a lot of great family resorts in Newport, stay
Manager Response: Hi Jacque, thank you for your review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. We apologize that your vacation stay was disappointing and you did not receive an apology after the fire alarm went off.  We will share your feedback with our resort leaders so that we may continue to improve.

Summary: Great location near several beaches. Excellent staff with attentive service. Fast response with any request. rooms are modern and well maintained. Awesome view of  the ocean. There are several large pools and a children's area with water slides.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review, Peter.  We are happy to here you received excellent service from our associates and enjoyed the awesome ocean view.  We hope to have the pleasure of hosting you again!

Summary Heading: Traded Into this Beautiful Resort Oct 2021
Summary: We are completing our 7-night stay at the Marriott Newport Coast Villas having traded via Interval Intl our Marriott Ko Olina owner week from 2020 (cancelled due to the COVID lockdown).  We have always wanted to stay here (even though it’s only an hour away) since the location along the Newport Coast is amazing, drawing visitors from all across the country and the world.   Our Oct 2021 stay did not disappoint … my pre-arrival request for a high floor room in the 1200 to 1800 cluster of villas was granted (ocean view partially blocked by trees even from our third floor) but it was right next door to the family-friendly Tide Pool.    Our check-in took about 30 min on our Sun arrival, then we sat through a 2 hr timeshare presentation on a rainy Mon, but then Tue the sun came out
Manager Response: Hi Jasmine, thank you for your review of your recent stay at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. We are happy to hear that you had a great stay with us and our accommodations met your vacation needs. We cannot wait to welcome you back!

Summary Heading: Nice views, shame about the place
Summary: A bait and switch is the best description of this place. I was contacted (twice) by a sales team offering me an awesome experience. When we arrived, we were assigned what I would describe as a basement apartment with shabby furniture, threadbare towels, views of a mild stained wall, windows that were opaque because their seals had broken. As a lifetime Marriott Platinum, I was told that my status was “irrelevant” here because I was jot an owner. Then they tried to sell us on the merits of ownership. Not a chance of that here. Stay away.
Manager Response: James, we appreciate you providing your review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.  We are disappointed to hear that you found your accommodations in poor condition.  We do value you as a loyal Bonvoy member, however the resort does not participate in the Bonvoy Elite Benefit program.  We truly hope you had an enjoyable visit in Newport Coast, California!

Summary: Please make sure you get everything in writing from Marriott Sales and also record your sales presentation many promises and incentives offered but not followed through we got cohursed into signing and we are not he losers

I love this resort, and this is my fourth visit here. I'm five days into an eight-day stay. The Internet service has been weak, intermittent and sometimes nonexistent, making it difficult for remote workers to get our job done. This is a warning for future visitors hoping to enjoy this beautiful location while taking care of business. Grrhhh!

Great location on a hillside above Crystal Cove State Park beach.  All two bedroom condos.  All pools and hot tubs are operating again.  Condo very well equipped.  TV now have internet capacity and streaming services work well (with your own account).  Showtime on Demand included.  Very near Pavilion’s, upmarket version of Vons and Safeway with an excellent selection of mostly prepared or entirely prepared meals to go.  Condos have full refrigerator, microwave, stove/oven, dishwasher.  Coffee makers standard too.  Very easy place to relax. Small store on property with Starbucks option too.  Felt it was extremely clean.  No maid services but extra towels requested and delivered promptly.  Communication via text nice feature.  What could they do better?  Check in.  4pm is the

Very comfortable 2-BR condo with full kitchen was great for two adults and two grandparents, with 2 kids on the fold-out couch in the living room.  Our unit overlooked the main pool area and ocean - just gorgeous.  WiFi was great for working from the balcony.  Nice grocery store up the street for cooking in the unit, and easy GrubHub delivery when we didn’t want to cook or go out.  Easy free shuttle to Crystal Cove for beach time, Beachcomber Cafe, and Shake Shack.  Nice fire pits and outdoor grill areas throughout the property - clearly several family reunions were using them and having a great time.  We were not able to book direct as the resort was “full”, but then easily found a nice unit on Airbnb.
Manager Response: Hi Amiee and John, thank you for your review of your recent stay at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. We are delighted that you and your family enjoyed your stay with us. We are pleased that our accommodations met your vacation needs and you liked the view from your villa. We hope you will visit us again for more relaxing family time.

Summary: Nothing but praise in this review..  This place is such a heaven. Great ocean & canyon views, all amenities are great.. The pools, the BBQ areas, the fire pits...  The villas are amazing, very spacious & very well equipped... Staff are very helpful & friendly, the drinks at the pool bar are quite nice...  I can go on & on.  Quibbles? Very little... 2nd car cannot be parked near your villa.  Please build more fire pits... That's it :)  If you can, you must go to this place.. I will definitely go back..
Manager Response: Hi Michael, thank you for your review of your recent stay at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. We are delighted that you and your family had an amazing time with us. We are happy that our accommodations and amenities met your vacation needs. We cannot wait to welcome you back for another great stay!

Summary: I was like you. I saw the gorgeous pictures, the proximity to crystal cove, and thought a few people were just overly picky or negative - so I booked anyway. Now, a week out from our disappointing trip, I wish I didn't. So now I'm saving you the trouble to tell you why you need to avoid this property.   1. Room selection: You should take it as an omen that you can't pick room or view classes, as a hotel guest you will inevitably be placed on a ground floor room in the middle of a dark hallway with a view of a fence, the kids pool, or if you're lucky, an empty footpath. Impressed by the lobby? Don't be. That's the only time you'll see that view your entire stay.   2. Guest Service: Hey, you don't like your room selection? The manager is going to lay it out for you like he did for
Manager Response: Hi Allison, thank you for your review of your recent stay at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. We are saddened to learn that you did not enjoy your stay with us. We apologize that you were not made aware of the status of our amenities and housekeeping services prior to your arrival, this information is on our website through a "Click Here" banner. While we are a Vacation Ownership resort, we value each guest that stays with us and apologize this was not communicated correctly by our team. Lastly, as a Marriott Vacation Club resort, we do not participate in the full Marriott Bonvoy benefits of Marriott hotels such as room upgrades/downgrades or late check-out as communicated on our website. We are glad we were able to accommodate an extra hour of time for you. We do appreciate your patronage and thank you for being a loyal Marriott Bonvoy member. We hope to provide a better experience on a future stay.

Summary: Terrible customer service if you are an owner.   No regard for making an owner happy with room location.  They will ask you for your room request in advance, but be advised they have no intention of granting it.  Extremely disappointed in Marriott experience.
Manager Response: Hi Pumpvixen, thank you for your review of your recent experience at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. We are sorry to hear about your disappointment with the villa you received during your time with us. As an Owner with us, you do receive priority on villa location requests. While we would love to meet everyone’s requests, it sometimes is just not possible when occupancy is high. However, the resort team will make every effort to accommodate. We do appreciate your patronage and ownership with Marriot Vacation Club. We hope to provide a better experience on a future stay.

Summary: Never IN MY LIFE have I had a check-in experience like this. It was like a Disney World line. This is disgusting, I feel like I’m at a McDonalds. This place is a tacky, understaffed dump. Would never even consider staying here again or recommending it to anyone. Ugh. Live and learn I guess.
Manager Response: Hi, thank you for your review of your recent experience at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. We apologize for the line upon check-in, our agents are working diligently to assist each owner guest promptly and thoroughly. We do hope you enjoyed the rest of your stay with us.

Summary: My family has stayed at the Newport Coast Villas perhaps a dozen times.  I believe I have always rated them five circles.  Now I have dropped one, because the drinks at the pool bar continue to be terrible (how do you make tasteless Pina Coladas and Mohitoes?), as does the food.  On the other hand, the facility is lovely, it now has 4-5 pools and the staff is very friendly and helpful.  Marriott Vacation Club has also fallen down on its pledge to completely refurbish the units every five-six years.  We have been coming to Newport Coast for over ten years and I do not believe the units have been refurbished.  We will be back, but we will continue to find other places to eat and drink.
Manager Response: Hi, thank you for your review of your stay at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. We are pleased that you come back to visit us but are saddened to hear about the drinks at our pool bar. Our units do get refurbished but they take place in phases. This past winter the villas closest to the lobby were refurbished. We look forward to welcoming you back for another stay and hope to provide you a newly renovated unit.

Summary: I elected to spend by birthday here in 2021, mainly because of the views and the availability of a kitchen in my villa.  I have been here many times over the years, but this year was special.  On my birthday, I received a beautiful bouquet of flowers from the San Diego Pulse staff and a day later a basket of goodies from the Newport Coast staff.  I feel so remiss because I thought I had written a review, but evidently not.  The staff here is great too.  The grounds are beautiful as always.  So are the views.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing us as the destination to celebrate your birthday!  We are thrilled you enjoyed your stay along with our staff and the breathtaking views;  We hope to host you for another wonderful stay, soon!

Summary: Our group booked several villas to celebrate a few birthdays in may. Yes, we gathered in one villa on a saturday & had a person complaint over noise at 2 pm & 9 pm. Seriously?! Some people just need to get a life!!! Anyway, at the 2pm complaint, the security who responded was courteous & professional, however, at 9 pm, the 2 security that came up was more confrontational & rude. There was no loud music playing or anything beyond conversational tone. We sang for the birthdays & it was kids birthday, so yeah. Anyway, the only thing she got us for was having more han 8 guests inside the villa at one time. I totally understand that the staff are just doing their job by responding to a complaint, but there was no need to be rude. Nonetheless, I apologized & send them on their way.
Manager Response: Hi, thank you for your review of your stay at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. Thank you for celebrating some birthdays with us! We apologize the security officer you encountered was confrontational. We are happy to learn that our accommodations met your vacation needs and you enjoyed the beautiful view from your villa. Thank you again for choosing our resort for your celebrations and we hope you visit again soon!

Summary: This is a beautiful spot and is one of Marriott's timeshare resorts.  That means great two bedroom villas but also means no restaurant or room service on site.  Staff is friendly and it's family oriented (for better or worse).  We live locally and it's a nice getaway when we need a break.
Manager Response: Hi, thank you for your review of your stay at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. We are happy that you enjoyed your stay with us you chose our location for your staycations. We cannot wait to welcome you back!

Summary: We experienced Newport Coast Villas in 2013 and now during May, 2021.  In 2013, we were on the go . . .Catalina Island, Getty Museum.  This time we experienced the resort more and adventured no more than 10 miles out.  We loved Fashion Island and all the great restaurants . .especially loved the R & D Kitchen and the french bakery called Le Bain . .their brownies are the best I have tasted!!  We explored Balboa Island with the homes' gorgeous gardens, and the restaurant Wilma's Patio.  The main street there had many cute shops and very dog friendly . .reminded me of Carmel, CA.  We also went to the beautiful nursery called Roger's Gardens and ate dinner at their restaurant the Farmhouse.  And then today, we walked to Crystal Cove Beach and found the Beachcomber.  We had their
Manager Response: Hi Cathleen, thank you for your 5-star review of your stay at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. We are elated that you enjoyed your stay with us and felt safe while visiting. The safety of our owners, guests, and associates is our priority. We are happy that you explored all that our local area has to offer including the great food.  We are pleased Catherine was able to assist during your stay. We hope to welcome you back for another awesome visit!

Summary: Snack shop personnel rude and didn't pack all our items.  Valet parking attendants screwed around and instead of talking to people for assistance yelled lazily from behind the stand.  How embarrassing Marriott!! So disappointing you allow your employees who park cars to harass guests!!!!! Do not recommend this property!!!  Spend your money elsewhere!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave a review. We regret hearing about your experience at our on-site convenience store. We strive to provide the best service to all our guests, rather than the experience you described. We are also saddened to hear that you encountered difficulties at your parking garage. Unfortunately, this is a third party off-site garage; we encourage you to use our resort's parking in the future - it's complimentary with your stay!

Summary: I was surprised to see the first few reviews being less than five stars. I’ve stayed here several times as a non-owner guest and have never had anything less than stellar service.  We’ve stayed in high rooms and low rooms and never had an issue with any loud sounds. I never hear anyone, actually.   We love the beautifully manicured grounds and all the family friendly activities. My kid brings his bike and bikes around the little park and streets.  We live in the area so this is a staycation for us. We don’t even have to leave the property, but if we do, the beach is close by and the shuttles are convenient.
Manager Response: Hi Bunsie, thank you for your review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. We are delighted that you had an amazing stay with us and choose our location for your staycation. We are happy your family enjoys our grounds and the activities offered. We look forward to providing you another amazing stay!

Summary: We planned to stay here for a quiet, relaxing weekend and ended up with the exact opposite.  Our room was in a terrible location.  We wanted to be by the adult pool and have a ground floor unit there we ended up by the “family” pool next to the elevator.  Not the quiet, relaxing weekend we expected. The resort was unwilling to accommodate our request. I’ve stayed at many Marriott Vacations properties as a Vacation Club Member and have always had excellent service. The fact that this property would not try to work with with me on making my stay more enjoyable was a major disappointment. I would recommend stying elsewhere with better customer service!
Manager Response: Hi Liasun, thank you for your review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. We are saddened to learn that your stay did not meet your expectations due to your villa location. As a Vacation Club Owner, you are aware that site owners do receive priority on villa location preferences. While we would love to meet everyone’s requests, it sometimes is just not possible when occupancy is high.  However, the resort team will make every effort to accommodate. We will share your feedback with the front office leaders to review the villa assignment process. Thank you for being an Owner with Marriott Vacation Club, we hope to provide a better experience on a future stay.

Summary: From the moment we arrived and were welcomed we were treated like honored guests. When we checked in, Zach made us feel like royalty, recognizing our Elite status. Because this trip was due to a last minute cancellation, we did not expect to get a top floor with a view in one of our favorite villas, but Zach was persistent in checking and after several attempts he finally made a call and got us in our favorite building on the top floor. This Marriott could be the model for COVID19 protection: cleanser everywhere, remote controls sanitized and wrapped in plastic, unused rolls of toilet paper and Kleenex. Most everyone says “My Pleasure”. Well maintained and everything works. We loved our stay and will be back next year.
Manager Response: Hi Dave, thank you for your review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. We are delighted you enjoyed your stay with us and Zach was able to assist in meeting your room requests. We will share your kind comments with Zach's leaders. Thank you for recognizing out Commitment to Clean, as we strive to keep all of our owners, guests, and associates safe.  We cannot wait to welcome you back next year!

Summary: What a gorgeous property just a short walk away from beautiful Crystal Cove beach. We inquired about an ocean view room at check-in and received the most amazing panoramic view of the ocean and hillside. The unit was modern and clean and the grounds were amazing. It truly felt like we were somewhere far away. Our teenagers loved the pool and basketball court, as well as the marketplace for after dinner ice cream runs. We will definitely be back!
Manager Response: Hi, thank you for your review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. We are delighted that you and your family had a wonderful stay with us. We are happy you enjoyed some of the amenities our site offers and took in the beautiful views. We cannot wait to welcome you back for another vacation!

Summary: First off I would like to start off by saying the property is gorgeous! Walking into the lobby it was beautiful and the pool and ocean view was spectacular.  what to expect  Check in: Masks in lobby and pool area Jacuzzi , fire pits,  arcade not open. Pool bar had plexiglass all around it you had to wait in line and they would call you up to order you could not sit at the tables next to the bar and just have drinks you had to order food as well. So the vibe wasn’t very fun. Upper pool who is gorgeous there was no one up there I rotated my chair to face the sun and security came over and harassed my sister-in-law and I . They have no clue when the Jacuzzi will be open and they’re only answer is Covid however every other hotel we stayed at Jacuzzis are open I feel like since this
Manager Response: Hi, thank you for your review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. We are saddened to learn that you did not enjoy your birthday weekend with us. We understand your frustration with the some of the Covid-19 guidelines, however keeping our owners, guests, and associates safe is our number one priority. We will share your feedback with the site leaders as we are always striving to improve our guests experience. We do appreciate your patronage and hope to provide a better experience on a future stay.

Summary Heading: Garbage management, threatened a pregnant woman
Summary: I stayed here for just 1 night and the 5 minutes I spent on the phone with the manager was enough to solidify my 1-star rating. If you feel like reading, please see below. If not, the highlight is: this is a time share and they only care about their owners (they get the nice, top floor, good view units; they get wine and dined by management; they are the priority). If you are not an owner, you are only there to fill a room, you are a nobody, you are not important to them. And if you are pregnant, they will threaten you.  For context – we decided to spend a night at a nice resort to celebrate my birthday and our baby moon (I’m 20 weeks pregnant). The only (ONLY) thing we asked for when we made the reservation AND during check in was a higher floor, quiet room. To be crystal clear
Manager Response: Hello, Camila. Thank you for taking the time to share your experience at Marriott’s Newport Coast Villas. We value the feedback of all our customers – including those who are staying on an exclusive associate discount rate that is reserved for employees. As you can imagine, it would be highly inappropriate to disenfranchise an owner in order to accommodate a member of our team.  While we want everyone to have a positive experience, villa assignment and views are prioritized for resort owners and Marriott Vacation Club members.    Regarding the fact that you felt threatened by the manager of the resort who was addressing your concerns, we apologize.  It is never our intent to be disrespectful to anyone staying at our resorts; however, the associate benefit can be revoked for any associate not complying with the terms and conditions.  This was not a threat directed specifically to you. Rather, they were ensuring you understood the policy and potential impact of not following the policy.   Please know in the future, if you book a reservation at an associate discount rate, we will continue to prioritize villa assignment for our owners.

Summary Heading: Dirty, wish it felt more inviting
Summary: Saw this in my kitchen today. We are here on a preview package, so far not very enticing to convince me to want to own here.   Checking in was fine. Lots of people in line which we expected. No problem. Unfortunately didn’t get to have a room with a stellar view. Those are reserved for owners, understandably. Wish prospective owners were able to experience some of the same.
Manager Response: Hi, thank you for your review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. We are saddened to earn a 2 star review. We will share your feedback about your room with the site leaders so they may review with the housekeeping team. As stated our Owners do receive priority in villa location, but the front desk will also do their best to accommodate others requests if available. We do thank you for staying with and hope to host you at a Marriott Vacation Club location in the future.

Summary Heading: Good luck sleeping - paper thin walls
Summary: This hotel has some positives, but if I can’t get a good night’s sleep on my vacation the hotel is going to get 1 star. First issue is that the walls are paper thin. You hear everything going on in the rooms around you, above you, below you. If a neighbor wakes up early or stays up late, you’re going to wake up early or be forced to stay up. My biggest issue was with an inconsiderate neighbor blaring their music past 1am. I called the front desk several times to complain, and they did a terrible job addressing the issue. Horrible customer service and paper thin walls ruined what should have been a relaxing much needed vacation.
Manager Response: Hi Jay, thank you for your review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. We are saddened to hear you did not enjoy your stay with us due to noise from your surrounding area. Thank you for bringing the noise to the attention of the front desk. We will share your experience with the site leaders so they may review proper procedure with the team. We do appreciate your patronage and hope to provide a better experience on a future stay.

Summary: Do not stay here, this GM doesn't care at all about his guests, he actually bullied us when we checked out early due to an unacceptable stay.  Too noisy, wouldn't change our room, didn't have amenities they said they did have, and as a loyal Marriott Titanium level member this hotel and this GM are the worst!
Manager Response: Hi, thank you for your review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. We are saddened to hear that you did not enjoy your stay and checked out early due to noise near your room area. While we do like to accommodate guests move requests, sometimes this can be challenging due to occupancy levels. The interaction you describe with the General Manager sounds very out of the ordinary and is something we will review. We do appreciate your patronage and thank you for being a loyal Marriott Bonvoy member.  We hope to provide a better experience on a future stay.

Summary Heading: Hotel polices are not customer friendly
Summary: Beautiful property but be warned that check in is 4pm and check out 10am. They do not allow you to use the pool day of check out. So after you get settled in the sun is down and then the next morning housekeeping was buzzing our doorbell at 10:00 on the dot to get you out. Was not allowed to enjoy the pool during our one night stay. What a waste!
Manager Response: Hi, thank you for your review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. We are saddened to hear that you did not enjoy your stay with us. We understand check-in begins at 4pm but you are able to use the amenities should you arrive early and the room not yet be available. While we do not participate in the Marriott Bonvoy benefit of late checkouts, housekeeping should allow a grace period for you to vacate the room. We will share your feedback with the site leaders. We do appreciate your patronage and hope to provide a better experience on a future stay.

Summary Heading: Wonderful relaxing place, perfect for a family weekend away
Summary: Between the gorgeous views, the wonderful service, the amazing well appointed 2 bedroom suite (which was perfect for our family of 5), this was a great getaway from our family.   Although some amenities were closed due to Covid, we took advantage of the pools (which were very sparsely populated which we were happy about given the pandemic), the amazing little trolley that takes you to the beach- we had a family beach day, and the golf carts that were eagerly waiting to take you back to your condo at the end of the day.   I was so happy to have a washer dryer and full kitchen for snacks. And our cute balcony was amazing!   We walked along the amazing property for at least an hour each day and there are so many little corners to discover.   Thank you Marriott for making our stay
Manager Response: Hi Sandy, thank you for your review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. We are delighted you had a great stay with us. We are happy you enjoyed some of the onsite amenities as well as our grounds. We hope you visit us again soon!

Summary: Stayed here in a nice 2 bedroom in the 2799 area on the third floor.  Easy parking, elevator and not busy.  Can see Catalina on a clear day.   Nice facility well maintained and great walking areas.  Pool is open but is cold at this time, some kids are using.    Have been here before and is very nice, Has alimited market place but large grocery sotre is up the hill on the left, must drive.  Free transportation of Crystal Cove and malls if you want.
Manager Response: Hi, thank you for your review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. We are happy that you enjoyed your stay with us and were able to enjoy some of the walking areas around the resort. We hope you will visit us again.

Summary: Due to the pandemic this year, my husband took me here for my birthday celebration instead of our annual overseas birthday trip.  The last time we stayed here was when the resort first opened many years ago.  As a titanium elite member, we requested a villa with an ocean view.  The staff assigned us a nice villa with a beautiful ocean view.  Our check in process was smooth.  They handed us some paper about the resort when we checked in. I would recommend that they cut down on paper and make things contactless by just emailing or texting the resort info.  I now make it a point to bring our own disinfecting products and pillows with sheets and comforter whenever we stay at a hotel/resort which gives us an added sense of safety.  Our villa was very clean and comfortable with
Manager Response: Hi, thank you for your review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. Thank you for celebrating your birthday with us! We are delighted that you had a great stay with us and were able to enjoy some of the resort amenities. We look forward to hosting you again soon!

Summary: From the moment we arrived, I realized their COVID-19 protective measures were less than what I was comfortable with!  Check in process was unfortunately a major disappointment and made me very uncomfortable. There was a big line of people waiting for check in INSIDE the lobby and it took me 45 min to finish the check in. While they asked people to stand 6 feet apart and have one person per group to check in, people start gathering in groups that made social distancing less than 6 feet. Worst part was the lobby is still used by guests who are not checking in and there were many people WITHOUT MASKS in the lobby chatting and laughing out loud.  when I brought up my concern to one of the staff members, she told me there is so much they can enforce which I understand but I also saw
Manager Response: Hi, thank you for your review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. We are very saddened to hear that guests and associates are not respecting the Covid practices and policies in place. The safety of our associates, owners, and guests is our number one priority. We will share your feedback with the site leaders so that this may be addressed.

Summary: This is a beautifully located resort and we have had great stays in the past. The staff had always gone above and beyond and always been very friendly. However, our last stay was very disappointing, both staff and cleanliness were issues we faced. We first checked in and noticed cheerios in different locations around the room (we did not have cheerios with us). We opened the remote in the "clean remote bag" and there was caked on food in 2 of the numbers. There was a glob of someone else's hair in the corner of the master bedroom. It also felt dusty and musty. I called to see if we were able to move to a cleaner unit anywhere on property and was told that wasn't an option due to COVID-19 restrictions (which I understood) but they would clean the room again.  I agreed to that and
Manager Response: Hi, thank you for your review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. We are saddened to hear about the opportunities encountered during your stay and that no one from the resort followed up with you. This is not the standard we set for our rooms.
