The villa was very large with lots of space to relax. The beds were firm and very comfortable. The sofa bed was also very comfortable. All the units are two bedrooms with fully equipped kitchen that has all the basic pots, pans, plates, utensils etc.

A special price brought us in for a 2 day stay after a 12 day Alaska cruise. Great view great bed. Room Was ok. Evening food in the bar area was limited for choices. Valet is only service available for cars. At $39.00 per day will keep me away. I had a travelzoo special that made the resort free no charge.

We stayed 3 nights on the timeshare promotion package. It was a great deal. The room and grounds were very nice, most of the staff was nice and helpful. But the timeshare presentations markets this as a 5 star experience and it certainly wasn't that! Our room was right on top of the busy road; it was very loud to leave the windows open or to even use the balcony. We didn't think it'd be a big deal but the road is really busy.... You get a feeling everywhere the resort is overcrowded and you have to compete for amenities. Pool chairs are hard to find, check in line is long, etc. We tried both jacuzzi's on Sat night (even taking a golf cart shuttle to the remote one) and they were both packed. This is what you get for hundreds of units and presumably a couple thousand people

Marriott timeshare resort just off Highway 1, hillside overlooking the Pacific Ocean at Crystal Cove State Park. Spent three nights in a comfortable and well maintained 2 BR, 2 bath apartment with a balcony that offered a gorgeous ocean view. Fast WiFi, plenty of free parking, fully equipped kitchen, flat screen TV in living room and each bedroom. Helpful and friendly staff, from registration to answering questions by phone, text, or email. Free scheduled shuttle service to several area locations. Very satisfied with my experience. Well done Marriott!

Villas are spacious and very nice.  Lots of activities.  Beautiful grounds.  But be aware that there is a lot of walking between the villa and the pool and activity center.  Marriott provides a free shuttle to Crystal Cove Beach, and also the shopping center.  We stayed 4 nights on a "preview package".  I do have a big problem in that the Villas did NOT do their job in giving me my 1,000 points for my Titanium recognition gift and the credit for the 4 nights that I stayed there.  So now it is up to me to pursue Marriott to get what I am entitled.  Calling Marriott is VERY difficult.  I tried to call the Villas yesterday and was told that "everyone had just gone into meeting".  So now I am on cruise ship and cannot call.  I should not have to do this work.  I have spent almost

We received an offer to stay three nights to hear their timeshare pitch and jumped on it.  Being former owners here we know how great a property it is and have stayed numerous times.  We only sold it because of the marine layers here can shroud the sun all week and one never knows how much sun you'll get.....we enjoy sun and warm temps.  This weekend we got lucky and it burned off at noon and ten am each morning so we enjoyed time around the upper pool.  The lower pool is being redone and won't be ready by the looks of it until the fall which was annoying as our unit was down in the basement of the 1200 building so not a great view, but quiet for us.  Our unit was in great condition and we always invite friends to come down and enjoy our time with us.....the units are so large

Time share exchange.  Beautiful facilities and location.  Staff especially cordial.  Two bedroom villa very comfortable.  May June weather can be iffy.  Shuttle service off site to Crystal Cove State Park very convenient.  Other off site shuttle venues available.

spacious 2 bedroom , 2 bathroom with full kitchen and cooking accessories did make the stay very pleasurable and fun. 8 adults and 2 kids and a 1 yr old were content for a 3 night 4 day stay. Very close to ocean within walking distance. Plenty of amenities for everyone. Pools, games, fitness center, etc. Would do it again for our family.

First time staying here, felt like we were back in Tuscany. Beautiful, huge property set on the hillside overlooking the Pacific Ocean. Great location. Loved Newport Beach.  Check in was excellent, we wanted to ensure we had a preferable view, they were very accommodating, ensuring that we were happy with the villa location and view. It was still early, Villa wasn’t ready, so we enjoyed the facilities, had lunch at the poolside grille, then watched Bohemian Rhapsody in the onsite theatre.  Loved our Villa, spacious two bedroom, two bath. Very stylish decor. Large balcony.  We took advantage of the complimentary shuttle to Fashion Island and Laguna Beach. Very convenient in nice vans with great drivers.  Marketplace was very good too, lots of options, kind of pricey.

Summary Heading: Always a pleasure staying at Newport Coast
Summary: We have been a weeks owner at Marriott's Newport Coast property since 2003 and always enjoy our weeks spent there.  A great property, meticulously maintained and in the heart of the vibrant Newport Beach / Laguna coastal communities.

As a Marriott Vacation Club owner for many years, I’ve enjoyed many great vacations. However, this resort was not one of them! First, our villa in bldg 1900 had no view since there were just trees off the balcony. That gave minimal natural light and made villa dreary. We had to walk 2 high staircases to main pool which was a problem for my guest. The worst part of our stay was the pool complex. It was chilly for me to go in the pool, so I just wanted to soak in the hot tub and chat with my cousin. We could not do that because both hot tubs were mobbed with young kids all afternoon. I complained to Mgmt, but then found out from security that their rule allows any age child in the hot tub if they are accompanied by a parent. How can it possibly be safe for young children to stay

We had a lovely time!  We stayed for a week!  Very nice property!   Our room was a little dated but clean! I love the layout of the 2 bedroom!  It would have been nice to have a patio that we could see something, other than a wall!  Not a lot of options for dining!  The pool was wonderful and nice gym!

The property grounds are amazing here.  The pools can get crowded but, the views are awesome here.  We love the big rooms and the amenities on the property.  We have been here a number of time and love it.  This last time we had some issues with our dishwasher but, the maintenance department got it fixed right away and even followed up later that day.

Summary Heading: Excellent Place to Anchor Your Visit
Summary: We have stayed at Marriott’s Newport Coast Villas over 10 times .  They are two bedroom villas with a full kitchen, balcony, two full bath and a large living room.  There are numerous activities every day for adults and children.  There are at least four pools and, from most villas, beautiful views of the Pacific and Catalina Island.  I would not consider anyplace else for our visits.

I only stayed here for one night but I can see myself coming back for a full week.  The property and views are amazing!  We enjoyed the heated pool, hot tubs, and fire pit outside our room.  We stayed at the 3800 building which was very close to everything (gym, theater, pool, game room, etc.)

Why we will return and recommend:  1. Villas are good sized with two nice bedrooms each with a private bathroom (one with a hot tub but we didn't use it). Well equipped kitchen which we used daily and cook a full dinner in one day. Washer and dryer that we used daily which helps conserve the need to pack so much. Nice sized living room area with sofa and balcony off of.  2. Location was very good for our needs. While attending a two day conference in Irvine it was a quick drive from this location with minimal traffic. And a nice 20 minute stroll to Newport Beach. The best of both worlds. 3. Starbucks on sight, inside their market which many items are available; good selection of a variety of items. 4. Numerous activities on site but not stacked one on top the other. Several

Summary Heading: Back again after 8 years and still beautiful
Summary: We stayed in a 2 bedroom villa with another couple for one week. Our view was from the second floor of the 2000 building, and although we could see the ocean, the view was blocked by "trash" trees on the Marriott side of the property fence (not the golf course). Note to management: how about cutting some of those trees down since there are plenty of others and they block lots of views from lots of rooms? (see picture below) Other than that, no complaints at all. Beautiful villa, updated furnishings, stunning grounds, lovely pools, excellent service.Our room was quiet. The resort was full of kids because it was during Spring break week for lots of schools. But the kids we ran into were polite and easy going. You can park right out front for free (one car only) and there are

Summary Heading: Great resort, but very noisy floors, needs updating
Summary: This was our second visit to this property. Love the resort pool, grounds and other amenities. However, this visit left us sleepless for 3 nights. The beds did not provide any back support, they seem broken. We were on the third floor, room 2936. This building faced the road which was noisy, which I understand. However at all times of the night and early morning we kept hearing footsteps from the upstairs unit. We complained and the front desk asked us to call security when it happens again. We called security the next night and the front desk (Gina) told us that there is a family with children above us, hence the noise. The noise continued and we called again. This time the security person told us that there is a lady with her mother in the room above us, so they cannot be

Summary Heading: Beautiful setting right above the beach at Newport Coast.
Summary: Great Marriott resort property. Well maintained and beautiful. Every imaginable amenity. Great staff. Located right in Newport Beach California. This is truly the American version of the French Riviera. Surrounded by more restaurants of every possible ehtnic group and luxury level. This is where you want to bring the wife or the whole family for a fabulous time.

I’m reluctant to write such a positive article, because I don’t want this place to become one of those overcrowded, lackluster family resorts we’re all familiar with. The Marriott Newport Coast villas are amazing. There are several pools with plenty of chairs, umbrellas, towels, and toys. If you are looking for a place to get away with your spouse for an adults only weekend – this is not it. If you’re looking for a perfect family place for kids of any age, you hit the jackpot.  Because this is a timeshare property, you are not pressured into poolside service the same way you are at hotels. The rooms are two bedroom with a living room and kitchen. A short drive away you’ll find grocery stores so you can save money by cooking at home or on the patio grills that are provided.

Summary Heading: nice and roomy, well kept property and a great location
Summary: We ended our spring break trip with 3 nights at the Marriott Newport Coast.  While we wished we had a view of the ocean, we thoroughly enjoyed our time at the property.  The pool and other amenities were nice although we found ourselves travelling most days.  it certainly was "away from it all" yet just a short drive into Laguna and Newport Beach.

We started our week at  Disney and this was supposed to be the big finale! We booked this resort about six months in advance and requested three possible buildings with higher rooms. Called resort several times and even called on day prior to arriving. They told us rooms ready at 3:30 and don’t show up till then. At front desk they said we might have had our request filled if we had showed up earlier instead we got rooms on second floor by the noisy common areas in a building we didn’t request. Then we didn’t get into rooms till 4:30 and we had to wait even then for maids to finish! Not a great way to start a vacation!!!!

The kids really loved this place; the pools, the games, and all the extra activities they could sign up for (especially the build-a-bear). The villa was great (really nice having two bedrooms separate from the lounge and kitchen area). About the only downside was the lack of a first class restaurant on-site. The pool grill is ok, but it was a little frustrating always having to drive somewhere for dinner. There were plenty of options a short drive away, so that is being fairly picky.

Stayed here with my family during Spring Break! First, all of the staff are super friendly and helpful! Our 2 bedroom villas was beautiful and very spacious! The clubhouse had plenty of family friendly activities for both adults and kids! The views from the resort were simply breathtaking! We will definitely be returning to this property in the near future!

If you want to go first class you can't do better than this resort.  Amenities, service, layout, activities and location are all premier.   My wife, 10 year old granddaughter, and I stayed here for five days.  Everyday was special and made more so by the staff at Marriott.  On Sunday we attended a Magic Show at the resort.  We didn't expect much more than a distraction for our granddaughter.  What a surprise to see a truly outstanding magic show worthy of a spot in any of the Las Vegas hotel venues.  Great for kids, but equally wonderful for adults.  One afternoon we attended a wine and cheese tasting, in the morning we attended a coffee and pastry event with guests from various local attractions to explain their offerings and to insure we made the most of our time.  Located at

We had a large family gathering here in March 2019 over spring break with several kids ranging from 2 yo to 12yo.  The pool was heated, great children's activity center, games to entertain kids. In addition, there's putt putt golf, basketball, tether ball, fire pit, sand pit and playground all in good condition. For adults, poolside service was convenient and pool grill had good food. Gym was typical - clean, modern equipment and awesome view of the ocean. Rooms - spacious, updated, clean, enough pots/ pans to cook basic meals. Staff - amazing! They went above and beyond to ensure our stay was comfortable and relaxing. We look forward to returning hopefully soon!

Staying at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas was great.  The only real drawback was having to sit through the 'sales presentation'.  The villa was spacious with good up-to-date funiture.  The kitchen appliances needed updating-stove top showed some age, dishwasher was low.  All countertops (kitchen and both bathrooms could be raised for better utility.  Toilets need to be higher.  Would have been convenient to add pull bars in bathrooms.  View out the back over the golf course to the ocean front was great.  You could see the sunsets, if desired from the balcony.  The balcony was built with a solid 3 foot high wall rather than using see-through wrought iron.  Patio furniture was nice--4 chairs and a table.  We happened to be there when the 'super bloom' was full and that was nice.

These are some of Marriott’s nicest timeshares. The location is perfect and the ocean views are beautiful. It’s close to restaurants and theme parks. There was plenty of room for six of us and only a short drive to Disneyland. We love it. This was our second visit and we will be back!

Summary Heading: Really nice property, great for families!
Summary: I am a very frequent Marriott resident and have been for many years.  However, I have not stayed at a Vaction Club property before.  I was blown away!  Great hotel!  The villas are very spacious and the rooms are very nice!  Well worth the price!!!   The location is fantastic as well.  I highly recommend this spot if you are looking for a place with six or less people for 3 days.  Plenty to do, and this was a good home base for us to go to Huntington down to Laguna.

I may have rated this resort before but it’s worthy of an update. The rooms are all 2 bedroom 2 bath and comfortable for families. We were in building 2100 which is located right next to a great play area for young kids as well as a basketball court for those that are older. Saw many families enjoying a picnic on the grass. A simple walk to the beach is a must. Had dinner out first night at the pool bar as it is the only place to get food other than the marketplace. Be aware they close at 8 pm and they want out of there. Ordered two martinis served in plastic for $35. Ordered the Greek bowl with chicken but they forgot the chicken. Had to beg the bartender to get it as he told me it must not come with chicken. Read the menu.  With that said , everyone had a great time and the

I can’t say enough great things about this place.  First the all the grounds are ALWAYS pristine and beautiful, the resort pools are all awesome, and the villas are very clean.  Also, the villas come stocked with almost everything you’ll need.  Grocery stores and restaurants nearby and the beach is a short 3-5 minute drive away.  All of their staff are professional and welcoming.  Special shoutout to Kady at the front desk and the maintenance team who quickly responded to a minor issue in our room!  Much thanks, we will be back soon!

Very nice Marriott property, with spectacular views - bring your binoculars.  Rooms were nice, property is very well maintained, and you can easily walk down to the harbor.  My only complaint would be check-in.  They are sticklers that you cannot get in before 4:00 - hence there are numerous people lingering in the lobby. However, they did offer wine and cheese which made the wait a little easier.

If you want to visit southern California and stay somewhere that has great views, this is it.  Absolutely loved this property.  Quiet, serene with beautiful views of the ocean.  Rented a car at LAX, drove to Malibu, went to Disneyland (never again) and visited the Long Beach area.  Very easy to navigate from this property!

Summary Heading: Our very favorite place to stay in Newport Beach...
Summary: The views. The staff. The beautiful property. The scale of the facility. The hospitality delivered...  We had a "poor man's" ocean view...Our unit was dated but clean, spacious and well-located. The staff is exceptionally helpful, skilled and professional.   The workout facility is well-equipped but needs more square footage.   We love this property and have fond family memories here.  Recommended...

After a long flight from the UK we were greeted by an enthusiastic guy on reception.  Check in was easy, quick and very informative about the resort and activities on offer. The villa was excellent. Fully equipped kitchen with utensils, oven, fridge and microwave.  Ask for a room in the 4000 block if you want the views and to be away from the crowds.  Very quiet.   Location is good.  The grounds are well maintained and easy access out onto the Pacific Highway.  Excellent facilities for kids - table tennis, volleyball, fosse ball and kids club. BBQ and fire pit areas easily accessible from anywhere on the resort. Coffee shop sold pizzas in the evening if you want to relax and enjoy your accommodation.   Supermarket at Crystal Market - 5 mins. Excellent fish restaurant there

This is a beautiful place to stay. Make sure when you go that you request a room on the top floor overlooking the ocean, golf course, and Pacific Highway. The room was nice but the view you couldn't ask for more.

Summary Heading: An absolutely perfect piece of property
Summary: We loved our stay here. Spent 7 nights as part of a family Disneyland trip. Our villa was beautiful with a spectacular view, right over the golf course. Room was quiet and dark with every comfort we could ask for. Staff were very friendly and responsive. We would absolutely stay here again and highly recommend. You won’t be disappointed!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of Newport Coast Villas!  We are happy you enjoyed your visit and the villa style accommodations.  We do hope to see you again soon for another great stay with Marriott Vacation Club!

Summary: We stayed here for a couple of days for a small high school reunion.  We had the 2 bedroom villa.  The place was clean and roomy.  It has kitchenette and a dining area.  The place was clean and i guess the room was sound proofed.  The place is just right for us and is accessible to a lot of nice places to visit.
Manager Response: Wow, what a great review of your reunion celebration!  We appreciate your kind words are so happy you enjoyed your time with us at Newport Coast Villas.  We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: What an AMAZING property.  Even better when your family already lives in Orange County and you get to visit them once a year and use the Marriott's awesome amenities.  We all had a mini family reunion last Fall and enjoyed making smores around the fire pit.  The Marriott even sells extra long sticks for the occasion.  We rented motorized bikes and took the 2 1/2 hour tour which was absolutely a MUST DO!!!  Well worth the $300 we spent. Our tour guide was very in tune with the sites around Newport. Enjoy!
Manager Response: Hi Pamela, thank you for sharing your review!  We are happy your entire stay was wonderful at Newport Coast Villas and that you enjoyed some great activities.  We appreciate your review and look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: I recently stayed at this property for a week and it was absolutely fabulous! I don't even know where to begin....perhaps check-in.  Thomas, I believe is the gentleman's name. He was very pleasant and professional He provided me with detail of the property and what it has to offer.   The location of the villa was perfect. No stairs to deal with is always a plus!  The inside of the villa was so very clean and well put together.  I really like the fact that I had a full kitchen and dining area.  I utilized the kitchen every day.  The secondary bedroom was great for guests.  The master bedroom was amazing.  I especially enjoyed the sunk-in tub and the double shower.  AMAZING.  the arcade room was pretty decent.  I actually spent about an hour playing video games. LOL  I was super
Manager Response: We are happy to be your home away from home in Newport!  Thank you for your great review on TripAdvisor.  We cannot wait to see you again!

Summary: Just a great place to stay with a family.  Lots of room, 4 beds, two full bathroom and a full kitchen.  Staff is great here.  So many pools, and they are all heated and look amazing.  Right by the beach.  Doesn't get any better than this for a family vacation.
Manager Response: Thank you, Delos!  We are happy your family had a great stay and look forward to seeing you again at Newport Coast Villas.

Summary: we stayed a week in Sept 2018 and had a great trip. the grounds are beautiful and right across the street from the ocean. we found a great little fish market right down the hwy. it think it was called bear fish market. we got take out several times throughout our stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review of Newport Coast Villas, Tina.  We appreciate your feedback and look forward to your next stay with us at a Marriott Vacation Club resort!

Summary: Nice area, nice rooms & pleasant staff.    Avoid the lowest tier of rooms due to (i) adjacent golf course work which begins slightly before 6 am each day (think blowers), (ii) stairs from parking (tough luggage lug) and (iii) less desirable views, if any.  We requested a higher room both before arrival & at check in, it wasn't possible to honor that request.  lower floors roughly in units 1700-1200 aren't a good choice...  Finally don't expect any attention if you are Marriott Platinum.  Process feels both "pleasant" and "scripted."
Manager Response: Thank you for letting us know about your recent visit to Newport Coast Villas.  We are sorry the villa location did not work out for your visit and appreciate your feedback.  While we do hope to honor all requests, sometimes it is not possible to do given high occupancy.  We do hope your next stay with Marriott is excellent and thank you for sharing your thoughts with us.

Summary: This was our second time spending a week here. The first time our kids were little and they loved the arts and crafts, painting, movies at night at the pool as well as.swimming.  Fast forward 5 years, My Mom, nephew and I stayed in the best Villa! It was new and so very cleans the views from the pool over the ocean were incredible. The pool, pool bar and concerige were awesome. We had such a comfortable, relaxing and wonderful time!  My Mom wants to pack her bags now and.go back. Also.we are from the East Coast.
Manager Response: We are happy to hear you had a wonderful second stay with your family at Newport Coast Villas!  Thank you for your review and we hope to see you again soon for visit #3!

Summary: Best timeshare experience in fifteen years at fabulous resort in everyway!! Not enough stars available to rate this exceptional report! A special thanks to Dalia for our special accommodations and requests.  All personnel well trained and they all set a high standard for customer service. Treat yourself and spend time at this outstanding resort close to the beach and communities of Newport Beach, Laguana Beach and Huntington Beach and 40 minute drive to see the Queen Mary in Long Beach plus many activities,
Manager Response: It's an honor to be the best vacation ownership experience you have had!  Thank you for sharing your feedback and for making us your resort of choice in Newport.  We hope you will return soon!

Summary: Meet family here for a few days to connect and enjoy the area. The grounds, pool, rooms and atmospheres made it hard to leave. Great rooms and nice staff that even with a power outage did not disappoint. Hint; don’t miss sitting by the fire pit in the evening, a great way to unwind for a great nights sleep.
Manager Response: We are happy you enjoyed your stay with your family, Gary!  Thank you for your review and for choosing Newport Coast Villas.

Summary: This is a Marriott Vacation Club property, but you do not need to be a time-share owner to stay here. It’s a short (maybe 30 minute) drive to Disneyland, a short drive or quick walk to Crystal Cove beach, and about a ten minute drive to Laguna Beach.   The units aren’t actually free-standing villas; these are oversized ~700  s.f. suites with about four or more on each floor with shared walls between each one. The “Villas” have 2 separated bedrooms, 2 separated full baths, a full kitchen, dining table, and a full living room, featuring a clean, modern design.  There are a total of 3 TVs in each unit, and the living room TV has a DVD player. The WiFi is complimentary and works well.   The master bedroom has a king-sized bed and the en-suite bath had a large jacuzzi tub, a large
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing Newport Coast Villas, Katelynn!  We are happy you had a great stay with us and do hope you will return soon the next time you are in southern California.

Summary: This resort is in the top ranking of Marriott Vacation Club properties.  The resort features about 700 Villas and provides an exceptional view of the pacific ocean.  The issue of late is more Villas, particularly on the ground floor or even second floors have obstructed views due to the growth of the trees which are planted on the Pelican Hills golf course which sits directly to the south.  The resort does a good job of accommodating your request but if a pacific ocean view is part of your planning make sure you take the obstruction issue into consideration.  Staff is professional and pleasant.  There are complimentary shuttles to various shopping and the Crystal Cove beach.  Each Villa is a 2 bedroom unit and can sleep up to 8.  The Villas are great for entertaining as they are
Manager Response: Hi Fredy, we are happy to hear you enjoyed your visit to Newport Coast Villas!  Thank you for being a part of Marriott Vacation Club and for sharing your vacation greatness!

Summary Heading: Beautiful resort sprawling across the hills above the ocean!
Summary: Beautiful Marriott timeshare property with about 40 buildings, a main activity center and preview center, one large pool area, two smaller pools, tennis courts, a putting green and sports court.  Also, a sand volleyball court, several firepits and public bbqs.  Either ask to be close to the main pool or the tennis courts (there is a separate pool by the tennis courts and it tends to be quieter up there).  They also have daily onsite activities and a bar/food service.  Large two-bedroom villas, with full kitchens, living rooms, two bathrooms, one large balcony and a smaller Juliet balcony of the master.  Ocean view isn’t possible from every unit, so ask for an upper floor if that’s important to you.    20 to 40 minute drive to many wonderful attractions, including beaches, Balboa
Manager Response: We are happy you had a great visit to Newport Coast Villas!  There is so much to do at the resort, you barely have to leave the comfort of the property.  We hope your next stay is soon!

Summary: We stayed in a two bedroom villa with an ocean view. The ocean and beach  is actually across the street. The property is well maintained and has a lot of amenities for families. Every day offers different events or you can lounge at the pool complex. We did eat at the pool side bar a couple times but mostly used the property for our base of travels to Southern Cal attractions. The property is well staffed and everyone was friendly.   Advice if doing more than local travel:  The Orange County Toll Road system does not have toll booths. If renting a car this could be a problem. Since the property is near the 73 toll freeway your directions north and south on Google or Mapquest will always suggest 73. I downloaded the Cal Toll Roads App and registered our rental car before using
Manager Response: Thank you for letting us know about your stay!  We appreciate your review and look forward to seeing you again at Newport Coast Villas.

Summary: We stayed here as a family of 5 visiting the area. We had a two bedroom place which also had two fold out couches, so plenty of room. Staff are great, lots of different things to do. Would definitely recommend for larger families wanting to stay in the area or those looking to book somewhere where there’s activities to do on sight.
Manager Response: Thank you for bringing your family to Newport Coast Villas!  We are glad you enjoyed your stay and the activities on site.  Please visit again soon!

Summary: We spent Christmas week at Newport Coast and were surprised that other guests saw this as an opportunity to decorate.  Many had lights on their patios and we even saw a few trees on the decks.  The property itself was exceptional as always.  Some of the activities were limited on Christmas Day, but otherwise, it was a normal week.  Several times walking around the property, we were surprised by a pop-up happy hour or barbecue.  The lower pool is being completely renovated (meaning completely dug up when we were there).  Unlike the summer, though, there was plenty of space at each of the other pools.  The water was heated to about 80 degrees.  The weather was great for six of the seven days were were there.  Generally, the weather is a bit riskier in the Winter, though.  The
Manager Response: We are happy to hear you had a great holiday vacation at Newport Coast Villas!  Thank you for your review and we look forward to your return!

Summary: We stayed here for 5 days in October 2018. The room was spacious and had all our basic needs. We were told we would have an ocean view but we were in the bottom floor and could only see other villas. I assume the upper floors have lovely views. We also were at a villa at the top end of the property which had access to a nice pool and game/fire area. To get to the main pool area we had to walk awhile. Even though they offer a shuttle and we called for one we were treated terribly by the driver when he picked us up...he made a few comments like “what’s wrong you don’t feel like walking today?” And “the weather is nice enough to walk”! I was embarrassed wondering if the shuttles were only for guests with special needs or something but all my children were also embarrassed and we
Manager Response: Hi Jenny, thank you for letting us know about your visit to Newport Coast Villas!  We appreciate your feedback and apologize there were a few hiccups during your stay.  Rest assured, your comments will be shared with the resort leadership team to use as a training opportunity.  We do hope your next stay with Marriott is wonderful and thank you for visiting!

Summary: I'm an MVC owner but this is my first visit to this property.  By far the best of all the MVC properties we've been to, except maybe for Waiohai on Kauai.  Our unit (4100 building) had a wonderful view of a Pelican Hill golf hole and the ocean below.  Beautiful at sundown from the balcony.  Very large two bedroom apartment with all amenities and very fresh looking furniture and appliances.  Parking was ample and the pool area was great.  Will sure come again.
Manager Response: Thank you for being an Owner, Neil!  We are happy you had a great stay at Newport Coast Villas and look forward to hearing about your future travels with Marriott Vacation Club.

Summary: To be fair this is only a 3 star property but it failed to impress. To start I am a Marriott’s Platinum Elite customer! Eventhough the property isn’t rated on the same level as Pelican Hill and RC Laguna Niquel I still expected more. I requested an ocean view and received a room overlooking multiple homes under construction. On 1-21-18, upon checkout I discovered the gentleman that checked me in forgot to give me a parking pass. I woke up to a large orange sticker on the windshield of my brand new Mercedes Benz. Very disappointed! This property needs more training in basic hotel and hospitality practices.
Manager Response: Hi Allison, thank you for your feedback on your recent visit to Newport Coast Villas.  We are really sorry that the view was not what you expected and that you were not issued a parking pass.  Your comments will be shared with the resort front desk and used a training opportunity.  The resort is a vacation ownership location and there is an obligation to provide our Owners with their view requests as a priority.  We do hope your next stay with Marriott is excellent and thank you again for your review.

Summary: Beautiful location and views. Easy beach access. Great views and pools. Pools are great with great food. Customer service is excellent. Food and drinks fantastic. Full kitchen and great vons pavilions near by.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to bring your family to Newport Coast Villas, Kimberly!  We thank you for your review and look forward to a future stay.

Summary: This is our third visit to the Villas and enjoy the location, amenities and access to the beach. the units are 2 bedroom, 2 bath and have full kitchens. There are several grocery stores nearby if you cook and numerous restaurants and places to eat in Newport Beach.  There are plenty of activities included in your stay including first-run movies, and tons or activities for the kids.
Manager Response: We are happy to have you back for a third visit, Jim!  Thank you for your great review and for making us your vacation spot in Newport.  We appreciate you!

Summary Heading: Perfect 2 Bed Getaway In Newport Beach
Summary: The rooms here just couldn't be any better including views and spacious villas. Location is the best between Newport Beach and Laguna right off Pacific Coast Highway. Highly recommend this for couples and families, a lot of room for all.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review on TripAdvisor!  We are glad to hear Newport Coast Villas made for the perfect getaway.  We hope you will return soon!

Summary: This place is amazing! Gorgeous 2 bedroom condos with great kitchen for making meals. All the amenities a person needs with several swimming pools, activities galore, and night time music! Close to Laguna Beach and Crystal Cove State Park.
Manager Response: It sounds like the perfect stay, Laurie!  Thank you for sharing your vacation greatness with us on TripAdvisor.  We cannot wait to have you back!

Summary: Check in was a breeze.  Our check in person (ilionna)[sic] was very personable and patient and assisted us in getting an excellent unit with a spectacular view of the ocean.  The poolside bar was handing for a nice lunch and the bartender couldn't have been nicer.  As big as this place is you wouldn't even know it.  Very close to Crystal Cove State Park which is a treasure.  Our favorite town was very nearby Luguna and the Crystal Cove shopping center probably has the best view of any shopping center that I have ever seen.  Overall 5 Stars!
Manager Response: We are happy to hear your stay was perfect from check-in to check-out!  THank you for your great review and for choosing Newport Coast Villas.  We hope to welcome you back soon!

Summary: Loved our villa. Oversized shower in master bath with 2 shower heads big enough for two people; lighted expandable, adjustable mirror on wall to see the back of your hair or putting on your makeup; balcony big enough for the table/chairs for 4 people.    Lots of activities. Morning yoga, painting classes, face painting for kids. They have a kids club with organized games/activities our 3 yo granddaughter loved.  5 pools, the largest of which is a heated salt water pool. Temps were in mid-60’s the week before Xmas and a heated pool was perfect! 2 hot tubs, 1 at each end of pool.   They have a Christmas boat parade at Balboa Island (this is a don’t miss if you’re there the week before Christmas!) and the very friendly staff let us rent beach chairs. We were allowed to take them
Manager Response: Great rooms and great amenities make for a great time at Newport Coast Villas!  Thank you for your review and for sharing your feedback.  We appreciate it and cannot wait to see you again!

Summary Heading: A perfect location for our week stay
Summary: We had a two bedroom, two bath villa on the second floor of our complex that looked across the property to the ocean. The balcony was spacious and had a nice table and four chairs.  The view was spectacular, particularly the sunsets.  The rooms were spacious and well appointed. Comfy beds and pillows, lots of closet space and hangers and dresser drawers.  Nice dining and living room space plus a great kitchen. All the utensils you would need, dishes and silverware, pans and skillets, plus cupboard space for groceries.  Meticulously clean and well maintained space. Furniture seemed almost brand new. Washer and dryer with detergent in the villa.  We primarily left the complex every day to explore the area. However there are dozens of activities to keep you busy at the resort: a
Manager Response: Hi Edie Ann, we appreciate your review of your recent stay!  Thank you for the feedback and we will be sure to let the front desk know about the parking passes.  We hope to see you again soon at Newport Coast Villas!

Summary: Was assigned a 2 bedroom unit at bUilding 4600. It was a corner room on the top floor which had a fantastic view.   Pros: Spacious 2 bedoom unit. Has a washer and dryer. Kitchen comes with plates, cups, glasses, coffee, dishwasher cleaning tablets. Amazing view. Very clean. Plenty of space to park your car. Plenty of pools and bbq areas.  Cons: Not really a con, but just in case you are not aware. Housekeeping is once a week. Check in could have been faster. We arrived at 3 and room was not ready until 3:30 (although I had checked in with the Marriott app to arrive at 2sh).  Highly recommended.
Manager Response: It's wonderful to hear you had a great time with your family at Newport Coast Villas!  Thank you for choosing Marriott Vacation Club and for sharing your #vacationgreatness.  We look forward to your return!

Summary: This resort is wonderful.  Had a view of the Pacific ocean.  Resort has five pools, there are 3 in front of check in desk.  Pool parties with entertainment.  All new appliances and furniture.  Activities include walks to the beach and shopping.
Manager Response: Hi Brandy, we are pleased to hear you had a wonderful vacation at Newport Coast Villas!  Thank you for taking the time to share your #vacationgreatness on TripAdvisor!

Summary: We loved our stay at the Newport Coast Villas! Absolutely stunning view from our condo in the 3900 building. Check in was friendly, welcoming and easy. Condo was available earlier than expected - we received a text as promised when it was ready. Condo was very nice. Beds were comfortable. We were here the week between Christmas and New Year so there were a lot of families here enjoying the pool and the amenities. Parking in front of the condo was tougher to find later in the evening but we were able to find a spot in the next section up so it wasn't a big problem. We would definitely recommend this property and would be happy to return to this beautiful part of the world.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of your recent stay!  We are happy you chose Newport Coast Villas and we look forward to your next visit.

Summary: My family and I decided to stay close to home this year for Christmas, but wanted to experience something different.  Without a doubt, we are so happy that we looked into Marriott Newport Villas.  The property is spectacular.  It is nestled right along the coast , and provides fantastic views of the ocean. All of the villas have a perfect view of the ocean, and are some of the most spacious rooms I've ever seen.  The two bedroom villas have a full kitchen and living room, and can sleep up to eight people.  It's truly resort living at it's finest! There are tons of daily activities on the property but if you choose to venture out, you're close to all of the major attractions.  There is a shuttle service that provides rides to some local spots.  Your dining choices on the property
Manager Response: We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your visit to Newport Coast Villas.  Thank you for sharing your review and we look forward to your next stay with Marriott Vacation Club!

Summary: We stayed at this beautiful property on a marketing promotion through Marriott rewards and loved every minute of it. I would have given it a 5 but we didn’t have a view of the ocean and the only have one restaurant on property and it’s not that good! Every room on the property is a 2bdrm villa with full kitchen and cookware. It’s only a 5 minute drive to the nearest beach and maybe a 10 minute drive to Laguna beach. The restaurants and grocery stores in town offer a discount if your staying at the property. Newport Beach is a beautiful area and we will definitely visit again!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to visit Newport Coast Villas!  We are happy you enjoyed your stay and the preview of Marriott Vacation Club.  We look forward to your return!

Summary: My family loved this property!  It is a great location for visiting many area attractions, has an amazing view of the ocean, and lots of activities on site to enjoy.  We are MVC members, and will definitely put Newport coast on our return list!
Manager Response: We are pleased to hear you had a wonderful time at the resort!  Thank you for your review and for choosing Marriott Vacation Club for your #vacationgreatness

Summary: We came to check in at 3:45 pm our room was not ready. It is now 5:16 a m we are still not sure n our room. We are platinum level with Marriot. We have been traveling since 6am this morning, this is unacceptable.
Manager Response: We are sorry to hear about the issues you encountered during check-in.  Our team would be happy to personally follow up with you.   Please contact our customer care team at 800 936 6824 or by email at customer.care@vacationclub.com.  We look forward to hearing from you soon.

Summary Heading: Nice rooms (with few issues), but less than average service
Summary: This was my second time staying at this Marriott property, and this time for four nights (12/22 - 12/26/18, 2 bedroom villa). The property is known as the Marriott's Newport Coast Villas, but it's one of Marriott's Vacation Club (aka Marriott timeshare property) that also uses unused rooms as hotel rooms. Unfortunately, they missed the mark again with check-in issues. As with the first time, the check-in process was less than optimal. Actually, this time it was simply terrible. When we arrived at the property, the front desk wait was unbelievable (long line outside with vehicles and even longer lines inside). After a long wait (FYI - there is no priority lane for Marriott status members), I finally had the chance to check-in only to be told that our room was not ready as we had
Manager Response: Hi Tom, we appreciate your feedback and will share this with the resort leadership team. We hope your next stay with Marriott is exceptional!

Summary: This is a massive property.  The property grounds are well maintained.  The location is stellar.  The apartments spacious and clean.  We were assigned to building 4000, ground floor.  We enjoyed our view.  Our building was 4 floors, with elevator.  Other buildings also have elevators.  Some do not.   Prior to your arrival they will reach out by phone and/or email with questions to your preferences.  I can say building 4000, 4100, and 4200 all were exceptional locations.  I'm certain there are other "perfect spots".  My guess is high floors in 4300-4700 would have great views as well with ocean and grounds below,  Try for a high or top floor whichever building you are assigned.  We rented a car so actually did not take advantage of the resort itself with any amenities.  Sunsets
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your #vacationgreatness on TripAdvisor!  We are happy your family had a wonderful visit and look forward to your return.

Summary Heading: A spectacular view from the room
Summary: This is the second time we are staying at Marriott Newport Coast Villa , the first being 3 years ago. As always , Marriott live up to its expectation of being one of the top vacation timeshare. The room is in an immaculate condition and with a view overseeing the Pelican Hills Golf Course.  Go for the 4200-4700 series rooms which offer a view that is worth a million.  The property is huge and we spent one morning exploring it. As it sets itself upon the Pacific Ocean , the sunset is beautiful too. The Crystal Cove Trail is a short walk from the resort and offer a quiet respite just strolling along the coast line.  Good choice for a family vacation away from the city life.
Manager Response: We are pleased to hear you had a wonderful vacation with Marriott Vacation Club!  Thank you for taking the time to share your #vacationgreatness on TripAdvisor!

Summary: We had a lovely condo with a view of the resort and the ocean.   It was spacious, very clean, and all amenities were first rate.  It was furnished with a well stocked kitchen.  We cooked Thanksgiving Dinner!   The activities were numerous for children as well as adults.   All family activities well done!  All pools are heated and spacious with generous chairs and towels.
Manager Response: It's wonderful to hear you had a great time with your family!  Thank you for choosing Marriott Vacation Club and for sharing your #vacationgreatness

Summary: We are Marriott Vacation member and make use of this property while at Newport. Was given a villa with the view of the golf course and the pacific ocean. Beautiful sun rise from our villa.  Only stayed for a night but the whole property is huge with many blocks.  The villa is spacious with modern fittings. I believe they just did some renovations to give the rooms a new face lift.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience on TripAdvisor!  We look forward to hearing about your next vacation with Marriott Vacation Club!

Summary: Our Villa was very nice and very spacious. The pool and recreation areas were great! The only downside was the construction going on behind our villa. They started every  morning at 8am and worked all day long.
Manager Response: It sounds like the perfect vacation with your family!  Thank you for making us a part of your vacation and for choosing Marriott Vacation Club!

Summary: The property is very pretty, the villas are spacious and well kept. Except they put us in the worst room to start with. We had to complain. The traffic noise from that room was awful. You’re trying to seek me a time?! Haha. Employees are nice. The timeshare presentation was nice. But the only restaurant onsite is the pool bar and grill! That alone is a deal breaker for me! And there’s nowhere to walk to. You’d have to get in your car and drive. Just use your Marriott CC and build up the points.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, Jill!  We are always looking for ways to improve and appreciate your feedback on your recent stay.  Please know, your comments will be shared with the senior resort management team.  We do hope to welcome you back soon and thank you again for your review!

Summary: Our home away from home except this home has amazing views, a beach within walking distance and fun activities.   Be sure to ask for a water view.  Just first class facilities.  Be sure to go down for the pool side music.
Manager Response: Thank you for living the vacation life with Marriott Vacation Club!  We appreciate your review and look forward to your return!

Summary Heading: Don’t store valuables in the in-room safe!
Summary: The resort is nice with many activities for kids. The access to beach isn’t ideal, although they do offer free shuttle service, which helps. The pools are nice. The bar/food area is average at best. Our room wasn’t renovated, but was in okay condition.   Everything went well until I left the resort with the key from the in room security box. I realized shortly after checking out that I had down this. I wasn’t too concerned because I assumed they had a backup key. Long story short, when they finally got into the safe that night, the cash that I had left in there was somehow missing. The opened an investigation, but found nothing. Clear gaps in security procedures. Fortunately I’m only out a few hundred dollars, but definitely a lesson learned. Don’t trust the cheap in-room safes
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of your stay with Marriott Vacation Club.  While we are sorry to hear there was an issue with items left in the villa, we do appreciate your feedback on this and have shared your comments with the resort leadership team.  We do hope your next stay with us is excellent and thank you again for your review.

Summary: I have been staying here for at least 8 years with my family and this year, I went with my husband. This resort has it all. The rooms are spacious, clean, and well maintained. The pools are beautiful and the beach is only a short, shuttle drive away. I look forward to going here annually and definitely suggest it if you are looking for a place to stay in  the area.
Manager Response: Our team is delighted to hear you enjoyed your time with us!  Thank you for your review and for sharing your experience.  We look forward to your next stay with Marriott Vacation Club!

Summary Heading: One of Marriott’s finest locations overlooking the Pacific Ocean
Summary: This is a very beautiful place to stay. One of Marriott’s finest vacation resorts. Beautiful villas with many of them having spectacular views of the Pacific Ocean. The rooms are very nice with updated furnishings and clean. The only complaint is the mattress on the bed was softer than we like to sleep on, but they did bring in a bed board to put under the mattress and that helped.  Plenty of activities on site as is the case at all the Marriott’s.  If you like sweet rolls, try some at the marketplace which they have brought in locally from Rose Bakery.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your #vacationgreatness on TripAdvisor!  We appreciate your review and do hope to welcome you back soon to a Marriott Vacation Club Resort.

Summary: Better than anticipated, surprised by the scope, scale and spaciousness.  2 bedroom, 2 bath, big kitchen and joint living space.  I’m sure it was designed by an expert to provide plenty of amenities both in and outside your room.   Pool and hot tub in close proximity to the bar, which has a TV to watch your favorite team.  You’ll feel more at home than at a hotel. Recommend.
Manager Response: Our team appreciates your review and for letting us know about your stay.  We look forward to welcoming you home again soon!

Summary: This is by far the best Marriott Vacation property I have ever stayed at.  Our villa was truly amazing.  It was brand new, clean, well appointed, functional, spacious and had the most beautiful view.  I cannot think of anything negative about the villa.  Check in could have been quicker and the same was true for checkout.  Other than that and the fact that there was not enough parking directly by the villa, I dare to say that this is a really amazing place to relax and vacation.  It is close to Laguna Beach and Newport Beach which have great shopping.
Manager Response: It's wonderful to hear you had such a great visit!  Thank you for letting us know about your #vacationgreatness and for making Marriott Vacation Club a part of your travels.

Summary: This is one of the best resorts I’ve been to. The place is quiet and clean. The rooms and suites are superb. I would vacation here any time. The pool area and activities and the view is amazing. It is very close to the coast, so a lot of beaches are accessible.
Manager Response: Thank you for letting us know about your #vacationgreatness with  your family!  We are pleased the resort was just what was needed for a great holiday.  We do hope to welcome you back soon to a Marriott Vacation Club resort!

Summary: Love this resort being a facilities manager this property is very well kept was able to check in 1 hour early which was a first for me at 17 different marriott staff all very polite only problem la vista closes too early and turns off lights when people are still eating entertainment by la vista could be a bit longer
Manager Response: It sounds like the perfect vacation with Marriott Vacation Club!  Thank you for your review and for making us a part of your #vacationgreatness

Summary: We spent four days at the Marriott in Newport Beach.  Our condo unit was on the top (third) floor of building 1700.  We had a two bedroom, two bath condo with full kitchen, washer/dryer, dining room, living room and comfy balcony overlooking a golf course and the ocean.  The furnishings were clean and well cared for.  The kitchen included a cook top, oven and microwave, fridge, dishwasher, double sink, coffeemaker, toaster, etc.  The beds were comfortable and the master  bath included a roomy double shower.  The living room has a large couch, armchair and large screen TV.  Each bedroom also has a flat screen TV.  The dining room table has six chairs and plenty of outlets for your computer.  They have two huge swimming pools, a market, etc.  Almost everything you could ask for at
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of your recent stay!  We are happy you enjoyed your time with Marriott Vacation Club and look forward to more #vacationgreatness soon.

Summary: It is hard to imagine how they could improve Marriott’s Newport Coast Villas. Our villa had two bedrooms ,two baths and a spacious living and kitchen area. Everything was like new, including three TV’s. The pool and pool side bar were a great place to relax. Great views of the Pacific Ocean made it truly unique.
Manager Response: We are always glad to hear about #vacationgreatness!  Thank you for your review and for making Marriott Vacation Club a part of your travels.  We look forward to hearing about your next stay!

Summary: Location, Location, Location. This is a great Property to visit. Rooms are well appointed and the oversized showers are the best. The Grounds are well kept and activities are every day. Checking went smooth and the staff was gracious. Bingo on Tuesday and I was a Winner. Loved all of this time we spent here. Highly Recommended. The Ride North Along The Coast is a Must, early or late only. We will return 😍
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and for choosing Marriott Vacation Club for your family vacation.  We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: We took one last trip to newport. This time we stayed at the marriot newport villas just off coast Hiway.,the stay was great everything seemed to go well. There is no real food service on property. I thought they would fix that by now. If you want a restaurant you have to find one off property. The pool is great the bar is ok. Seemed to be a large number of young kids around, the noisy kind that party to much. I have been here when things are much quieter. This is a nice place that I like to visit when I can't get to Maui.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and for taking the time to let us know about your stay! We are happy you had a great visit to the resort and look forward to more #vacationgreatness with your family.

Summary: Newport Villas is a beautiful place. Grounds are immaculate, rooms are perfect for families.   The main pool can get overrun with tons of kids but that’s why you are staying at a MVC. To bring the family. All villas are two bedroom two bath with full kitchens and washing machines. It really is like home away from home.  The only downside is it’s not on the beach!
Manager Response: Our team is delighted to hear you enjoyed your time with us!  Thank you for your review and for sharing your experience.  We look forward to your next stay with Marriott Vacation Club!

Summary: We really enjoyed our stay here - our villa offers beautiful ocean view.  It feels so peaceful sitting on the balcony to enjoy our breakfast with the nice view!  Plenty of parking on the property.  Nice shopping centre within short distance.  Shuttle bus to beaches... We will be back!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your #vacationgreatness on TripAdvisor!  We appreciate your review and do hope to welcome you back soon to a Marriott Vacation Club Resort.

Summary: The villas are really nice - plenty of room - nicely decorated.  The staff were all extremely nice and friendly.  We stayed in the 4300 building.  It was a great location with a beautiful view but we were on the 1st floor and there was a lot of foot traffic by our patio.  I recommend at least the 2nd floor if available.  I can see where the villas closer to PC1 would be noisy.  We actually heard the traffic and we were near the top of the property.  Check the property map and make your request early.
Manager Response: We are always pleased to read about our guest’s #vacationgreatness on TripAdvisor!  Thank you for your review and for making us your home away from home!

Summary: All suite Marriott property next to the Pelican HIll golf club in the upscale Newport Beach coastal community.  All the bells and whistles come with the fully equipped units  (kitchens have ranges , refrigerators, dishwashers and even stacked washer/dryers).  A word of advice: take the McArthur Blvd. exit off the highway  73 toll road get to this property otherwise you will have to pay a toll.  Other than that all I can say is Marriott you've done it again !
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing Marriott Vacation Club for your vacation!  We are happy you enjoyed your time at the resort and do look forward to seeing you again!  #vacationgreatness

Summary: My family of 7 stayed here in January. It was a blissful vacation. The resort was quiet and really relaxing. There we activities for everyone! We especially loved that is was an easy drive to the beach, and an easy walk as well.  The near by area had great shopping and restaurants, and Trader Joe's! The 2BR Villa we stayed it was very spacious and fit our family perfectly. We hope to come again some time soon.
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your time with us!  Thank you for your review and for letting us know about your visit on TripAdvisor.  Our team looks forward to seeing you again soon at a Marriott Vacation Club Resort!

Summary: This was my third stay at Marriotts Newport Coast villas. So, yes, you've guessed it, I like it. There are about 700 flats, not just rooms, in the many buildings and easy parking outside each. Why do I point this out? Well, if you search the well-known  websites it's sometimes difficult to understand that you're getting a two- bedroomed flat with a livingroom and a diningroom area with a large table and a fully equipped kitchen with tea and coffee.  A balcony and two bathrooms ensuite. And if need be, the sofa in the livingroom may be turned into a double bed. So a flat easily sleeps six. And then the price isn't too bad. On the premises you'll find several pools, the most popular ones centrally placed by the check-in building where you'll find a lot of activities for old and
Manager Response: We are happy to hear your family had a wonderful time!  Thank you for sharing your #vacationgreatness and for making Marriott Vacation Club a part of your travels.  We look forward to your next stay!

Summary: We enjoyed our stay at the Mariott. There were many nice amenities such as grills and housekeeping. The Tide pool was lovely but could use better lighting in that area at night. Great hot tub! We love the villas,  for couples it would be nice to have both bedrooms with king sized beds. Nice location! I would definitely recommend staying here and would go back again.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your #vacationgreatness on TripAdvisor!  We are pleased you enjoyed your visit to the resort and look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: Qualifier:  I am a Marriott Vacation Club participant, though this does not influence my review. Newport Coast is a villa type resort that upon check-in Madison at the front desk said that is covers about 73 acres.  This resort is in an affluent area or affluent Orange County.  As such, there are numerous upscale eateries located around the area.  Unfortunately, there isn't a sitdown restaurant on property.  The marketplace is comparatively small so picking up groceries beforehand is advised.  The villas are spacious and well equipped.  Our intention was to have a relaxing venue for a reunion of friends.  To this end, the resort exceeded our expectations.
Manager Response: Our team appreciates your review and recommendation on TripAdvisor.  We are happy you enjoyed your visit to the resort and look forward to welcoming you back again in the near future.

Summary: The resort location is perfect for a California get away.  The room was just right for our group of 5 adults and 2 children.  Close to theme parks, beaches, and local attractions. The pools are large and accommodate kids and adults.  Kid friendly activities.  We enjoyed feeding the fish.  There is most everything you need right at the resort.  We will be going back!
Manager Response: Thank you for letting us know about your recent visit.  We are happy to hear about your #vacationgreatness and appreciate you sharing your experience on TripAdvisor.  We look forward to your next stay at a Marriott Vacation Club resort.

Summary: Great location for a peaceful time on the ocean and yet so close to so many restaurants, shopping and activities.  This is a place for the entire family to be together and enjoy the beach and then head into town for a great selection of restaurants / or just chill at the condo and cook in.
Manager Response: It's wonderful to hear you enjoyed your visit with us!  Thank you for your review and for making Marriott Vacation Club your home away from home.

Summary Heading: Italian Villas on the Pacific Ocean
Summary: Love staying at this property, this was our 3rd stay. just up the hill from Crystal Cove State Park, a large, top ocean-side state park great for swimming and beautiful trails for walking, running and biking. 25 min to Disneyland, Laguna Beach, Irvine Spectrum, San Clemente all easy drives,   Beautiful views of the Pacific from the property.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing Marriott Vacation Club!  We appreciate your review and look forward to hosting you again soon.

Summary: This was my first visit and without my young family so I have not tried out all the facilities.  Check-in: The check-in process was relatively fast but given it was my first visit, it would have been nice if I was asked if I needed someone to spend time explain the facilities. The resort is quite spread out.  The Apartment: I was fortunate to be able to get a great ocean view room on the top floor.  The apartment had 2 bedrooms and was spacious and well equipped for a family.  The Facilities & Ground: The resort has great facilities (pools, playground, BBQ areas, etc.) spread across the entire property.  The off-property shuttle buses are convenient but could be more frequent.  The Service: All the staff were nice and efficient. As mentioned above, I think extra assistance for
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review on TripAdvisor!  We are delighted to learn you had a great visit to the resort and look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: Right standard in front of the estuaire . Quiet , garden to have diner or drinks . A good Marriott hotel with a good quality of service . If you have the park view , it is great . You can run or walk around the natural réserve as well .
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your #vacationgreatness!  It’s wonderful to read about your recent stay with us.  We look forward to seeing you again for another great stay!

Summary: This was our first stay at this beautiful resort. We were assigned to a 3rd floor 2 bedroom unit in building 3500 with a partial ocean view. As timeshare owners, we were really impressed. The unit was spacious throughout, and very very clean. They provided spa type soaps and amenities that smelled really nice. Everyone we met was super friendly, and the grounds were beautiful and well maintained. They have a huge fitness center as well with everything you will need. I left a backpack in the unit at checkout, and got a call from Loss Prevention within an hour. Thank you for the honesty and great service!! Looking forward to returning!!
Manager Response: Our team is delighted to read your review and to learn you enjoyed your time at the resort.  We appreciate your feedback and look forward to seeing you again soon at a Marriott Vacation Club resort!

Summary Heading: One bad day can ruin it all, especially if it's the last day
Summary: The theme of this review could be "what more do you want us to do?", which seems to be the phrase of choice of Marriott employees as to why they couldn't help my family. A pattern of disregard and unprofessionalism after the bill has been paid.  For a 7-family reunion, for it to end the way it did, it put a black cloud on the vacation. But Marriott did nothing to alleviate our suffering. My family's minivan was broken into during the last night, a rock was smashed through the sliding door and my son's backpack was stolen. My mom's minivan next to ours was also smashed in with a 2'x2' stone paver (there was at least one other car broken into as well). There was glass everywhere.  Around 7am hotel security called our room to make me aware of the break in. I went down to assess,
Manager Response: Hi Damien, thank you for your feedback on your recent stay.  We are sorry to hear about your experience after your car was broken into during your visit. Our team would be happy to follow up with you.  You may reach our customer care team directly at 800 936 6824 or by email at customer.care@vacationclub.com.

Summary: Lovely vacation club hotel, which we booked through vrbo. It’s perched up on a hillside, not directly on the beach. Every villa is very spacious with 2 bdrms, 2 baths, and a full kitchen. The grounds are very nice, with koi ponds and beautiful views all around. Lots of outdoor sitting areas. Starbucks and a gift shop/convenience store is in the lobby. There are several pools, but no waterslide or baby/wading pools. Poolside cafe had a lot of options. Kids club, video games, play area, chess, ping-pong, bingo, in-house movie theater were great for all different ages. A free shuttle takes you down to Crystal cove beach (too far to walk for most). The beach is swimmable and the sand is nice but it does get very crowded. So many great restaurants, bars, ice cream shops, and shopping
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing Marriott Vacation Club for your travels!  We appreciate your review and do hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Stayed 1st weekend of Sept. Got my 1st choice off my Pre-check wish list. Great view, quiet building, CLEAN LARGE room. Grounds are impeccable. Staff wonderful throughout: front desk, housekeeping, mini-mart all friendly and helpful. Mini-mart remodeled and enlarged since last visit. Resort has easy, quick access to PCH for trips to Newport Beach (north) or Laguna Beach (south). Shopping trip to nearby mall with free shuttle available.  Friend was VERY impressed on their first visit to Newport Beach/Coast
Manager Response: We are pleased you enjoyed your time with us!  Thank you for your TripAdvisor review and for sharing your #vacationgreatness.  We look forward to your next stay at a Marriott Vacation Club resort!

Summary Heading: BEAUTIFUL FRIENDLY HOTEL WITH OCEAN VIEWS
Summary: Just love Marriott’s Newport villas It is a relaxing area with gorgeous views. We were here Labor Day weekend and it was crowded. We would like to see the parking issue resolved There is no parking when u get home late We knew one villa had 4 cars parked there. The food has improved dramatically and service was excellent by the pool area. The sheets need to be better sized as they clearly aren’t long enough for the bed. Cleaning of rooms was excellent and I believe they have changed the chemicals as rooms smell very fresh and not like chemicals  Can’t wait to go back
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your time with us! Thank you for your review and for letting us know about your visit on TripAdvisor. Our team looks forward to seeing you again soon at a Marriott Vacation Club Resort!

Summary: This was our fifth time staying at Newport Coast Villas and once again it was a relaxing vacation. This time we were able to share with my sister and her husband.  We stayed in the 1800 building where we had previously stayed with grandkids.  That time we didn’t notice the highway noise from PCH because we had kid noise.  But this time we did notice more highway noise in this building.... it is the lowest on the property and closest to the highway.  Not a problem really since you don’t spend that much time in the villa.  Pool bar service was good and prompt. Looking forward to next visit.  Marriott always does a great job in taking care of guests!
Manager Response: We are always glad to have you for some #vacationgreatness!  Thank you for your review and for making Marriott Vacation Club a part of your travels.  We look forward to hearing about your next stay!

Summary: We stayed here for a week in April with my in laws. It's a beautiful resort with multiple pools, fire pits and BBQ's. The full kitchen is stocked with everything you need. We saved a lot of money by grocery shopping and cooking a lot of our meals. There is even a little movie theater on site that was showing pretty current movies. There is a little store on site, but the prices are a bit inflated. We did go during spring break, so there were a lot of kids there. This didn't bother us very much, but if you want a quiet relaxing pool day do not go during this time. I would definitely recommend staying here and we can't wait to be back!
Manager Response: Hi Elena, thank you for letting us know about your #vacationgreatness with  your family!  We are pleased the resort was just what was needed for a great holiday.  We do hope to welcome you back soon to a Marriott Vacation Club resort!

Summary Heading: Expect plumbers out your window, Saturday’s too ..all day!!!  starting before 7
Summary: Stayed there several times over past years & leaving a day early, utterly disappointed.  We were placed on ground floor, near elevators. Woken up to luggage carts moved by staff after 10pm (little girl slept walk after being woken up,  next door - parents completely unaware) & plumbers on fri & sat before 7am (All day), replacing pipes around entire building & pouring concrete Saturday night til 7pm (no naps, no patio, rise & shine by 7 on vacation). Hotel refused to move us anywhere since we had purchased 3 night stay through vrbo / time share owner at $600/night. Treated us poorly at departure & will never stay there again.
Manager Response: We are sorry to hear your stay was not superb, but do appreciate your feedback.  Our team would be happy to personally follow up with you about your visit.  You may reach our customer care team at 800 936 6824 or by email at customer.care@vacationclub.com.  We look forward to hearing from you soon.

Summary: This place is excellent for family or couples. We took our grandkids and also golfed at Pelican Hill. Stunning views, comfortable upscale rooms. The beds are one of the most comfortable beds I’ve ever slept in. Numerous pools for your level of relaxation. Numerous indoor & outdoor activities for kids. Beach is 5 minutes away. The resort can provide everything you might need to a day at the beach.
Manager Response: We are glad to hear your stay was excellent, Gina!  Thank you for choosing Newport Coast Villas and for your beachside vacation.

Summary: We stayed at the Marriott’s Newport Coast Villas recently on a family holiday for two weeks. The property is large and there is a tram that will take you to any part of the property. The room was lovely, spacious and well equipped.  It is within walking distance of Crystal Cove and there were organized walks to Crystal Cove several times a week. There is a regular bus service to local amenities. We really enjoyed our vacation and would definitely consider the venue for future vacations.
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your vacation with us!  Thank you for your review and for sharing your experience on TripAdvisor.  We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: What a beautiful location and villa.  Close to everything, including the airport and Orange County.  The staff was most gracious and professional.  Cannot wait to return.  Sunsets were fantastic, as well as being able to sit out and enjoy breakfast each morning.
Manager Response: It sounds like the perfect vacation with Marriott Vacation Club!  Thank you for your review and for making us a part of your #vacationgreatness

Summary: The Marriott Newport Coast Villas is the beautiful property.  It has all the amenities - wonderful coastal views, with lots of colorful landscaping, patio areas  accommodate BBQ for family dinners and firepits for good conversations nite or day.  There are many things for young and old alike  to do throughout the property.  You are close to tourist destinations such as Laguna Beach and Corona Del Mar.  The shopping in the area is fantastic and there are many fine restaurants at all price points. The staff is very cordial and well informed.  The rooms are well appointed and clean.
Manager Response: Hi Colleen, thank you for letting us know about your stay!  We are happy you enjoyed your time at the resort and the local area.  We do hope to welcome you back soon to a Marriott Vacation Club resort!

Summary: I stayed with my family recently at this resort and while my car was parked in the parking lot overnight, it got COMPLETELY infested with ants. I had to take it to a nearby detailing shop and after two runs through an interior detailing, there still were colonies of ants in my car. Once I got home I had to bait my whole car to get rid of them. The whole thing cost me hundreds of dollar, not to mentioned spoiled my whole family’s weekend getaway. While disgusting and unacceptable, things happen. However, the way the hotel handled the report it was almost an inconvenience to talk with my wife or I. The front desk said they never seen anything like this before and an Assistant Manager (Patrick Sanchez) made a measly offer to cover the car wash. I don’t think they understood how
Manager Response: Hi Conrad, we are sorry to hear there was an issue with ants in your car during your visit.  Your feedback is appreciated and while the front desk did work to assist you, we are sorry it did not meet your expectations.  Thank you again for your review and for visiting Newport Coast Villas.

Summary: I’ve stayed at this property a couple of times, and always have enjoyed their accommodations and on site facilities. The rooms are very clean and spacious and kept current. I will be staying there again in a couple of months and I’m looking forward to it
Manager Response: We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay during your business trip!  Thank you for your review on TripAdvisor and for making Marriott Vacation Club a part of your travels.

Summary Heading: A beautiful location.  A lovely resort.
Summary: This is a very large resort with building spread over a large property.  They have a main pool area and at least one smaller pool .  The rooms are lovely.  Everything you'd expect from a Marriott property.  Plan and book ahead.  This is a popular resort and can be difficult to get a reservation.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  We are happy you had a great visit and enjoyed your villa accommodations.  It's a great way to travel with family and have all the conveniences of home!  Thank you again for your review and we do look forward to your next stay with Marriott Vacation Club.

Summary: Stayed here for a week with my wife and 2 small boys. We had a 2 bedroom apartment overlooking the ocean. They were of a great size with plenty of living space and good sized bedrooms. Ours was a little bit away from the main check in area and pool but we enjoyed the walk and had a smaller pool only a stones throw away which was perfect as it was quieter.  The hotel had a small shop and a Starbucks which was handy but at a price. You really need to rent a car if staying as its a little bit isolated, there is a shuttle bus, and you really do want to discover the area, its magical. There are plenty of Supermarkets a short drive from the hotel and plenty of shops for the ladies, all at a price let me tell you!! but produce is amazing  Couldn't say a bad word about the staff in fact
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your #vacationgreatness on TripAdvisor!  We appreciate your review and do hope to welcome you back soon to a Marriott Vacation Club Resort.

Summary: This place is amazing! Highly recommend for anyone looking for a great stay with an amazing location to Laguna Beach and Crystal cove. The staff was wonderful and made us feel very welcomed! AJ was always there with a smile offering us rides up the hill. He was there to greet us upon arrival, assisted us during our visit and was there to say farewell come visit again soon when we left. JR too came to our rescue with a golf cart ride when we were attempting to climb the hill back to our beautiful villa with our hands full with breakfast. Thx so much for a perfect stay!!!
