Manager Response: Our team is delighted to hear you enjoyed your time with us!  Thank you for your review and for sharing your experience.  We look forward to your next stay with Marriott Vacation Club!

Summary: Stay at this property many times, first time writing a review. The two bedroom suites are wonderful and functional, marriott does a great job managing the property. The ride to Crystal Cove and Fashion Island is very helpful. The only problem is the 11am check out time. Which makes the morning time a bit hectic.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and for taking the time to let us know about your stay! We are happy you had a great visit to the resort and look forward to more #vacationgreatness with your family.

Summary Heading: The building you stay in makes a huge difference
Summary: Newport Coast is all about opulence. You'll see it everywhere, but especially in the cars driving around town! This is a really nice place. I loved having two bedrooms and the living space.  The property is spread out, with multiple 2-story condo buildings scattered among play areas, pools, tennis, basketball courts. The building you check into has a small store, the main pools, rental gear for beach or pool, a small cinema, and a pool bar/snack shack.  My best advice to you is this: The building you stay in dictates the type of experience you have. I say this because my family stayed in the main 3600 building while our neighbors were in the 4800 building. Completely different experiences. The 3600 seemed to have many young families with small children. The acoustics around the
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and for choosing Marriott Vacation Club for your family vacation.  We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: We stayed for a week and loved the resort, beautiful setting, lovely apartments with everything you need. The resort has great pools and lots of activities - we’ve now  visited a number of MVC resorts and this is our new favourite! We visited Disney, Universal and Warner Bros Studio - only downside is the traffic to downtown LA! Thanks for a great week.
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay!  Thank you for your TripAdvisor review and for making Marriott Vacation Club a part of your vacation.  We hope your travels bring you back again soon!

Summary: This property combines a perfect setting, magnificent views, well to perfect maintenance, and fine Management. Units are well furnished and the quality of the appointments is very good for this type of operation.
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5-star TripAdvisor review!  We are delighted your family enjoyed your stay with us and look forward to seeing you again for more #vacationgreatness

Summary Heading: Great Location, Great Pools, Great Facility
Summary: We have 5 in our family and so enjoy our weeks at the Coast Villas.  Every unit is a two bedroom with a pullout queen sofa.  Full kitchens and great deck.  We enjoy the top floor end units.  Each unit has a different view, from the canyon, to the ocean and even the Pelican Bay golf course.  There’s a snack bar and food by the pool.  For restaurants you get to enjoy everything Newport Beach and Laguna Beach have to offer.  Easy access to Crystal Cove beaches and the always great Beachcomber Cafe.  So many things to do from the gym to yoga to painting to pool aerobics or grilling on the many bbq’s.  A great option in Newport Beach !
Manager Response: Hi Scott, thank you for the positive review of Newport Coast Villas!  We appreciate your comments and look forward to welcoming you back soon for more #vacationgreatness

Summary: I love this place! I could live here, it is so clean and wonderful! The place has so much to do and the views are amazing! We had a 2 bedroom that was very clean and alot of room! We took advantage of the pools and spas and activities! SO fun!
Manager Response: We are happy to hear your stay was awesome, Elizabeth!  Thank you for your review and for sharing your #vacationgreatness on TripAdvisor.

Summary: Rooms, beds furniture are older and a bit outdated. Overall needs an upgrade. Food was ok...do not drink the coffee. Pleasant enough, rooms were quiet. Cleaning staff were sweet. Dining area is tiny and food is OK. It's more of a Fairfield Inn than a Marriott. I travel to NewPort beach 1-2 times a year for business, won't stay here again. I would not stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, Karen.  We are always looking for ways to improve and do appreciate your feedback on the decor.  We do hope to see you again on a future stay with Marriott Vacation Club.

Summary Heading: Our friends went with us for their 50th wedding anniversary. You treated us well with an ocean view & celebratory vino!
Summary: We always love this resort!  It is a pristine, wonderful service and has a great location. Many great restaurants are close.  Of course, DO NOT MISS the one and only Crystal Cove.  Marriott shuttle there
Manager Response: Thank you for celebrating at Newport Coast Villas!  We hope to see you again soon for more #vacationgreatness

Summary Heading: It’s not the Four Seasons ... it’s a Marriott
Summary: This was our 10th visit to the NPC villas. I was worried after reading many recent reviews since we didn’t make it there last summer. Our experience was very good.  This is not the Four Seasons or a DVC luxury-level resort. With that in mind, it is a nice place to vacation. The villas were updated several years ago and have a light beach-y feel to them. Everything in our villa worked and was an acceptable level of clean. We received at least one phone message Inquiring as to whether there was anything management could do to make our stay more enjoyable. We asked for fresh towels on the 3rd day and had them within 30 minutes. (No daily service if you’re staying on time share points or week).  On our first full day (a Sunday) I went to the pool at 7:30 to save seats as recent
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, Suzie! We appreciate your feedback on your visit to the resort and look forward to welcoming you home again soon to Newport Coast Villas.

Summary: This wasn’t my first visit. It’s a family place and we loved the pool. We even went to Disneyland one day and the beach nearby multiple times.  It can be crowded in he summer but January was beautiful and not crowded.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to visit Newport Coast Villas again, Carissa!  We appreciate your feedback and do hope to welcome you back soon for more #vacationgreatness

Summary Heading: Comfortable Place To Stay In NPB
Summary: I stayed for 3 nights at one of the villas located within this resort.  Overall I was very happy with my stay.  The villa was very clean and well maintained.  Very comfortable bed.  All the necessary ammentities were readily available.  Front desk staff were very pleasant and accomodating.  The resort's grounds are kept in an immaculate condition.  Access to the beach was very combersome and only available via driving to a parking lot across the PCH and then walking for 10 minutes or taking a trolley ride to the beach.
Manager Response: We are happy to hear you enjoyed your three night stay, Ramin!  Thank you for your review and we look forward to seeing you again at Newport Coast Villas.

Summary Heading: Stunning location and an excellent Resort - We Loved It
Summary: We stayed at Marriott Newport Coast Villas for 3 weeks in July 2018. Our Villa was on the top floor of Building #2200, with a clear view to the ocean and we loved it. The standard of the Villa and the Resort in general is to a very high standard; equivalent to a 5* hotel, but with the added amenities and apartment space that make it a fantastic place to vacation. I was there with my wife, son (18) and daughter (12) and we all loved it so much that we are already planning for when we can go back. To top it all the coastal stretch to the north and south of Newport Coast is simply stunning, offering numerous options for day trips you won't forget. The nearby scene in Corona Del Mar and Laguna Beach are great spots to enjoy the sunset, where you can then enjoy a lovely meal in one
Manager Response: We are glad to hear you enjoyed your stay with us!  Thank you for choosing Marriott Vacation Club for your getaway.  We do hope your travels bring you back to see us again soon!

Summary: If you’re looking for a family-friendly resort in an upscale area, this is the place for you.   There are buses to take you to some of the local destinations like Laguna Beach, Fashion Island, and the famous Beachcomber right nearby at Crystal Cove State Park.  There also seemed to be lots of activities for kids at the resort.  We hardly used any of the amenities though as it was so crowded when we visited.  We did find Building 4700 fairly quiet.  The common patio area with multiple gas grills had such a gorgeous view that we had our breakfast there each morning.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, Laura!  We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your view and the time spent at the resort.  We look forward to your next visit to Newport Coast Villas!

Summary Heading: A First Class Marriott Vacation Club Resort
Summary: This was our second visit to Newport Coast Villas.  An amazing facility in a special location.  Imagine having a drink by the pool while looking out over the Pacific with Catalina Island in the distance.  All the facilities one would expect from Marriott.
Manager Response: It's wonderful to hear your stay was five-star at Newport Coast Villas!  Thank you for your review and for choosing Marriott Vacation Club for your travels.

Summary: We love these villas.   They are beautiful in a lovely location.   Great pool !  Nice Little market on the premises to pick up a few items or have a morning coffee.  Quiet and very relaxing location.   Beautiful views of the ocean.
Manager Response: We are always delighted to hear about #vacationgreatness!  Thank you for your review and for making Marriott Vacation Club a part of your travels.  We look forward to welcoming you home again soon!

Summary Heading: Awesome resort...if only the bed was not horrible
Summary: Love this resort we've been going for years. I would give 5 stars if the bed wasn't so bad. PROS:  beautiful grounds, several pools, lots of activities for whole family, villa is spacious & has everything you could need (dishes, laundry, 2 bathrooms, big tub, pull out beds), free shuttles to and from Crystal Cove beach & Fashion Island, friendly staff, great location  CONS:  Horrible, uncomfortable bed in master bedroom ( if you have a bad back it will be a rough week), no restaurant (other than poolside with small menu), marketplace is extremely overpriced, no airport shuttle
Manager Response: Hi Elise, thank you for your review!  We appreciate your feedback on the bed and will share your comments with the resort management team to take into consideration during villa updates.  We do hope your next stay with Marriott Vacation Club is filled with #vacationgreatness and thank you again for your review.

Summary: Nice big room with kitchen. That’s all. The maid service was almost non existent. When we called and asked why our room had been ignored for two days, they eventually showed up. They used liquids dish soap in the dishwasher, leaving a foamy mess when we returned to our room. It felt deliberate. What person, especially one who does this for a living, doesn’t know what kind of soap to use in the dishwasher? We had large spiders in our master bedroom.  With the exception of the room size, I didn’t feel as though it was a “resort” that offered much more than the Marriott Laguna Cliffs down the street. They offer nice pools and activities too, for a significantly less price. Heading back there for our next vacation. We can survive without a full kitchen.   Full disclosure we visited
Manager Response: Hi Brittany thank you for letting us know about your recent visit.  We are sorry to hear there were issues with housekeeping in your villa and will share this with the resort management to address.  We do hope the rest of the time with your family was enjoyable and thank you again for your review.

Summary Heading: One of worst Marriott Resorts I have stayed at.
Summary: Very understaffed resort. Only restauarant is poolside one. Their food awful. This resort not conveniently located to other restaurants, or activities.  I am Marriott Vacation Club Owner. Would not recommend this resort, and would never stay here again.
Manager Response: We apologize your experience at the pool restaurant was not the best and will share your comments with the food and beverage team to review.  We do hope you enjoyed the rest of your visit with your family and thank you for letting us know about your visit to Newport Coast Villas.

Summary: I have never posted a negative review of any Marriott but in this case feel that I have to.  I am a Platinum Elite Marriott Rewards Member and Executive Level with MVC and it meant nothing to the staff or even the General Manager of this property.  Our unit was filthy with a broken dishwasher, broken freezer, and a bedroom door falling off the hinges.  We traveled thousands of miles to have an ocean view and instead were looking at trees.  We went to the desk every morning 6 days in a row and they refused to move us saying they were just too busy.  The General Manager and front desk staff flat out lied after they had over 80 checkouts one morning and they still said they didn't have any open units to move us to.  The General Manager lied to me again claiming that only 10% of the
Manager Response: We are sorry to hear about your experience at Newport Coast Villas.  We would like to learn more about your visit and personally respond to your concerns as we do not see a similar concern being reported to our customer care office. Please contact our customer care team at 800 936 6824 or by email at customer.care@vacationclub.com so that we may assist you.

Summary: This hotel is not great and there are a lot of negatives here front desk checkin is strictly at 4:00pm not earlier, the pools are so crowded you will not get a spot in summer unless you put towels out early morning. The rooms are very noisy and we had kids running upstairs all night long so there was no peace and quite here for us. We had a road view room with busy traffic going by all night long so we actually had to leave the TV on to sleep with everything going on here! The positive is that it is a kid friendly resort where you can let your kids go wild but you may will not  get much relaxation here at all. You will need a car because everything is super spread out. We flew in and Ubered everywhere and that was a mistake you really need a car here. This is a run of the mill
Manager Response: Hi Everett, thank you for taking the time to share your feedback and leave a review about your stay at Newport Coast Villas. While we are sorry to hear about your concerns with your stay, our team appreciates you letting us know about your experience.  Please know, your review will be shared with the senior resort management. We look forward to exceeding expectations on your next Marriott Vacation Club stay.

Summary Heading: Week owner in MVC and point owner- not impressed
Summary: I give the resort location a 5 Star. Great location, we explored everywhere from San Diego to LA. Room was partially upgraded, so not too bad. Kitchen cabinets seemed dirty, old and only partially functional. It definitely served its purpose. My biggest issue with the resort is the fact that during our visit in July there were random people coming to the pool who were not even staying here. I’m not referring to visitors of the (walk-up bar or walk up restaurant), but people come to bring their entire family of 10-15 people with no one asking them or enforcing the fact that amenities are for people who are “actually paying” to stay there. I asked the staff/manager on duty for the day and they said they checked the pool band, yet 90% of the people at the pool didn’t have one and
Manager Response: Hi Tiffany, thank you for your feedback on your recent visit.  We are sorry to hear your pool experience was not the best and will be sharing your feedback with the senior resort management team.  We do hope the rest of your visit was enjoyable with your family and thank you again for bringing this to our attention.

Summary: My family and I enjoyed a three-night stay at this lovely property. Many great memories were made and our daughters especially enjoyed hiking and exploring the resort.   The two bedroom villa is spacious and perfect for larger families. The beds were comfortable, including the sofa mattress which has a memory foam top. It was amazing to see the beautiful fountains and koi pond near the entrance to the resort. The views were breathtaking, especially during the sunset.   Although the resort was fully booked during our stay, we did not feel it was crowded near the pool or public areas. I love that this property has multiple pools around the different buildings to allow people to spread out. We mainly stayed at the Catalina Pool since it was closest to our villa. The pool attendants
Manager Response: Hi Rania, thank you for sharing your #vacationgreatness on TripAdvisor!  It's great to hear your enjoyed your time at the resort and we look forward to your next stay with Marriott Vacation Club.

Summary: Ideal property for family vacation. Rooms well accommodated and maintained. Beautiful pools and many family activities throughout the week. Entertainment by pool each day which included live music,, games, etc. Courteous staff throughout the property.
Manager Response: Hi Ken, it's wonderful to hear you enjoyed your time at Newport Coast Villas!  Thank you for your review and for sharing your feedback on TripAdvisor.  We look forward to your next stay at a Marriott Vacation Club resort!

Summary: This time-share property is ideally located and offers a variety of activities for families. However, service quality has been on the decline and our most recent experience leads me to believe that management is taking guests (and perhaps owners) for granted due to very high occupancy.  Pre-arrival, we had only one request: not be booked in the 3400 building due to its proximity to the road and noise pollution. We have conveyed this request by email and over the phone and a note for this request was made. Upon arrival, we found that we were assigned a unit at the ... you guessed it: building 3400. The front desk agent was nice, apologized and moved us to another unit. I asked to speak to a supervisor to alert the management to a potential communication issue since the
Manager Response: Hi Matt, thank you for sharing your experience with us.  Please accept our apologies for the issue you had at the front desk and with your villa.  This is not the typical level of service provide by Marriott Vacation Club.  Our team would like to personally follow up with you.   Please contact our customer care team at 800 936 6824 or by email at customer.care@vacationclub.com so that we may assist you

Summary: Beautiful resort overlooking Crystal Cove Beach State Park. Spacious 2 bedroom, 2 bath Villas with a kitchen are clean and nicely decorated. Lots of activities on site for the family. Nearby, are water sports, hiking, shopping and gourmet restaurants. The staff couldn't be friendlier! Love this place!
Manager Response: Hi Linda, thank you for the positive review of Newport Coast Villas!  We appreciate your comments and look forward to welcoming you back soon for more #vacationgreatness

Summary Heading: Worst service of any Marriott I have ever been to
Summary: I have stayed here over 300 nights and the service has continued to decline every time.The "At Your Service" reps are unfriendly and could care less about what your needs are.  It is like calling technical support and having someone in another country answer the phone.  This used to be the best place.
Manager Response: Hi Eric, we are sorry to hear about your experience at the front desk. This is not typical of the service you expect and deserve from Marriott. We would like to learn more about your experience and personally respond to your concerns. Please contact our customer care team at 800 936 6824 or by email at customer.care@vacationclub.com so that we can assist you

Summary: I am a timeshare owner of Marriot and this resort is very  overrated ! 1. If you have any physical limitations do not go here, it is  full of stairs and hills . It was a task to get to main pool. 2. The only food is an outside bar area with absolutely no shade or space if you have a large group .  3. The staff is not helpful in anyway , I have received better service from 3 star hotels .  4. They make it seem like it is a short walk to the beach it’s not . You have to cross the Pacific Coast highway to get to the beach . Yes they do have shuttles , but it would be nice to go to the pool and have a short walk to the beach. The walk to the beach is 20 to 30 minutes at best and once again if you have any physical limitations forget it .  5. They sell you the view of the coast , but
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback and leave a review about your stay at Newport Coast Villas. While we are sorry to hear about your concerns, our team appreciates you letting us know about your experience.  Please know, your review will be shared with the senior resort management. We look forward to exceeding expectations on your next Marriott Vacation Club stay.

Summary: Beautiful resort overlooking the ocean.  Very tropical in feel, which is nice 😀 The staff was courteous and very helpful and the rooms were well appointed, with 2 bedrooms and 2 baths.  My only complaint is the wifi was terrible.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, Elaine!  We appreciate your feedback and hope to welcome you back soon to Newport Coast Villas.

Summary: Spectacular views looking down around the coast, landscaping, and hillside houses.  Plenty to do on site for 3 teen boys, and opportunities to get away via the free shuttle many times throughout the day to Crystal Cove, Laguna, and Balboa. We were so content to spend 3-4 hours several days at beach at Crystal Cove.
Manager Response: It sounds like you had a wonderful time at Newport Coast Villas!  We hope to see you again soon at a Marriott Vacation Club resort.

Summary: We had a wonderful time here, the suite was comfortable and welcoming.  The bed was comfortable with nice linens. The kitchen was equipped with almost everything that one would need.  The washer/dryer in the suite made it possible to pack a lot less clothing, which was very nice! The dining table on the balcony patio was lovely to have breakfast or dinner at, with a view of the Pacific Ocean! There were offered activities, movies, spa services, etc.  The fitness room was absolutely awesome, very well equipped and made it very easy to get in workouts. The pools were beautifully clean and at a comfortable temperature to use even at night in February!  The resort is across from Crystal Cove and it can be walked to easily.  Overall, there are only positive things to say and we would
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of Newport Coast Villas!  We are glad you enjoyed your visit and look forward to more #vacationgreatness with your family.

Summary: This is our 3rd visit to this Marriott resort. As Chairman's level and platinum members, we appreciate the friendliness of the staff. The villas have been updated recently.  Lots of nice inclusions are standard: room safe, W/D, hair dryer, whirlpool tub in master,  plenty of plugs for charging devices, good wifi. There are several pools on property along with a cinema that shows movies all day, every day. A nice spa also there for massages and facials (no hair or  nails though). Lots for kids to do. Catalina pool has restaurant for lunch and dinner al fresco. Easy parking. Nearby Pavilions for grocery shopping. Fashion Island mall close for shopping and entertainment.  Easy to get to Anaheim and Los Angeles attractions. Plenty of cool restaurants nearby to check out.
Manager Response: We are so pleased you had a great stay on your 3rd visit to Newport Coast Villas!  Thank you for sharing and we look forward to hearing more about your travels with Marriott Vacation Club.

Summary Heading: Great location but needs an update
Summary: Great location by the sea. Friendly staff and helpful. Villa need an update otherwise fun for the family and many activities. Parking is limited and registration can be hectic so have patience. Rooms have nice views.
Manager Response: Thank you for your five-star review, Paul!  We are pleased you enjoyed your stay and look forward to welcoming you back again soon to Newport Coast Villas.

Summary: For me, and for what it cost us to stay there I wouldn’t stay there again. It’s not really a resort...it’s more of a Courtyard Hotel with a nicer pool. Rooms were great but noisy, staff was just so-so, food was average. For over $600 a night I think the Pelican Resort across the street would be a better choice for not a whole lot more money.  Don’t get me wrong ... I like Marriott and I stay at Courtyard properties all the time. However, I expected more from a so called resort. And as others have pointed out ... status with Marriott means nothing to them. A fact they rudely pointed out to my wife when we asked for an 11:00 am check out!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback, Kurt.  We are sorry to hear the resort was not exactly the accommodations you were expecting and will share your feedback with the senior resort management team.  We do hope your next stay with Marriott is exceptional and thank you for your review.

Summary Heading: Marriott Platinum  owner , third visit ,disappointed again.! Lack of Customer Service. Hate to return!
Summary: We can drive to this location from AZ. so it is convenient. .   We did arrive early at 200. Rooms to be ready at 400 as they promised to call when ready. By 4:30 we had not gotten a call. When we called the front desk it was a Zoo. Long lines and no communication... They never called us. A housekeeper showed us our room was ready.  Loud running kid all around us. Above us, in pools,everywhere!  The front desk is somewhat rude also. We have owned Marriott s for years and travel abroad also. I don't plan to return. A loud headache at the pools. Families of 8 are in the rooms. Resort is too big.  The whole Newport Beach vibe of the people are just Snotty ad Rude!
Manager Response: Hi Janet, we are very sorry to hear your stay got off on the wrong foot at check-in.  Thank you for bringing this to our attention and please know, your feedback will be followed up on with the senior resort management team.  We would be happy to speak with you further about your stay and may be reached at 800 936 6824 or by email at customer.care@vacationclub.com.  Thank you again for your review and for being a part of Marriott Vacation Club.

Summary: The pictures don’t do it justice.  This is a sizable property with many, many amenities.  Lush landscaping and beautiful views of the ocean. Perfect for families.  Clean, spacious rooms, plenty of parking. Many pools & hot tubs. Food & grill areas. Washer & drier in rooms.  Lots of daily activities for all ages. No negatives. You will think you’re the rich folks.
Manager Response: We are pleased you enjoyed your visit to Newport Coast Villas!  Thank you for your review and we look forward to your next stay with Marriott Vacation Club.

Summary: Newport Coast Villas are the best! Right across the street from the ocean. The views are incredible. There is so much to do in the area. Great golf courses. Right down the road from Laguna Beach. The Villas and amenities are great. You absolutely will not be disappointed!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience on TripAdvisor!  We look forward to your next stay for more #vacationgreatness

Summary: This place was really quite wonderful. The accommodations were spacious and clean. The amenities were endless. Things to do with your kids or on your own. Also convenient to so many locations and points of interest. Best of all the rates are reasonable.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of Newport Coast Villas, Kelli!  We look forward to your next stay with Marriott Vacation Club.

Summary: My wife and I celebrated our 45th wedding anniversary this year and we decided to bring our sons, daughters-in-law and grandchildren to an all-expenses paid(by us) vacation to Southern California. We stayed at this location. We have used Marriott Vacation Clubs all over the world. This location ranks among the top three locations we have stayed. The views of the Pacific Ocean were breathtaking and the personnel at this location were very courteous, efficient and went out of their way to make sure our needs were met. They surely met and surpassed the Marriott standards!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing Newport Coast Villas for your 45th wedding anniversary!  We are delighted to have been a part of your celebration and look forward to your next stay.

Summary: Stayed here for about 4 days with the family. My daughter and her friend played basketball every day at the courts. We went on several jogs around the area and down the beach. It's a fantastic area with scenic views and it's very close to areas that are urbanized.
Manager Response: Thank you for your TripAdvisor review, Will.  We are delighted to hear your family enjoyed their visit, especially the resort activities.  We look forward to your next stay at Newport Coast Villas.

Summary: My family had a fantastic time. The staff was attentive and responsive. We did not place any room specific requests in advance but were accommodated with an ocean view. The property is up to Marriott standards and we had no issues with our room. The resort is a short walk to the beach. On-site pool and lazy river a plus!!! While I’m a veteran of the Marriott system, others might be put off by being approached by sales reps immediately after checking in. Not cool but did not detract from our overall experience. Also, the exercise room is a little small given the number of people on the property so get there early
Manager Response: Thank you for the positive review of Newport Coast Villas!  We appreciate your comments and look forward to welcoming you back soon for more #vacationgreatness

Summary Heading: One of the nicest beach areas in Orange County, California
Summary: This Marriott Vacation Club property sits right across Pacific Coast Highway from one of the least tampered with beach in the area.  There is a state park at the headlands above the beach that has walking and bike paths  that overlook the beach and little areas on the cliff where you can use your binoculars to search for dolphins and whales.  If you walk down the beach towards the south, there are old beach cottages, some of which have been restored and were the site of some movies (Beaches, for instance).  There is also a great restaurant right on the beach that serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner.  Marriott provides a trolley that shuttles people along the coast for exploring.
Manager Response: Hi Sherrye, it's wonderful to hear you enjoyed your time at Newport Coast Villas!  Thank you for your review and for sharing your feedback on TripAdvisor.  We look forward to your next stay at a Marriott Vacation Club resort!

Summary: Just finished a stay here.  It was our first time but we will be back for sure.  The front desk staff was very professional and helpful.   All of the pool bar personnel have been excellent  and the food and drinks are better than most pool bars.  No pool chair issues but there were a lot of people here.  This is a large property on a hill.  Walking is a challenge so they have a number of shuttles around the property and some off property.   It is convenient to the John Wayne Airport at about 15 min.   The view of the Pacific from our unit was amazing.  I think the units have been refurbished recently as all furnishings were in great condition.  The activity staff does a nice job offering a lot of activities for all ages.   As i said we will be back .
Manager Response: We are glad to hear you enjoyed your stay with us!  Thank you for choosing Newport Coast Villas for your getaway.  We do hope your travels bring you back to see us again soon!

Summary: My family of five spent 6 nights at the Marriott Newport Coast last week.  The check-in was smooth and uneventful.  We ended up getting a two bedroom unit facing the ocean, which is exactly what I had requested.  The beds were comfortable, even the queen size sofa beds. The kitchen is stocked with enough silverware and plates for 8 people.  The thermostats worked well, as did the washer and dryer, which we used often, as well as the wifi.  The Newport Coast establishment is a series of about 40 buildings which are four floors each.  So it’s a large area with intertwining streets.  The beach is a good ten minute walk across the Pacific Coast Highway, which is about 1/4 mile from the resort.  However, the resort does have a shuttle which will take you there.  We did not go down to
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing Newport Coast Villas for your first visit to the area!  We are pleased you enjoyed your visit and look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: The resort is located on a bluff overlooking the ocean so you may get ocean / golf course views (golf course belongs to another resort) from the rooms.    There a lot of amenities on the property and plenty of restaurants and other services close by.  Crystal Cove State park is down the street (walkable if you are ok with the uphill climb on the way back).   The park is definitely worth a visit.    Just a few minor observations as examples of what separates a ‘4’ from a ‘5’.  The fitness center had a lot of equipment but very little space for stretching or other exercises, and only 2 mats available.     The sink in one of our rooms had the stopper stuck in a closed position (was that way when we got there) and we had to call for a repair.  This wasn’t noticed when they cleaned
Manager Response: Hi Diane, thank you for your great review of Newport Coast Villas!  We appreciate your feedback and look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: Great vacation property. Pools, courts, activities for the kids, and adults, fully furnished rooms and kitchen.  We had two villas for two families. We were able to cook dinner every night, and still had time to go to the Shake Shack and the Beachcomber for lunches.  Great tram system, including transportation down to Crystal Cove for beach trips (with beach towels to boot!).
Manager Response: We are happy to hear you enjoyed your visit to Newport Coast Villas!  Thank you for your review and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary Heading: Tuscany SoCal Getaway at Marriott Newport Coast Villa
Summary: We had a fantastic time this Memorial Day weekend at the Marriott Newport Coast Villa.  Our ocean view two bedrooms unit overlooks the Hole #3 of the Pelican Hill Resort Golf Club - South Course.   The view was absolutely glorious in the morning! Thank you to our pre-arrival staff, Berit.  Our 3:00AM check-in was also handled perfectly by an experience staff, Tervin.  We will definitely be back and ask of the same unit (if available)   :)   !!  The pools, bar restaurant and fitness center are well maintained.  Great for active family with many activities scheduled.  Visit to Crystal cover State Beach Park and road-side Shake Shack dinner is a must too.  I recommend this resort for a family stay or reunion.  Its is probably one of the Marriott's best resort.
Manager Response: Hi Louie!  It's great to hear you enjoyed your time at Newport Coast Villas.  Than you for taking the time to share your feedback.  We look forward to your next Marriott Vacation Club stay!

Summary: This hotel is in desperate need of a renovation. It’s location and views have excused the current aesthetic of hotel. Service and food are pretty poor for overall Marriott brand. Also as a Marriott Rewards guest, you are not treated as so. There are very little extra amenities offered for a Marriott rewards member.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of your recent stay.  We appreciate your feedback on the resort decor and will share this with the senior resort management team.  While certain Marriott Rewards perks are not available at Marriott Vacation Club resorts, you may still earn Marriott Rewards points and night credits during your stay.  Thank you again for your review and for visiting Newport Coast Villas.

Summary: We stayed here recently during a visit to the area and wow, were we impressed! From the time we checked in, everything went extremely well. The 2 bedroom villa we rented had obviously been renovated recently and was simply GORGEOUS! The bedding and furniture were oh so comfortable. The FULL kitchen (not "sorta full", it had EVERYTHING!) was such a great perk. There is a Pavilions grocery a few minutes away, so you can stock up on groceries and prepare your own food to save on the really high restaurant bills! They have top notch gas grills located all over the property as well. Even if you don't spring for a great view from your room, there are MANY public areas on the resort with amazing views of the Pacific Ocean. Simply STUNNING! They offer numerous activities for all ages,
Manager Response: Hi Jay, thank you for your review!  We are happy to hear you enjoyed your time at Newport Coast Villas.  We look forward to hearing about your next stay with Marriott Vacation Club!

Summary: The suite had everything we needed, except the food.  We stayed a week and loved the pools. the shuttle to the beach and into town.  The staff was helpful and professional. The sunsets over the Pacific were spectacular every evening.  The only downside is that nothing is within walking distance of the resort.
Manager Response: We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your time at Newport Coast Villas.  Thank you for your review and for making us your vacation destination in California!

Summary: The property is beautiful and well Maintained . It is perfect for families  Or adults. They have everything in the kitchen you need. A washer dryer if you need it. There are many activities for kids. A nice bar . Good food. Near shopping. Many restaurants. Great weather.
Manager Response: Hi BK, thank you for your review!  We look forward to your next stay with us at Newport Coast Villas!

Summary Heading: Beautiful Hotel with some amazing views
Summary: We just recently stayed here last week.  The hotel rooms were spacious and gorgeous.  We had a really nice balcony overlooking the PCH and ocean.  The hotel is huge so depending on where you are you might be far from the main lobby.  The stairs to the pool were a killer because everything is on a hill.  The pool is really nice, 2 hottubs, bar.  The market is a little small but has the essentials... pricey though.  The grounds are just gorgeous... really nice golf course.  Lots of parking, though some of the lots for your hotel location are hard to find.  The only issue we had was that it was chilly because of the breeze.  The hotel really is nice.  The best are super comfortable.
Manager Response: We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your visit to Newport Coast Villas!  Thank you for your review and we do hope to see you again soon on your next vacation in Newport!

Summary Heading: Would not dream of purchasing a timeshare here
Summary: We are here on a timeshare deal and I cannot wait to get out of here. Tomorrow I’m supposed to sit through 90 minutes of persuasion to buy. In the meantime, we’ve been given a villa in probably the worst building onsite, overlooking the trash area with no view and lots of traffic noise.  I asked to change rooms and was told they are full. How on earth do they think anyone would want to buy into a place when this is the preview provided?
Manager Response: Thank you for your review on your recent visit to Newport Coast Villas.  We are sorry to hear you did not enjoy the location of your villa during your stay and would like to learn more about your visit.   Please contact our customer care team at 800 936 6824 or by email at customer.care@vacationclub.com so that we can assist you.

Summary Heading: Marriott has a beautiful property here
Summary: Booked a 2bed/2 ba full service villa and were given one in the 3900 building. Clean, well equipped, seemingly recently updated, no stains, quiet AND a beautiful view of the ocean in the distance. The staff could not do enough. Friendly and efficient. It does lack a full service restaurant though but has a snack, pool place.   This area of the Newport Coast offers an unending array of places to visit. For one full week you won’t be bored.   Enjoyed it immensely. I think most families will as well.   Parking included, pools, tennis, putting green, basketball, game room, gym, etc.
Manager Response: Hi Stefanie!  Thank you for your five-star review of Newport Coast Villas.  We are happy you enjoyed your visit and do look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary Heading: Great escapades with friends and family
Summary: Lots and lots to do for everyone in your family and friends 3 Swimming pools, 2 jacuzzi, great music and activities by the pool, activities for kids and young at heart, bbq, golf, basketball, volleyball and more  Great staff, friendly and accommodating  Clean rooms and big space in the room (we stayed in 2 bedroom kitchenett) Great food as well 😁
Manager Response: We are happy to hear you enjoyed your time at Newport Coast Villas with your family and friends!  Our team looks forward to your next visit for even more #vacationgreatness

Summary Heading: Beautiful Property with Lots of Local Things to do
Summary: Great check in process.  We arrived a day early and we were able to add another night to our reservation.  We were on the 3rd floor of building 2700 which had a beautiful view of the ocean.  The particular room we were in had tall enough trees just in the sight line of the horizon where the sun set, but it was still a pretty sight.  We were closer to the "quieter pool" in that building, which was much less crowded, but didn't have a bar.
Manager Response: We are happy to hear your visit was five-star at Newport Coast Villas!  Thank you for your review and for letting us know about your stay.  We look forward to your next stay with Marriott Vacation Club.

Summary Heading: Beautiful all around - Tuscany in Cali
Summary: Stayed here for my nieces graduation! Lovely views on top hillside- looking out over Pacific  Great pool!good food poolside . Nice area for miniature golf , tethered ball and volleyball. Bbq grills and fire pits all around. Wonderful family vacation
Manager Response: Hi Jamie, thank you for celebrating your niece's graduation at Newport Coast Villas!  We hope to see you again soon for another great stay.

Summary Heading: Great Week at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas
Summary: We exchanged for this property because it is so close to Disneyland (20 minutes drive).  The two bedroom Villas are huge!  Everything is provided to include laundry soap. Check in with Caitlin was very friendly and efficient.  In fact, everyone at the front desk were very helpful.  The Concierge desk was also very helpful- even arranging tickets for us.  They also gave us good driving directions to avoid toll roads. All the facilities and grounds were clean and kept up nicely.  Our unit, 4633 looks brand new!   This was a very good home away from home while we took the Grand kids to Disneyland!
Manager Response: Hi John, thank you for your five-star review!  We are happy to hear your family enjoyed their visit and the close proximity to Disneyland.  We hope to see you again soon at Newport Coast Villas!

Summary Heading: Excellent Huge Modern Resort, Ocean View Pools & Rooms, What More Can you Ask For?
Summary: We stayed here as a 70th birthday present to my mother this weekend.  There were 3 of us...and we all LOVED it.  We did not even use any of the amenities nor activities that were provided on site.  The resort, although sprawling and huge, was easy to navigate, had ample parking, and the units with two bedrooms and living area were quite large.  We regularly stay at airbnb properties and this was fresher, cleaner and more tasteful.  Each room had an adjoining bath, it could have easily slept 8 (but that might be too many to really enjoy), and our balcony overlooked a partial ocean view.  Although quite busy, we rarely saw anyone else nor heard noise in the apartments and there was a washer and dryer that were nice than what I have at home in the unit. The kitchen had the basics
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing Newport Coast Villas for your mother's 70th birthday celebration!  We are so glad your family had a great time together at the resort.  Our hope is to see you again soon at a Marriott Vacation Club Resort!

Summary: We were there for 4 days for a wedding and it was absolutely beautiful and relaxing. There are several pools, free transportation to the beach (walking distance if you are up to a little walk). It overlooks the ocean and golf course. Full kitchen, beautiful  2 bedroom rooms with 2 baths. Staff is excellent and all the people were super friendly. Every room has a balcony with table and chairs to sit outside and relax.
Manager Response: Thank you for spending four days at Newport Coast Villas!  We are happy your family had a great visit and look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: This is now our fourth year coming here and I love the place. We rent three villas, and our three children and seven grandchildren just love everything about this place. Each villa is airy, clean, and perfect for hanging out. We each had a ground floor villa and the kids loved playing on the grassy area outside our balconies. The desk people did everything they could to position us near to each other, and this made such a huge difference to the success of our week. The ground are just perfectly kept at all times. The pools and hot tubs throughout the complex provide easy access for everyone. We loved the poolside service and the ample number of tables and chairs around the poolside. The table tennis tables, shuffle board, and other small games were a particular attraction.
Manager Response: Hi Drake, it's great to hear you have enjoyed your four trips to Newport Coast Villas!  We look forward to more #vacationgreatness with your family!

Summary Heading: Very clean, nice and everything you need
Summary: The Newport Coast Villas are located across the street from the Pelican Hill resort. Plenty of places to go walking and explore and gorgeous views of Laguna and the beach! I stayed in the two bedroom suite with a full kitchen and this place has everything that I would possibly need. The grounds are gorgeous as soon as you pull up and everything is very well-kept from the landscaping to the rooms. Service could have been a tad bit quicker and friendlier. There were a total of three people behind the desk at check in, two who could have helped and were not busy after their customer left, but Regina the third was on the phone and once she hung up immediately addressed me, whereas the other two didn’t seem to bother. So thank you Regina. Concierge was nice but seemed extremely
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing Newport Coast Villas!  We are pleased to hear you had a great stay and look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary Heading: Do not come here for quiet
Summary: If you are a family with kids charging around and going crazy who like pools and a beach nearby then consider this property.  The facilities are terrific and the staff are friendly, though for some reason last evening half the Catalina pool and one of two whirlpools at the Catalina pool were closed forcing overcrowding of the other open whirlpool.  The villas are well equipped and clean with nice views out over the ocean.  Parking is free with easy in and out very close to units.  Short drive to the OC Airport, shopping including groceries, great restaurants, and beaches.  There are lots of things to like about the place--except the ability to get sleep.  If you are adult travelers who want peace and quiet then stay far away.  You know the kind of cheap construction I'm talking
Manager Response: Hi Bruce, thanks for your feedback on your recent visit.  We are sorry the resort was not what you expected and appreciate your feedback on your visit.  Owners do have priority when it comes to villa requests, which will be the same for all Vacation Club resorts.  However, if there is noise that is making your stay unpleasant, then the front desk will work with you to make sure this is resolved.  Thank you again for your review and we hope your next stay with Marriott exceeds your expectations.

Summary Heading: Lots of activities for the kids!
Summary: We stay here every year with the in-laws. We love this place as it has lots of activities for the kids (basketball, put-put golf, sand boxes, marshmallow roasting, game center, video game center, mini movie theater, ping pong, corn hole, warmed swimming pool, playground). Once of my favorite things is the shuttle that leaves every hour and takes you straight to the beach. You don't have to worry about parking, and the shuttle comes back and picks you up every hour. The rooms are nice, and the kitchen is fully stocked with what you need to cook meals. I really don't like that every time you turn on the TV you are forced to listen to their timeshare shpeel. Just go directly to the guide, or to the last channel I had on, please! We have a really nice time every time we go. the
Manager Response: Hi Chris, thanks for your review!  It's great to hear your family enjoys their yearly trip to Newport Coast Villas.  There are certainly a lot of great activities to enjoy, which is a great perk of staying at Marriott Vacation Club.  We look forward to seeing your family again next year!

Summary: Have a vacation club ownership with Marriott. Newport Coast is exceptional. We celebrated our 29 year anniversary. Stayed in Bldg 4000 2nd floor. Newly renovated. Awesome space. Nice view of the ocean. Staff was very helpful. Beach’s were awesome. Would definitely go back. If you have a rental car avoid toll roads in GPS settings. Only adds 5 minutes to travel.
Manager Response: Thank you for celebrating your 29 year anniversary at Newport Coast Villas!  We are delighted to hear your enjoyed your time at the resort and look forward to many more celebrations to come.

Summary: We have stay d at the Newport Coast Villas for years.  They are beautiful two bedroom villas, almost all have lovely water views.  They are extremely well-maintained and landscaped.  The complex has at least four pools, tennis courts, exercise facilities, a shop, a spa and a poolside bar/restaurant.  The only drawbacks are it’s size, your unit can be a long walk from the facilities you want (there is a shuttle bus) and, recently, parking.  We returned at 11:00 Saturday night to find the nearest open parking place a ten minute walk from our villa.  Management needs to figure out a way to enforce its “one car per Villa in the lots next to the villas” rule” because the current system is not working.
Manager Response: Thank you for continuing to choose Newport Coast Villas as your destination of choice.  We are happy to hear how much you enjoy your time here and the many activities the resort has to  offer.  Thank you for the feedback on parking and know, this will be shared with the resort management team.  We do hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Wonderful place for relaxing, taking in in fresh sea air. Abundant activities for children and adults. Beautiful pool Over looking the Ocean. Manager works hard to greet visitors and Keep them happy. Nicely appointed rooms. We had a 2 bedroom with an  Ocean view. Loved taking advantage of our 3rd floor balcony for breakfast Each morning. Be sure to request Ocean view when making reservation  As they are at a premium. I did not, but one was coming available...had to wait but worth it.
Manager Response: Thank you, Joan!  We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and the lovely view from your villa.  We do hope to see you again soon at Newport Coast Villas.

Summary Heading: Nice villas in an enormous, beautiful, remote resort
Summary: Perched on a hillside above the California coast between Newport and Laguna Beach this resort is a wonderful place to stay...with a few caveats. The villas themselves are comfortable and spacious with 2BRs, 2Ba, laundry, and a fully equipped kitchen.  The first caveat is the location. The resort is rather isolated with not much a short drive away. And the resort's Marketplace isn't really up to handling the morning coffee/breakfast crowd. But drive a bit further and you can be in Newport/Fashion Island or Laguna Beach. Drive further still and you can take the ferry to Catalina Island or visit Disneyland (both of which we did). The one nearby hidden jewel is Crystal Cove beach with it's excellent Beachcomber restaurant right across HWY 1.   The second caveat is that unlike many
Manager Response: Hi Leo, thank you for your feedback!  We are happy to hear your stay and the villa you received.  We do hope to welcome you back soon on a future visit!

Summary: We enjoyed our 3 night stay here. They have a lot to offer with activities and if you are a beach fan, you can walk to the beach (or take the shuttle they offer). They have a couple of pools and for us it was nice to be at one of the quieter pools. Great stay and will come back! The property is huge and it makes for a nice walk around also!
Manager Response: Thank you for joining us for your three night getaway to Newport!  We are pleased you enjoyed your visit and look forward to your return!

Summary: Very nice accommodations since it has everything in your suite, Living room, dinning room, two bedrooms and full baths and kitchen and washer and dryer. Makes you feel like home. Many lovely places to visit close by. Many activities you can take advantage of and the staff is very helpful.
Manager Response: We are happy you enjoyed your stay, Carol.  Our team looks forward to your return!

Summary: We are Marriott Vacation club owners in Orlando.   This is our first trip to this resort.    The resort is very large and hilly but well maintain and the staff is extremely friendly.    We stayed in Villa 4100 in room 4112.   The view was stunning as it overlooked 3 holes of the Pelican Hill Golf Course and we had unobstructed views of the ocean.  It is definitely a bit colder than Florida in March but they have a heated pool and several fire pits.  You can walk to the beach or take the free shuttle (predefined schedule) to/from the resort.   The walk is invigorating and just down the hill and across the street into the state park.
Manager Response: Thank you, Theresa.  We look forward to seeing you again at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.

Summary: Spent Spring Break here with four adults and five kids. Delightful. Very family friendly. Crystal cove beach. Corona Del Mar. balboa island. Flew in to Long Beach airport. Easy access. Marriott is alway top notch. Fourth visit here and we will come again.
Manager Response: Hi Rory, it's great to hear the resort exceeded your expectations.  Please visit us again soon at a Marriott Vacation Club Resort!

Summary: We traveled with my wife's family and had a great time!  Two 2 bedroom villas housed the eight of us comfortably.  We rented a 12 passenger van from Yale Rentals and enjoyed all that Orange County had to offer...included Duffy Boat rental, enjoying all the Marriott had to offer and visiting our favorite restaurants.
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting Marriott's Newport Coast Villas, Wendall.  We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: Near the beach (there’s a shuttle- it’s a long walk) and several pools, including a quiet pool (although it’s pretty close to the not quiet pool). They have lots of activities and a gorgeous view from the lobby over the pool to the Pacific. The villas are huge! 2 BRs each with its own bath, and a full kitchen and living area (not as quiet as I might have hoped)
Manager Response: Thank you, Samin.  We are happy you enjoyed your stay at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.  We do hope to see you again at a Marriott Vacation Club Resort.

Summary: Stayed in late January 2018 for 4 nights. Beautiful resort! 2 BR condo was updated and spacious. Main pool was large and warm (especially for January). Grounds were very well maintained, with great views of the Pacific ocean. After I booked, I was worried that I would get a first floor, parking lot view room or a room in a terrible location. Well, our room, view and location were fantastic. After a few sub-par stays at other Marriotts, I was about to give on them! However, this place was great and I wouldnt hesitate to stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review on TripAdvisor.  We are happy your stay exceeded your expectations and we do hope to see you again at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.

Summary Heading: Just stayed there last week for vacations with family.  Magnificient resort with large romantic pool, facing down to the
Summary: It is a wonderful resort, nice and romantic for either \vacations or staycations.  Nice from outside to inside the resort.  Landszcaping outside is gorgious with roman fountain, Koi pond and stairs looking down to the ocean. Inside, all suites have 2 bedrooms with 2 bathrooms , fully equipped kitchen with balcony.   Besides the swimming pools, we can enjoy the fitness center and steam room, free of charge.   Resort not only  offers shuttles  to go around the buildings and facilities, it also offers shuttles to beaches, shopping centers and groceries, of course free of charge. Each buiding has barbecue pits with tables and chairs, in a very nice garden setting.  This resort is very convenient and elegant for family to stay. The price looks expensive but it is worthy, especially
Manager Response: Hi Chau, thank you for taking the time to let us know about your stay.  We are glad you enjoyed your time at the resort with your family this month.  We do hope to see you again at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.

Summary: Came here with a group of ladies from work after a company meeting, to unwind and have "girl time." It was amazing! One if them is an owner, and we were all blown away by how picturesque and comfortable it was. The pools, firepit, jacuzzi, giftshop, everything was just top notch, especially the gorgeous view at night! Even the sofa bed was super comfortable. The amenities were fantastic, and we had the best time. We can't wait to go back next year! The trolley down to the beach was a terrific convenience as well.
Manager Response: We are happy to hear Marriott's Newport Coast Villas was just the right location for your group outing!  Thank you for sharing your review on TripAdvisor and we look forward to seeing you next year.

Summary: Beautiful resort with amazing views of the California Beach. The pool areas are amazing and it it a very quiet place. Nice for families with or without children. The villas are very big and they fit 6 adults confortable.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and photos, Daniel.  It sounds like your family had a great visit to Marriott's Newport Coast Villas this month!  We look forward to seeing you all again on your next trip to southern California.

Summary: On a family March Break trip to California, we chose to not stay where we usually do (Fairmont Miramar in Santa Monica) for a change of pace. I was a little apprehensive at first, not knowing the property, but I was so impressed with the amenities, the layout, the cleanliness of the grounds, the fitness center and even the super cool fire pits. Our room (I think all rooms) had a spectacular view of the Pacific Ocean that made the stay even more memorable. The only negative is the parking...they need to do something about that.  This place is a HIT with us and it will now be our go to place in Souther California.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, Tom.  We are glad you gave Marriott's Newport Coast Villas a try for your family vacation this year.  We look forward to seeing you on your next trip to southern California.

Summary: We came here for a week with our grandkids who we are watching from San Diego. The activities for families are wonderful, well designed, and well organized. The food activities from the poolside bar were wonderful and the food is excellent. Staff is always attentive and very friendly. As always, this Marriott Resort was exceptionally clean and well-appointed
Manager Response: Thank you, Rick.  It's always great to hear when the resort team exceeds expectations.  We look forward to seeing you again at a Marriott Vacation Club Resort.

Summary: Marriott’s villas never disappoints, we enjoy being owners so much.  The views are just amazing, especially coming down the hill to the villas, staff friendly as always.  Rooms very nice, clean, loved having the grills so close we did eat in one night.
Manager Response: We enjoy having such great owners like yourself!  Thank you for your review and for being a part of the Marriott Vacation Club family.  We look forward to your next stay with us in Newport Beach!

Summary: I spent the day at the Villas and it was a magical experience. I had visitors from out of town for St. Patrick's Day weekend.  I have to give a shout out for great service to Roger in the bar, Heather, Charli, Ingrid and Gina at the Front Desk.   The Marketplace is recently renovated and looks fantastic. From family fun to a weekend with friends I recommend the Villas for everyone.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, Jesse.  We are happy you chose Marriott's Newport Coast Villas for your staycation with friends over St. Patrick's Day.  Your kind words for the team is much appreciated.  We do look forward to welcoming you back again soon to Newport Coast Villas.

Summary Heading: great place, great views needs better parking
Summary: The main issue was the lack of adequate parking especially as our parking garage was undergoing repairs and closed for the week.  The problem with the noise from the upstairs apartment was addressed twice but never solved and the kids were allowed to run around stomping on the floor. Perhaps a little better insulation would solve the noise issue.  Other wise the staff was wonderful, friendly and very helpful.  I also liked having access to the daily newspaper.  The accommodations  were very comfortable as was the bed almost. The cabinets in the bathroom and kitchen  could used some updating in the unit we were in. We had mold in the shower which the staff responded to quickly.  One of the towel bars fell off of the wall. I would like to see  trash containers and recycle bins
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of you recent stay at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.  We are always open to suggestion and appreciate your feedback.  We look forward to hosting you again on your next trip to Newport.

Summary Heading: Excellent Resort in a Wonderful Setting
Summary: It has been several years since we last stayed at the Newport Coast Villas, and we were not disappointed. Our villa had a wonderful view of the Pacific and on most days Santa Catalina and San Clemente Islands were clearly visible 26 miles and more away.On a couple of days we were able to see the spouting plumes of migrating whales in the channel between us and Catalina Island. Our unit was quiet, clean, and comfortable. The short walk to the central building and pools was through an area called "Pacific Park" with basketball court (only one functional basket at the time), tetherballs, a putting green, sand volleyball, a couple of firepits, and picnic areas. The resort had a nice mixture of activities including a couple of free wine and cheese events (one of them combined with
Manager Response: Thank-you for the positive review of our resort.  We appreciate your comments and look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: My girlfriend’s and I stayed in one of the Villas. We had a great view of the ocean and were close to one of the pools and jacuzzis. I must mention the delicious beverage the staff passed out while waiting to check in!
Manager Response: Thank-you for the positive review.  We're happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: A small team of us lived at the property during a week-long work event. Although our schedules didn’t allow us to take full advantage of the amenities, the villas are the perfect place for us to make home for the week. The beds are comfortable and the kitchen fully stocked. The one drawls are the couches- they are very hard. It’s still worth staying here! You can’t beat the location, and there is always parking. I would stay here each time I’m in Newport with a team...it’s so fabulous that it’s sold out 8 out of 10 times we travel there.
Manager Response: Thank-you for sharing feedback regarding your stay.  We hope you'll come back for vacation so you can take advantage of all the resort has to offer.

Summary: Enjoyed a week at our two bedroom very nicely decorated villa overlooking the golf course and Pacific Ocean.  Property is hilly, so a walk around the property and up the stairs to the pools can be a bit of a workout!  The staff was great at check in with a signature drink offering in the lobby. The location is convenient to some wonderful restaurants and sights.
Manager Response: Thank-you for sharing feedback regarding your stay.  We hope to welcome you back soon.

Summary: I saw that Southwest had a fare sale so I started playing with dates.  Before I knew it, I had booked flights to Los Angeles for Feb 1 to Feb 10 for $162 round trip from Indianapolis.  Just couldn't pass it up.  So we called my wife's two sisters and a brother in law and they booked too.  Now, to find a place to stay.  I put in a request on Interval International to request a time share trade specifically for Marriots's Newport Coast Villas.  There isn't anything around LA to trade into so this was the next best choice.  To pick a specific resort for a specific date isn't the easiest thing to accomplish, but, after 5 or 6 weeks, Interval did it.  We have traded for 3 or 4 Marriots around the country and they are by far the best places we have stayed at.   This one was no
Manager Response: Thank-you for the 5-star review.  We're thrilled you enjoyed your stay and look forward to seeng you again soon.

Summary: Location is wonderful . Within an hour to LA and Oceanside. Rooms are clean , bathrooms are roomy. Towels nice and white and fluffy ! Staff is very helpful , brought extra towels, fixed my dryer handle at midnight, brought trash bags , extra everything when we called! Grounds are kept lush and beautiful! Our 6th Visit in 15 years here!
Manager Response: Thank-you for the positive review.  We look forward to seeing you again soon for visit #7.

Summary: This is our third visit to Newport Beach and our third stay at this Marriott.  We love it here!  It’s a great place to stay... right in the middle of the beach communities... about 2 hours to San Diego and 2 hours to LA.  It’s a time share... which is great fir our family of four.  Plenty of room for two teens, kitchen facilities, pool, and resort activities.  Well worth the extra spent instead of a hotel room.
Manager Response: Thank-you for the positive review of our resort.  We're happy to hear you decided to come back for the third time.  We look forward to welcoming you for #4.

Summary: Our villa overlooked the Pacific Ocean.  Beautifully appointed.  The staff there are top notch and you can do as little or as much as you like.  We did need a car to get there, but there shuttle to shopping centers and beach makes it a real "breeze"  and a lovely one at that!
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear you enjoyed your stay at our resort and even more excited you found our associates to be top notch.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary Heading: A few tips for a one time visit
Summary: Family of 6 from East Coast who thoroughly enjoyed the villa experience. Although we stayed at the Miami MVC resort last year, we found this one to be much better.   Tip 1: we gambled and picked a room at the edge of the property and found it to be perfect. The 5100 rooms were very quiet and beautiful views of ocean and great angle for sun in morning and afternoon. The pool near our room never got busy. Any time of day there were only a few residents at pool.   Tip 2: sadly took me a few days to figure this one out but I didn’t need to take Toll road out of villa each day. Whether going south (San Diego) or North (Los Angeles) my gps initially sent me on toll road. I found that bypassing the toll option on my GPS only made me trip (at least north) 4 minutes longer.   Tip 3:
Manager Response: Thanks for sharing a review of the resort.  We're happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and appreciate you taking the time to share some tips for future guests.  We look forward to seeing you at our resort in the California sun again soon.

Summary Heading: Wish number of stars could go to 10! Better than the Pelican!
Summary: My husband and I just returned from 2 glorious weeks at this amazing resort. I have stayed several times across the street at the Pelican and can honestly say I would go back to the Marriott again if given the choice between the two. Don't get me wrong Pelican is spectacular but I was always disappointed in my lack of a water view for the price of the rooms. The way these 1200 sq foot villas are set up made our stay even more comfortable than we are in our own home! We could have lived there forever! Every amenity you can think of it was easier to cook in the room than my own kitchen at home! Great coffee (a deal breaker for me and one of my issues with the Pelican they are stingy with the coffee and changed there machines.) The view is breathtaking I worked on a writing project
Manager Response: Thank-you for the great review.  We're thrilled to hear you enjoyed your stay and found the villa to be comfortable and the views breathtaking.  We hope you'll come back soon.

Summary Heading: It Never Rains in Southern California
Summary: Newport Coast Villas is a magical place. These Villas are family friendly, beautiful ocean views, pools, activities, socials as well as solitude. The staff makes you feel special, calling ahead to find out what you would like before you arrive, then a warm welcome, clean Villas, and consistant concern making sure you have a wonderful stay. Another plus the Villas are a 15 minute distance from the Orange County airport.
Manager Response: Thank-you for the 5-star review.  We agree that Newport Coast is a magical experience and we appreciate your comments regarding our staff.  We hope to welcome you back soon.

Summary: First the +’s: -great property! My kids had a blast playing the giant chess/checkers board, mini shuffle board, ping pong (plenty of paddles/etc), the basketball/tether courts, huge fire pits (bring or buy s’mores stuff & you’re a hero!!), taffy at the front desk & the pool is warm! -responsive & professinal staff (both front desk & housekeeping.  -easy parking & getting to the freeways -room was comfortable for a family of 5. Clean, easy to access, & the kitchen is a huge plus (make sure to bring your favorite spices or condiments) -close to the beach & nice shuttle if you don’t have a car or the family splits up for the day  Here’s the stuff to be mindful of -it’s farther away from many of the things you may want to do (LAX is at least an hour away, many of the colleges LMU,
Manager Response: Thank-you for taking the time to share feedback regarding your experience with us.  We're thrilled to hear that you'll be back.

Summary Heading: Fun in the Sun... hidden gem
Summary: We are locals to this property & know the area inside & out. I'm a huge fan of hiking the nearby trails (walking distance) of Crystal Cove State Park & El Morro Canyon. This is a family spot that has a great staff, tons of on site events (we had an epic time at the 4th of July Cardboard Boat Races). I really love the fire pit area they added next to the massive green park / sand volleyball courts - It's nice for the kids to have an excellent game room also.... we just let them run around this safe property. Not to mention amazing access to restaurants and excellent surf, diving  & kitesurfing nearby.
Manager Response: We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay with us here at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback and leave a perfect reiew.

Summary: This is part of the Marriott Vacation Club timeshare properties.  I am fortunate to be an owner, however units are available for rental.  The resort consist of approximately 700 units and each villa is about 1,200 sq. feet.  The Villa's are two bedroom and sleep up to 8.  The views are impeccable and the resort is full service: pools, recreation, store, outdoor bars, sportscourt and a wide array of activities.  Historic Crystal Cove beach is immediately south of the resort and there  is a free shuttle.  The Villas are fully stocked including working kitchen, laundry and other things you would expect if you were home.  Each building has 20-25 Villas and there are specific bar-b-que units per building.  The resort is centrally located and there are stores within a short distance.
Manager Response: Thank you for a perfect review! It is great to hear you enjoyed your stay with us here at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.

Summary: The resort offers panoramic views of the spectacular Crystal Cove State park. The resort has lovely flowering gardens and landscaping, pools and fire pit. The two bedroom villa is spacious and our unit was recently updated with new furnishings and decor. We had a third floor villas with elevator access and ocean view just as pre- requested. The Vista pool has a stunning setting and outside the lobby has areas to sit and enjoying the views and hummingbirds. This is an excellent location with grocery and upscaling shopping to choose, but we were there for the beaches. Crystal Cove beaches seemed pristine with tidal pools large expanses of empty beach. We were pleased with surrounding restaurants and activities.
Manager Response: Thank you for a perfect review! We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us here at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.

Summary: I rented two villas for a cousins retreat.  We were able to get villas right next to each other which was great!  The villas were two bedroom villas with more than enough space for eight to sleep comfortably.  The full kitchen and a washer and dryer in the unit came in handy.  The check-in staff was very friendly and hospitable.  We didn't have a chance to use the pool and all the amenities but it looked wonderful!
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us here at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback and leave a review.

Summary: This is a great resort.  Love the area.  So peaceful.  Gym is very tiny.  Not much to eat in terms of restaurants at the resort. But there are plenty of restaurants outside of the resort to go to.  The resort is near the beach and near a very nice mall.
Manager Response: It is great to hear you enjoyed your stay with us here at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas! Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback and leave a review.

Summary: Usually we go to Hawaii in November or December each year, but we decided to come to this Marriott location for 2017. We are glad that we did. From check-in to check-out, we were very pleased. We found that the two bedroom villa was more than enough space for the two of us since it had a full kitchen and a washer and dryer in the unit. What we particularly liked was the ability to cook some meals and eat on the spacious balcony that overlooked the ocean. There is a Trader Joe’s about a mile away where we were able to purchase groceries. There are bar and grill meals by the pool that were also very good.   If you fly into the Orange County airport, look on your phone map app first to take the back roads to the Villas which will keep you off of the freeways. This route is so much
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear you had a great stay! Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback and leave a review. We hope you will join us again sometime soon.

Summary: Our family stayed here for a couple of nights! Lots of great family activities and has a wonderful view of the ocean. We stayed in the 2 Bedroom and it had everything you would find at home. The pool is huge and the property is relaxing! The service was great and is just a few miles from Balboa Island and Fashion Island Mall. Check out the Ruby's Diner on the Pier at Balboa Island. Great place to relax with the family!
Manager Response: Thank you for a perfect review! We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us here at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.

Summary Heading: Beautiful resort, friendly, accommodating staff, plenty of activities.
Summary: Stayed in a 2 bedroom villa with friends.  It was spacious and clean. Free parking was available.  Concierge was very helpful with dining and tour suggestions.  Front desk was helpful with directions.The grounds of the resort were immaculate.  Free shuttles were very handy.

This is definitely in my top three favorite hotels I’ve ever stayed at in the US. It feels like you’re in another country- definitely somewhere tropical- but with all the comforts Marriott is known for. I stayed in a 2 bed/2 bath villa with 3 other women for a girls trip. We were a little worried it would be overrun with kids, but it wasn’t. The staff was amazing, the room and grounds were clean and beautiful. There was live music at night and the heated pools and hot tubs were enjoyable in the evenings, even though it was January. We very much enjoyed our stay. There is a trolley that goes to Laguna; we drove ourselves since we had a car, but if I get to go back (and I hope I do), we will take advantage of the free trolley. All of us want to come back with our

Great property part of the Marriott Vacation Club selection of vacation properties. It has everything  you would want in a vacation resort, Pool, fitness, great activities and great for kids. We were near a lot of nice dinning and near the beach.  You won't be sorry to spend some time at this property

Are you looking of perfect California balance for your family for young to young at heart?  This exceptional villa overlooking the Newport coast is situation perfectly for every possible adventure.  Just 10 minutes from the Newport Coast open mall, you will find some of the best shopping California including the famous Sprinkles cupcakes!  Or go 10 minutes down hill in the property shuttle to catch the ferry to Catalina.    We rented a car and drove 30 minutes north to Disneyland - so fast and easy on the toll roads.  The next day we drove 30 minutes south to the San Diego Zoo.  Its truly the perfect location!  But if you just wanted hang out at the gorgeous blue pool with a view to die for, or play giant, life-size chess by the Koi ponds fed by Grecian fountains, then start you
