Manager Response: Thank you for a perfect review! We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us here in Newport Beach.

Summary: The villas were simply amazing and well maintained.  The service by everyone was a delight, from the front desk, to the cleaning crew, to the exercise facility, and the concierge. Oh yes, the market place was wonderful as well. We even ran into security and they were all nice.  The villas were well stocked with cooking items and serving items.  Shopping was near the villa and it was an overall great experience.
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us here at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. Thank you for a perfect review!

Summary: Nice property, location and service...Fun place to stay with the kids and enjoy the amenities...nice views of the ocean and all units are two bedrooms...the market/cafe was redone and looks great, the grounds are well maintained
Manager Response: Thank you for a perfect review!

Summary: This was our first time at a Marriott time share and we were very impressed with everything about the room and property.  We stayed in a huge 2 bedroom suite with a balcony.  The room was very clean and very comfortable.  The overall experience would make us want to come back
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback and leave a perfect review. We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay with us here at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.

Summary: Have stayed here for many years and it has always been top notch.  Beautiful views, good food and many options for activities.  On site there are BBQs and many options for children.  Close by a Trader Joe’s and Pavillion grocery.
Manager Response: Thank you for a 5 star review! It is great to hear you enjoyed your stay with us here in Newport Beach.

Summary: As Marriott Vacation Club owners, my wife and I were joined by friends of ours, also Vacation Club owners with Marriott, spent a week there in Oct. 2017 for the first time.  The facilities were exceptional and the staff as well.  If anyone is considering buying a timeshare, I would highly recommend Marriott.  We enjoyed the coastline vista from our condo unit.  The weather was great and we used the rental car to explore La Jolla and Coronado Island.  A vast selection of restaurants with Mastro's Ocean Club being the best by far.  Great shopping opportunities nearby as well.  Across the street is the Pelican Hill Resort which is simply outstanding to visit for lunch, dinner or cocktails.
Manager Response: Thank you for a perfect review! We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us here at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.

Summary: Marriott's Newport Coast Villas never rests on it laurels.  Considering the location, they could offer their guests much less, but they don't.  The property is excellently maintained.  We were in a newly updated suite on our most recent visit; the furnishings were very contemporary.  They also also updating the lower pool (one of the three pool complexes).  There are some modest concerns to be attentive to.  Not all of the rooms have a great view.  It is always wise to get a high floor and to avoid the lowest bank of buildings.  Parking can be tight, particularly at night.  The middle pool complex can get crowded, but we've always enjoyed the upper pool complex, which doesn't get anywhere near as crowded.  We have never been disappointed at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.
Manager Response: Thank you for a perfect review! We are pleased to hear you enjoyed another stay with us here at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.

Summary: My wife and I were in California to enjoy the Tournament of Roses parade, so we stayed a few nights at the MARRIOTT NEWPORT COAST VILLAS. It’s a beautiful resort with fantastic service and amenities. Our rooms were beautifully designed and decorated, including a full kitchen and laundry closet.  From our balcony, we could see the ocean and sunset – delightfully relaxing. We especially liked the big 2-person shower and garden tub in the Master Suite! The place is clearly kid-friendly – so ask for a top floor to avoid thundering hoofs above at night! Another annoyance is the drones! Drones are allowed, so don’t expect complete privacy. Lots of families were enjoying the swimming pools and playgrounds, and our evening entertainment by tonight’s guitarist-singer xxx was absolutely
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback and leave a review. It is very important to us and has been shared with our senior resort management. We look forward to welcoming you back again sometime soon.

Summary: I have been to this location multiple times and have never been disappointed! The amenities and location cannot be beaten. From nearly every room you are overlooking the ocean. The family friendly activities keep everyone occupied; and of course, the adult activities are very good as well. The multiple pools and fitness centers are very accessible and very well organized. It is worth noting however, this is centered on a hill and may be difficult for some handicapped individuals to get around.
Manager Response: Thank you for a perfect review! We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us her at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.

Summary: This was a pleasant surprise of a resort. Located near the Pelican Hills resort, Marriott's Newport Coast Villas is tucked high above PCH. The resort is quite large and a little confusing at first. However, once you figure out your way, it is perfection. Check-in was quick, easy and everyone was very friendly. The rooms were clean and spacious. This property is split up into numerous buildings. There are various parking lots/structures around the property for cars. Prior to your arrival, you receive an email asking for your preferences. Be specific so you get what you want. This is not an ocean front property, so be prepared to hike down the massive hill, or drive. I believe they may also have a shuttle that runs every so often. One downside is that if you have a room facing a
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us here at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback and leave a review.

Summary Heading: Pleasantly surprised with this awesome resort!
Summary: We stayed in a 2 bedroom suite with the grandparents for a week. The suite was spacious and well furnished. The resort was clean and the staff was great. The pool area was amazing and huge! There was plenty to do including ping-pong, kids areas, and multiple pools and hot tubs. The kids areas (The Sandbox and The Shack) were great areas to let the kids play games and participate in activities. The pool bar and restaurant were delicious and the staff was great. The drinks were delicious as well as the poolside food. The only downside to this resort was that it was so expansive. We stayed at one end and had to drive to the pool area. However, there are multiple fire pit and grill areas spread throughout with great views. There is also a shuttle service. Finally, if you are staying
Manager Response: Thank you for a perfect review! We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us her at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.

Summary: My first time staying here.  The property was beautiful.  Rooms were large and spacious.  Full kitchen, fully furnished.  Staff was friendly and very responsive.  Parking can be a little difficult if you don't have the parking pass to park directly in front of the buildings.  But otherwise, these rooms were very nice.  Clean.  Excellent place to stay!
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us here at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. Thank you for taking the time to leave a 5 star review.

Summary: My family (Gold Elite MVC Owners) hosted my stay at this resort to escape the heavy smoke of the Thomas Fire.  I looked forward to my spacious ocean-view villa and the opportunity to have open windows and breath fresh air.  Being on a second floor, with no one able to peer into my villa, I took advantage of the opportunity to keep the drapes/sheers, pulled back and windows open.  To my surprise, the first morning of my stay, I was greeted by what sounded like a lawnmower outside my bedroom window, while I was bathing in the master suite.  When I moved to the drawers to begin getting dressed, I looked at my window and a drone was buzzing a few feet from the window.  It was the cause of the noise I had been listening to!.  Through the open window, I overheard part of a
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback and leave a review. We apologize for any inconvenience you experienced during your stay. Please contact our Customer Care team directly at 800-860-9384 or customer.care@vacationclub.com so we may address your concerns personally.

Summary: This was our second time at Newport Coast Villas and we very much enjoyed our stay.  The villas are really spacious with wonderful views of the coast.  One negative is the lack of a fine dining onsite restauarant but there are many a short drive away.  The shop onsite is also very expensive - only buy there if it's an emergency!  Concierge is great and so helpful but one thing they don't mention that we would recommend is a day trip to LA as independent travellers. Irvine Amtrak rail station is only 13 miles away and an easy 25 minute drive from the resort.  Great free parking at the station and only $18 each way to LA.  In just over an hour you arrive at the beautiful historic Union Station.  From there it's easy to get to lots of great sights in the Downtown area.  We highly
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us here at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback and leave a review.

Summary: As a Marriott Gold (6 nights from being platinum) member and MVC owner, I have n get been more disappointed in a resort. To begin with they didn’t call our correct number to get our preferences yet the onsite sales people sure had the right number! This place is incredibly overrated. The villas are common run of the mill places with cheap furnishings and horrible mattresses. There have been numerous small spiders all through our villa. One even crawled out of one of my toiletry bags on the 2nd morning. They don’t stock the proper number of towels for the number of people in the reservation. We were stuck in a dungeon like villa with no view. We were promised another room with a better view and never received it after we checked back with them in our 13 night stay! Outside our
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback and leave a review. It is very important to us and has been shared with our senior resort management. Please contact our Customer Care team directly at 800-860-9384 or customer.care@vacationclub.com so we may assist you.

Summary Heading: A fine visit to a great resort
Summary: The Marriott Newport Coast is a superior facility.  All rooms seem to be two bedroom, two bathroom suites with full kitchen, living room, dining room, and patio. As is the case in Marriotts we have visited, the facility, staff,and programs, are superior.  This resort is very well located and has an hourly van to the beach.  All the amenities one would expect at a superior resort are on hand. Although rated for up to eight guests, that would be a crowd.  However, four to six would be no problem making this an excellent resort for a family get away. This resort has always pleased us and we return on a regular basis.
Manager Response: Thank you for a perfect review! We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us her at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.

Summary: The only negatives are the water pressure and the cheap paper products in the Villas.  The views and accommodations are wonderful and the staff is extremely pleasant.  If you want a sales presentation make an appointment with Mike Machanick - very knowledgeable.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us here at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.

Summary Heading: One of the best resorts of Marriott
Summary: Thats the second time I come to Newport and don`t ask me if I would return for the third time because my answer is YES. I love the location, the city of Newport, the possibility of beeing in a huge city like LA and all the attractions but you can keep away from the stressful traffic and life. Avoid the highways during the rush hours and enjoy the views and the beach close to the resort that you can reach on foot
Manager Response: Welcome back! We are so happy to hear you enjoyed another stay with us here at Marriott's Newport Coast. Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us.

Summary: Nice place but will need to watch out for the email they sent to you to indicate your preference for eg high floor, close to main building...  I over looked mine, so ended up with partial view of Pacific Ocean.  Very relax atmosphere and each villa is fully equipped to ensure it is a home away from home.  It is very comfortable for four people, and can hold up to eight people.
Manager Response: Thank you for a 5 star review! It is great to hear you enjoyed your stay with us here at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.

Summary: Every year my family and I travel to the Marriott's Newport Coast Villas for a week long stay. The resort is on the hillside overlooking the Pacific Ocean. There are no real restaurants at the resort but you are close to dining nearby and closer to Los Angeles. You are close to LA destinations and to the beautiful beaches in southern Cal such as Newport, Huntington, Laguna, etc.
Manager Response: Thank you for a perfect review! We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us here in Newport.

Summary Heading: A beautiful resort with many amenities.
Summary: We stayed at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas in November and had a fantastic vacation.  All of the staff were friendly and the accommodations were very comfortable.  We had a fantastic view of the Pacific ocean and really enjoyed all of the amenities located on the property.  We made sure to play on the basketball court, used the volleyball court, giant checker set located by the pool and even the sandbox for the little one.  We enjoyed eating poolside for lunch.  The highlight of the trip was drinking wine and making smore's by the outdoor fire pit while watching an incredible sunset!  Will definitely return in the future.  Love Southern California.
Manager Response: Thank you for a 5 star review! We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay with us here at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.

Summary: Property is well maintained.  They have a large firepit with lots of seating and frequent visits from the racoons.  The pool area looked welcoming even in the winter, we did see a few people swimming but I'm not that brave.   The Starbucks baristas are the best!  Rooms are clean and well equipped.  In a great location near shopping, dining and the beach.  Looking forward to going back with the family.
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you for taking the time to leave a perfect review and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

Summary: Nice location with stunning sunset views. A great place to stay with variety family activities for a lot of fun. Hotel shuttle services made really convenient for us to scoop around nearby shopping plaza and the beach. I highly recommend this place.
Manager Response: Thank you for a perfect review! We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and hope you will join us again sometime.

Summary: Fantastic three night stay at this beautiful resort! Amenities are plentiful and staff is outstanding! Our villa had the best view in the resort and my wife was even able to do yoga from our patio. Our two bedroom two bath unit was completely equipped, so we dined in one night and had all our breakfasts there. Resort offers convenient shuttle service to shopping and local beaches.
Manager Response: Thank you for a perfect review! We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay and hope you will join us again sometime.

Summary: We had extra Marriott Vacation Club points we had to use up and decided to use them here. We added an extra night for a decent rate. We arrived after dark and it was a little confusing, but we did find registration without getting lost. Check in was efficient. The staff was friendly. The resort is beautiful.  Our villa was nice. We were lucky enough to have an ocean view. The grounds looked beautiful, and I wish we'd had enough time to explore a bit. There are daily activities that were nicer that some of the other resorts. The market off the main lobby has lots of nice options.  We could hear the people above us quite a bit, so just be prepared for this if you are not on the top floor.  When we were checking in, we rented a couple of movies, but we didn't end up watching them
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and look forward to welcoming you back again sometime!

Summary: This resort is just so-so.  Lots of better Marriott properties out there (favorite is Aruba).    Negatives:  They way our rooms were situated -  we were a far walk up and down stairs from everything, including where we parked our cars.   Forget your bracelet on the way to the pool and be punished with some serious stair climbing.  Also, we were towards the bottom and had essentially no view  (i recommend not being on a bottom floor, if you want to see the ocean - If that sounds obvious, note that the hotel is on steep  hill face).  I didn't realize the ocean would be so far off property, but that is on me.  I felt more like I was staying at a friends residential condo, than I was staying at a resort or time-share.   Also, the restaurant and food is lacking.  There is one
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback and leave a review. It is very important to us and has been shared with our senior resort management. We look forward to exceeding expectations on your next Marriott Vacation Club stay.

Summary: Love this hotel, ocean views everywhere.  Excellent and friendly staff.  Rooms are spacious and equipped with full kitchen.  Plenty of beautiful places to walk to such as Crystal Cove beach area and Pelican Hill.    There’s also a Starbucks in the building which is great but it’s hard to find parking in the main building.  You will have to walk from your room which is not too bad depending on which building you get assigned.     Right now the hotel is decorated with holiday lights and just spectacular to see in the evenings.    Just note that this is a vacation property so there is no room service.  Other than that, awesome hotel to stay at and very close to the beach.
Manager Response: Thank you for a 5 star review! We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay with us here at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.

Summary Heading: A fantastic family and couples spot
Summary: We have been coming here every year for over 12 years so it is easy to say that my family loves these villas. The location is great as it doesn't take too long to get to Disneyland, and you could also do a road trip up to Santa Monica if that tickles your fancy as well. The pools are beautiful and the food at pool side is quite good. Each villa is 2 bedrooms with your own full kitchen, which means stopping at Costco on the way in is a great idea.
Manager Response: Thank you for a perfect review! It is great to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. We hope you will join us again sometime.

Summary: We had the wonderful opportunity to visit the Marriott Newport Coast Villas in Newport Beach, CA. The property is very special. Our villa was beautiful two bedroom, two bath , living area and kitchen. The location offers great views of the Pacific Ocean and is has easy access to Los Angeles or Laguna Beach. The service was excellent in every respect.
Manager Response: Thank you for a perfect review! We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us here at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.

Summary: Very conveniently located in the posh Newport Coast. Very fast check in and efficient concierge that was helpful with all requests including last minute basketball game tickets as well as Disney passes. The hotel is residence style with good sized apartments that have all facilities including kitchen and washing machine. There are very good facilities for families and we liked the basketball pitch, beach volley, swimming pools, bbqs and fireplaces in the garden. Housekeeping service was poor and cleaning of common areas needs improvement. Had one night for free as we attended a marketing meeting for Marriott vacation houses. A supermarket close to the compound offers discount for Marriott clients and there are various shopping areas nearby. The hotel is not on the ocean but has
Manager Response: Thank you for a 5 star review. It is great to hear you enjoyed your stay with us here at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. We hope you will join us again sometime.

Summary: We had a wonderful stay at The Marriott Newport Coast Villas in California. Walking through the resort is like walking through a beautiful botanical gardens.  The lush and well manicured property is really quite breathtaking. All the staff, from the friendly reception staff to the housekeeping staff and everyone we talked to were just great.  The view out to the Pacific, the picture perfect sunsets, the pools, patio areas and walkways, all add to the experience.  We immediately felt right at home.  The two bedroom villas are spacious and clean and the layout is innovative — open concept living areas with inside wall angles making the units seem even larger. This resort came highly recommended and based on our visit, we wholeheartedly agree.  We are looking forward to returning
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us here at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback and leave a perfect review. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

Summary Heading: A great place to take family
Summary: We love the villas. There are no suites less than 2 bedroom, which makes it great for families (we took our three children plus one souse, and 2 yound grand children), but a bit roomy for couples. Most villas have an ocean view and the grounds are beautiful with several pool complexes. this is one of the crown jewels of the Marriott resort system.  The staff, as always, were superb.
Manager Response: Thank you for a perfect review! We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us here at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.

Summary Heading: Anthony’s Magic Show: A Must See!
Summary: We recently checked into the Marriott Coast Villas and while wandering around the property, a staff member said we should make sure we attend the magic show at 7 pm on Sundays.  We thought, oh ok... that will entertain our four year old for 30 minutes...boy, we we wrong!  Anthony was amazing and entertaining for all ages in attendance!  Not only a great magic show that lasted nearly an hour, it was nearly standing room only and the crowd gave him and his assistants a standing ovation.  I’m not sure what brought so many smiles to our faces - that he included our son for the coin tricks randomly selected from the kids sitting up front probably didn’t hurt...or the banter with adults and near adults with appropriate level humor for each....or that the magic was interesting and
Manager Response: We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay and the activities. Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback and leave a review.

Summary Heading: Fabulous hotel, great rooms, fantastic facilities and friendly staff... Marriott at its best.
Summary: We spent 2 weeks at this Marriott resort in September 2017 and it was excellent in every way. The rooms, facilities and service were first class and the staff at the resort are friendly and welcoming. The resort is designed so that almost all the rooms have a fantastic view of the pacific ocean and are very comfortable, a real home from home experience. If you want a great vacation either with just your partner or with the family go here.
Manager Response: Geoff, thank you for a perfect review! We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us here at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.

Summary Heading: As always, Marriott provides stylish updated amenities
Summary: Beautiful mediterranean styled villas set atop a hill overlooking the Pacific Ocean with near perfect weather all year.  Lots of onsite activities for all and lots to do near by.  3 minute ride to beaches and shopping.  My family is really enjoying our stay. As always, Marriott provides stylish updated amenities with the comfort of home and beyond.  I will return to the villas here.
Manager Response: Thank you for a perfect review! We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

Summary: Great place, stunning views of the Pacific situated on top of a hill across from the beautiful Pacific Ocean. The lobby opens up to stunning views. Villas are modern & all updated. I come back 2x a year....location can’t be beat!
Manager Response: Welcome back! We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your holiday with us here at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. Thank you for a perfect review.

Summary: stayed here from 10/10/17 to 10/14/17. We had gotten upgraded to a 2 bedroom suite on the 3rd floor of the 4500 building. Had a super view of the ocean and golf course. Check in went smoothly with a friendly staff. The grounds and facilities are well maintained. The resort is spread out over a fairly large and HILLY area. One complaint when we go to our room in the late afternoon the hallways and suite entryway are poorly lit. Better lighting later in evening.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback and leave a review. We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay and hope you will join us again sometime.

Summary: Location is great, view is beautiful.  Beautiful grounds.  Pools are warm which is very appreciated.  When we were there, only one hot tub was working and the steam burned my eyes when I went in it.  Chemicals were very strong.  So I did not stay in for very long.    Front desk staff were friendly and professional.  Rooms are a bit dated but had nice couches and beds.  They still need some updating, like getting rid of the carpet for starters!  Also,  our room could have been cleaner, it was not vacuumed particularly well (or dusted) and there was even something left behind from a previous guest still on the floor.    Kitchen well stocked with pots and pans and utensils, even a blender was there.  Complimentary coffee was provided and little containers of salt and pepper.  Nice

Summary: We spent several days at this setting. Exquisite sunsets from the top of the hill. Lovely, clean and easily accessible. The massage at the spa was marvelous. The pools and activities were inviting and there was something for everyone.
Manager Response: Thank you for a perfect review! We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay with us here at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. We hope you will join us again sometime.

Summary: Location is fantastic with easy access to lots of other attractions. Property is beautiful with shuttles to the nearby beach. The villas are well maintained and staff is extremely courteous and helpful. Stayed with another couple but plan to bring son and his family to enjoy the place. Has areas for kids and multiple swimming pools.
Manager Response: Thank you for a perfect review! We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and the location of the resort. We hope you will join us again sometime.

Summary: We are Marriott Vacation Club owners and this was our first visit to this property. There is a lot to love about this place.  Excellent location, spacious villas, ocean views, great pool areas, dinning option onsite and plenty of activities.  I would have given the resort five stars, but the noise level was really bad during the day and slightly past sundown due to refurbishing of one section of the resort near where we stayed.  Could not enjoy the patio or keep the doors open even though the weather was great.

Summary: Easy to get to- nice pools- beach access- great accommodations. Perfect location and nice easy drive to Dana Point. Especially loved the bar/ restaurant by the main pool. Salt water pool also available.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay with us here in Newport Beach.

Summary: On our way to Mexico before our flight out of LAX arriving from Michigan, we decided to stay a couple days at the Marriott Newport vacation club in a two bedroom villa. The facility was very spacious and the views of the ocean were wonderful. We had only intended to stay and relax before going to Mexico, so we could adjust to the time-zone changes, but were pleasantly surprise with our stay. The town of Newport offer many amenities and a costal view of it's beaches and ocean views, our only regret was the time of year (Fall) so we weren't able to enjoy the activities of the summer. We will be returning soon, and can't wait for another stay at the Marriott Villa's at the vacation club of Marriott.
Manager Response: Thank you for a perfect review! We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us here in Newport Beach.

Summary Heading: Great place; High Pressure Sales Presentation
Summary: As I have said in another review, this is a beautiful property.  We love staying at the Villas. We have been ask to go to presentations to hear about what is new with the Marriott program and how to use points.  They always offer a nice insensitive gift so you will go and have a hour and a half presentation with no pressure to purchase. The last ones we went on have been extremely high pressure at the end of presentation.  Sales say they don’t know why we wasted our vacation time, if we weren’t going to buy. We tell them we wanted to know about new programs and receive the gift!  They are not happy and show their displeasure.  As I said we love the property, just wish sales wasn’t sooo high pressure!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback and leave a review. We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay with us.

Summary Heading: Classy Resort in a Beautiful Location
Summary: We are Marriott Vacation Club owners and took the opportunity to stay at this resort after dropping our kids off at college.  It was the perfect peaceful getaway we were hoping for. The villas here are spacious with two bedroom two bath and full kitchen.  There are three swimming pools.  The view of the ocean is spectacular.  Marriott provides a shuttle for those who wish to go to the beach, or shopping.  Plenty of great restaurants in the area. We bought food for our breakfast and lunch to stock in our kitchen and went to dinners locally.  Staff here is vey helpful. This is a wonderful property for families - highly recommend.
Manager Response: Thank you for a perfect review! We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay with us here in Newport Beach.

Summary: I booked a two room villa on the third floor.  The view was amazing.  I got nothing but great service from the staff.  They were all helpful and friendly.  We all loved the taffy located in the lobby. This is a time share type of place but there was nobody pressuring you to buy into it.  Thanks goodness for that. Totally geared to kids and teens.  There is sand volleyball, tetherball, basketball, swimming, skee ball, bag toss, a movie cinema with various movies ( PG, PG13, and R), an indoor play area for tots, popcorn, lots of walkways and open green areas.  There are also grills, kitchens are fully stocked with cookware, glasses and the like. Villas are spacious and furnished nicely.  We had to borrow a W/C from the desk and I was surprised they had one.  Housekeeping was
Manager Response: Thank you for a 5 star review! It is great to hear you enjoyed your stay with us here at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

Summary: Have been here for 5 days now. Love it!!!! Full kitchen. Not needing anything. I’m going to inventory what they have and get rid of my overstock that has been accumulated over the years. Two full bedrooms, private patio with furniture. Two full bathrooms. Amazing sunken tub in master suite. Full dining table that seats 8.  Great parking near room entrance.  Only negative is we were told no housekeeping for the whole week! What? We call for fresh towels which Are delivered in a bag? Only one set of amenities and no fresh sheets. It is a time share place. I just don’t get it.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback and leave a review. As we are a Vacation Club, housekeeping will depend on your reservation. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to delivering the 5 star experience on your next Marriott Vacation Club stay.

Summary: We a Marriott timeshare owners and had the opportunity to visit this resort for the first time.  We had a wonderful stay.  Staff was very friendly and all very helpful.  Our son and his family from Utah met us there and we had a great time with the pool and the many activities they had on site.  The fire pits were perfect for s'mores and friendly chat with other guests.  The food at the poolside bar was not bad and plenty of it.  There was some type of entertainment every afternoon.  Plenty of movies for the kids in a delightful small theater.  Would go back for sure.  Shuttle to the ocean during the day.
Manager Response: Thank you for a perfect review! We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us here at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. We look forward to welcoming you back.

Summary Heading: VERY BAD EXPERIENCE, THE WORST MANAGEMANT PERIOD !
Summary: The Property is fantastic ! the Management and staff are NOT whoever assigns rooms it NOT DOING the job correctly ! here is a Idea....check the guest's Marriott PROFILE and assign the room accordingly  Top floor or anything else would be acceptable........NOT 1ST FLOOR... glad I drove 8 hours for a room with a view, only to be assigned a ground floor room with a view of the  Noisily  parking lot....talked with the night Manager about changing rooms, only to get a "canned" speech that they are AWAYS 95% full................ok, so are ALL the other available rooms are on the ground floor too?   THIS PLACE NEEDS TO TRAIN THIER MANAGEMENT PERSONNEL on PROPER CUSTOMER SERVICE, PERIOD ! this place leaves a lot to be desired. SHAME on them and Marriott. As a Platinum Premier member I
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback and leave a review. As we are a Vacation Club, we do not operate as a standard Marriott hotel. Owners do get priority when it comes to villa assignment. We apologize for any inconvenience you experienced during your stay.

Summary Heading: if you want bad treatment, this is the place to come!
Summary: After spending 4 days and 3 nights at the MARRIOTT NEWPORT BEACH COAST VILLAS, i highly recommend you look elsewhere.  Not only was the first floor villa smelling of mildew, but the management planned a total electrical blackout during my stay and only told me the night before it happened at 6am!  the management at this place is young and inflexible. they have no customer service skills and i am a gold elite member. i have never been treated so badly at a Marriott resort!!!   When i asked for an open parking permit on a Monday morning because the parking lot was empty from everyone leaving, the manager said NO without even a consideration that the place was half empty.  If you want first class treatment, find another place in Newport Beach. You won't get at the Marriott Newport
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback and leave a review. We apologize for any inconvenience you experienced during your stay. Although the parking lot may have been empty after departures, it soon filled up completely as the resort was completely sold out. We did offer a later check-out and an alternative in an effort to accommodate your needs during the power outage. Again, we apologize for any inconvenience you experienced during your stay.

Summary: We stayed here for three nights at the end of our week in Southern California. The pools are great, there is a lot of space to keep it from feeling too crowded. The views on the property can’t be beat! Gorgeous landscaping. Our villa had everything we needed to be comfortable. Can’t wait to return!
Manager Response: Thank you for a perfect review! We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us here at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.

Summary: Very nice hotel with great staff.  Was a little crowded the night we went and request for towels was over 30 minutes but the apology was appreciated and respected.   Nice place to get away for the night or for a business travel.   Now it was a little more expense when we stayed but based on timing and location , all good.  Thank you again Marriot
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us here in Newport Beach. Thank you for a 5 star review!

Summary: This was an amazing property.  We had such a great time, and the villa was gorgeous.  We had no problem checking in or with any other employees of the hotel.  Check-in was a little slow, but check-out was a breeze.  We had problems logging in to wi-fi, but called and got immediate and excellent help.  The property was so very well maintained.
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us here at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. Thank you for taking the time to leave a 5 star review!

Summary: We traded in to his resort through interval. About 2-3 weeks before we arrived we received and email asking us for room preference. I asked for a newly renovated room on a top floor and that is exactly what we got. The villa is large-2 bedrooms but could sleep 8! We were in unit 1420 and had a view of the golf course. We didn’t have a pool right out our door but we were very close to a “tide pool” and that was perfect for out two year old. That pool was never busy. We never went to the main pool because it was Carter away and always seemed packed. We spent a lot of time at the putting range, playground, sandbox, and tether ball areas.   The only thing we were disappointed in was the temperature in the master bedroom. It was always a lot warmer in there than anywhere else in the
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave a review. We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay and look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

Summary: If you're looking for a quite retreat and plan to golf, this is the place for you. It's a great place to reconnect with family since there's not a lot of distractions around. Plan on cooking or driving to town to eat. Cannot beat the views (but not all units get one)
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and the view from your villa. We hope to welcome you back soon.

Summary: I'm currently a guest of the hotel, let me add that they were not too enthused about my husband and I checking in. In any case I asked for a late checkout and was rudely dismissed by the front desk agent. As she stated 12pm is the latest so I offered to pay for another night at the military rate which is what we used and was told NO I MUST PAY REGULAR RATE! She did not offer to look up another night for us or check rates. I asked if I go online and   could see the military rate could I just go that route and she said; YEAH GOODLUCK IF YOU CAN FIND IT. So I called and spoke with the manager Allison who then apologized for Kodys behavior and offered to let us stay until our needed time of 2pm at half the rate of the military rate which seemed ok UNTIL she said but I need you out
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback and leave a review. We apologize for any inconvenience you experienced. Please contact our Customer Care team directly at 800-860-9384 or customer.care@vacationclub.com so we may assist you. We hope to hear from you soon.

Summary: We were her on a time share offer.  It was probably the best one we have ever attended.  The accommodations were absolutely breathtaking.  You are set on a high elevation looking down and the ocean.  It's a large complex but very quiet.  We were there in March and it was not very crowded.  We took many side trips up and down the coast and enjoyed our stops along the way!    This is a perfect location to use to see other areas of California.  Book and enjoy!
Manager Response: Thank you for a perfect review! We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us.

Summary: I will keep this short.  Our family has stayed in over 10 Marriott Vacation Club properties over the years.  This property is as good or better than any other property.  The rooms are what you would expect from Marriott.  The pools are amazing...all of them.  The service is as expected.  The views and surrounding area are better than any other resort.
Manager Response: Thank you for a 5 star review, Alan. We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay with us here at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.

Summary Heading: More condo than hotel.....first class all the way
Summary: We stayed one night as an alternative to a Laguna hotel, and these units are really upscale condos in layout and furnishings versus a traditional hotel. The quality of the construction and furnishings are certainly way above Marriott's usual budget stuff.  This is a huge layout about 1 mile from the coastline. The view from our unit, which was the cheapest rate on the hotel website, was beautiful. See the photo.  The ocean was in the distance but this is definitely not an ocean front complex.  Since it's a condo you park right next to your building with a short walk and elevator ride to the unit. You may have to drive however to get back to the reception area depending on the building you are in.   The condo was a huge 2 bedroom with 3 tv's, full kitchen and w/d in the unit.
Manager Response: Thank you for a perfect review! We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us here in Newport Beach.

Summary: So I see there are many reviews noting issues with rooms.  Here's another one.  Promised an ocean view room through Marriotts sales program and then get a room on first floor far away from ocean.  I was informed, after complaining, by several Marriott staff that it's owners first, then renters, then promotion offers.  No guarantees.  The problem is they are dishonest.  We walked the property and it was obvious there were many ocean units open.   They just don't care about us folks here that are target time share owners.   What a major disconnect.  They think by putting you in a crappy room and then showing you a nice room with the promise of become an owner and you too can have this unit.  It's backwards.  Our sales person during our presentation confirmed my theory.  What a
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback and leave a review. We apologize for the inconvenience you experienced and hope to have the opportunity to exceed expectations on your next Marriott Vacation Club stay.

Summary: The sunsets over the coast were amazing each night. It was so pleasant and clear.  It was good to be able to visit good friends while there.  The resort was very enjoyable and relaxing. Always good food and experiences near the resort to enjoy
Manager Response: Thank you for a perfect review! We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us here in Newport Beach.

Summary: My wife and I booked four night here recently.  Our son and his girlfriend joined us and we were very comfortable in our 2 BR, 2 bath unit, which came with a full kitchen and laundry facilities in the unit.  The staff were courteous and friendly and ready with suggestions on where to go to eat and see some sights.  The pools were big and well maintained, with coctails and food nearby.  We had a corner ubnit on the third floor with beautiful views of the Pacific Ocean, as requested.  This is a huge property that operates as though it were a boutique property...very nice!  We arte already planning a return trip here with our extended family in the next year.  I highly recommend this property!
Manager Response: Thank you for a 5 star review! We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us here in Newport Beach.

Summary: This is an exceptional property. Jonathan checked us in and went the extra mile to make sure we were well taken care of. We we in 4514. 2 bedroom 1st floor unobstructed ocean view. A little worn but it was clean, roomy and comfortable. I love everything about this property.
Manager Response: Welcome back! Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback and leave a perfect review. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

Summary Heading: Not relaxing or impressive at all
Summary: So many issues. If you want to come to California to be near the beach this is not your hotel. Not near the beach and no pool chairs available. Very crowded. Not a good layout for the number of guests as far as parking, eating, pools. Parking was a nightmare. No spots. Parked 3 buildings away. Our room was next to a busy road so very noisy and not the relaxing atmosphere we had hoped for. The room was cheaply made and not well maintained. If anyone gets int a cabinet the doors SLAM shut so loudly it wakes everyone up.  Walls are thin as are ceilings. Timeshare presentation was painful and sub par. They want you to shell out tens of thousands of dollars yet offer you mini stale half frozen muffins and a baby cup of water or lemonade. They were out of coffee.  No plates so
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback and leave a review. We apologize for any inconvenience you experienced during your stay. Your feedback is very important to us and has been shared with our senior resort management.

Summary: We could not have been happier. The accommodations were spectacular. Great swimming pools and a fantastic place to relax. The views of the Pacific Ocean are second to none. Crystal cove beach, which is close, was great. Restaurant that is right in the beach is something you just do not see at very many places. The south coast beaches are beautiful!!
Manager Response: Thank you for a perfect review! We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us here in Newport Beach.

Summary: We stayed 3 nites at the Marriott in Newport Beach.  The staff were all friend and professional.  The shuttle drivers were excellent and the property amazing.  Though you have to navigate hills up and down, it is a beautiful area.  We enjoyed hanging at the pool on top of the property by the 5000 number units.  The views from our villa were over the golf course to the ocean.  The villa itself is rather large, two bedroom with a full kitchen.  I recommend spending a few nites here is you are traveling through the area,
Manager Response: Roy, thank you for a 5 star review! We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay with us here at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.

Summary: We are members and stayed here for a week in September after the crowds had died down.  We loved it!  We were in room 4131 (4100 building) with an ocean view on the 3rd floor.  Occasionally I heard someone walking around above me, but it wasn't a bother at all.  The ocean view was gorgeous, (except for the Los Trancos parking lot at Crystal Cove which is smack dab in front between the Pelican Hill golf course and the ocean, keep that in mind when picking your room.)  Our villa was immaculate, though the furnishings could be updated (I hear they are scheduled for refurbishment soon).  Very comfortable beds! The pool up next to the tennis courts is great, large and quiet with a beautiful view of the ocean.  We never had any problems finding a pool chaise.  We love this place and
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback and leave a review. We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay and hope you will join us again sometime.

Summary Heading: Wish we would of gone elsewhere
Summary: We waited 2 hours after check in time. Next day we had toilet overflow, two days later the ceiling was dropping big drops of water. There was a leak so they had to move us to another building. We specifically had a rm for my Mom, she is handicapped . The room we got was far away from the main building. My mom could no longer walk there. The room was up stairs, i had to lift her up if we went outside. My mom felt trapped. The food at the bar is the only place you can get real food, they do have a store with incidentals but watch for timesof opining and they close when they want so call and ask. We had really bad luck there. It really upset my Mom who should of been upgraded not down graded, last thing which was really huge, we drove our all electric leaf down. While i was
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback and leave a review. We apologize for any inconvenience you experienced during your stay. Please contact our Customer Care team directly at 800-860-9384 or customer.care@vacationclub.com for assistance.

Summary: I cannot say enough about the service and attention to detail the entire staff embraces at this resort.  You really are never in want of any amenity unless you are not too familiar with the environment.  Great service all the way around.  Smiles everywhere!
Manager Response: Thank you for a perfect review! We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay with us here in Newport Beach.

Summary: Title says it all. We frequently visit Newport & Laguna Beach and love staying at Pelican Hill.  Little did we know what a gem we were missing out on across the street.  In fact, our stay has been so pleasant we will serious sky consider purchasing a time share here.   We booked our room via Hotels Tonight and got a 1st floor 2 bedroom unit. Full kitchen and extremely clean bedrooms and bathrooms. The two bedrooms were a bonus as our 9-month old angel enjoyed crawling around the massive unit.  The pool is amazing and we spent most of our last day there. Excellent service and plenty of space for all.  This is fantastic property if you have kids or are just vacationing as a couple. With the price above it half of what Pelican Hill goes for this is a no brainer. We will absolutely
Manager Response: Thank you for a perfect review! We are so happy to hear you had a perfect stay with us here in Newport Beach.

Summary Heading: Some Nice Improvements, Still Some Issues
Summary: We are owners here and have been since 2002. It is still our favorite place to go to escape the desert heat in Palm Desert, where we live. This year we discovered their vastly improved Marketplace. Much wider selection than before in almost every category. They still need to add a selection of magazines and books. The only bad thing about the Marketplace are the prices. C'mon Marriott, we are owners here. Do you really need to gouge us with prices you'd find in airport gift shops? I know it's a "convenience store", but really, $7.99 for a pint of Ben and Jerry's ($5.99 at Pavilions). Also, no logo t-shirts. The villas are still great, but more comfy patio furniture would be an improvement. Great TV selections available, but why are we getting the East Coast feed of many of the
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback and leave a review. It is very important to us and has been shared with our senior resort management. We look forward to welcoming you back to Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.

Summary: I have been an owner at NCV for 10+ years and have noticed a dog here or there throughout the years, I questioned why am I paying for a kennel when I can bring my dog? Oh wait I signed a contract that dogs are not allowed. This current stay, I feel as if I'm at a dog park.    The dogs I've seen in the grass/barbeque area near bldgs 4600-4700 do not appear to be "service  dogs" and let me state a service dog for blind or deaf, not emotional sopport. These dogs have no formal training and no self control as their behavior is no different from being at a dog park.  I witnessed dogs run out onto the higher floor balconies to bark at dogs on the grass. I couldn't believe how many dogs were at the property. I advised the front desk who sent an employee.  The owners did not provide any
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback and leave a review. Please contact our Customer Care team directly at 800-860-9384 or customer.care@vacationclub.com so we may address your concerns personally.

Summary: Beautiful resort in an awesome location in Orange County.  Convenient to grocery store and many many restaurants.  Went to the San Diego Zoo one morning and it only took an hour to get there.  45 minutes to Beverly Hills.  Wait until 10am to get on the highway on weekdays to avoid traffic.  All 2 BRs
Manager Response: Thank you for a perfect review! We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay with us here in Newport Beach.

Summary Heading: This is one of the best !
Summary: This is one of the best places I have ever stayed. The people were so nice. Rooms very clean. Everything I wanted! I would highly recommend it. I will go back!  I just cant say enough. Coffee shop was great. Beds so comfortable. Great showers. Kitchen fully equipped. Grounds well kept.
Manager Response: Thank you for a 5 star review! We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay with us here in Newport Beach.

Summary: I'm very honest with my reviews! This is one Marriott that's worth it! It's clean, beautiful, no mold, great pools & amenities, great location, not to mention amazing bar and grill. It's a home away from home! Basically a 2 bedroom apartment with washer and dryer! Great prices for what you get.  There are only 3 flaws  1) not exactly walking distance to the beach, but that's ok they offer a shuttle!  2) the floor boards aren't sound proof so you will hear your upstairs neighbors if they're loud or have children running around. Just call the front desk, they'll send security!  3) the parking isn't assigned per room, which it should be. If you get back late you may have to park kind of far.   Other then these 3 flaws, everything else is perfect!
Manager Response: Thank you for a perfect review! We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay with us here in Newport Beach.

Summary Heading: The only place to stay in Orange County!
Summary: Just completed our 4th stay at the Marriott Newport Coast Villas, and I'm convinced it is still the most perfect place to stay on the Southern California coastline. The resort is beautifully maintained, the Villas (we stayed in 2135) have been tastefully refurbished with all the amenities you need, and most importantly all the staff at the resort from the gardeners to the shuttle drivers, the activities team and the reception staff were very helpful, pleasant and welcoming. A special note to the Shuttle Driver Jon (from Laguna Hills) who went out of his way to transport us to beachcomber cafe on a drizzly morning - what a great guy and a model employee.  For the first time we engaged in the morning fitness activities which were delivered with great professionalism, patience, fun
Manager Response: Thank you for a perfect review! We are so happy to hear you enjoyed another stay with us here at Marriott's Newport Coast. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

Summary Heading: Huge resort, great place to stay
Summary: We were offered a low rate to stay here for 4 nights in order for the Marriott to present their time share options to us.  The place is huge.  It's like a little neighborhood.  The rooms are spacious and clean.  The staff is very helpful.  It is located near many attractions, however by near i mean within a 2 hour drive.  You can hit a lot of theme parks and interesting cities.  There is a supermarket nearby.  We rented a car so it was no problem getting around.  They definitely have video games for free in the kid's center (this was info i was having trouble getting from the other reviews).  There were tons of activities for the kids, and the ones that you have to pay for were reasonably priced.  It's a beautiful property and it's hard to imagine how anybody would be unhappy
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. Your feedback is very important to us and has been shared with our senior resort management. We look forward to delivering the 5 star experience on your next Marriott Vacation Club stay.

Summary: You guys need to do a better job of privacy when it is near the lobby when we arrived at 11:30 we heard music In the lobby at that time so I ask you please turn off lobby music after hours because I think it is disturbing other guests who are sleeping near the lobby    Thanks Assaad
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback and leave a review. It is very important to us and has been shared with our senior resort management. We apologize for any inconvenience you have experienced during your stay.

Summary: We stayed at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas for a week. The resort is big, beautiful, and very kids-friendly. There are also nice restaurants nearby.   Service  quality is excellent. My daughter was stung by a bee and the hotel staff quickly got someone to come over to put on sting relief for her.  Front desk staff, Jonathan, gave me a great impression. He assisted us not only at the check-in, but also some other matters during our stay. He is always very friendly, helpful and efficient.      We had a wonderful experience, and certainly look forward to going back again next summer.
Manager Response: Thank you for a perfect review! We are so happy to hear you had a wonderful experience and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

Summary: Very spacious two bedroom villa!  Location is excellent.  Marriott does a great job with vacation rentals -- particularly suited for families.  A romantic weekend, as well.Very easy to cook inside or on one of the grills. Good restaurants are a short drive.
Manager Response: Thank you for a perfect review. We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay with us here at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.

Summary: Stayed here with a family of 5 in a Villa and we had more than enough room.  Great communal barbecue and basketball court.  The main pool actually had pretty good poolside service even though it was very busy.  I would have preferred a little closer to the beach as it's  20 minute drive to Laguna Beach. They did have shuttles to the beach which was very close but we didn't use that. All and all this is a 5 star rating and the value booked through Airbnb was great.  If I had a couple of families meeting up at one place this would be ideal.  The staff at the hotel are excellent.
Manager Response: Thank you for a perfect review. We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay with us here in Newport Beach.

Summary Heading: A Gem - Perfect Property - Perfect Location
Summary: My wife, daughter and I spent a week at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas in August to celebrate my wife's 51st birthday.  The property is very high end, absolutely gorgeous, and the location is perfect too.  I will attach photos to give you an idea.  We are Lifetime Platinum members with Marriott and also own 2 time shares and have stayed at many beautiful resorts.  This property is among the best of the best.  Things I would want to know: - We flew into John Wayne airport and were so happy we did - avoided LAX and it's really easy to the resort from there. - There are toll roads nearby that we found useful but not a necessity - glad our rental car had the EZPASS - we used it and were grateful. - Great taffy upon check-in - many guests (like me) returned several times to bring
Manager Response: Thank you for a perfect review! We are so happy to hear you had a perfect stay with us here in Newport Beach. We hope you will join us again sometime!

Summary Heading: My villa was bigger than my apartment.
Summary: We got a deal on the villa, and shared with family, otherwise this would be out of my price range. There is a pull-out in the smaller room, plus one in the living room, and none in the master suite.  We had the master suite, which included a huge tub and a walk in shower with two shower heads. It comes with a well-equipped kitchen-microwave, coffee maker, dishwasher, pots and pans, silverware, several types of glasses. We had a couple of coffee packets, sugar and filters. Dishwasher soap and laundry soap were also waiting for us. This was great as we stocked up at the local store so we could have brunch with all the family staying there.  A few minor problems with the room though, The giant bed had a padded mattress cover that was bunched up and made it feel like I was sleeping
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback and leave a review. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us here in Newport Beach.

Summary: We love Staycations!!!! Nothing better then driving 30 minutes to a little piece of heaven. We met up with some friends that moved to the East Coast and came back for a visit... we stayed at the Marriott Villas for two days and I have to say it's a perfect place with kids! My only complaint is check in time and check out time. Check in is 4:00 pm however we didn't get our room until 5:30 pm. Check out is 10 am which is insane!!!!! I can't believe how much you spend and it's for such a short time. I know other hotels do this but it's very sad when years ago it was for 22 hours you had a hotel room.  The resort is huge with great activities for families. Sports Court, Mini Golf, fire pits for smores, upgraded rooms, great walking paths...... list goes on and on!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay with us here in Newport Beach. We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: The put us in a unit where our bedroom had the Newport Coast highway right outside our window and there were car and motorcycle races all night long.  Well, maybe they weren't racing, but it sure sounded like they were.  Previously, we were in the units like the 4500 and they were nice and quiet.  Great place to stay, except we were enticed to "take a tour" to "see what was new" and were berated by Ben, a sales manager of some sort that said we were only touring to get the points.  He needs to listen to the people talking you into touring and fuss at them....not me, I won't stand for treatment like that.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback and leave a review. Please contact our corporate Customer Care team directly so we may address your concerns personally. We apologize for any inconvenience and hope to hear from you soon.

Summary: We had owned here in the early 2000's but go out due to the lack of activities for our twin sons at that time (the resort was newly built and hadn't developed like it is now.  The wife and I booked a timeshare pitch four night stay as it's right down the freeway for us and close to work.  Our unit was in the 1400 building (bottom of property) and close to the lower pool which is quieter and worked well for us.  The main pools are extremely crowded (August) but they had entertainment in the evenings and poolside service if you want that.  The upper pool was very nice but we'd drive up to get there.  The unit was newly renovated with nice looking and comfortable furniture and beds, the kitchen had stainless appliances and granite....very nice.  The timeshare pitch was no pressure
Manager Response: Kenneth, thank you for your review! We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay with us here in Palm Desert. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back sometime.

Summary: This is a beautiful resort and very kids-friendly. We stayed for a week, and were reluctant to leave. Located close to the beach, Crystal Cove, with many good restaurants and a supermarket nearby, it is also convenient and easy to go to Laguna Beach, Balboa Island, and Irvine. Most of the resort staff are friendly, and service quality is good.
Manager Response: Than you for a perfect review! We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us here at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.

Summary: The first time we stayed here a few years ago we were happy with our 2 bedroom unit on a top floor with a view across the golf course--it was quiet and worked well for our family. But the last two times we've stayed here, we had rooms on lower floors and the insulation here is SO bad, that it was impossible to sleep. It sounded like a herd of elephants overhead and heaven forbid if the people above you flush their toilet in the middle of the night--it sounds like a waterfall bursting through the walls. Combine that with rooms that are tired looking and funky smelling! It just wasn't relaxing. Also, it's across the highway and up the hill from the ocean. So we feel it would be worth it to pay a little more and go back to the Montage.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback and leave a review. We apologize for any inconvenience you experienced during your stay. Your feedback is very important to us and has been shared with our senior resort management. We hope to have the opportunity to exceed expectations on your next Marriott Vacation Club stay.

Summary: Our family stayed in a 2-br villa with grandparents (4 adults, 2 children).  Villa was clean and comfortable.  The property is HUGE.  So many places to walk and places for the kids to play too.  Golf cart shuttles were abundant and easy to flag down.
Manager Response: Thank you for a 5 star review! We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay.

Summary: This property is just amazing and I did not want to leave at all!!! We came here on a discounted vacation with the Marriott vacation club. Because of that, we did not get the best room. The room itself was very nice with 2 beds 2 baths, but the view was of the "race track"  and the Ferraris were loud all night long. But that was just one small mishap. The building was by the northern entrance,  where you can catch a trolley to the beach at the lobby. The plan was to go to the salt water pool up on top of the hill after the beach, and the trolley driver said that she would take us there. The salt water pool was nothing like the normal pool by the lobby. This hotel is huge and that is the pool where most of the people go. This one was very quiet with ping pong and shuffle board at
Manager Response: Thank you for a perfect review! We are so happy to hear you had a perfect stay with us here in Newport Beach. We hope you will join us again sometime soon.

Summary: We recently stayed for 7 nights.  It is a very nice property.  Lost of amazing views of the pacific.   Villa is laid out well and the kids thought the pull out sofa's were very comfortable.   The resort property is HUGE with many hills and steps.  So be mindful of this if you have mobility issues.   One knock, the kitchen appliances are complete garbage quality crap.  The loudest dishwasher you will ever hear (good luck washing dishes at night).  You can actually feel the cheapness of the dishwasher when you load it.  It kind of feels and sounds like you are closing the door of a 1986 Hyundai.  The fridge is also very loud.   Speaking of which, you can hear every footstep of the people above you.  Not something we have noticed at any other MVC property, and we've been owners
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback and leave a review. It is very important to us and has been shared with our senior resort management. If you prefer, you may contact us directly at 800-860-9384 or customer.care@vacationclub.com so we may address your concerns personally.

Summary Heading: Good but needs improvements to maintain high quality standards
Summary: We stayed at the Newport Beach Marriott resort for the first time. We were disappointed with the room that was offered did not meet our pre-checkin preferences.  The room was on the first floor without any of the views and with special needs access that we did not request.  We ask you  to perform additional pest control on the properties as we did see a few bugs in the villa.  With this size of this Marriott resort, at least we would recommend one restaurant on premise, with the understanding that we do have the choice of cooking at the villa or taking advantage of the Market place. However, we think having one restaurant available is a reasonable request. One additional item comment is the late check-in process at 4 PM, I believe this is way too late. We have been very happy
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback and leave a review. It is very important to us and has been shared with our senior resort management. We do our best to fulfill all requests, but we are unable to guarantee them. We look forward to delivering the 5 star experience on your next Marriott Vacation Club stay.

Summary: We loved our family vacation here - first visit to my mother in law's timeshare. Our unit was recently renovated, building 4800. So - everything new and modern. Contemporary beach decor. Beds were super comfortable.   This resort is fun - lots of planned activities; we did a tequila tasting that was fun. We couldn't get to the glow in the dark Margarita golf - but it sounded fun! The shuttle to the Crystal cove beach was very convenient - leaves on the hour every hour, takes about 5 minutes and drops you right on the beach - no long walking to the waters edge.  The Canyon's pool near to the 4800 building was lovely, with an incredible view to the ocean, and the large fire pit and hot tubs are great to relax at with at night.  I had a massage and facial at the spa and they were
Manager Response: Patricia, thank you for a perfect review! We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us here at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary Heading: Big and Busy But Well Done
Summary: This is a large Marriott property on the coast in Newport...villas/timeshares. We had stayed at Pelican Hill across the road a few years ago and wanted to see what this had to offer. Beautiful grounds, tons of things to do , incredible spacious units with patio and ours had an ocean view. Fresh and well appointed ...only appliances are not quality.   The common spaces are scattered around and you dont feel the numbers that are staying here. BBQ grills that are immaculate and tables for eating nearby....grassy area for kids to play nearby. A list of things to do that will leave you wondering how you will fit it all in ! Every staff member has been over the top helpful in every way.  Good spot for a family with children... we will return.
Manager Response: Thank you for a perfect review! We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us here in Newpor Coast. We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: Just returned from a week at this "time share" resort.  Our family was disappointed with this resort.  Room was very dark and dingy and infested with ants.  The ocean view was fabulous but to get to the beach was an ordeal.  The resort did have multiple pools but only one served food poolside.  There were no restaurants except for this pool restaurant so every meal that was not hamburgers and fries, had to be off site.  Fortunately, Newport Beach is a great community with many restaurants and shopping nearby.  The beach however, that the hotel took us to was overcrowded and again no good restaurants nearby.  We found ourselves going to Huntington Beach for a better beach seen.  We will not stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback and leave a review. We apologize for any inconvenience you experienced during your stay with us. As we are a Vacation Club, we do not operate as a standard Marriott hotel and we do not offer the same amenities such a full service restaurant on site. Our villas and rooms do offer kitchenette/full kitchens for those who decide to prepare their own meals. Your feedback is very important to us and has been shared with our senior resort management.

Summary: Spent the first 7 nights of our Southern California Holiday at the Marriott Newport Coast Villas - clean and roomy accommodation, great weather, but a long way from the beach and rather let down in two ways a) lack of bars, restaurants & entertainment on property (apart from the single pool bar, nothing else within walking distance)  and b) the huge number of small children wandering freely who didn't seem to be very well supervised by their parents - and given the lack of resort security- we were slightly concerned as to who was looking after them! Compared to other large Marriott properties we were left feeling a bit disappointed - for example in Europe - the excellent Marriott Marbella Beach resort with great kids club and excellent restaurants & Bars - Newport Beach could be
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback and leave a review. As we are a Vacation Club, we do not operate as a standard Marriott hotel and we do not offer the same amenities such a full service restaurant on site. Our villas and rooms do offer kitchenette/full kitchens for those who decide to prepare their own meals. Your feedback is very important to us and has been shared with our senior resort management.

Summary: The property is immaculate. The staff is friendly  . The villas are awesome. The main pool is beautiful, however, over the years it's so crowded it's hard to get a place to sit. There are two other pools, however, they don't have the bar and grill that the main pool does. The staff will take you other pools with golf carts. They are constantly updating their property to keep fresh.
Manager Response: Patty, we are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us here at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas! We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary Heading: Amazing resort for families - we didn't want to leave!
Summary: Marriott's Newport Coast Villas has it all - great comfortable beds, a villa with a kitchen for cooking our own meals (and save a little money), wonderful views of the Pacific Ocean from our balcony, great pools, and kids activities galore! We really enjoyed our stay here. We didn't need to leave the resort since there was so much going on there, but when we did we found that Disneyland was an easy drive about 30 minutes away, Crystal Cove beach was literally across the way, Laguna Beach was about 15 minutes south, and Balboa Pier was about 20 minutes north where we enjoyed the Ferris wheel and a whale and dolphin two hour tour (Davey's Locker).
Manager Response: Thank you for a perfect review! We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us here at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.

Summary: I stay with my aunt and uncle every year at the villas and I have an absolute blast. The villas are very spacious and you feel right at home! The pools are great! This is definitely a kid friendly hotel!
Manager Response: Welcome back! We are so happy to hear you enjoyed another stay with us here in Newport Beach.

Summary: We rented two 2-bedroom units for 6 adults and one infant- plenty of room but smaller than most other Marriott timeshare properties. Overall a nice resort and a convenient location- be aware there is a 10-15 minute walk to the beach, and plenty of street noise. Great restaurants, shops and things to do- unfortunate for us, it was cool & cloudy all week.
Manager Response: Corey, thank you for taking the time to share your feedback and leave a review regarding your stay with us. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay here in Newport Beach.

Summary Heading: A high quality resort with delightful ocean views
Summary: We stayed here for a week with another couple in a 2-bedroom villa with a delightful ocean view.over the neighbouring golf course.  Our unit was modern and, I think, recently refurbished.  While we were there, the property wasn't overly crowded, but the pool area near the bar was still very busy, as there is only one adult pool. Unfortunately, the only place to buy a meal on-site is at a rather downmarket takeaway window by the main pool. The food there is fine, but a little over-priced.  For a resort of this size and quality, I really think Marriott should consider opening a proper restaurant, or at least seeking to offer an improved choice of eating options.  That said, there's no shortage of alternative choices all within a short driving distance, and we would especially
Manager Response: Thank you for a perfect review! We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us here at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. Your feedback has been shared with our senior resort management. We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: We had a wonderful two-week stay at Newport Coast Villas.  The property is gorgeous, the service was great, and we loved it.  We are owners, and this is the largest property we have ever stayed at.  We are also beach people, so while we missed being able to walk to the beach as we have in Hilton Head, Hawaii, and Aruba, the shuttles were easy to use.  But it is also super easy to drive yourself, so you don't have to be confined to the hours of the shuttles.  Be aware that the last shuttle of the day leaving the beach has a huge line and a 30 plus minute wait, so we preferred driving.  The shuttles are cute though; they just tie you down a bit.  Full marks to the shuttle drivers who all have a great attitude!  The shuttle runs to Laguna and Crystal Cove, but after sampling some,
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback and leave a review. It is very important to us and has been shared with our senior resort management. We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay and look forward to welcoming you back to Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.

Summary: First class all the way. From stunning views of the Pacific to great family amenities, we rate this as one of Marriott's best. We were in a 2 bedroom villa, not untypical of other Marriott properties. The accommodations are spacious, clean and private. Just a short drive away there are great choices for supplies and restaurants.All amenities are well maintained, the pools were crowded, but you never really felt that way. We especially enjoyed the fact that this was one resort that really did check for "squatters" in the pool area. They were very efficient at making sure lounges were available. We are already planning our trip for next year. Can anyone tell us a good hour to avoid traffic coming from North LA?....I'm kidding...grin and bear it. This place is worth it.
Manager Response: Thank you for a perfect review! We are so happy to hear you and your family enjoyed a great stay with us here at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.

Summary: This is our third visit to Newport Coast Villas. Every year, we discover new places to eat and visit.
