During our visits, we typically spend a few evenings in Laguna Beach at one of their many excellent restaurants, head to Huntington Beach for an afternoon, a day in LA for a Dodger game, a day trip to San Diego has been worthwhile, and there's always Disneyland and California Adventure for our son.   The two-bedroom villas are first rate. There are four pools (in three locations) as well as an hourly trolley to Crystal Cove Beach that is definitely worth the trip.   We've stayed in Newport Beach three times in four years and we plan to come back every other year for the foreseeable future
Manager Response: Jason, thank you for a perfect review. We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us here at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. We look forward you next visit.

Summary: Beautiful, clean and well maintained resort. Grocery store & Starbucks within a mile up the road. 10 minutes to SNA airport .  Had problem with disposal, no worries- it was fixed easily w/ one phone call. Always had what we needed to cook with in room.  Kids loved the pool grill & bar service while in pools & hottubs!!
Manager Response: Tami, we are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and the location of the resort. Thank you for taking the time to leave a perfect review.

Summary: What a perfect vacation spot. We spent 4th of July week here, which also happens to be my birthday. I have stayed up the road at the St. Regis many times, which I also love, but wanted something more relaxed and family friendly for this trip and decided to try the villas. We stayed in the 3900 bldng and I couldn't believe how modern and nice everything was.   The staff was so friendly and nice that when we checked in, we mentioned fireworks and she later found us as we were walking to the room to bring a list of ideal places to watch fireworks. They also delivered a lovely bottle of wine to the room for my birthday with a big bow and card signed by all the staff for my bday... Very sweet...thank you!   The kids loved the pools and beach, and fought over who could sleep on the
Manager Response: Bridgette, thank you for a perfect review! We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us here in Newport Beach. We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: This is a good property and location. The staff is great along with the rooms. The property is located away from a lot of stuff to do but they do have four shuttles that take you to different places that was pretty cool. I was a little disappointed in the fact that we are Platinum Marriott members but was treated like being a platinum member was no big deal at check in at this Resort. Also was disappointed that in the Villa that we got there was no Ocean View.  There are 3 pools here with a great view of the water. The main pool is a little to busy but fun.
Manager Response: Joseph, thank you for taking the time to share your feedback and leave a review. As we are a Vacation Club, we do not operate as a standard Marriott hotel and do not offer the same amenities. Owners do receive priority when it comes to requests and villa assignment. We hope to have the opportunity to deliver a 5 star experience on your next Marriott Vacation Club stay.

Summary Heading: Stunning views-  but they are limited
Summary: We traveled with another couple rented a 2 bedroom villa with an ocean view.   Be aware that most of units on the property DO NOT have ocean views.  If this is important to you make sure to request as early as possible.  Usually MVC calls 21 days or so ahead to check on preferences.  We did not get a call on this trip but thankfully we were able to get a unit with a view.  Some things to consider- This property is crowded and could really use an adult only pool.   I love kids, but if I don't have them with me I can do without being splashed by cannon balls.  Also- the "restaurant" is a take out window by the main pool.  Not bad but pricey.  I think a property of this size could use a real sit down restaurant or something a little higher quality. Not a major problem since there
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback and leave a review. We do our best to fulfill all requests, but we are unable to guarantee them. As we are a Vacation Club, we do not operate as a standard Marriott hotel and do not offer all of the same amenities, such as a full service restaurant. Our multi room villas do offer kitchenettes/full kitchens as some guests choose to prepare their own meals. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: The views at this place are beautiful.  We stayed in a very spacious 2 bedroom villa with 4 adults and 4 kids.  The pool areas are pretty awesome.  At night we made s'mores and sat around the fire pit.  There are at least a couple of huge fire pits surrounded by Adirondack chairs.  There is a large play area for kids including some basketball hoops.  I highly recommend this place!
Manager Response: Thank you for a perfect review! We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us here at Marriott's Newport Coast.

Summary: The staff were friendly when we checked in and very helpful with local knowledge. The room was large and comfortable making our short stay lovely. There are a coiple of pools which we unfortunately did not have a chance to use. Very close to the quaint and beautiful Balboa Beach.
Manager Response: Christine, thank you for a perfect review. We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us here in Newport Beach. We hope you will join us again sometime.

Summary: Even though we love Marriott hotels and resorts from past experience, my husband and I absolutely adored this property.  The staff is extremely helpful, and check-in was simple.  The rooms are absolutely lovely and extremely comfortable, with your own private balcony and a full-size kitchen for eating in.  There is a bar/ grill by the main pool, and the food was tasty and quickly prepared.  There are also multiple pools near the various areas, so that you don't have to walk far to get to one.   The location is perfect.  On site there is a lot of family-friendly action, such as scheduled activities which change daily and free movies (recent) with popcorn served at the beginning.  You can take a shuttle to Crystal Cove beach (about 5 minutes away) or to Laguna Beach (further but
Manager Response: Thank you for a perfect review. We are pleased to hear your stay with us here in Newport Beach exceeded your expectations. We look forward to your next Marriott Vacation Club stay.

Summary Heading: Great place for family vacation - plenty to do
Summary: Came here with 3 adults and two young kids for 3 nights.  We loved the fact that we have our own condo with a kitchen, laundry and space to maneuver with a 3 month old and 3 year old.  The resort is very large and hilly, therefore its not great for walking around with little kids, but they do have a complimentary shuttle to come grab you - you just will need to call for it.   Otherwise, be prepared for a 3 year to ask you to carry them after a while...  The views are great, and the grounds are beautiful overall.  There are a lot of activities to do, albeit with our very young kids, we couldn't take advantage of them all.  I would highly recommend this to families with kids  5+ years old.  It was very crowded and people all over, but because there is so much space on the resort
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback and leave a review. As we are a Vacation Club, we do not operate as a standard Marriott hotel and do not offer all of the same amenities, such as a full service restaurant. We hope you will join us again sometime.

Summary: We stayed in the 2700 building, and had a room on the second floor.  We could see the Ocean, but it would have been better to be a little higher up.  The overall location of this Resort is fabulous.  We took the shuttle to Crystal Cove beach and had a blast.  BTW, you can rent chairs at the beach instead of lugging the chairs you rent at the Marriott.  The pool is always fun and we had no issues with getting food from the Pool Bar/Restaurant quickly.  We love the fact that the room has a full size kitchen and plenty of room to spread out for a family of 4.  I highly recommend this resort.
Manager Response: We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay with us here at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. Thank you for taking the time to leave a perfect review.

Summary Heading: A lovely spot on the Newport Coast
Summary: We've stayed multiple times at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. Always lovely accommodations, beautiful views and attentive staff. It's also a good location for taking day trips up and down the coast. Very relaxing resort.
Manager Response: Susan, thank you for a perfect review! We are happy to hear you enjoyed another stay with us here in Newport Beach.

Summary: I rented a 2 bedroom suite for my son's graduation. The room was spacious and had a full kitchen and water/dryer. The resort was pretty and in a stunning location but I found it very crowded. It took over an hour to get a salad at the pool bar the first day and 2 drinks plus salads ran over $50. My adult children enjoyed the fact they could enjoy the amenities after check out. The resort accommodated my desire for an ocean view which I appreciated. I'm not sure I'd go back though, unless I had kids to entertain.
Manager Response: Becky, thank you for taking the time to share your feedback and leave a review. It is very important to us and has been shared with our senior resort management. We look forward to delivering the 5 star experience on your next Marriott Vacation Club stay.

Summary: This resort is an excellent resort to relax at. You can walk to the beach (30 minutes), or just lounge around the pool. It is a very large resort, but each villa has enough amenities so you don't have to go very far to get to grills, parks, or the multiple pools.  We went to Disneyland one day (40 minutes), and it seemed like we were against traffic the whole time, so not too bad of a commute. We also visited San Diego one day (90 minutes) which was not a bad commute either.  Overall a great resort near plenty of attractions, we will definitely go back one day!
Manager Response: Thank you for a perfect review. We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay with us here at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. We look forward to welcoming you back sometime soon.

Summary: Just came back from a wonderful week at this terrific property. Staff is superb; courteous, professional and surpasses all expectations. The property is well-maintained and central to many sites along the coast. Don't miss Laguna Beach sunsets, Crystal Cove walks and visits to San Diego as well as wonderful restaurants throughout the immediate area. Balboa and Catalina are sure bets for a memorable day. Finally, while I'm a MVC owner at another resort, everyone of my requests for room location and help within the resort were met. Go there.
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us here in Newport Beach. Thank you for a perfect review.

Summary: If it were just the location, this Marriott Vacation Club would be tops with its perch on Pelican Hill overlooking the Pacific and landscaped with lush trees and shrubs. There's great walking-- especially over to Crystal Cove Beach and along the shoreline. Bring your boogie boards and beach chairs. If you don't want to tackle walking the hillsides, there's a convenient shuttle throughout the day. (Marriott will also shuttle you to Laguna Beach, Fashion Island, and the Crystal Cove Shopping Center.) But then add in the beautiful 2-bedroom units with balconies overlooking the sea. If you ask for a building higher on the hillside you'll get extensive views, although the main clubhouse is further away. The main pool and Activities Center are a hubbub all day long with families
Manager Response: Barbara, we are so happy to hear you have found Marriott's Newport Coast Villas to be one of the best! Thank you for taking the time to leave a perfect review.

Summary: Very beautiful.  Well manicured grounds with so many activities for everyone.  We are Marriott timeshare owners and have stayed at many of them and this was definitely one of our favorites.  We were there for 4 days in one room and then left for a couple days and then came back for a week in another room.  Our first room was on the top floor of the 3900 building and had a breath-taking view of the ocean. I thought I had died and gone to heaven.  It was updated and comfortable.  The second room was on the second floor of the 4500 building and had a partial ocean view. It had not been updated but was still nice and comfortable.  The staff at the front desk was so helpful. The location was great.  Very convenient to so many things.  Grocery only 5 minutes away.  If you go, visit
Manager Response: Thank you for a perfect review. We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us here at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.

Summary: The grounds, location, and amenities are great' it's the staff and service at this resort that's fair at best; however, we've  returned and this is our third stay.  We've returned because of the location and proximity to so many spectacular things to see and do.  This time we booked 13 months out, 2 villas, so we could bring our kids, my parents, my in laws, my husband's aunt, uncle and cousin.  Everyone lives far apart (Ohio, South Carolina, florida) and it was a rare opportunity to get everyone together and have fun.  We obviously requested the villas together at one end of the resort and were assured this was not a problem' however, when we arrived, this was not the case.  after lengthy discussions with staff and management and hours of waiting, we ended up in two separate
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback and leave a review. We always do our best to accommodate any requests, but we are unable to guarantee them. We look forward to delivering the 5 star experience on your next Marriott Vacation Club stay.

Summary: I have stayed with Marriott in many different cities and several countries.  I can truly say that this is one of my favorite Marriott properties. The views in and around the resort are beautiful, filled with the ocean and surrounding mountains.    We were impressed by the service of the front desk and housekeeping staff.  Everyone was more than helpful and friendly.   We stayed in a two bedroom, two bath villa with a full kitchen in building 3400. While the view from our villa left much to be desired, we were able to walk right across the street from the courtyard of our building to the main building and had a perfect view of the ocean.  The grounds were lush and the main area had several koi ponds and fountains along with plenty of seating areas.  The resort seemed pretty full
Manager Response: Thank you for a perfect review! We are thrilled to hear Marriott's Newport Coast Villas is one of your favorite Marriott Vacation Club properties! We look forward to welcoming you back to Newport Beach!

Summary: Its rare I do a 5 star review.  This one is warranted.  My family and I visit a lot of resorts and I honestly can not think of anything I would change.  Its probably the best managed resort I've experienced in years, and especially given the vast size of this property, it says a lot.  Everything from check-in, the entertainment and service at the pool, the grounds crew, and shuttle service, was outstanding.  Make sure to check out Crystal Cove when you make your visit!
Manager Response: Thank you for a perfect review! We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us here at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. We hope you will join us again sometime soon.

Summary: We have stayed at this resort several times and it continues to be one of our favorites.  It's a Marriott Vacation Club resort and all the rooms are spacious, two-bedroom suites with two full bathrooms, washer and dryer, kitchen and balcony, many with spectacular views of the ocean.  There are also several pools of various sizes and plenty of kids activities.  Price and availability are at a premium during the June - August months but once the kids go back to school, that frees up and, if your schedule is flexible, you can find great values for what you get.
Manager Response: Thank you for a perfect review! We are so happy to hear you and your family enjoyed your stay with us here at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.

Summary: We can't afford to own a home at the beach so we bought into this timeshare, we're an original owner, bought before they had even broke ground & they were operating presentations out of a tent. We come every year! There was only one year that we called in on the wrong day (because of leap year) & didn't get our dates. But since then we've gotten our preferred dates & our preferred buildings. Every year there have been improvements made to the villas & property which is good to see our operating fees are put to good use.  This is our home resort & we love it so much we have never traded for another location.  Thank you Marriott!
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear you have found a home away from home here at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. Thank you for taking the time to leave a perfect review!

Summary: With two bedroom units and large bathrooms, these condos were a much needed delight on our last trip to Orange County.  The level of service at check in was good, we stayed in an upper unit away from the main pool, so it was quite and relaxing.  We made good use of the natural gas barbeques located near the upper pool and there is plenty of open space.  The full kitchen and patio were great for cooking and eating.  I even visited the pool bar and chatted with a friendly bartender who knew the area very well.
Manager Response: Tony, thank you for a perfect review! We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay and your villa here at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.

Summary Heading: Broken down room, timeshare rip off
Summary: We've been owners here since the beginning.  We reserve a year in advance.  The room we have has a shower door that leaks out onto the tile, a dishwasher top rack that you have to wrestle in or out, beds that slope, and a couch that slopes towards the floor.   No comfort here.  Clearly an old room that hasn't been refurbished.    Don't buy the timeshare hype.  The only way you get great treatment is if you buy more (and more).  You'll be told you need to upgrade to points and buy more to get the best rooms.
Manager Response: Sue, we apologize for any inconvenience you experienced during your stay. Please contact our Customer Care team directly at 800-860-9384 or customer.care@vacationclub.com and we would be happy to assist you. We hope to hear from you soon.

Summary: I love Newport Coast Villas! We try to go every year (or every other year at least). The grounds are massive so if you want to swim a lot request a room near one of the pools. The main pool is a lot of fun, but very crowded. Tuck around the back side of the pool (near the back of the second pool) and you can usually find a chair or two. Also, because of the size of the grounds, a wheelchair or stroller can be tricky to get around. Other than that, it is fantastic! Be sure to check out some of the daily activities and movies playing in the small theatre (next to the arcade). The activities are very low-key and laid back. Don't expect a lot of organization or structure. You're on vacation anyway so it's kind of nice.  We like to finish the day off with a trip to the fire pits (you
Manager Response: Marchelle, we are so happy to hear you love the resort! It is great to hear you enjoyed your stay and we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back sometime soon.

Summary: Have stayed at this property many times and have never been disappointed. All rooms are two bedroom, two bathroom apartments,  the owners use the word Villa but I generally expect a Villa to be a freestanding building and these are three level buildings with several apartments on each level. This is a Marriott Vacation (Timeshare) property so expect children. Check-in is 4 pm and getting in earlier is like wining the lottery even if you are Gold Marriott and you own a timeshare at that property. Hence check-in is generally a slow procedure but there is free coffee to help pass the time.  The "villas" are spacious, the main bedroom has a king size bed, large vanity area with spa bath and a separate shower (double) and toilet area. The second bedroom also has a double bed and sofa
Manager Response: Welcome back! We are so happy to hear you enjoyed another stay with us here at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. Thank you for your review.

Summary: This a beautiful property on a beautiful coast.  We stayed for several days on an Anniversary trip that was made all the more special because we chose to stay here for part of our vacation.  The villas are spacious and luxuriously decorated.  The large kitchen has everything you need...and then some.  Although we only used it to reheat some leftovers and chill some wine, it would serve a family well for preparing  meals.  We enjoyed sitting on the balcony with coffee in the am and wine in the pm.      The grounds are manicured and inviting.  Although we had limited interaction with staff members, all were courteous and friendly.  We hope to return!
Manager Response: Thank you for a perfect review. It is great to hear you enjoyed your stay with us here at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back.

Summary: Nice property along the Newport Coast. Units are being remodeled. If you come at the right time of year, not over run by crowds. Stay away from the main pool if you want a quieter pool experience. Good base for exploring the area.
Manager Response: It is great to hear you enjoyed your stay and the location of the resort here in Newport Beach. Thank you for taking the time to leave a review.

Summary: The 2 stars are for the location and views. Stayed here for a weekend to possibly buy into the time share. Chose not to for several reasons. If you have young children this is a great location. However if you are an adult that wants to relax, enjoy the views, have adult conversations and a nice beverage without kids in diapers on up to about 13 years old running around, you should stay away. Only 1 bar and grille and the bar closes at 8pm on Sundays.  No bbqs on the balconies of the villas like other time shares either. They definitely cater to the kids because the pool and arcades are open later than the bar. They have many of the same games you would see at a local bar like pool..shuffle board...corn hole..and ping pong....yet its all kids playing them 90% of the time. In
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback and leave a review. We apologize for any inconvenience you experienced during your stay. We look forward to delivering the 5 star experience on your next Marriott Vacation Club stay

Summary: Loved this place! Great location and gorgeous rooms. The staff is great and the pools and grounds are beautiful. Only issue, we got stuck with a room overlooking Newport Coast Parkway and it was really loud with no views. My suggestion is to do everything you can to get a room away from the busy road.
Manager Response: Bill, we are so happy to hear you loved the resort! We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay. Thank you for taking the time to leave a review.

Summary: This timeshare and location was absolutely beautiful. It is a huge property with everything you can ask for with amenities, three pools, activities, tennis courts, well maintained BBQs, and staff. There are shuttles to several nearby areas including Laguna Beach. Beautifully maintained property and units.
Manager Response: Marie, thank you for taking the time to leave a perfect review. We are so happy to hear you had a relaxing stay with us here in Newport Beach.

Summary: The rooms are appointed very well. The staff is friendly, however be clear with them what your expectations are and what theirs are. You could end up disappointed.  There is plenty to do for the family.  Take the time to enjoy the scenery.  Go in to town
Manager Response: Mark, thank you for taking the time to leave a a review. We are happy to hear you had a comfortable stay.

Summary: We have stayed here 3 times and absolutely love this property.  We are not owners, just guests.  We were there over memorial weekend and it was very busy.  Owners get priority on rooms (and they should) so if your not an owner, don't expect a lot of say in your room location.  We keep trying to get one with a view, but no luck yet.  The rooms are spacious, super clean and updated.  The beds are extremely comfortable and the sheets are so soft (I want to know where to buy them).  The views around the property really are breathtaking.  They offer a lot of fun family activities. There are a lot of BBQ areas all over the property to use.  I loved having a kitchen. We had breakfast at our villa every day (grocery store just a couple miles away) made sandwiches for lunches to take to
Manager Response: Welcome back! We are so happy to hear you enjoyed another stay with us here at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. We look forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: Great property.  Not what it used to be.
Summary: We love this property and have stayed there several times.  The views, pools, facilities etc...  All are great for families and we really enjoyed them all.  Live music poolside was great.  Here is the problem.  Had serious mold on the ceiling in our bathroom.  When the maintenance engineer cam by he was alarmed and said they were going to need to tear out the roof.  The manager did not want to offer us a new room?  I was not really concerned until the engineer made me feel like I should be.  Poorly handled by management and not how a nice resort should behave.  I know it was Memorial Day weekend and maybe they had nothing else to give us.  Inexperience probably and we will be fine :).
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback and leave a review. We apologize for any inconvenience you experienced during your stay. Please contact our Customer Care team directly at 800-860-9384 or customer.care@vacationclub.com so we may assist you. We hope to hear from you soon.

Summary: I own at this resort and have only been back a few times to visit.  I love being here every time.  I love the option of restaurants and close proximity to attractions.  Took a ride to Catalina Island right from Balboa Pavillion which was within 30 minutes from the resort. They have updated some of the rooms and they are very nicely appointed.  King bed in master and queen bed with pull out couch for children in guest bedroom.  Also couch in living room makes into bed.  Table sits 6.  I have a few recommendations for rooms.  Request a room with a wrought iron fence on the patio.  Some have block walls and you cannot see the ocean.  I would recommend building 4000, 4100, or 4200 as the best views and location.  Also the month of May and June is not a good time to visit.  The
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear you are enjoying your Ownership. Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback and leave a perfect review.

Summary: We spent 5 days at the resort in March. It was conveniently located. Close to Balboa Island, Fashion Island and Laguna Beach to name a few places. The rooms are nicely appointed and modern. We had one of the two bedroom units up on the hill with a beautiful view. It was close to the pool that also had ping pong, shuffleboard and corn hole. We already booked a trip to go back in December.
Manager Response: Lee, thank you for a 5 star review. We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us here in Newport Beach. We can't wait to welcome you back in December!

Summary: By far, this is the largest of the Marriott timeshare resorts we have stayed at.  And we thought some of the FL ones were big...this is by far the largest and one of the most impressive of the Marriott timeshare collection.  There's literally not a bad room and all the various buildings have their unique scene.  Though do try to stay on floor 2 and above unless you like to walk out from your patio to the many (many!!!) activity areas.  There are three sets of pools - one is salt water!  There are large gigantic firepits and even a good size indoor movie theatre.  The Club Thrive activities are for adults and kids...and there are a lot of things for every age group.  No one would get bored here if they want to be active...or just go lay out by the "quiet pool".  The state beach
Manager Response: Thank you for a perfect review. We are so happy to hear you found Marriott's Newport Coast to be the most impressive Marriott Vacation Club resort you have visited. Enjoy your stay!

Summary: What a week!  We spent the first few days with sons & grandsons enjoying this beautiful resort.  Then we spent the rest of the week alone as a couple.  This was the best of both worlds!  Marriott Newport Coast is the ultimate vacation.  You can stay at the resort or go to the beach!
Manager Response: Thank you for a perfect review. It is great to hear you enjoyed your stay with us here at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.

Summary: We enjoyed our timeshare week at this resort.  This was my first visit to California and I couldn't have asked for a better place to stay.  The state park beach is a short walk from the property, the pools were lovely and the landscaping well done.  Our room clean, spacious and overlooking the sea.  Lots of activities were planned but we only participated in a few of them.  Very friendly staff.
Manager Response: Thank you for a perfect review! We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us here at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.

Summary: It was just my husband and me for our timeshare vacation. We have enjoyed many cities and countries, some Marriott and some others, but this resort is the most beautiful!  We requested our room preferences and our wishes were granted!  Happy Marriott Vacation Club owners!
Manager Response: Thank you for a perfect review! We are so happy to hear you are enjoying your Ownership. We look forward to your next stay.

Summary Heading: Short but great spot for family vacation
Summary: Great location near the beach.   Very good spot for a family vacation.   Resort was clean and well managed.   The weather was fantastic and our adult children enjoyed the facilities and the beach and surrounding coastal towns.
Manager Response: Rob, thank you for your review. We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us here in Newport Beach.

Summary: Next time, we will stay at least five nights.  Stayed in building 3900 which provided an ocean view.  We were lucky! The property is just beautiful and we will definitely return.  We hopped on their shuttle for rides to the Fashion Mall and Laguna Beach.  Note that Laguna shops close early so I think it's best to drive or uber there during the day.  The late Laguna shuttle stop is best for dinner and/or sunset pics.  We ordered Gina's pizza one night for dinner  Very good.   Our room (3942) was renovated which I was surprised to learn that it also included a top/bottom high efficiency washer and dryer. Did I mention the cabinet was stocked with wine glasses?  You won't regret a visit here.  Just lovely!
Manager Response: Thank you for a perfect review! We are thrilled to hear you enjoyed your stay. We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

Summary Heading: Awesome Resort with Great View and Lots to Do
Summary: Marriott's Newport Coast Villas is a beautiful resort with a great view of the  Pacific Ocean and lots of activities.  The landscaping is beautiful and worth just a walk around the property.  We had a large, spacious villa with 2 bedrooms, 2 full baths, living area, dining area, full kitchen, and balcony.  We had a beautiful view of the resort property and Pacific Ocean from the balcony as well as the master bedroom.    The 2 bedroom villa is perfect for families.  The master bedroom had a king size bed, dressing area, double sink vanity, tub and shower.  The closet had plenty of hangers and storage.  The second bedroom had a queen size bed, sofa bed, and a large closet.  There was a nice size bathroom that could be entered from the second bedroom or living area.    We needed a
Manager Response: Larry, thank you for taking the time to share your feedback and leave a review. We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

Summary Heading: Wonderful location and beautifully​ kept property.
Summary: We are a family of 5, parents with adult kids 25 ,24 and 19 years old. Everyone enjoyed our week at the Marriott. It is a vast property with spacious villas offering something for everyone.  Heated pools helped because it was way cooler than we expected but we still were able to do every thing we wanted to do. The kids even got in the ocean so you know they are from the Northeast! We really loved the putting green, fire rings and huge pools. Also wonderful shuttles to take you to Laguna Beach and Crystal Cove State Park. Our villa had a view of the Pacific and a nice table so we could eat out on the porch. We rented a van so we were able to see more of the area. Some of our finds- *Go to Crystal Cove and do the walks. *Carolina Island is a MUST! We were a little set back by the
Manager Response: Thank you for a perfect review. We are so happy to hear you and your family enjoyed your stay with us here in Newport Beach. We hope you will join us again soon.

Summary Heading: Fun in the Sun for Mother's Day!
Summary: We live in Newport so this hotel is right around the corner and we did a staycation last weekend and loved it.  First of all I booked a room for Sunday night and check in was 4pm.  We wanted to check in early so I called at 9am Sunday and asked if there were any rooms available-I knew they were sold out Sat. night.  The front desk said someone checked out early so there was 1 room available.  I drove right over and checked in.  We are Marriott Vacation Club owners in Maui and Vail and Rewards members so really appreciated the early check in.  We had a 2 br ground floor villa with a garden view/peek a boo view of ocean.  It was beautiful-love the décor.  The room could sleep 8 because king in 1 room, queen and sofa bed in other room and queen sleeper sofa in living room.  The
Manager Response: Thank you for a perfect review We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us here at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary Heading: Easily the best timeshare resort property in Southern California
Summary: We own multiple Marriott weeks and have stayed at the Marriott timeshare resorts in Kauai, Maui, Palm Desert, Lake Tahoe, Park City and Vail. This resort is second to none with respect to the facilities, the amenities, the activities and the location.  Set high above the coast with sweeping ocean and golf course views, the resort provides convenient shuttle service to the beach at Crystal Cove where you can have breakfast or lunch at the Beachcomber.  In addition to the 3 pools at the main clubhouse and activity center, there are two additional pools and spas with their own character located at each end of the resort.  We especially enjoyed the pool near the tennis courts and the 4000 buildings.  Quieter than the main pools with 4 super comfy bed sized loungers.  Tennis courts,
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback and leave a perfect review. We are thrilled to hear you found Marriott's Newport Coast Villas to be the best resort in Southern California. We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: I was lucky to have the opportunity to stay at the Marriott Newport Coast Villas. The weather was perfect and coming from Las Vegas I was looking forward to spending a few days by the beach.   I was struck by the lavish reception area and the views from their double doors were simply spectacular. They have a can do attitude and no guest request is too much for them. Everyone in the check in area was helpful and also with a smile on their faces to show how much they enjoyed what they were doing.   The villa itself is quite large and a view of the Pacific Ocean to die for. I had a two bedroom two bath unit with a full kitchen that is equipped so you can actually cook. They also say if you don't find what you need in the unit they will do their best to provide you with what ever it
Manager Response: James, thank you for a perfect review. We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay with us here in Newport Beach.

Summary Heading: Gem tucked away in Newport Coast
Summary: The vaction villas at Newport Coast aren't located in the hustle and bustle of Orange County which makes them a great find for families and couples looking for a getaway. I have had the pleasure of staying here multiple times, and I cannot get over their pool/games/bar area. Such a huge property with all the fun centralized! And the staff knock it out the park. Thank you to Roberta who show my family a wonderful time by being so helpful no matter when we needed her. I look forward to visiting again.
Manager Response: Thank you for a perfect review! We are so happy to hear you enjoyed another stay with us here in Newport Beach. We look forward to welcoming you back.

Summary: We really loved our stay here.  This is an awesome location. It is very convenient to everything.  This resort has a shuttle to the beach although we didn't use it.  There was a nice pool and hot tub area.
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and the location of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. Thank you for taking the time to leave a review.

Summary: We have been a time share owner for over ten years at this facility. I am continually impressed with how well this facility is managed and the continual improvements made. This year we are in the 3900 building. Newly  renovated... they did a great job on the little convenience items. The room was well appointed and housekeeping did a great job for our arrival. A must stay in Newport Beach.
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear you are enjoying your Ownership! Thank you for taking the time to leave a review. We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: We are a local family and this resort popped up with our bonus week just a couple of days before arrival.    It is a jewel of a time share right above the coast in Newport Beach.    We were given a 2 bedroom ocean view room.  It was very clean and updated with everything you would need for your week long stay.  The master suite was beautiful with an ocean view and a jacuzzi tub.  The second bedroom only had a queen bed, but did have a pull out sofa.  The living room also had a pull out sofa.  You can take a short walk  out to the lawn and enjoy the adirondack chairs and beautiful view.  The pool area was lovely and well attended by staff.  The food was good.  The kids area was very nice for my 9 and 10 year old sons.    It is quite a walk to the beach, especially with kids.  The
Manager Response: Thank you for a perfect review! We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us here at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary Heading: Spectacular Site--Views, Pools, Rooms, & On-Site Classes/Activities
Summary: Absolutely loved this property--even our college-aged son & daughter did.  Relaxing ambience and well-maintained property with loads of tropical foliage and Spanish tiled roofs.  The five pools will keep little ones happy, too!
Manager Response: Thank you for a perfect review. We are happy to hear you and your family enjoyed the resort. We hope you will join us again sometime soon.

Summary: Recently stayed there for 10 days.  I had 3 different reservations there as I used some of my chairmans club points then had to buy one extra night due to the fact I couldn't get availability.  Anyways, very impressed with the staff Manny who was able to fuse all the reservations into one thus avoiding us to check out and recheck in.   The property was beautiful, well kept and in a great location.    Many amenities to utilize, plus bbq's throughout the property and firepits at night.   The view from our villa was amazing.  I highly recommend this to anyone who is interested in a great location, great view, great staff and great property.
Manager Response: Paul, thank you for a perfect review. We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and the location of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. We hope you will join us again soon.

Summary: We own at 2 different Marriott Vacation Club resorts.  We often trade one of those weeks to travel to another Marriott Vacation Club property.  This is our second time at the Newport Coast Villas.  Obviously, the first time was great (approximately 5 years ago).  This time has been terrible.  We got to our villa (2BR, 2BA -- overlooking the golf course and the ocean).  The view is magnificent, the location of the resort is fantastic.  The good news stops there.  It feels like the furnishings have not been updated in many years.  I'm sure that they are the same as when we last visited.  But now they are old, tired, saggy and, in some cases, threadbare.  The cabinets in the kitchen are old and do not close.  The appliances are old, dirty and dented.    We looked past all of that -
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback and leave a review. We apologize for any inconvenience you have experienced during your stay. Please contact our Customer Care team directly at 800-860-9384 or customer.care@vacationclub.com so we may address your concerns personally. We hope to hear from you soon.

Summary: As part of our trip across the country and back, we stayed 5 days at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.  This location is fairly close to heaven.  Our 2 bedroom suite was more than we needed and very comfortable.  We were on the forth floor overlooking two beautiful holes of the Pelican Hill golf course ($290.00 per round with Marriott discount) and the Pacific Ocean.  The grounds are gorgeous but hilly.  Marriott's personnel, from grounds keeper to sales rep are top notch professionals.  We took a whale watching excursion out of Balboa Island but once we new what to look for, we could spot Grey Whales and porpoises from our balcony.  The weather was beautiful but a little cool and windy.  This didn't stop us from using their pool and spas.  We loved our stay here.
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear you loved your stay with us here at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback and leave a 5 star review.

Summary: Second time at this resort.  The accommodations are 1st class and the location is 2nd to none.  Unfortunately it is very difficult to get an ocean view room so be prepared for disappointment.  I was unhappy with the master bathroom in that there was NO drawer space.  Everything was on the counter top so it looked junky.  The drawer in the night table was so shallow a normal sized prescription vial would not allow the drawer to close.  Very surprised that Marriott would accept this.    Pool area is terrific and there is entertainment which is a nice touch.  The resort takes up 45 acres so walking to one of the other pools is a hike.  There is a shuttle.
Manager Response: Welcome back! We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay and the location of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. We hope you will join us again sometime.

Summary: This is the second time we have stayed there and really enjoyed ourselves. The staff is friendly and the resort is nice and well landscaped.   The main pool was an absolute zoo because the weather was amazing.   The only downside is the place was packed and we couldn't get an early check in which kept us from a room until 4pm and then we were rushed out for a 10am check out with no late check out as an option. Aside from that it is conveniently located to Laguna and the local shopping centers as well as the beach.
Manager Response: Welcome back! Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback and leave a review. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and hope you will join us again sometime.

Summary Heading: One of Marriott's Nicest Vacation Clubs!
Summary: Marriott's Newport Coast Villas are one of their nicest vacation clubs and hotel properties. Location, Location, Location! They are located in Newport Beach, CA, a superior location where there is so much to do.  The fact that you are SO close to Crystal Cove Beach could be reason enough to stay here.  Here is a tip:  There is a restaurant on the beach at Crystal Cove that takes dinner reservations on Open Table.  Make those reservations as soon as you decide to stay at this Marriott! It's very hard to get in there, but the food is super, and the view can't be beat. It is a 10-minute walk to the restaurant from the parking area, so bear that in mind.  What I like about staying at Newport Coast Villas is you can always count on Marriott quality.  The rooms are clean, the dishes
Manager Response: Thank you for a perfect review. We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay and look forward to welcoming you back again next year.

Summary: We stayed here for 10 days over the spring break. We have unit 2023. It was a lovely two bedroom unit that was sea facing. The property is a bit of a distance from the ocean. The units like all Marriott's  are very well appointed. The unit had two bedrooms with two queen beds. Very comfortable along with two bathrooms. One issue is that there seems to be alot of mosquitos in the area so keep doors and windows closed. Our telephone did not work despite telling them 4 times during our stay, so missed out on a few events. The managers were very apologetic about this. My unit was a short walk to the main pools. Three pools in main area. Plenty of seats so n issues and pools were heated which was nice. Ordered Virgin Colodas at $8 expensive. Over all a great place and would return
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay and the resort here in Newport Beach. We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: My husband and I decided to take a little getaway to celebrate our wedding anniversary. The staff was very friendly.There is free parking + free wifi. Overall we had a great experience, will stay here again in our next mini vacation.
Manager Response: Thank you for a perfect review. We are so happy to hear you had a lovely stay with us here at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.

Summary: Great hotel and staff. Loved the pools, BBQs, fire-ring, and outdoor activities. Our family had a blast here and would love to return.  We are not owners, so we ended up going on one of their presentations. It was a very pleasant experience, buying right now didn't make sense for us but I would definitely consider it in the future.
Manager Response: Thank you for a perfect review. We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay and we hope you will join us again sometime.

Summary: We're just completing another great stay at the Newport Coast Villas. All the rooms have been recently renovated and are in good condition. The pull-out sofas are of the actually sleepable memory foam variety and not the old spring version.   The staff does a good job of having activities and games poolside. The pool temperature is great and the hot tub is very hot (almost too hot).   They could do a better job of policing the parking. It can be hard to find a spot sometimes and several cars are parked in front of the villas that should only be in the garage. The basketball court gets used heavily and one of the rim needs to be replaced.
Manager Response: Welcome back! We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. Your feedback is important to us and has been shared with our senior resort management. We hope you will join us again sometime.

Summary: From the moment we checked in until the moment we left, this beautiful resort along with perfect California weather made for the perfect hub for an awesome 8 day vacation. We will be coming back soon.
Manager Response: Bill, thank you for a perfect review! We are so happy to hear you had a perfect stay. We look forward to welcoming you back to Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.

Summary: We have stayed at the Villas on four visits and proud to say that we are happy owners.  Had a little issue with the original room that was assigned to us and we decided to move to another unit that was more comfortable for us.  The staff was very helpful in making the room change and have to give a big thank you to Joanie at the front desk for her assistance.  Marriott is fortunate to have her on their staff.    One of the most important decisions you need to make when you reserve a room at this resort is the actual unit that you want.  I prefer a high floor, near the lobby and pool area, with a great view of the ocean.  The property is quite large and on one visit we stayed in a unit where we had to use our car to get to the lobby.  To me, that's unacceptable.  If walking is an
Manager Response: Welcome back! We are so happy to hear you are enjoying your Ownership! Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback and leave a review.

Summary: My favorite place to stay in Southern California.  Within walking distance of Crystal Cove State Beach Park.  2 Bedroom Villas are very spacious and all face the ocean. Rooms are very large w/ high end amenities. Fully stocked kitchen, 3 Flat Screen TVs. Several pools and gyms to use.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave a perfect review. We look forward to welcoming you back to Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.

Summary: We stayed here for 4 nights and had a wonderful time. The property is beautiful. We had a room 3022 that had an ocean view and was on the main floor. Which was a bonus with kids. I had read some previous reviews about hearing people on the floors above, but we did not have that problem. I felt that the resort was quiet maybe it was the area we were in. The kids swam in the main pool area and had no problems. The staff was friendly. I used the fitness center and it had a wide range of cardio equipment and weight machines plus a bonus of a view of the ocean. I would recommend this place in a heartbeat and would certainly stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for a perfect review. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us here in Newport Beach. We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Spent a week here and had a 2-bed/2-bath condo with Ocean view on the top floor. We had a wonderful time overall, just had to show with bags, do some shopping for food and the rest is history. The staff overall were very friendly, however the prices on the resort were either not posted so you got sticker shock when bill arrived, or things in the Market place were really expensive. Great location as main base to jump off to any of the SoCal sightseeing locations or theme parks.
Manager Response: It is great to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and the location of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. Thank you for taking the time to leave a review.

Summary: This is an extensive resort with excellent facilities including a cinema, kids club rooms and numerous large swinming pools within the resort. The rooms are large and comfortable with a good wifi connection. The resort is also located near enough to be able to visit Laguna beach or even L.A for a day out, but also in a very secluded, pretty coastal area. Overall an enjoyable stay at the Marriott's Newport coast villas!
Manager Response: Thank you for a 5 star review! We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay with us here in Newport Beach.

Summary: Very nice and spacious villas.  The views of the sunsets are excellent.  There are lot of indoor and outdoor activities for the whole family.  We really loved the location.  So close to Newport yet we felt so removed.  The beach was a short walk and not crowded.
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay here at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. Thank you for taking the time to leave a 5 star review.

Summary Heading: Beautiful!  Try to get a room with a view.
Summary: We had a great time at this property once we had Joanie looking after us!  We booked on an encore package and were given a villa with a lovely view of the parking lot and garbage dumpster.  When I approached the front desk the following morning Joanie worked her magic and got us a new villa overlooking the ocean.  The timeshare person we met with could learn a lot from Joanie!  As far as the facility goes, the rooms and common areas were well kept, the staff friendly and the location great.  We saw everything we wanted to see and did not have to drive far to get to anything.  Parking is free and we were always able to park near our villa.  We were caught in a snow storm on our way to California and the property was wonderful to deal with about that too - they refunded the one
Manager Response: Thank you for a perfect review. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and that Joanie was able to assist you. We look forward to welcoming you back to Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.

Summary: After spending a few days in smaller hotels my heart leapt for joy when we drove up to Newport villas! Totally captured the resort feel!  The villas are huge! 2 bathrooms, 2 bedrooms, great kitchen, huge living room.  The only reason I'm not voting higher are for the following: Far from the beach, you need to take a shuttle but it is provided by the hotel Far from shopping, again there's a shuttle  The cinema, while a nice add on, needs some love as the seats seem Pretty old and uncomfortable. The free popcorn tasted like bagged popcorn. It would be nice if they actually had fresh popped.  There is an animator in the games room who organizes poker and what not. We had a blast with him. My partner won the game and was given a free drink coupon however the bistro was closed and it
Manager Response: Kelly, thank you for taking the time to share your feedback and leave a review. Your feedback is important to us and has been shared with our senior resort management. We look forward to exceeding your expectations on your next Marriott Vacation Club stay.

Summary: We have been here a number of times and just love it. As a couple we have experienced every thing we need here. Our villa is 2 bed, 2 bath, although we don't really need it. Just love the facilities- great kitchen and laundry. We were actually able to travel with only 1 suitcase, knowing that we had a washer and dryer in our room and could wash when we needed to. Having a full kitchen is ideal for us as we love cooking in our own apartment. We are aged  60+ so our mobility is limited, but we still enjoy driving around the area and enjoying the sights. The Marriott is perfection and we could not fault it.
Manager Response: Welcome back! We are so happy to hear you have found perfection here at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Took the family here over spring break.  Was here when the kids were younger and was worried there wouldn't be enough to do for teenagers. Wow was I surprised!  The kids loved staying on property most of the time.  The loved the property  and that's all they wanted to do.  Easier on my wallet.
Manager Response: Thank you for a perfect review! We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your spring break with us here at Marriott's Newport Coast. We hope you will join us again sometime.

Summary: We booked the hotel through Marriott Vacation club. This is our first time staying at this resort. Our room 4336 is on the 3rd floor, a corner room. It has beautiful view of the ocean. It is not right by the pool, but the walk is short and enjoyable. The facility is very clean from the hotel room to the lobby, swimming pool.  There is only one food place in this resort which is by the pool, the food is very good. I do wish there is at least a sit down restaurant for good breakfast.   A wonderful resort for a family vacation.  it's short driving distance to a lot of sign seeing places. We definitely will come back again!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave a 5 star review. We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us here in Newport Beach. We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Beautiful 2 bedroom villa with kitchen. Great grounds, excellent pool area. Only thing lacking on the grounds is a three meal restaurant. Reasonable priced for parties that require two bedrooms. Nice set up for couples or families.
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us here at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback and leave a review.

Summary: This is a great location near everything in Orange County. Forget about service though. No matter what you do when you request a room area, they will not help. I tried several months in advance by contacting the front desk to get in a general area of the resort but when we got there we were as far from that area as you could be. The management said "too bad".
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. We apologize for any inconvenience you experienced during your stay. We do our best to fulfill all requests but, unfortunately, we cannot guarantee them. As we are a Vacation Club, our Owners do take preference. We hope to have the opportunity to exceed your expectations on your next Marriott Vacation Club stay.

Summary Heading: A very nice stay and a good location
Summary: We are Marriott Vacation Club owners, so we traded into this property using our Destination Points. The public rate for a hotel stay here is probably high, though. We have stayed at Newport Coast Villas several times to visit family and friends in the Newport and Irvine areas. The 2 bedroom units are all well appointed, clean, and many have some special views out to the Pacific (see below for location hints). This time we stayed on a third floor room and had a beautiful sunset and Catalina Island view.
Manager Response: Thank you for a perfect review. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and the location of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back again sometime.

Summary: Stayed with friends for three days in a two bedroom, two bath villa. Nicely appointed kitchen where we cooked several meals. Washer and dryer were slow, and the hair care products provided were substandard.  Beyond those minor inconveniences, this is an amazing property, with ocean views from the balcony, a fantastic pool/hot tub setup and an outstanding setting. It's a 10-minute walk to dip your feet in the ocean, or a three-minute walk to soak in one of the numerous pools on site. Plenty of clean towels always available and spot-on service from the attentive staff.  Bonus for comfortable beds that were clearly not an afterthought when the place was designed. Great restaurants and shopping in all directions (other than west, which is an ocean) and the nearest grocery store even
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and the location of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. We hope you will join us again sometime and thank you for your review.

Summary: Our family of nine (three generations) stayed here for the grandkids' Spring Break.  What a beautiful place!  The grounds are gorgeous and well kept.  The views are fabulous from upper floors, and the facilities were top notch.  Friendly staff at the bars, and activities --- I particularly enjoyed the outdoor Pilates/Yoga classes offered poolside.  The kids enjoyed the pools and hot tubs.  Loved the nearby beach which is only a 10 minute walk away. One day was spent off site while the younger ones did Universal Studios.  My husband and I visited the Getty Center in LA.  Great side trips, but must admit, it made returning to our villas a nice respite from the traffic and noise.  Each villa (we had two in Building 2800) was fully furnished and well equipped.  The nearby outdoor
Manager Response: Thank you for a perfect review! We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us here at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Our third time, staying for approximately one week, during our kids spring vacation.  A place for families boasting over to 700 units with flip flop floor plans that have master bedroom, kitchen, living room, and another bedroom. The kitchen is well stocked, three big screen Tv's, wifi, and ocean views to die for! A large property that that tries to pull its visitors to its outdoor attractions in the same way that a cruise liner attracts its guests to common rooms. The kids, both old and young, can play outdoor basketball, sand lot volleyball, enjoy a group barbecue, or sit around a campfire and not even have attempted the plethora of programs offered by the property for its customers. At one point every family must experience the Newport Coast Villa by Marriott.
Manager Response: Welcome back, Darren! We are so happy to hear you enjoyed another stay with us here at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. Thank you for taking the time to leave a perfect review and we hope to welcome you back again sometime!

Summary: I very large and well kept property.  We had a 3rd floor room overlooking the ocean. Friendly staff and a very smooth check in and out process.  Great for families with various pools and hot tubs.  It also has a theatre showing recent movies.  A great location for a family holiday!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing Marriott's Newport Coast Villas for your spring break vacation. We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you for a perfect review.

Summary: We stayed 7 nights in a 2 bed / 2 bath unit at the Marriott Newport Coast Villas in March of 2017.  The unit was on the 4th floor and had an amazing view of the beach volleyball and lawn area, as well as the ocean.  My relatives told me that several of the units in the lower buildings have trees that block the view, but this unit, east of the beach volleyball area had a spectacular view. When we arrived, we had lots of activities planned like Disney and SeaWorld, but did not know the extent of activities available right there at the resort.  They had wine and chocolate tasting, crafts and activities for the kids, a kids club, 3 great pool areas, a playground and a couple fire pits for roasting marshmallows.  In hindsight, we wished that we had more free time to explore and enjoy
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are pleased to hear you had an excellent stay with us here at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. We look forward to your next visit to Newport Beach.

Summary: We rented a house and had a nightmarish experience so we moved here for the rest of the week. It was a wonderful experience. They have daily activities (crafts, make your own sundae) for kids, multiple pools, etc. The unit we stayed in was newly renovated (might want to ask for this) and wonderfully maintained with a full kitchen. For adults, they have a nice fitness center, bars and a movie room. The property provides a shuttle to Laguna Beach, and everything is walkable. And the rates here are reasonable. I cannot recommend this place enough if you are vacationing with children.
Manager Response: Thank you for a perfect review! We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us here at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back to Newport Beach.

Summary: Second time here. This place is fantastic and will not disappoint. Close enough to San Diego, Anaheim and LA for day trips.Fully furnished suites with full kitchen is a dream for those seeking a vacation without having to eat out everyday. Will definitely keep coming back. Well done Marriott Vacation Club.
Manager Response: Welcome back! We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us here in Newport Beach. Thank you for a perfect review and we look forward to your next visit.

Summary: As Marriott vacation club owners (really...it's a timeshare, but they apparently hate that term), We have visited the Newport property several times in the last 10 years.  Especially loving this visit due to newer units (we're in the 4800 building this time).  Vacationing with our own full kitchen and a comfortable, roomy 2 BR 2BA condo is the best way to travel with family.  We are able to enjoy grandparents and cousins and cook some meals together without being on top of each other.  Views of the ocean from this altitude are spectacular!
Manager Response: Welcome back, Therese. We are so happy to hear you and your family enjoyed your stay with us here at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: First impression:  Parking was an insult.  Near your apartment is space for 1 car.  Our second car had to be parked under another building about 1/2 a mile away.  Really?  The apartment was lovely, although the animals staying upstairs from us were outrageously noisy.  So was the construction area next door, and the Coast Highway below, which seems to be a drag strip for any number of unmuffled vehicles.    If you don't cook in your apartment (I just can't bring myself to referring to these things as "villas"), the nearest food service is more than two miles away.  While this place is near a beach, other tourist attractions may be some distance.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback and leave a review. We hope to have the opportunity to exceed your expectations on your next Marriott Vacation Club stay.

Summary Heading: Staff is terrible and ceilings are paper thin
Summary: It's too bad that the staff is completely rude and unhelpful.  The location is gorgeous.  I called twice to report how noisy the people in the Villa above me were.  It was never logged according to Marriott Rewards staff.  At checkin I asked for a room where I could easily bring in heavy luggage, I found myself stumbling down many stairs at midnight after I was told my villa was ground level. (Telling me elevators were close by would have been nice).  I asked if bottled water was in the room, they don't provide water in the room and the marketplace was closed.  I checked in just after midnight due to a late flight.  Upon checkout I let them know I forgot something in my room, they wouldn't bring it to the main office and stated I had to meet the staff at the Villa, which is a
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. It is very important to us and has been shared with our senior resort management. Please contact Customer Care directly at 800-860-9384 or customer.care@vacationclub.com so we may address your concerns personally. We hope to hear from you soon.

Summary: I think this is one of the gems of the vacation club portfolio. It's huge. Multiple villas and several pools.  Ask for a renovated room, near the main pool with ocean views and a higher up floor.  We are owners in Orlando and usually we are accommodated. Tonnes of on site activities if you are interested.  This place might be too big for some and it doesn't have a full service restaurant.  Like many vacation club properties, renting a car would probably be helpful.  This resort and grounds are very well maintained.  It was at capacity the week we were there and it did not seem crowded.    It's fairly close to Disney if you are so inclined.  Close to Newport beach and Balboa Island.  You can take a boat to Catalina Island for the day.  We did zip lining there which was awesome.
Manager Response: Thank you for a perfect review! We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us here at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.

Summary: If you expect to get me to commit to a long term vacation commitment, you might want to figure out how to wow me into wanting to return.  Nice rooms with average views of local vegetation  and the house on the hill combined with nothing close to the unit for recreation or entertainment and I am going to have to pass on a long term commitment.  Sorry Marriott
Manager Response: Mark, thank you for taking the time to share your feedback and leave a review. We look forward to our next opportunity to exceed your expectations on a Marriott Vacation Club stay.

Summary: This place is sooooo beautiful. I had a blast. I usually go to places and am always on the move but I really relaxed here. And of course, Marriott always has a ton to do. I purchased more vacation time from Jen, who is an absolute JEM, and am very happy about it. Because I LOVE to travel, this was a very smart addition for me! Loved traveling up and down the coast. Just sooooooo pretty.
Manager Response: Kara, thank you for a perfect review. We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay and the resort. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back sometime.

Summary: We stayed here in January.  The grounds overlook the beautiful pacific ocean on a cliff.  Many pools to choose from. We were upgraded into a two bedroom villa. The room we had was recently renovated and was very comfortable.  I loved the decoration and colors of the new reno.  The resort itself is away from any stores or restaurants so if you want to eat offsite you will need a car or use the complimentary shuttle they offer.  It goes to many places such as the pier or mall.  We decided to drive to grab some dinner. They have a nearby plaza with many restaurants, stores and Trader Joes.   Really enjoyed our stay and look forward to staying for a long weekend during the summer.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and your villa here at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. We hope you will return sometime soon.

Summary: It was our second time here so I knew what to expect and I was not disappointed.    Berit was super in contacting us before we got there, and blocked us in our preferred room. Loved the amazing views.  We did not have a renovated room, but I felt the rooms were perfectly fine. Beds were super comfortable and the bedding was awesome. I typically don't sleep well in hotels so kudos to the hotel  Everyone was super friendly including the Disney reprentative. Get you tickets there and ask questions. She know the answers. The more lines you can skip at Disney the better!!  Parking was only a little tough at night. It's very busy.  You may just need to walk a bit.   Pool was great. Good menu and pool drinks.  If it rains, no food and no bar. Thank goodness it only rained one day.  I
Manager Response: Sharon, welcome back! We are pleased to hear you enjoyed another stay with us here in Newport Beach. Thank you for your review.

Summary: This resort is a lot of fun with excellent service.  Yoga in the valley toward the top of the mountain looking down onto the ocean is first for the day, then for breakfast, Dana Point Catamaran, Shopping & Beaches!  What more do you need.  The villas are lovely and tastefully decorated.
Manager Response: Thank you for a perfect review. We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay and your villa here at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. We hope you will join us again sometime.

Summary: This is an awesome place.  The people working here are so extremely friendly. They are all two bedroom two bathroom villas.  Request an ocean view. The grounds are wonderful and the location is perfect.
Manager Response: Thank you for a perfect review. We are so happy to hear you found Marriott's Newport Coast Villas to be amazing. We hope you will join us again sometime.

Summary: This was our first visit to this resort.  We found the service to be excellent - particularly the pre-arrival care that Berit Stingley gave us was unprecedented.  She worked with us to get our preferred location.  The exterior/grounds of this resort are reminiscent of Tuscany and it is quite breathtaking.  However, the interior of the units is very modern and almost austere, which was not to our liking.  However, the units were large and clean.  I did not give this property a 5th star as they have no restaurant on site.  They only have a pool-side bar and grill.  For a resort of this size I'm surprised that they couldn't do better than that.  We ate there once as we had just arrived and were tired and didn't want to have to go out driving to find a place to eat.  The food was
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. As we are a Vacation Club, we do not operate as a traditional Marriott hotel and do not offer all of the same on-site amenities, such as a full service restaurant. All of our villas boast a fully stocked kitchen with a refrigerator, oven, dishwasher and much more for those guests who choose to cook their own meals in their villa. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and look forward to welcoming you back sometime soon.

Summary: As always, MVC does not disappoint!  First time visiting Newport Coast Villas and I'm ready to go back.  The room was one of the renovated ones and was nicely appointed.  Huge shower in master bath!  2nd bedroom had a queen bed and a pull out couch which was perfect for our two daughters.  We did it have an ocean view, we were in a lower building but we did see the golf course.  We were also a very short walk to the pool which was nice. The pool area was very large with 3 pools and 2 hot tubs.  It was not peak season when we were there so we had no trouble getting seats in the sun. Staff was very nice as always.  Lots of kids activities, husband loved the putting green.  The huge fire pit was nice for those chilly nights!  Hotel is close to many attractions: Crystal Cove State
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your first visit to Marriott's Newport Coast Villas! Thank you for taking the time to leave a 5 star review. We look forward to welcoming you back!

Summary: We rented a villa for 5 of us (3 teenagers) and we were all pleasantly surprised. The villa was clean and spacious, the grounds were beautiful and the pool was fabulous!   The villa came fully equipped with all the amenities of home, dish detergent, dishes etc. We loved it!
Manager Response: Thank you for a perfect review! We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us here at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.

Summary: We visited Marriott's Newport Coast Villas in early February 2017.  It is a nice place to keep busy, even when there is rain and cool weather.  They have a cinema on site, showing current movies along with a bag of popcorn.  The room is small, with nice comfortable chairs, but if it is a movie everyone wants to see, come early or you will have to sit on folding chairs.  We were in walking distance of the ocean, which we did fit in on a day it was not raining, just a light mist.
Manager Response: Carol, thank you for your review. We are happy to hear you had a nice stay with us here at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.

Summary: We stayed a week here and things just didn't click.  We felt much further removed from Newport Beach than what we expected.  We also had a very upsetting experience with a Marriott sales person which tarnished our experience quite a bit.  The villa we were in was very well appointed and we had no other complaints.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback and leave a review. We apologize for any inconvenience you experienced during your stay. Please contact Customer Care directly at 800-860-9384 or customer.care@vacationclub.com so we may address your concerns personally. We hope to hear from you soon.

Summary: I did an II exchange for my first west coast stay. Requested and received a top floor room with an ocean view (1700 Building). The room was spacious, beautifully appointed and appeared to be recently renovated. Great view of the ocean and Catalina island. A little noisy though because of the proximity to the coast highway. There's an abundance of pools, hot tubs, and activities for the kids. The huge fire pits are great on a chilly night. Front desk service was top notch. This is conveniently located near supermarkets, restaurants and attractions in OC. Just beware of the traffic which was the low light of our stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. It is great to hear you enjoyed your stay with us here at Marriott's Newport Coast. We hope you will visit us again sometime.

Summary: We have 2 weeks here every year. This is such a special place; sunset views from balcony are wonderful. Even if weather isn't great, there are lots of things to do.  We love the workout center. When grandkids come; the pools are special  and Disneyland is relatively close.  Located across the street from Peligan Hills Resort.  Best shopping area ever!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for a 5 star review. We are so happy to hear you had a fabulous stay here at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.

Summary: I visited the resort at the end of February. This was my first time in California and not was I disappointed. It was freezing cold and raining my entire stay.   The resort was absolutely beautiful, the staff was extremely pleasant from the moment I walked in the door up until I left. This place made up for the joke Mother Nature played on us. Unfortunately, I didn't get to experience the resort as I could have  because it was far to cold to even sit out on our patio even. I would definitely recommend and even return if I'm ever in the area again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave a 5 star review. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. We hope to welcome you back for some better weather sometime.

Summary: We had a great experience staying 5 nights in February with our 1.5 year old son. Very stroller friendly, if not hilly grounds. We were able to use the pool one day and we were disappointed there was no baby pool. We had Instacart deliver our groceries and found parking very easy. The hotel provided us both a pack'n'play and a high chair. It was such a great way for us to vacation with our son - a full kitchen to make breakfast and his basic dinners.
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us here in Newport Beach. Thank you for taking the time to leave a review.

Summary Heading: Great place for families with small children or adults!
Summary: We have been staying the Marriott Newport Coast Villas for about 10 years now. Our family has been taking annual trips to Newport for over 30 years and each year it was a challenge to find a nice, affordable beach house or hotel to stay with our small children. I can't tell you how nice it has been since we starting staying at the Villas! Now, my grown children love coming with their children. It is beautiful, clean, close to the beach and has more activities for the kids yet still has the feel of a serene resort for the adults.
Manager Response: Welcome back! We are so happy to hear you are enjoying your Ownership. Thank you for taking the time to leave a 5 star review. We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary Heading: Great family resort.  Loved our stay!
Summary: We stayed at the Newport Coast Villas for a couple of nights in early February at the end of our family vacation in southern California.  We stayed on a ground floor suite in Villa 4400.
