Resort management sent us an e-mail about three weeks before our stay asking us if we had any room preferences.  We responded to that e-mail right away and requested an upper floor suite but we did not get one.  We were travelling with two little ones (ages 4 and 3) and I suspect that was the reason we were given a ground floor suite.  Our view was nice as it faced the ocean but no doubt it would have been more spectacular on the higher floors.  Wish we did get a suite on a higher floor but at the same time, I wouldn't want the stomping feet of my sometimes over-exuberant children to disturb
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback and leave a review. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us here at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.

Summary Heading: it has a fully equipped kitchen!
Summary: one way to save up while on vacation is to cook, and Marriott's villa has one of the best equipped kitchen utilities from dishwasher (detergent included) to baking utensils etc. One thing they did not provide was a HDMI cable (if you wish to connect your laptop to the tv screen for movie night). They have a mini golf cart to drive you to the main lobby if your place of stay is further. I stayed there for 8 nights and it was wonderful! They provide free shuttle services to Crystal Cove beach and Laguna Beach, and shopping havens like Fashion Island and Crystal Cove shopping centre. The activities at the hotel itself is enough to keep you busy.
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and your villa here at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. Thank you for taking the time to leave a 5 star review.

Summary: We own a few Marriott timeshares but not this particular property. Yet we have come here a few times and always love the environment and the staff is impeccable. Activities for the kids and places for the parents to hang out. The Newport Beach area has fabulous restaurants and happy hours to find and enjoy. The ocean views are really hard to beat!
Manager Response: Welcome back, Jim! We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us here at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. Thank you for taking the time to leave a perfect review.

Summary: They were actually in the process of updating the rooms, and even though we had an "old" room, it was still very clean and neat! The views from anywhere on the property were fabulous. The pools were great. It was within driving/uber (5-10 minutes or so) distance to restaurants and Fashion Island. I plan on going back!
Manager Response: Risa, thank you for a perfect review. We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us here at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. We look forward to your return.

Summary: this is my second stay here on business.  The hotel is very clean, modern and quiet.  The rooms are large and all have kitchens.  I had several requests of the staff related to a business meeting, and all were handled quickly and professionally.  I would definitely go back for future meetings or pleasure.
Manager Response: Welcome back! Thank you for your review. We are so happy to hear you had a nice stay with us here at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.

Summary: We stayed just one night while traveling, but to quote Frankie Valli, "oh what a night". Gorgeous sunset, beautiful pool, staff over the top helpful and courteous. Close to everything. A don't want to miss stop while traveling.
Manager Response: Thank you for a perfect review! We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us here at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.

Summary: This resort is top notch. The grounds are beautiful and well manicured. The location of the resort is perfect - with views of the Pacific Ocean from the outdoor bar, pools, hot tubs, basketball courts, etc. There is plenty to do in site if you want to keep active-exercise classes, bike tours, the gym and plenty of walking paths to explore the beautiful grounds.   We stayed in a 2 bedroom suite with a full kitchen, living and dining room, and washer and dryer. We had plenty of room for 7 of us.   We had 4 teenagers in our group and hey had a blast. They enjoyed the heated pool (even in the rain) and the hot tubs. They also loved the game room with board games, pool table and PS4.   Beautiful resort. Wonderful staff and excellent location!
Manager Response: Darlene, thank you for a 5 star review. We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and the location of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.

Summary Heading: To quote Bette Davis, What a dump!
Summary: We so looked forward to our first visit to Newport Coast Villas, several people had told us it was one of the nicest Marriott Vacation Club properties.  As Marriott Vacation Club pros we expected something special.  What we got was a very small unit with old dilapidated appliances and decor like something out of the 50s.  The bathroom is depressing and dark.  There is not enough light anywhere, not nearly enough for reading.  The only halfway modern thing in the entire villa is a relatively new TV in the living room.   There is no covered parking at the various buildings and strangely enough, no handicapped parking spaces provided, at least not at the building to which we were assigned.  It's incredibly noisy, you can hear the people in the adjoining units talking and and you
Manager Response: Bebe, we apologize for any inconvenience you have experienced during your stay. Please contact our Customer Care team directly at 800-860-9384 or customer.care@vacationclub.com so we may address your concerns personally. We look forward to hearing from you soon.

Summary Heading: Nice Marriott, but getting a little dated
Summary: We have enjoyed our stay at the Newport Coast Villas. We were here during a big storm so didn't get much chance to do many activities. We did to paint night with Jessica and enjoyed that as an evening out. The room was great, the carpet is getting a little threadbare and need to be replaced I would say...but other than that the room was typical high standard Marriott. Nice spot.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. It is very important to us and has been shared with our senior resort management. We look forward to welcoming you back sometime soon.

Summary: I stayed at the marriott coast villas during last holidays and everything was great, the only exception was the housekeeping, it seems like you have to tip them so they can do their jobs correct, i stayed 7 days and they only left me one soap, one shampoo, etc. and they didnt even take the trash and I was  dissapointed with this,
Manager Response: We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay but disappointed to hear about your housekeeping services. We appreciate this valuable feedback and have shared this with our Senior Leadership for review. We hope to welcome you again, soon.

Summary: The accommodation here meets all needs.  The section of building we stayed in had just been updated so modern conveniences such as bedside lamps with charging ability were present.  Ample sized apartment, bedrooms, baths & living space were comfortable.  However, the two things that disappointed are   1)   There was construction going on very close to us. They were completing, what appears to be a patio for grilling, right below our balcony.  Relaxing on the balcony in the sun with a book was not possible with the construction right below.  Also, they were updating the building right next to us & contractors vehicles, dumpsters, cement trucks, pallets of furniture, filled many of the few parking spaces assigned to our building which was vey frustrating .   2)  we were very close
Manager Response: We are happy to hear you enjoyed your overall stay with us but are very sorry to hear that your relaxation was impacted by the construction noise. We hope to see you again at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas, Patty. Thank you for your review.

Summary: Who - My family, Extended local family What - Family "Stay-cay" with cousins, aunts uncles and of course, Grandpa Where - Marriott's Newport Coast Vacation Villas When - Halloween 2016 Why - ... ... The "why" is the key component of this review.  It's hard to please aging kids on Halloween, even harder to find acceptable and fun alternatives to bags full of stranger candy during Halloween. Booking at the Marriott Vacation Villa's was the best idea and will hopefully become an annual tradition.  The property is set against one of Orange County's most stunning views of our gorgeous coastline, seriously. As a native of Huntington Beach and a regular at beach sunsets, I didn't think it possible for me to be awed by something I'd seen thousands of times. But I was. This stretch of
Manager Response: Christa, thank you for choosing Marriott's Newport Coast for your Halloween vacation. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and hope you will join us again next year.

Summary Heading: Our Favorite Go To Family Vacation
Summary: We've been owners at this resort for over 15 years. We come at least once a year for 1-2 weeks. Always clean, always beautiful, always excellent service. So many places you can get to easily from Newport Coast as a base, but the resort itself has lovely pools, activities for kids, easy access to Crystal Cove State Park beach, nice spa. Disneyland is about 1/2 hour away (unless you go right in the middle of the worst traffic), San Diego is not far, Laguna Beach is right down PCH, and great shopping at major high-end shopping centers. Some of the ocean view units now have increasingly large trees in front of them which obstruct views to some degree, but still lovely. The recent renovations are very modern and cool. SO much better than hotel rooms, and super safe as well. Shuttle
Manager Response: Welcome back, Kathi! We are so happy to hear you are enjoying your Ownership. Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback and leave a review. We look forward to your next Marriott Vacation Club stay.

Summary: I stayed in a two bedroom unit with a lovely ocean view.  I tried to catch the sunset every night.  Lots of activities for different ages and interests.  Activities staff was very friendly.  This is a great place to relax.  They had a nice grilling area near my villa.  They also had elevators, which were much appreciated.  Parking at times could be a walk.  Main pool area was beautiful with views of Catalina Island.  I have to say I was disappointed in the entertainment/cable system.  A few months ago, I stayed at a Marriott Resort in Palm Springs that had an amazing entertainment system.  I would have thought Marriott would have adopted that system at their other resort properties (suggestion for the company).  Orange County location is great, close to LA proper and not that
Manager Response: Jody, thank you for your review. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us here at Marriott's Newport Coast. We hope you will join us again sometime.

Summary: We rented a 2 bedroom condo here. Fabulous place. Close to a lot of things to do but you must drive to most of them. There are some activities on the property. The rooms are spacious and the price is fair for what you get. This was our second visit here and we will come again.
Manager Response: Welcome back! We are happy to hear you and your family enjoyed your stay with us here at Marriott's Newport Coast. Thank you for taking the time to leave a 5 star review.

Summary: We had a nice weekend stay here.  The 2 bedroom unit was spacious and everything was clean, comfortable and nicely appointed.  There were three televisions, which kept everyone happy.  We were there on a rainy weekend, so we didn't take advantage of the outdoor areas.  The only complaint is the signage - we arrived late at night and had a difficult time finding the registration office, which is in the middle of the complex - the signs were hard to see at night - they could use some extra lighting.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review! Your feedback regarding signage has been shared with our senior resort management. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and hope you will join us again sometime.

Summary Heading: Beautiful property along the Newport coast
Summary: We passed by the entrance because it wasn't marked too well from the highway.  Then you drive up a hill to the villa grounds.  Stayed here because a client gave us an offer they'd received to stay here.  Resembles a small Italian town with all the villas.  Parking in front of each villa.  Staff is friendly.  Lobby is really large and beautiful with marble floor and large window overlooking the pool area, grounds, and ocean from across the highway.  Flavoured water in lobby as at any Marriott property.  The pool is very large.  The grounds are astonishingly beautiful with birds of paradise, fountains, a koi pond, a putting green, basketball court, and a small play area for the children.  We had a two bedroom unit with 2 bathrooms.  The first bedroom was near the entrance and had
Manager Response: We are pleased to hear you and your family enjoyed your stay with us here at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback and leave a perfect review.

Summary Heading: great location, give yourself a week there
Summary: Picked the Marriott Newport Coast Villas because with a family of 4 with 2 teenage boys, having two bedrooms is becoming mandatory. At MNCV I could get that, a full kitchen, and a balcony for far less than 2 rooms at a comparable hotel. Very spacious 2 bdrm villa. Once you get off the property you are about a 30 second drive to the PCH. Crystal Cove State Park is right on the other side of the PCH. Easy walk or you can take the shuttle down to the park or to the Beachcomber. Next time I'm staying for the week.
Manager Response: Jeff, thank you for a perfect review. We are happy to hear you and your family enjoyed your stay with us. We look forward to your return.

Summary: Do not miss an opportunity to visit this place, villas are beautiful, property is beautiful and the sunsets are breathtaking!  So much to do close by, whale watching at Dana Point, day trips to LA and beautiful resort and so many things to do right on the property!  You don't get better !
Manager Response: Thank you for a perfect review. We are so happy to hear you enjoyed you stay and found the resort to be gorgeous. We hope you will join us again on your next visit to Newport Beach.

Summary Heading: Gorgeous property with lots to do
Summary: Every villa is a beautiful two bedroom apartment with complete kitchen, washer dryer and balcony with a view.  We were fortunate enough to have a view of the ocean as well as Pelican Hill Golf Course.  You can choose to chill out or be active with shopping and attractions close by.  There is a spa, several pools, tennis and childrens activities on property. The property is pristine.  We chose to chill out and it was fabulous.  Great for couples or families.
Manager Response: Thank you for a 5 star review! We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and the resort. We hope you will visit us again sometime.

Summary: We loved it here the minute we arrived! Beautiful communal grounds and our jaws hit the floor the minute we walked into the villa - luxury and attention to detail was superb. The kitchen had more equipment and utensils than we have at home!!! Clean, comfortable and spacious - could not ask for more. The view from the pool was amazing. Playareas for children and BBQ areas were lovely and there were so many activities for the children with wonderful, enthusiastic staff. Only negative is the bar/restaurant (more snack bar) - we expected an actual restaurant rather than just nachos, tacos etc.
Manager Response: It is great to hear you had an amazing stay with us here at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. Thank you for taking the time to leave a 5 star review.

Summary: My husband and myself recently stayed at this resort and were thrilled with the place and location.  I'm sure this all depends on availability, however, we had a top floor, ocean view, and not far from the pools.  Our villa #3361 was perfect.  We had a gorgeous view of the Pacific Ocean.  The resort itself has the most spectacular views.  It also has just about anything you could want in a resort.  They have several pools, hot tubs, movie theatre, game rooms, for adults as well as children.  A small store for basic items as far as food.  The staff is very welcoming.  They keep the place immaculate, and all grounds are beautifully manicured.  It is located right off the Pacific Coast Highway, so plenty of places to eat, shop, and do all kinds of things.  The villas are beautiful.
Manager Response: Thank you for a perfect review! We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your view and loved your villa. We look forward to welcoming you back.

Summary Heading: Aussie family - Great start to US Trip
Summary: After an early flight in to LAX from Aust we grabbed a rental car and took the easy drive out of LA and along the coastline to Marriott Newport Coast Villas.  This was appealing to us as we had a few days to get over jetlag and we find it difficult to find good and well priced accom in LA.  We had also seen the sights of LA with the kids on prior trips.  We arrived at 10am and they accommodated us right away with an avail room that was in newer building with awesome ocean views.  We are so thankful that this helped us get our trip off to a great start, the villa was great, the weather in mid Nov was stunning.  The kids headed straight to the pool and explored, while I unpacked.  We went to Crystal Cove for lunch, delicious and popped down to the nearby grocers to stock up on
Manager Response: It is great to hear you and your family enjoyed your stay with us here at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. Thank you for taking the time to leave a review.

Summary: This condo complex is the size of some small cities and place on ever changing elevations so that each building, somehow, has a view of the ocean. And so taking a walk is a workout, but well worth it.   Check-in was friendly and efficient. Directions to our villa looked complex, but was made clear, and we were invited to call once we entered our villa if we find anything amiss or have any questions.   The quality of the villa and its furnishings was top notch. As promised the villa was equipped with everything we needed right down to detergent for the washing machine and the dishwasher. And the view was breathtaking.   Although the facility seemed at first to be hard to find, it turned out to be within a mile or so drive to all manner of food, supplies and fashions.   I'm sure
Manager Response: It is great to hear you enjoyed your stay. Thank you for taking the time to leave a 5 star review.

Summary: I have stayed at The Villa's twice and the rooms and grounds are lovely.  The staff nice and helpful.  We had a few issues with our room that seemed odd for such a nice place.  First our toaster didn't work.  I called for another one and that was delivered when we were out.  It also did not work.  Another call and we got a third toaster that did work.  Our coffee maker was dripping very slowly so we also asked for a replacement on that as well.  It was delivered with the second toaster.  When I opened the top of the coffee maker to prepare coffee, there was a coffee filter filled with old, dried out, used coffee in it.  We also had problems with our dishwasher.  It was not attached!  I thought it was strange when we opened the door to fill it and the whole thing moved.  When I
Manager Response: Welcome back, Suzie. Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. It is very important to us and has been shared with our senior resort management. We apologize for any inconvenience you experienced during your stay. We hope to deliver the 5 star experience on your next Marriott Vacation Club stay.

Summary: Love this property…we spend a long weekend here every year for a quick staycation.  The grounds are well kept and beautiful.  The staff is friendly and welcoming.  Tons of amenities at a great location.  Close to the beach, Newport and Laguna.
Manager Response: Welcome back! It is great to hear you continue to enjoy your time spent here with us at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. Thank you for a 5 star review.

Summary: They put us on a 1st story room which didn't thrill me, noise wasn't too much of a concern though.  They are updating the units but unfortunately ours was still the dated decor/furnishings.  The main pool was not filled while we were there, fortunately we were near the pool at the top of the complex which was awesome.  Took this trip mainly to get out the cold and smog at home, mission accomplished.  Newport Beach is incredible and the villas is a great home base for all of the fun to be had in this area.  While at the villas, i would recommend the roll out/stretching class.  The instructor was amazing and this is something that i have never done, but given how limber i felt afterwords, i will be doing going forward.  Bottom line, the villas delivered as expected and we will be
Manager Response: Thank you for your review! We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and took advantage of all that the resort has to offer. We look forward to welcoming you back in May!

Summary: This is a well-kept, even luxurious time-share property.  The 2 bedroom villas are tastefully done, large, and luxurious.  Each unit has 2 full bathrooms which is perfect for families.  The grounds are well-kept, fitness center small but nice, and location is breathtaking.   Each unit has 3 flat screen TVs, a full kitchen, dishwashers, washer/dryer, and daily housekeeping, all of which make this place feel like home.  Free parking and internet with no resort fee.  A terrific, family-sized luxury property.
Manager Response: Jason, thank you for a 5 star review. We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your villa and your time spent here at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. Please join us again sometime.

Summary Heading: Marriott Newport Coast - fabulous family vacation
Summary: January 2017 - The purpose of our trip to Marriott Newport Coast was to gather with out of town friends and relatives for a week long stay.  This was a staycation for my family and I.  It's our favorite local hotel to gather with out of town guests for it's location near Crystal Cove, Corona Del Mar, Balboa Island, Marriott schedule of events and amenities.  We had two (2) - two bedroom villas.  Our group included four children; age six and under.  Marriott understands family vacations and we all had a great time; it's all about the kids and spending together.  We utilized the Marriott shuttle bus to the beach, koi fish feeding, s'mores by the fire, 3D Ship Craft, Pirate Party and Treasure Hunt, wine and cheese event - the musician was great that evening; kids danced too.  We
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear you and your family were able to make some special memories during your stay with us here at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. Thank you for taking the time to leave a perfect review.

Summary Heading: A lot of things went wrong with the stay!
Summary: I had requested a decent view room due to it being my 3rd year anniversary and I had spent a lot of time planning this trip. I was put in a first floor room, that not to mention took us 20 mins to find, where when you walk out to the balcony, and all you see is construction cars and hear work noise (they were doing construction on the main pool which caused it to be shut down our entire stay). Which, was literally right outside the balcony. Upon walking into the room, it had a terrible smell of b.o. There was no way I could have lived in that room. I politely asked the front desk associate if we could move rooms because of the smell and they were really weird and unapologetic about it almost as if they thought we were lying. I was satisfied with our next room, still had no view
Manager Response: Stephanie, we apologize for any inconvenience you experienced during your stay. We'd like the opportunity to address your concerns personally. Please contact Customer Care directly at 800-860-9384 or customer.care@vacationclub.com so we may assist you. We hope to hear from you soon.

Summary: The 2-bedroom villas are nice and big which make them great for family travel. We had an updated unit with a partial ocean view. It was nice, but some parts were dated such as the cabinetry and tile in the master bath (which actually looked pretty gross). While the villa is spacious, there definitely is plenty of wasted space and it's not well-designed. For example, there's no front closet for storing shoes and jackets and beach gear, and the bedroom has closets that are quite small. The resort itself is lots of fun in good weather; we had one rainy day and we were somewhat disappointed with the activities and amenities for that day only.  The good: We were blown away by Science with Susie - one of the activity coordinators does a great job demonstrating engaging science
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave a review. Your feedback is important to us and has been shared with our senior resort management. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your villa and look forward to your next Marriott Vacation Club stay.

Summary Heading: Still a Really Nice Place to Visit
Summary: We have stayed at this property a number of times.  (The last review I made was in 2012.) Many of the units have been updated and refurbished with new furnishings.  The grounds and property still look fresh, clean and comfortable.  It was still a delight to stay here.  Location: This Marriott time share resort is located in along the Southern California coastline in Newport off of the Pacific Coast Highway. It is a few miles drive from shopping areas in Irvine, Costa Mesa, and Newport Beach.  Accommodations: All units are two bedroom, two bath condos, with full kitchen and outside lanai.   They are spacious with an eating area and seating area. With fold-out sofas, the unit accommodates eight persons.  The rooms are large, comfortable, and clean.   The master bedroom is roomy
Manager Response: Welcome back. Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. It is very valuable to us and has been shared with our senior resort management. We look forward to your next Marriott Vacation Club stay.

Summary Heading: NOT OCEAN FRONT BUT THERE IS A VIEW
Summary: The room we got was 2 bedrooms with kitchen for 2 guests. This is awesome for 2 nights we truly appreciate the grounds, amenities, and the bar. We run around in this big place. There are plenty of unit buildings.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your villa and your stay with us here at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. We look forward to your next Marriott Vacation Club stay.

Summary Heading: Our second stay and would definitely come again!
Summary: This is our second stay at these villas and we love the 2 bedroom condos!  The staff are always fabulous and we find that this is a great location to enjoy both the beach and disney fun! Our first stay was near the main pool, and this stay was close to one of the smaller pools. We enjoyed both of the stays but probably prefer the condos near the smaller pools.
Manager Response: Thank you for another great review. We are so happy to hear you are enjoying your Ownership. We look forward to your next Marriott Vacation Club stay.

Summary: We have been owners here for just over 10 years and have stayed here 5-6 times--last was in 2013. We were pleasantly surprised with the upgrades to the villas, which we'd always thought were nice, anyway. However, we agree with other commenters that the living room furniture is better to look at than to sit on.    We stayed on the top floor of the 3600 building--the same building that the lobby is in--and had a nice view of the pool and ocean from our balcony and the master bedroom. I'd asked for a unit close to the main building, as we've stayed in the "Back 40" before and didn't enjoy the experience as much. I was happy that they accommodated my request so well.  We found the service a bit hit or miss. The concierge sold us Disneyland tickets and was friendly in general, but
Manager Response: Welcome back! We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us here at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. It is very valuable to us and has been shared with our senior resort management. We hope to have the opportunity to exceed your expectations on your next Marriott Vacation Club stay.

Summary Heading: Not bad for the price I paid, but unpleasant experience after
Summary: The villa was fine, though the living room furniture was nearly unbearable. I got a last minute rate to stay there while visiting my daughter, so it was fine for the location. It's a pretty typical Marriott timeshare property -- looks good on the surface, but the quality is just average. You can't beat this location though if you get the right rate--Crystal Cove was one of our favorite places in the 20 years we lived in Orange County.  The thing that bothered me the most was the experience I had with Marriott's sales after my stay. They called twice to offer me a great price on a 3 night/4 day stay if I would attend a 90 minute presentation. Since I will be going down there in the future, I took the bait. I was all set to buy when I was told by the woman I was transferred to by
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We apologize for any inconvenience you experienced. Please contact Customer Care directly at 800-860-9384 or customer.care@vacationclub.com. We hope to hear from you soon.

Summary: Unbelievable here. Prob the nicest stateside resort we have visited.  The interior is about the same as others but the grounds and amenities are gorgeous.  About 70% of the villas have views of the ocean.  Not too busy this time of year.  So much to do here - I think we will be back and stay longer.
Manager Response: Kathy, we are so happy to hear you had a top notch experience! Thank you for taking the time to leave a perfect review.

Summary Heading: One of our favorite Marriott locations
Summary: This is not our first trip but we keep coming back to this location because of it's location.  We stayed in bldg number 4500 and had a fabulous view of the ocean and golf course.   As a family of 5 we prefer to stay in Villa/condo living vs. hotels so we can all be together and have a kitchen and living area.  The pool area is pretty.  Flying into John Wayne Airport is a dream...so close it makes you forgot that traffic is a pain in LA/Orange County.  Another thing this location did is ship us 3 forgotten books!  My daughter accidentally left her 5 year journal at the villa.  She was heart broken.  When she called the lost prevention dept called back to let us know they had found that as well as 2 other books.  We just received them in the mail!  Thanks to Naomi our housekeeper
Manager Response: Welcome back! We are so happy to hear you enjoyed another stay with us here at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. It is great to we were able to locate and return your daughter's items. Thank you for a perfect review.

Summary Heading: Marriott Vacation Club Owner Visiting for Holidays
Summary: We are Marriott Vacation Club owners and have been here a number of times over the past few years. One of the nicest properties in the Marriott Vacation Club portfolio.  People say stay away from the Vacation Ccub presentation and purchase, but I feel otherwise. Its a worthwhile investment if you like to travel to nice places.  There are 5 pools, hot tubs, sports activities, kids activity center plus a poolside restaurant/bar.  Very close to the Ocean and all that the OC has to offer (less than 30 minutes from Anaheim, 10 minutes to Laguna Beach).  People
Manager Response: Welcome back! We are so happy to hear you are enjoying your Ownership. Thank you for taking the time to leave a perfect review. We look forward to your next Marriott Vacation Club stay.

Summary: We're here in late December.  Weather was inconsistent, mid 50's to low 70's.  We had a 2 bedroom with full kitchen and washer/dryer and view of ocean - perfect. Clean, safe and plenty of parking. WiFi worked wel thru unit and complete Marriott property. Plenty of pools and chairs - NOT on the beach so if you think you can just get up and walk to the beach - you can't.  Well you can but plan an hour there (downhill) and 1.5 hour back (up a very big hill). Staff very pleasant and helpful.
Manager Response: Gerald, thank you for your review. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and hope you will join us again sometime soon.

Summary Heading: Incredible resort with the feel of a European village
Summary: Gorgeous and spacious villas in a stunning resort setting. All villas are two bedroom two bath villas. Well appointed. Comfortable. Awesome workout room in the main lobby and other smaller one at the quiet pool. There are two large quiet pools at Wmh end of the property and one huge main pool Overlooking the ocean. The resort isn't right on the beach but across from Pacific coast highway and because of the elevations  of the resort the views are amazing.  We spent the holiday week here and while it was at full capacity - it never felt crowded.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing Marriott's Newport Coast for your holiday stay. It is great to hear you enjoyed your stay and we hope you will join us again sometime.

Summary: Loved the property overall but a few minor setbacks.  One is the lack of a lift if your unit is in the lower floor and it is tough if you have larger bags to carry down a flight of stairs.  Would be nice to be advised of this when we checked in.  The furnishing is also a little "off" ... oversized barstools blocked by oversized dining chairs made the setting in the area very inconvenient.  Also master bathroom was really small to fit a toilet and shower with a lot of space "wasted" on the jacuzzi in the bedroom! Due to the size of the property, it did not feel personal ... it is ok if you are not looking for awesome service.
Manager Response: Lester, thank you for taking the time to leave a review. Your feedback is important to us and has been shared with our senior resort management. We hope you will join us again sometime.

Summary: Great location between Laguna and Corona Del Mar, across from beautiful Crystal Cove Beach... Beautiful, spacious 2bd/2bth (2 beds & 2 sofa beds) condo with balcony, spacious enough for 4 adults and 3 kids... gorgeous view of ocean, lucky... plentiful pools to choose, easy walk to main resort pools w/ food and steps from family pool... Lots of activities for the whole family after spending hours at the beach every day, volleyball, smores, basketball, tennis, games, pool games, golf, mini golf, etc, etc ... adequate exercise room & great running outdoors.... tons of outdoor bbqs and seating areas, theme food & drink nights if you like... simply relax at pool & your condo in evening after long day outdoors at beach... booked on vrbo .... had everything we were looking for to
Manager Response: Jan, thank you for a perfect review. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and the location of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. We hope you will join us again sometime.

Summary: We arrived in the evening. The streets were not well lit and it wasn't easy to find your way in. We were placed at the back end of the resort on the lower level with a view of a back street/alleyway.  Not easy to navigate with little ones and a child with special needs who has trouble walking.   The rooms were partially updated. The tile floors and bathrooms were still old and outdated. Kitchen counters and furnishings were updated.   The concierge staff was unfriendly and would rather talk on their cell phones than answer questions about local sites.   Overall disappointed in this property and the difficulty in being able to get around easily. The resort in Palm Desert is much better!
Manager Response: Libby, thank you for taking the time to leave a review. It is very important to us and has been shared with our senior resort management. We apologize for any inconvenience you experienced during your stay.

Summary: Impeccably maintained by a professional staff. Spacious 2BR 2BA condo with covered parking garage. Newly renovated. Full kitchen. Near Crystal Cove state park. Conveniently located halfway between Laguna and Balboa Beach. Great place for a 25th wedding anniversary.
Manager Response: Happy Anniversary! Thank you for choosing Marriott's Newport Coast Villas for your special occasion. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and hope you will join us again sometime. Thank you for a perfect review.

Summary Heading: Nice views from property, but strict policies which doesn't make it feel as welcoming
Summary: The villas are a Marriott Vacations Club property which can take reservations from owners and renters (we were the latter - trying it out).  All villas are 2 bedrooms and the units are spacious (queen bed with sleeper sofa in the unit closer to the entrance, a king bed with a large bathroom area in the bedroom in the back, a kitchen with microwave/refrigerator/dishwasher, a washer/dryer, and plenty of utensils and plates/bowls/cups.    I sent a message to Ali about 45 days before the trip asking some questions and asking about preferences but never heard back (99% of the time I get responses from the CS manager or someone from the hotel - even if it's just a pleasant greeting and a confirmation of receipt [in cases where they can't enter my requests], so I was surprised not to
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. It is important to us and has been shared with our senior resort management. While we do our best to fulfill all requests, we are unable to guarantee them and Owners do take priority. We hope to have the opportunity to exceed your expectations on your next Marriott Vacation Club stay.

Summary: Our family has returned to stay in these villas over five times! We go with family of all ages: from ages six to fifty. Everyone loves the villas, spacious, well furnished, nice with lots of separate rooms to allow for some privacy. The youngest are always amused by the towels shaped like turtles left on the bed! The pools are nice, but we spend even more time playing ping pong and shuffle board. The saltwater taffy in the lobby is also a great touch. Crystal Cove state park is right nearby which is a beautiful beach area, another bonus of the Newport Coast Villa's. I absolutely love staying at this resort and can't wait to go back, which I plan to do soon!
Manager Response: Welcome back, Emily! We are so glad you and your family enjoyed another stay with us here at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. Thank you for taking the time to leave a perfect review.

Summary Heading: Nice suites BUT some painful staff
Summary: The good: nice clean property with big suites, including open kitchens, laundry and dining that seats 8 with some ingenuity.  Of note, not all the rooms have been renovated so make sure to book one of the renovated ones.  Beautiful views although not the same from every location.  Outdoor BBQ space available.  Basketball, volleyball, tons of options but they fill up quickly.   The bad: primarily, the front desk staff.  Totally unwilling to be flexible in any way and either not willing or able to understand the complexities of traveling with young children.  I tried to get a manager to help but she was worse.  Moreover, to make sure we suffered as much as possible, they kept sending us to the back of the line to make us wait as long as possible which is torture when kids are
Manager Response: Your feedback is important to us. We apologize for any inconvenience you experienced during your stay. We have shared your feedback with our senior resort management. We are happy to hear you, otherwise, enjoyed your stay and hope you will join us again sometime.

Summary: grounds are immaculate, location is great.. rooms are dated and uncomfortable.  Right across the street from Crystal Cove State Park which is nice but beds and furniture are fairfield inn grade.  I travel a lot and decided to stay here (i'm a MVC member) during christmas break instead of a hotel and had high expectations but 4 days later my wife and i both have backaches from the beds and the 2 pullouts were the worst kind of pullout in terms of comfort. On the bright side service was excellent, very attentive all around the resort.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. We apologize for any inconvenience you experienced during your stay. Your feedback is important to us and we have shared it with our senior resort management. We hope to have the opportunity to exceed your expectations on your next stay.

Summary: Just returned from a relaxing visit to Southern California made even better by our stay at the Marriott. This is a fine example of Marriott's quality vacation living in a most beautiful location. Units are being updated and new units are on display. Cordial, helpful staff. We consulted Carol Sue and other concierges many times during our stay. Love the off-track location of the villas as we had business in Costa Mesa requiring daily trips there done easily from this Marriott.
Manager Response: Sheryl, we are so happy to hear you had a lovely stay here at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. We hope you will join us again sometime soon.

Summary Heading: Excellent getaway location for the family
Summary: I was here for business and wanted something more home-like to stay at. Couldn't have wished for more. The condo was fully stocked with 2 bedroom / 2 bathroom, large kitchen and nice living area. On the balcony I had sunshine almost the entire day and I overlooked the ocean and part of the hills and golf course. Very very inspiring view.  The kitchen was great and the rain forrest coffee provided very tasty (and I'm a coffee snob).  The only remark I have is about the couch. It is too straight up and therefore not very comfortable to sit on.  The location is excellent for various trips and I highly recommend going to neighboring Laguna beach.  The pool side bar is fun and the small and simple menu has some better then expected tasting options. But with a full kitchen and so many
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear Marriott's Newport Coast Villas was your home away from home during your business trip. Thank you for taking the time to leave a perfect review.

Summary: This is a lovely property overlooking the ocean.  It is up on a hill with a wide panoramic view, beautiful landscaping and a friendly staff.  Our suite was recently renovated with modern decor.  The only fault I find is that Marriott buys basic dishwashers that are noisy when run.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us here at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!

Summary: The view is unparalleled. The property is well maintained.  The games and amenities for families is top notch. Our room was a newer finished suite with a neutral colour scheme with pops of colour. The pull out bed is super. It is firm, which we like, and was the most impressive pullout I've ever seen (no springs!). It's a solid 4 star experience for us even though we were on the bottom floor (nominal natural sunlight).    I would return again but ask for a room with an ocean view.
Manager Response: We are happy to hear you had an enjoyable stay. We hope you will join us again sometime. Thank you for your review.

Summary Heading: Despite the Paper Towels, a great place to see how the top 1% live!
Summary: If you're like me, you judge a timeshare by the quality of the paper towels in the kitchen. The quality of the paper towels can make or break a timeshare experience.  A good paper towel tears from the roll in an effortless manner. It's almost like the roll offers a towel for your use without being asked to do so. The towels we encountered treated the perforation as aspirational, at best, a cruel joke, at worst.  A good paper towel can soak up the water flow from Niagra Falls. The commercials wouldn't lie or misrepresent a critical matter like absorbency. The towels we encountered were more like a squeegee. You could shuttle liquid from point A to B without any loss due to absorbency.  A good paper towel makes kitchen clean-up a delight. The towels in our unit provided a
Manager Response: Howard, thank you for your feedback. We have shared your concerns about the paper towels with senior resort management. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and hope you will join us again.

Summary: Newport Coast Villas is an ideal place for us.  This is our second visit this year. We visit about twice every year. We stay here and go to Disneyland. It takes about 20 minutes to get there.  The villas have two bedrooms plus a sleeper in the family room and full kitchens. There are three pools, a putting green, a basketball court and tennis courts.  It is our favorite.
Manager Response: Welcome back, Bill! We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and look forward to your return.

Summary: This was our 1st visit to this part of California and it lived up to its reputation as we experienced great surroundings, stunning views and a friendly atmosphere. Our villa had been updated recently with new furniture which gave it a nice modern feel and made a real difference to our experience. The team were very helpful when we needed any advice and I would certainly recommend crossing over Route 1 and walk down to the beach as the views are stunning.
Manager Response: Susan, we are happy to hear you had a great first visit to Marriott's Newport Coast. We hope you will visit us again sometime soon. Thank you for a perfect review.

Summary: This was a post-Thanksgiving vacation. We stayed at the request of family, and we appreciated the spaciousness of our suite that also came with a balcony that you can enjoy a meal on. The overall landscape and view were beautiful; we could see the golf course and ocean from our villa even though there were a lot of trees obscuring it. What I was most impressed with is how accessible everything was for someone who is wheelchair bound including having a lift for the hot tub. The regular tub and showers were not so you may have to inquire about a special room for that, but there were ramps everywhere to get to the villas. They had quite a few activities for our young children in a cool place just for little people, but we didn't utilize them. We spent most of our time at the
Manager Response: We are happy to hear you were impressed with your stay, Ladee! Thank you for taking the time to share a perfect review.

Summary: DIL and soon booked room here in Newport Coast area. Absolutely stunningly beautiful resort. Outdoor La Vista pool and bar area is in the best location overlooking the numerous pools and ocean. This resort is massive!  Thanks to Roger and Brett at bar for giving us the scoop about this prestigious area of NB!  Koby Bryant's Newport home is just up the hill surrounded by massive mansions! I can see how one would want to stay here a while! You can rent a villa for one night!
Manager Response: Carol, thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us! We are happy to hear you enjoyed the a paradise that is Newport Coast.

Summary: Great Location and Views.  We celebrated a 60th birthday amongst 12 girlfriends and the place was awesome.  Villas were great and the grounds were amazing.  I would highly recommend this place.to anyone looking for a place by the beach.   Breathtaking sunsets and lots of good memories can be made here:-)
Manager Response: Laura, thank you for choosing Marriott's Newport Coast Villas for your special occasion! It is great to hear your group had an enjoyable birthday celebration. Thank you for a perfect review!

Summary: Great poolside drinks. plenty of sunshine and more than comfortable accommodations. Full-size kitchen 2 bedrooms each with king-sized bed. A living room and patio. Outside gas BBQ steps away to grill. Multiple pools and hot tubs. Short drive to fabulous beaches. Check out Crescent Bay Point Park for unbelievable views.
Manager Response: Thank you for a perfect review! We are happy to hear you were able to relax before the holiday.

Summary: This is our first visit.  For this expensive price I thought it would be beautiful. Our view is the parking lot - thanks Marriott. The room is fine nothing special the dining room chairs are ugly. They look like a spreadsheet piece of paper.  But the staff is very nice. I just wish for our first time we could have had a better view than the parking lot
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We apologize for any inconvenience you have experienced. While we do our best to fulfill all requests, unfortunately we are unable to guarantee them. We hope to have the opportunity to exceed your expectations in the future.

Summary Heading: Beautiful in the off season too
Summary: We've stayed at the Marriott Newport Coast Villas several times before.  This visit was in the off season (November) and the property was just as exceptional.  The grounds are very carefully maintained and the villas quite modern.  The property is large and has a very laid back feel.  I walked down to the ocean and had a long walk on the beach.
Manager Response: Welcome back! We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and especially your long walk on the beach. We look forward to your return.

Summary: Look, this is one of Marriott's most popular locations so you know they are doing something right. The property is gorgeous -- though also a little sterile. However, after one day here, I am feeling a little like a prisoner. I have problems with curbs and this place just isn't set up for someone to easily navigate with mobility challenges. I would like to walk from my villa to the main pool without circumnavigating the property and I cannot. I am not even sure I can do it with circumnavigating. And, it is a big property. There is a shuttle but 1) I am not sure I can negotiate the curb and 2) I would like to walk.   Also, our villa is downstairs, which I can handle, but it would have been nice to have been asked. No elevator.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. It is very important to us and has been shared with senior resort management. Please enjoy your stay with us at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.

Summary: This is a first rate property. I traveled there with my family and they treated us very well. The unit I had was in building 3800 and it face the ocean and It was amazing. We were in a two bedroom two bathroom unit The master was spacious with a spa tub. The second bedroom had a queen bed and a Sofa bed. The full kitchen was equipped with everything you need to cook a nice meal. The property had plenty of things to do with our children. The Sandbox play center offered reading time as well as a number of other kids activities. We will return!
Manager Response: Anthony, we are so happy to hear you and your family had a great stay with us at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas! Thank you for your review.

Summary: A very attractive, upmarket resort. Amazing location and spectacular views. The sunsets from our balcony were breathtaking. The apartments have plenty of space and are very well appointed with a full kitchen. Facilities and activities at the resort have options for all ages and interests. All the staff we encountered were unfailingly pleasant and helpful. The main pool area can be busy but there is a second, quieter pool which we preferred. The catering was good, if a little pricey. The shop was well stocked but also on the expensive side. A shuttle bus takes guests down to the Crystal Cove beach which is idyllic. We hope to return.
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear you had a fabulous stay with us at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.  We hope you will return, too!

Summary: An incredible property that is located high above the Pacific ocean with fantastic views. This is a very large complex but there is a shuttle service available that takes you to various locations in the area. The villas are well appointed and very comfortable. There are discounts available to many local restaurants that are quite good.  Drinks and food at the pools can be pricey.  You have the ability to get access to the pool area and locker rooms after you check out so you can still make a day of things at the property.
Manager Response: Thank you for a perfect review, Roy! We are so glad to hear you enjoyed your stay at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.

Summary: One of the best resorts my wife and I have visited.  You feel you are in Tuscany,  Fantastic golf course and ocean views.  Wonderful walking trails throughout the property.  Lots of fun activities for the entire family.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback, Jim! We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and hope to welcome you back soon.

Summary: Spectacular views, incredible space, crowded but still quiet.  All of those were our first impressions of the property.  All of the rooms are really two bedroom villas with full kitchens and tow full bathrooms.  Only drawback was the second bedroom had either a Full or Queen bed which would make it difficult for tow adult couples to stay. Property has 2 adequate fitness rooms, several pools, including a salt water "adult" pool and hot tub. We didn't eat or drink at any of the restaurants on site, but the location is awesome for taking in the sights of the Newport Coast/Laguna Niguel area.
Manager Response: Hi Eric.  Thank you for your five-star review.  We are pleased to read your impressions of the resort and that you found the resort location to be convenient to the sights of Newport Coast and Laguna Nigel.  We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Our family of 7 stayed in a 2 bedroom villa.  There was plenty of space in the living room/dining rom to hang out and the weather allowed us to open the double sliding doors to the patio which increased living space.  The view of ocean and golf course was unobstructed.  We watched for whales but saw only dolphins from the patio.  There were several pools to enjoy.  The main pools were beautifully landscaped and at night it was breathtaking.  However we enjoyed the canyon pool as it was quieter and more private with a view of the canyon and ocean.  There were multiple workout rooms around the resort and a beautiful park with fire pits,putting green, tether ball and basketball court.  There is a casual dining restaurant at he pool but we ate in as the villa was well equipped to
Manager Response: What a great sight to see dolphins from your patio!  We are happy to read that you thought the main pools were beautifully landscaped and found it breathtaking during the evening.  We look forward to your next visit!  Thank you for your Trip Advisor review!

Summary: This place is beautiful.  The grounds are outstanding and the villas are very comfortable and clean.  The view of the ocean cannot be beat.  We highly recommend this place.  They offer free shuttle service to the state park, Laguna Beach and some shopping centers.
Manager Response: Thank you for your positive review.  We are so glad that you enjoyed your stay with us and look forward to having you back again in the future.

Summary: Just spent six nights here and I didn't want to leave. It's a huge property with several swimming pools, a tennis court, fitness center, firepit, and BBQ grills. It also has a fabulous view, beautiful sunrise and sunset, with a relaxing atmosphere. The unit is very nice and clean, the kitchen has all the utensils, plates, and cookware that one needs to prepare meals for the family.  The property has activities for kids and adults, such as seashell picture frame making, ice cream float Thursdays, Taco Tuesdays, and yoga, aqua exercise class and tennis lessons.  The neighborhood is really nice, close to the beach, restaurants and shopping  centers. I went to Whole Foods and Trader Joe's everyday!!  I am hooked on this property and will definitely go back next year!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, Apple! We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and we look forward to your return.

Summary: Very nice resort with a lot to do for all ages - pools, hot tub, fire pits, basketball court, ping pong, putting green, kids activity center, etc.  Rooms are two bedroom suites with full kitchen, dining room, washer and dryer.  Food and drink are resort priced - plan ahead and bring food - there are even outdoor grills!
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear you and your family enjoyed your stay at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. We appreciate your feedback.

Summary: We took our family, 6 of us, to California for a week in June.  We are owners of a Marriott Vacation Club condo in Florida.  We did not want to stay in LA so we found this place not too far away.  We were very pleased with the condos, amenities and the area.  The ocean views were magnificent.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of your stay with us at Newport Coast Villas. We are delighted that your view was magnificent and, as Marriott Vacation Club Owners, that you had such a wonderful time. We look forward to hosting your next California visit.

Summary: Enjoying our week vacation. Staying in Building 4400 with a views of the golf course and the ocean. Such a Beautiful property . While exploring the property I saw a rabbit and different birds. Close to the beach, and shopping at Fashion Island.
Manager Response: Angela, thank you for your review of your stay with us at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. We are happy that you were able to take in the local sights and enjoyed some shopping, too! We look forward to your return.

Summary Heading: Beautiful views with walking distance to the beach
Summary: The large resort is divided into smaller buildings with amenities (e.g., grills, pools, etc.). The views can be astounding from your unit, but make sure you check when you're selecting at reservation / check-in time. In addition to the beach nearby, there's a Trader Joe's (long walk, or short drive), as well as a variety of restaurants.
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear that you had a wonderful stay with us, Mitchell! Thank you for your perfect five star review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.

Summary: The resort is situated in a nice location close to John Wayne Airport, Disneyland, Palm Springs and San Diego.  It allowed our group to visit these locations with ease.  As well, the beaches, restaurants and stores were very accessible.  The Fashion Island and the Crystal Cove shopping centre were our main stops.  The Aliso and Corona del Mar beaches were our favorites.  The sunset from Inspiration Point was spectacular.  The resort itself has a nice lobby area with a pool and other activity areas.  Our disappointment was with our villa which was one of the last few that had not been refurbished and looked quite outdated.  The ocean view we had asked for was not that great since the foliage and trees covered most of the view.  I would have been better off to have stayed on the
Manager Response: Thank you for your review! We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed the local area, activities and time spent at the pool. We appreciate your feedback about your view and villa décor and look forward to welcoming you back, soon.

Summary: Overall wonderful experience service is excellent and fast. Sunsets are to die for and any time of the year is good for a visit. It's clean, tidy well kept. My family was very very pleased, would come back for sure:)
Manager Response: Thank you for your perfect review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. We are delighted to hear that your family enjoyed the beautiful sunsets and that our associates made you feel at home. We look forward to welcoming you back, soon!

Summary Heading: Hotel highlight of the trip and hoping to return ASAP!!
Summary: On check in I was fortunate to be greeted by the Manager on duty and it was so nice of him to read through our room requests and ensure that we had such a fabulous room - view, sunset, top floor etc etc - very happy, we loved it. Resort was immaculately cared for, no end of activities for families if required. Too many things we enjoyed to list them all. Plus lots to do in the nearby area; we went to Balboa Island, Fashion Island and Crystal Cove - our 3 nights was simply not long enough.
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your time with us at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas and that we were able to meet your villa location preferences. We are also happy that your family had a great time attending our activities! We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.

Summary: We love Newport Beach. This is our first time staying here. Location is perfect. We love to stay away from crowded area but still within reach with civilization. The two- bedroom villa we stayed has a great living room. Kitchen is very nice. However, we were expecting a stand alone villa not a two bedroom unit in the 2-story building which consists on many units like what we have. The term used were a little confusing. But the overall stay and experience was good. We are very happy. We will definitely return here on our next opportunity again. Especially that I am a platinum Marriott card holder.
Manager Response: We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and you were able to enjoy the closeness to the local area as well as the relaxing atmosphere that our resort has to offer. We look forward to hosting your next visit to Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.

Summary: This resort overlooks the ocean.  Very nice accommodations, several pools to choose from as well.  They have a pool bar restaurant at the bigger pool. Free shuttles to laguna beach, the beach, two shopping malls.  Staff is friendly and helpful   definitely would come back
Manager Response: We are happy to read that you thought your accommodations were very nice and the staff were friendly and helpful, Pandee!  Thank you for your fantastic review.  We hope you will decide to visit Marriott's Newport Coast Villas soon!

Summary: We own several Marriott timeshares and this is one of them. We always enjoy coming here because it is just like coming home.  The staff is very gracious the property is very well-maintained and anything you could possibly want is just a phone call away. The best thing about this property is the fact that it is convenient to several California locations which is great for tourists and locals alike.  Just down the road is Laguna Beach, just up the road is Newport Beach, right around the corner from the property is Crystal Cove and Crystal Cove Beach which is an old California cottage beach where locals wants to rent a cottage right on the beach.  there are water sports there is sightseeing there is fantastic food, there are sports venues, there are music venues,  art galleries,
Manager Response: We are delighted to know that you, as Marriott Vacation Club Owners, felt at home at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. We cannot wait to host your next Southern California family vacation. Thank you for yoru perfect review.

Summary: one of the rare resort areas overlooking the Pacific and an easy walk to Crystal Cove State Park & Beach where an old beach colony is seeing a revival of the past California beach party scene. The Marriott has a first class location with comfortable villas. Minor drawback can be screaming children at the pool in the summer time so I recommend off season as the mediterranean weather is always nice. Summer traffic can be a nightmare. Super convenient location to go explore Newport Beach or Laguna Beach and many other beach locations.
Manager Response: It's nice that you feel that Marriott's Newport Coast Villas is in a very convenient location to many beaches and that we are a first class operation!  Thank you for your five-star review and we hope you will plan to visit again soon.

Summary Heading: Beautiful location to enjoy the California coast
Summary: If you can get a good rate, it's a wonderful place for couples or families to enjoy. It can be pricey but if you get a refurbished room you can expect a well appointed room and a variety of amenities to appeal to all ages. A free shuttle to the Crystal Cove beach area is a big plus. 6 of us stayed 3 nights in a 2 bedroom villa, in mid October on the "first floor", with only a tiny sliver of an ocean in view, but were told that ocean view rooms were only for owners. We cooked 2 dinners utilizing the very handy BBQs. In addition to groceries, bring your own spices, coffee,  and plastic wrap or foil, + baggies. Round 'basket' type filters are provided for the coffee maker-  don't bring cone shaped filters. Staff mostly all very friendly and professional (except for housekeeping
Manager Response: Thank you for your Trip Advisor review.  We sincerely apologize that the housekeeping team missed your tidy and that you received conflicting information about activities.  We hope that you will choose to try Marriott's Newport Coast Villas again in the future.

Summary: Stayed five nights in October.  We flew in from John Wayne (SNA) airport which made for an easy twenty minute commute.  Beds are comfortable and staff is friendly.  Patio furniture needs cushions as sitting on metal is uncomfortable.  Convenience store offered fast, friendly service with strong, Starbucks coffee and good breakfast sandwiches and fruit.  However, sundries are price high, such as $6.50 for a bottle of water.  So, buy your necessities off site.  We found resort to be nice and quiet.  Although, Saturdays at the pool they have a DJ and fun kid's activities.  The resort is in a great location and we walked the mile to the beach on two, separate days.  We would certainly return.
Manager Response: Thank you for your stay and also your feedback about your stay at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. We are happy you were able to relax as well as enjoy some poolside fun. We are looking forward to your return and thank you for your perfect review.

Summary Heading: Nice timeshare, clean and well maintained
Summary: This is a very nice property. We stayed here after trading into a 2 bedroom condo through Interval International. The property and rooms are very clean and well maintained. The staff were very friendly. There were a few pools on site and the larger main pool had a restaurant/bar. This was the only one on the property. There is also a small convince store on site. The air-conditioning worked well but did not cool the bedrooms if the doors were closed at night. We had quite a bit of noise from the room upstairs, If I went again I would request 2nd floor. I would stay here again for sure and would recommend.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of Marriott Vacation Club Customer Care! We are happy to hear our team took great care of you. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: We rented about 10 of these villas for a wedding close by.  Didn't get a discount so while the $400/night was steep, 2 couples can very comfortably share a Villa with privacy. Masters are HUGE & beautiful! 2nd bedroom has queen with pull out couch and another pull out in Living room. You could easily live here for a week to month!   Customer service is FANTASTIC!  the property is huge and they could not get us all together but they made up for it with shuttles and golf cart drivers(just tip) Main pool area is AMAZING with multiple pools,  hot tubs,  chess,  beer pong,  etc.   Main lobby is great with Starbucks and marketplace for sandwiches and supplies (though VERY expensive)   Room is very VERY large and kitchen is nice,  though decor/furniture is a little dated.  VERY CLEAN.
Manager Response: Hi Kristina.  It's so nice to hear that you were able to secure villas at Marriott's Newport Coast villas to attend a wedding nearby.  We appreciate that you liked your villa accommodations and that the resort team provided you and your party outstanding customer service!  Thank you for your review, and we look forward to a visit from you again in the future!

Summary: We stayed in a 2 bedroom villa for our family of 6 for 2 nights. The grounds are gorgeous and the views of the ocean are great but our room itself felt dated and a little worn. There was plaster breaking off in the master shower and the door leaked water onto the floor. The furniture looked well worn. The space was great for our family to spread out with 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and full kitchen and living room. The 2nd day we woke up to ants on the kitchen counter and the kitchen sink leaking in the cabinet below. We called maintenance and they sent somebody up in about 30 mins to fix both situations which was fine. At night it felt like we were in an apartment complex hearing the people above us walking/running around and doors shutting. We slept with the windows open because
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, Katy. We appreciate your feedback about your stay. We are disappointed to hear that you experienced a leak in your kitchen and ant intrusion but are happy to hear that our engineering team was able to take care of you. We hope to see you again soon at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.

Summary: We are owners at this Marriott and have been going there for the past ten years.  We usually go for a week in the Spring and Fall.  Last year we went for two weeks in October and had a great time.  Swimming pools, workout areas, arcades, as well close to Laguna and Newport Beach.  We discovered last year the resort is just across the Pacific Coast Highway from Crystal Cove and California State Park.  This has about a mile of beach in a beautiful natural setting. There are a couple of small gift shops and a great restaurant with indoor and outdoor seating.  There is a free shuttle from the resort that runs to the state park about once per hour most of the day. So with beach, pools, recreation areas and proximity  to two beautiful towns a week goes by very fast!
Manager Response: Larry, we are delighted to know that you have had such an enjoyable stay, especially as Marriott Vacation Club Owners. See you again, soon!

Summary: We stayed in 2 bedbroom villa with a kitchen, living room and balcony.  A couple things could be improved: our bed was a Queen but comfortable.  The tub didn't want to drain and the shower had very low pressure.  Lunch by the pool was slow and the fish tacos were just ok. Positives: Great views everywhere!  The lobby had fruit water and salt water taffy and views out to the pool.   Saw road runners, bunnies, lizards and hummingbirds around the grounds and they have a lovely koi pond.  The lime trees around the pond smell heavenly.  We enjoyed our 2 night stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and we appreciate your feedback. We are excited that you enjoyed your time with us at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas and look forward to your next visit.

Summary: We stayed for 5 nights at this Marriott. We got a 2 bedroom remodeled room that was awesome! It had a full kitchen and two bathrooms that were very nice. No smell whatsoever in the rooms. The ocean view was blocked by many trees but still not that bad at all. The parking was also perfect and there was always a spot near our hotel. The pool area was clean and had many activities for kids! Overall the the stay was awesome with a perfect location. The only downside is the room service only came 3/5 nights we stayed which was the only disappointment we had with the stay but overall Its a good place for families with tons of activities. Also there is no Beach access unless you hike down crystal cove which is a pretty long walk from the hotel but they offer shuttle service!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, Joe! We are excited that your villa was awesome for your and your family. We are sorry to hear about your experience with housekeeping and thank you for bring it to our attention. We hope to see you again on your next Southern California vacation.

Summary Heading: Great place to unwind and enjoy the local beach community
Summary: I'm a Marriott Vacation Club owner and I've now added this place as my go-to SoCal beach resort.  It is just south of Corona del Mar and Newport Beach and up the coast highway from Laguna Beach.  It is very easy to drive to from the John Wayne Airport and there are plenty of flights on Southwest.   The resort is not on the beach but they offer a shuttle to Crystal Cove.  We love the walks along the bluff and Crystal Cove.  I've vacationed at this resort for the last 3 years and love the SoCal golf courses and enjoy the views and eateries in the beach communities. The villas have 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, kitchen, dining, living room and patio.  There are outdoor grills with patio furniture for family cookouts.  There is a Trader Joe's down the road and a Pavillions grocery store
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of your stay at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. We are excited to be your 'go-to' resort when you visit Southern California. We appreciate your feedback regarding the shower curtains as well as your experience with parking. Thank you for your valuable insight and we will review your comments with our resort leadership. We look forward to seeing your again, soon!

Summary: When you look around at the homes and other resorts near Marriott Newport Coast Resort you are literally mixed in with million dollar homes and resorts. This is an amazing SoCal location. While not right on the beach it is a short walk to Crystal Cove, one of California's most iconic beaches. There are a couple of restaurants within walking distance but not a lot so you will want to rent a car.  The resort has a Tuscan feel and the streets have Italian names. There are as many different views as there are buiding (around 40) so you may want to consider what your needs are; pool, golf course, ocean, garden. My family prefers a beach and pool view so we like the buildings in the 4000 and 5000s.   I was also impressed with all the activities offered at the Resort. Yoga, PiYo, water
Manager Response: We are happy that you were impressed with the resort location as well as the different activity options for your family. We are delighted to hear that each member of your family found something that they could enjoy. Thank you for your five star review of your stay at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.

Summary: We stayed at the Marriott Newport Coast Villas in early October. This is the third time we have stayed here.  The property was great, the staff was great, and the location was beautiful. We look forward to returning.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear you enjoy the location and friendly staff. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: This was our third visit to the Newport Coast Villas.  We love returning to this resort and this area of the OC. We stayed 12 nights, and turned this into a home-away-from-home, a working vacation.  As always, the grounds are beautiful, the units well-maintained, the service outstanding.  Everywhere you turn there are squads of workers cleaning, scrubbing, trimming...and everyone greets you with a smile.    After our third visit, however, I do have some suggestions.  The furniture in the units and particularly on the balconies is very uncomfortable.  It's unfortunate, since the villas are so beautifully situated with views of the ocean, and the balconies in the units beg you to sit out and enjoy the views.  But it's tough since the furniture is uncomfortable metal with no
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your overall stay and appreciate your WI-FI feedback. We hope to welcome you again soon!

Summary: We stay here on a regular basis and enjoy the outstanding location and villas, and luckily, great weather. Now to the disappointments:  Requested an oceanview room, which was confirmed by the hotel. Apparently, we have different opinions about ocean view. Our last stay was in villa 53000, truly oceanview, this time in 17000, where the ocean can be barely glimpsed through the trees, if you know where you're looking. In addition, when sitting on the balcony every vehicle on the PCH seems to be right outside the unit, making as much noise as possible. I was hoping my Marriott Platinum Elite status would have provide a benefit -- no such luck. As another reviewer commented, front desk is rarely accessible by phone. On-property directional signs are fine in daylight, but barely
Manager Response: We are disappointed to hear that you experienced difficulties reaching the front desk and appreciate your feedback so we can review with our team. Thank you for your review of your stay at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.

Summary: This is my first visit here and I can't wait to come back next year!    The property is gorgeous and the staff is helpful and courteous.    We had a 2bedroom villa overlooking the ocean so we couldn't have been happier.       There is lots to do on property from 3 swimming pools, putting green, basketball hoops, yoga, walking/running trails, beach across the way, spa, or just enjoy the views   There is a shuttle that will take you to the beach if you don't care to walk.   There is also lots to explore both north and south along the Pacific Coast Highway so go explore. We enjoyed taking a ferry boat over to Catalina island for the day n
Manager Response: We are so excited that you are loved your stay, Renee! We are happy you enjoyed our activities and that our associates took great care of you.

Summary: The Marriott Villas are designed for families. With multiple pools, basketball courts, mini golf, volleyball courts, a fire pit, and game rooms it is the perfect place for family fun. It is located perfectly on a hill that looks out at the beach, and it is a 5 minute drive to the closest beach. Newport beach is about a fifteen minute drive, and Laguna beach is about a ten minute drive. The villas are absolutely beautiful, and the service is always amazing. As a family we go every year, and I wouldn't want to go anywhere else.
Manager Response: Thank you for a perfect review. We are so pleased to hear you and your family enjoyed another stay at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. We look forward to your return!

Summary: Spent a wonderful week at this resort.  This was a first time visit, and immediately impressed with the location and grounds. The unit was clean and had everything needed to have a great stay.  The property is huge with all the resort amenities.  Stayed in building 5000.  This was a great location with pool easily accessible and BBQ grills close by.  Surprised how busy it was considering middle of Sept.  Obviously others have found it too.  Lots of excellent restaurants close by and plenty of shopping opportunities.  Or you can do as we did and spend your days laying on a lounge chair looking out at the ocean!
Manager Response: Thank you for your five star review! We are ecstatic that your villa was clean and you enjoyed the amenities at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. We are happy that you had such a wonderful week with us.

Summary: Perfectly located along the Newport coast.  Close to several beautiful and uncrowded beaches.  Lots of activities nearby for all to enjoy.  Well-kept and up to date facilities, clean and spacious suites.  Three pool and hot tub areas.  Health club and other amenities.
