It is fantastic to read expectations are continuously exceeded because of the overall villa and the above & beyond service from associates like Valerie.  We thank you for your loyalty to Marriott's Newport Coast Villas and look forward to your next visit!

Summary: This was our second family trip to the Marriott's Newport Coast Villas, but we have not visited for several year.  The location is great and the pools and grounds are fun for the kids.  It was a little more crowded this visit, but the resort has grown to be twice the size.  The rooms have been up dated as well as the appliances.  The new pull out sofas are great.  The five of us were very happy with our visit.  The kids even asked to go back.
Manager Response: Thank you for the five-star TripAdvisor review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!  We are thrilled to learn your second visit exceeded expectations as a result of the convenient location and amenities like the pools.  We look forward to hosting you and your loved ones on future getaways to Newport Beach!

Summary: I've booked this place about 4 times.  Everybody is always nice, helpful and accommodating.  The 2 bedroom is very spacious with a full kitchen and bathroom.  All of the unit I've stayed in is very clean and the bed is comfortable.  I've tried staying in other places in Newport Beach and for some reason, I kept on returning to Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. They must be doing something right :D
Manager Response: Hi Soko!  Tank you for the feedback on your stay.  It is terrific to learn expectations are constantly exceeded due to the accommodating service from associates in addition to the well-appointed yet well-kept villa. We look forward to continuing to host you at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!

Summary Heading: Wonderful Location and Nicely Designed Units.
Summary: We recently stayed in these timeshare units for the first time.  We had a family wedding in the area, so we ended up with 7 two bedroom units.  I got a chance to visit 5 of them.  These are not “cookie-cutter” in design, which adds to their appeal.  Well-furnished and the kitchens have just about everything you would expect in the way of cooking necessities.  Many have a peek-a-boo view of the ocean.  We liked the location just outside the turmoil of Newport, Corona del Mar and Laguna.  The shuttle is a nice feature.  Three different pool complexes and lots of activities going on for both kids and adults.  We would enjoy going back.
Manager Response: Thank you for your TripAdvisor review!  It is thrilling to know the resort met the needs of you and your family throughout your vacation due to the well-furnished villa complete with a well-appointed kitchen.  We hope to have the privilege of hosting you again at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!

Summary Heading: Fantastic stay at this family-friendly property
Summary: Would definitely recommend staying here again... Pros: 3 pools with plenty of chairs and space - lunch service friendly and reasonable Beautiful lobby and grounds with lovely views Lots of activities for kids, as well as for adults (like cheese and wine one night) Room had ocean view with a patio and table to hang out outside Rooms well appointed with 3 huge tvs, comfy linens and pillows, etc Full kitchen is handy for storing beverages and making breakfast Room service and café were very inexpensive for snacks, salads, sandwiches, etc Free shuttle hourly to the beach Friendly staff and service at all times Free parking  Cons: They assign you a room in advance - so not really a chance for early check-in. 10am check-out and 4pm check-in is tough for most people, and not very
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!  It is terrific to see you found the resort perfect for a family visit to Newport Beach because of the amenities such as the pools, well-manicured grounds and accommodating service from associates among other highlights.  We thank you for the recommendation and hope to have the opportunity to host everyone again!

Summary Heading: The best vacation place to stay in Newport Beach
Summary: Newport has many great places to stay for a vacation...Parties on the peninsula, Cottages on Balboa Island and many hotels, but for a relaxed high quality "mini home", the Villas are hard to beat. All of the amenities that you would want and close to many attractions including Crystal Cove State Park.
Manager Response: Hi Ron!  Thank you for the five-star TripAdvisor feedback on Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.  It is wonderful to know the resort serves as your home away from home when visiting Newport Beach as a result of the multitude of amenities.  We thank you for sharing the photographs and look forward to your next stay!

Summary: The grounds are beautiful, the beach and cute cottages of Crystal Cove are so close too. Shopping near by is great! The unit we had was a two bedroom and two bath. They have full kitchens which was great to make the majority of our meals at. It is a easy and quick commute to Disney, LA and even San Diego.  Excellent and we can't wait to go back again!
Manager Response: Thank you for the five-star review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!  It is fantastic to learn you cite your recent vacation as your favorite mentioning the well-manicured grounds and well-appointed villa as standout aspects of your experience.  We look forward to serving your family on future Newport Beach getaways!

Summary Heading: "LAST MINUTE SURPRISE & WHY WE OWN WITH MARRIOTT"
Summary: We originally booked another hotel in the area. Although it was very quaint, clean and romantic, we were going to be seeing our 2 year old niece and the hotel was not children friendly. We decided to look for another hotel. While driving to our destination, we just happened to see the sign Mattiott Vacation Villa. My husband said let's check with them. I was feeling doubtful because we only needed 2 nights and this was more a weekly owners villa. I approached the friendly Woman at the desk, in she was kind enough to give me the number of the Marriotts vacation owners. I gave them a call in the gentleman was more than willing to help make the end of our trip another great experience. Not only was he able to book us a room for 2 nights, our room was viewing the pool and ocean and
Manager Response: Hi Lisa!  Thank you for your five-star review.  It is fantastic to see you found your recent getaway to Newport Beach top-notch due to the above & beyond service from associates, on-par with the Marriott Vacation Club standard.  We thank you for sharing the photo from your visit and look forward to your next stay at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!

Summary: We arrived on a Saturday (earlyish) and although our room was not ready, we were able to check in and we were given keys to the room.  We were told that when it was ready, we would receive a text and our keys would be activated to enter the room.  We've never seen this before at other resorts but it worked great.  We were able to walk around, hang by the pool, etc until the room was ready.  We received the text, the keys were activated and we went to the room.  What a great idea since we didn't have to go back to the desk or do anything else but go right to the room.  As usual for Marriott's, the room was well appointed, spacious, and had everything we needed.  As has been mentioned, the resort is large.  As we were having guests, we received three parking passes; one for us to
Manager Response: Hi Chris!  Thank you for the five-star feedback on your recent stay at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.  It is fabulous to know your visit met Marriott Vacation Club standards as evidenced by the well-appointed yet spacious villa in addition to the well-manicured grounds among other highlights.  We look forward to welcoming you and your loved ones back on future Newport Beach getaways!

Summary Heading: From check in to check out everything was superb!
Summary: The grounds were well kept, Villa was clean and staff went above and beyond! I thought they did a great job with the upkeep of the facility. We stayed in 2900 building and it was newly renovated, and you could tell. There were tons of activities on and of the grounds of the resort that kept the kids and adults busy throughout the stay! Would def visit again!
Manager Response: Hi Keli!  Thank you for the five-star feedback on your stay.  It is exciting to realize your vacation exceeded expectations, start-to-finish as a result of the well-manicured grounds well-kept villa as well as the above & beyond service from associates.  We look forward to welcoming everyone back to Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!

Summary Heading: Great place for a family getaway
Summary: I've been here with my entire family, including in-laws, twice, and is a great place for its value. The homelike feel of the rooms is perfect for gathering family from different cities without imposing on anyone.
Manager Response: Thank you for your five-star review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!  It is terrific to know you found the resort ideal for a family getaway as a result of the overall value and amenities of home.  We look forward to hosting your family on future vacations to Newport Beach!

Summary: Horrible service, disrespectful staff and no restaurant.  Yes the rooms are very large and good for families.  However, they somehow think that this makes up for treating guests with disrespect.  Take your business elsewhere, Marriott has lost my business for good.  .
Manager Response: Hi Jorgen, thank you for your feedback on your recent stay.  We are sorry to hear there were some concerns that detracted from your visit.  We would be happy to speak with you further about your stay.  Please email us at customer.care@vacationclub.com with your preferred method of contact and include your TripAdvisor Username. As an alternative, you may reach us directly by calling 800-860-9384. We look forward to hearing from you soon.

Summary Heading: Not like it used to be
Summary: Stayed in the Ville or fortunately we were lucky enough to have a great view near the top of the hill, unfortunately it was a screaming child next to us who parents did not know how to control, and they themselves needed parenting skills, they would put the dirty diaper( by itself not in a bag) outside the door so when you walked by he saw a plain dirty diaper sitting there! I call the front office they must have call them so they put it in a small plastic bag from the market stay there for over two days absolutely disgusting, I had called the office when we first Sorret instead of them taking it away they just had them put it in a plastic bag!  We were located near the top of the hill with amazing views on the top floor, we are excited that there was a full above us although
Manager Response: Thank you for your TripAdvisor review of Marriott’s Newport Coast Villas.  Please accept our apologies for the disruptions you encountered during your stay and lack of response from the front desk.  Your feedback is appreciated and will be shared with the resort management team.  We do hope to see you again soon on your next trip to Newport.

Summary: We stayed 3 nights building 4900 on 3rd floor with amazing views of the ocean. Apartments are large and contain everything you need although ours were rather old and tired in need of rennovation.   Pools are lovely. Resources on property are limited re food supplies etc but it's only a short drive into Newport for shops. Concierge Carol Sue is fab really helpful and knowledgeable. Great customer service from Manny and Dalia re our next reservation and a v welcoming check in from Bailey. We are booked in again from tomorrow for 5 nights in a renovated property - looking forward to seeing the difference. Definitely recommend this resort. Yes it's big yes it's hilly but don't let that stop you booking it's terrific.
Manager Response: Thank you for the five-star feedback on your recent holiday to Newport Beach!  It is terrific to find your family visit exceeded expectations because of the spacious villa and top-notch service from associates like Carol Sue, Manny, Dalia and Bailey among other highlights.  We thank you for sharing the photo and look forward to welcoming everyone back to Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!

Summary: Great location on the hills above the PCH with great views of the ocean. Resort has everything you would every need. The rooms are all two bedrooms and two baths. Has all necessary items for the kitchen. Washer and dryer with detergent. Three pools and two spas at the main building. Pool bar has excellent food and priced reasonable for a resort. Music three or four days a week. Try the chicken nachos, excellent. Close to excellent eateries. Must try the Beachcomber at Crystal Cove and The Cliff in Laguna Beach. The Shake Shack on the ocean side of the PCH above The Beachcomber has a very good breakfast for very reasonable price. Shakes are excellent. Close to Laguna Beach, Newport Beach and Balboa Island. We visit two to three times a year. Yes this is a timeshare property but
Manager Response: Thank you for your five-star review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!  It is fantastic to find your family vacation exceeded expectations due to the well-appointed villa, amenities such as the pools and convenient location to area attractions.  We thank you for your loyalty and look forward to hosting everyone again soon!

Summary: We stayed for two nights and three days.  During the day we caught the frequent shuttles to the nearby Crystal cove.  There were a lot of people, but it didn't feel like it.  The grounds are well kept and interesting faux Tuscany look.  The place had a full kitchen which had most of the utensils we needed.  It is convenient to stores like Trader Joe's.  We cooked our own meals which brought the cost down.  The view from our balcony was amazing!  Access to it easy even though it was on the fourth floor.   The room was well kept up.  When we got there, the previous group had left a "don't wake" sign on door as a joke.  (We were sharing this with another group of people.)  It was supposed to be a joke, but ended up that the room was not cleaned when we got there.  It wasn't the
Manager Response: Thank you for your five-star feedback on Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!  It is wonderful to learn your family vacation exceeded expectations mentioning the well-manicured grounds and well-appointed villa as highlights of your stay.  We look forward to welcoming everyone back on future getaways to Newport Beach!

Summary: We are staying here for a few days while our home is being repiped. Besides for getting no ocean view, cause apparently all of the ocean view villas were taken...and yes, I paid full price. But the best really was that they gave me a room where I have to go up and down the stairs all the time. Unbelievable that there is no elevator here!!!  So we had to bring the BABY and LUGGAGE all by ourselves to this very so so room (which is supposedly a luxury villa...). And when I complained, the best answer I got was that I booked this stay trough a 3rd party (booking.com) and therefore there was NOTHING they could do for me. And then they started trying to convince us to buy this time share thing. Omg! Totally tragic!  I don't recommend this property at all. Probably the good reviews
Manager Response: Hi Dafne.  Thank you for your review.  We are sorry to find expectations were not exceeded due to villa-related concerns.  The feedback on your stay has been shared with resort management and we thank you for your comments.  We hope to have the opportunity to host you again at Marriott Vacation Club.

Summary Heading: Nice place to stay in Newport Beach
Summary: The villas have two bed rooms, two baths, a kitchen, eating area and living room.  The bathrooms are each connected to a bedroom.  One of the baths is accessible directly from the living area.  The kitchen comes with plates, bowels, glasses, and silverware although the number seems to vary from villa to villa.  We had friends staying in other villas and they all seemed to have a different number.  The hotel is on a hill above the ocean.  Some villas have views of the ocean.  From ours, we could get a glimpse of the ocean. There is a shuttle that runs from the hotel down to the ocean at Crystal Cove.  Beds were comfortable.  There is a ceiling fan in each bedroom, but the ones in our villa made clanking noises, so did the refrigerator when it shut off.  Bathrooms are spacious and
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!  We are glad you found the resort an acceptable vacation location when visiting Newport Beach as evidenced by the spacious yet well-appointed villa.  We hope to have the pleasure of hosting you both again soon!

Summary: My wife and I are long time Marriott timeshare owners and have visited their properties all over the world.  We were disappointed with this facility.  First impressions: good location and lush green surroundings.  Second impressions: absolutely no views from the room (obscured by trees), unimpressive room decor (supposedly renovated), and most of the staff were mildly welcoming.  Disappointing.
Manager Response: Hi David.  Thank you for your review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.  While we are pleased to find the convenient location and well-manicured grounds impressed, it is disappointing to read villa and service-related concerns detracted from your overall impression of the resort.  The feedback on your concerns has been shared with the management of the resort and we thank you for your input.  We thank you for your loyalty to Marriott Vacation Club and hope to have the opportunity to host you both again so expectations may truly be exceeded.

Summary Heading: Nice stay but hoped for our items left in room
Summary: This was a great place to stay for the whole family, so much to do and very clean and nice! The only thing....was we left three very important things in our room and called right away and they told us the would call and never did... After calling them three times and them telling us different things they finally said they did not find anything. We know it was in the room so seems a bit confusing and maybe they need to speak to whoever cleaned our room??? Other then that it was good!:-)
Manager Response: Thank you for the feedback on your stay!  We are happy to find your visit to Marriott's Newport Coast Villas met expectations because of the well-kept facilities, family atmosphere and daily activities.  We are sorry to hear your lost items were not recovered.  We hope to have the opportunity to host everyone on future getaways to Newport Beach!

Summary: We enjoyed the property during our first visit earlier this year that we decided to come again.  The property is located just above Pacific Coast Hwy and many of the rooms have a views of the ocean. Some of the higher floors offer better ocean views. The grounds are well maintained and there is golf course just below the Villas that adds to the beauty. We stayed eight nights and the villa was very large with lots of space.The beds were firm and very comfortable. All the units are two bedrooms with fully equipped kitchen that has all the basic pots, pans, plates, utensils etc. Around many of the units are barbecue grill areas that offer 2 or 3 separate grills each so that many people can cook at the same time. The décor inside the villa was nice, but we had some serious
Manager Response: Hi Chuck!  Thank you for your TripAdvisor review.  While it is thrilling to learn you found your overall experience top-notch because of the well-manicured grounds in addition to the spacious, well-appointed and comfortable villa, we are disappointed villa maintenance concerns kept your visit from reaching its fullest potential.  The input on your stay has been shared with resort management and we thank you for your comments.  We look forward to hosting you both for a third time soon at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!

Summary: This is our third visit to this tranquil piece of heaven.  We enjoy being close to the ocean which is on separated by the pch. The 2 bedroom villa is very comfortable for 4 to 6 ppl 8 ppl would be fine but only if it was with 4 adults and 4 kids. The rooms could use an upgrade but are very functional. You are close to Disneyland about 30 minutes and about an hour to lego land. Our 7 and 4 year old boys love the pool and the access to the theme parks. We look forward to coming back!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for the five-star review!  It is terrific to find expectations are continuously exceeded each visit to Marriott's Newport Coast Villas mentioning the comfortable villa and convenient location to area attractions as highlights.  We thank you for sharing the picture from your stay and look forward to your fourth visit!

Summary: When we first drove into this resort I didn't think I was going to like it because of the size. We got to our room (a first floor one) and I immediately changed my mind. We had a beautiful view of the ocean, it was relatively quiet. We quickly found the path to walk to the main building. There are park areas for kids to play, several fire pits and BBQ's located everywhere, a shuttle to drive you if the walks are too far.  Our villa had everything we needed, including laundry soap. There are several activities for all ages. We will definitely return.  We were in building 4000.
Manager Response: Thank you for the five-star comments on Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!  It is thrilling to realize your experience exceeded expectations due to the quiet villa and amenities such as the fire pits and grills.  We thank you for sharing the photographs from you visit and look forward to hosting you both again!

Summary: We had the opportunity to stay with a time share couple a very nice property I would rate it 41/2 stars , only because it's not directly on the beach you have to walk to it and their is no sit down restaurant on property it does have a grill by pool but limited. Would recommend a high floor as it might have a better view, nice pool area also very clean and staff very helpful and courtesy , would rate it 5 star if directly on beach but if that is not a big deal go for it I don't think you would be disappointed
Manager Response: Hi Stan!  Thank you for your review.  We are excited to learn you enjoyed your recent stay as a result of the overall pool area, well-kept facilities and accommodating service from associates.  We hope to have the privilege of hosting you again at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!

Summary Heading: A true 5 star attraction for the whole family.
Summary: The entire resort is great for the whole family.  From the pools to the activities for the kids and adults.  The staff is extremely friendly and the resort is so clean.  Well worth the money to stay there and the rooms are great.  Probably one of the best places we have ever stayed for a vacation.  Since our first visit we have gone back numerous times.
Manager Response: Hi Jim!  Thank you for the five-star comments on Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.  It is fabulous to find expectations are continuously exceeded mentioning the family-friendly atmosphere, pools and activities as standout aspects of your experiences.  We look forward to continuing to host you and your family for many years to come!

Summary: This is a massive resort and if U want flexibility in traveling around really requires a rental car. Situated between Laguana and Newport it is a bus or shuttle (or $30-40 cab ride) to the cities. My biggest issue with this resort is how out of date and shabby the interior of the villas were...for $300-359/night I expected (and from the photos) a fair bit better.  The furniture and carpet looked dirty and were extremely over worn. The beds were very comfortable. The pools were nice but no one cleaned the pool area during the day so on several occasions we were picking up all the garbage and towels when we wanted space.   The concierge staff were helpful and friendly but because of the interiors and lack of attention to cleanliness I only gave it 3 stars.  Great for families but
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback on Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.  While we are happy to see you enjoyed aspects of your visit mentioning the accommodating staff from associates as a highlight, it is a letdown to discover villa maintenance and pool upkeep concerns detracted from your overall getaway.  Your comments on these concerns have been shared with resort management and we thank you for your input.  We look forward to your next stay with Marriott Vacation Club.

Summary: We always stay at Marriots Surf Club in Aruba and wanted to switch it up.  After speaking to a Marriot Rep we decided to switch our family vacation to the Newport Coast villas.  Upon arrival we were warmly greeted by all employees we saw upon check in.  We were assigned a room and were disappointed by location of room.  Way too far away from the pool and main complex. Resort is huge and you may need your car to get around ESP if traveling w kids like us. (10,12,15). The room was extremely disappointing.  The resort is built on a hill so many rooms you need to walk down to.  This was one of them.  It almost felt like a basement apartment.  Very dark and depressing. Please be aware of this when booking.  Rooms w a "view" aren't super important to us but this darkness was
Manager Response: Hi Nancy!  Thank you for the feedback on your recent family getaway to Newport Beach.  It is terrific to know you found the resort perfect for a family vacation due to the well-kept room, amenities like the pool and the multitude of daily activities offered for guests of all ages.  We look forward to the opportunity to welcome everyone back for more fun in the sun at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!

Summary: Beautiful property with too many amenities to list! Gorgeous ocean views, things for kids to do, shuttle to beach and local shopping, dining and hot spots. Outdoor games galore, corn hole, air hockey, pool table, gigantic chess board and table tennis! In the evening on Friday and Saturday they had a singer/guitar player by the pool!
Manager Response: Hi Laurie!  Thank you for your review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.  It is terrific to discover your recent family vacation met expectations because of the amenities, views, games such as corn hole, air hockey, pool and table tennis in addition to the entertainment.  We hope to have the pleasure of hosting everyone again!

Summary: Marriott Newport is a fantastic venue. Check in was easy and we got the top floor apartment which was recommended. Great rooms and pools. The activities are numerous and everything is well kept. The barbecue areas are an excellent way to cook and meet the locals. Close to shops, crystal cove and easy access to the freeways
Manager Response: Hi Matt!  Thank you for your five-star TripAdvisor feedback on Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.  It is wonderful to learn you found the resort a perfect family holiday venue as a result of the efficient check in, top-notch amenities like the pools and grills in addition to the multitude of daily activities offered.  We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: We stayed here with extended family in June 2015. Plenty of space for everyone with big cozy beds. Loved strolling grounds with family and playing tetherball, having an outdoor bbq, basketball game, and kids activities, not to mention lounging at pool. Walk down to the beach wasn't nearly as bad as anticipated, loved visiting the historic beach area directly below the hotel, as well as stocking up the kitchen with Trader Joe's treats, right down the street. Also saw lots of bunnies around the grounds. Kids loved that.
Manager Response: Hi Erin!  Thank you for your five-star review.  It is terrific to read Marriott's Newport Coast Villas suited you and your families needs due to the spacious villa, amenities like the grills and the daily activities.  We look forward to hosting you and your loved ones on future visits to Newport Beach!

Summary Heading: Loved the family time spent here
Summary: We stayed in villa 4320 from 9/2-9/9/15.  We rented from an owner.  We had requested refurbished, ocean view and high floor.  We go an amazing ocean view on the 2nd floor.  Our room was not refurbished, but it was still amazing.  The balcony was amazing to sit out on, and their was plenty of space for everyone.  Our kids are older (16, 21, and 25), so we wanted it for a place to hang and make family meals together.  They had pretty much everything we needed to cook, and it was easy and fun just to be together.  It has a great fitness center, fire pits, and swimming pools.  We took the shuttle down to Crystal Cove and ate at the Beachcomber which was great!  Highly recommended.
Manager Response: Thank you for the five-star TripAdvisor review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!  It is thrilling to discover the resort was a perfect host to your vacation mentioning the amenities like the fitness center, fire pits and pools as highlights of your stay.  We thank you for the recommendation and look forward to welcoming everyone back for more quality family time!

Summary: We vacation here every year. The staff is outstanding, the rooms are wonderful, there is activities if you want it or plenty of places to relax if you don't. The rooms are set up at opposite ends of the villa, and the 2nd bathroom can be accessed from the guest room or the front room. The kitchens are well equipped and there are BBQs at every building and in the group areas. The master bed/bath is awesome. The beds are extremely comfortable, and there is a hideaway bed in the front room and in the guest room, in addition to the queen bed. Sleeps 8 comfortably.
Manager Response: Thank you for the five-star TripAdvisor feedback on Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!  It is terrific to know expectations are exceeded each visit due to the top-notch service from associates, well-appointed villa and activities.  We we look forward to your next stay!

Summary: We stayed here in mid-August for a week.  We are vacation club members and this is another great resort in the vacation club.  We were surprised at how expansive the property is.  There are over 700 villas on the property.  The grounds are well kept and you can enjoy a strenuous workout just walking the property.  The resort was packed but since it is so spread out we never felt like we were part of a huge pack.    You are not on the beach here.  You are up the hill and across Highway 1, the California coastal highway.  The views of the ocean are breathtaking, and after the morning fog burns off, Catalina Island is in the distance. Newport Beach is to the North of the resort and Laguna Beach is to the South.  Both Towns have good seaside restaurants, and beautiful beaches to
Manager Response: Thank you for the five-star TripAdvisor feedback!  It is terrific to discover you found your recent family vacation top-notch due to the well-manicured grounds and expansive facilities.  We look forward to hosting everyone again soon at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!

Summary: This is a beautiful property located away from the commercial parts of Newport beach.  Most of the villas (two room suites) have excellent views of the ocean (and, in many cases, the neighboring golf course).  There are three sets of pools (one with three separate pools), so it's easy to find a busy or quiet space, depending on what you are looking for.  The nearest beach is a state part -- Crystal Cove; there is complimentary bus service to one part of the state part.  The rooms are very well outfitted.  We stayed for seven nights and cooked on the property each night (sometimes using the convenient outdoor grills).   The property is very well maintained and landscaped.  Parking can be a bit tight at busy times.  Overall, this is a great location for a relaxing get away or a
Manager Response: Thank you for the five-star feedback on your recent stay!  It is thrilling to read you found the resort an exceptional location for vacationing in Newport Beach because of the views, pools and well-appointed villa.  We look forward to hosting you both at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas for many years to come!

Summary: We are Marriott Vacation Club owners and as I visit different clubs, I am increasingly disappointed.  Our children are now teenagers and these clubs seem to cater primarily to families with younger children.  There is only one vacation club I've visit (Playa Andaluza in Spain) that had sufficient children's spaces so that even the "quiet" areas were not overrun with young children.   They should have designated pools for children!!!  The quiet pool areas are meaningless.  The hot tubs are so full of young kids swimming around, spilling their drinks, etc., that they can't be enjoyed.   Otherwise, it was in a great location for visiting southern CA areas, great restaurants, hiking, farmers' markets.  We were visiting family in the area, otherwise wouldn't bother with this hotel as
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!  We are glad you found the resort an ideal location when visiting Newport Beach.  We thank you for your comments on the pools and have shared your suggestions with resort management.  We hope to have the pleasure of hosting everyone again!

Summary: Stayed 1st week of Sept. Check-in was VERY busy  but still not overly long. Got my 1st choice off my Pre-check wish list. Great view, quiet building, CLEAN LARGE room. Grounds are impeccable. Staff wonderful throughout: front desk, housekeeping, mini-mart all friendly and helpful. Resort has easy, quick access to PCH for trips to Newport Beach (north) or Laguna Beach (south). Shopping trip to nearby mall with free shuttle available.  A great stay at a great resort. I'll be back!!
Manager Response: Thank you for the five-star TripAdvisor feedback on your recent stay at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!  It is wonderful to read you found the resort suited to your needs mentioning the spacious room, well-manicured grounds and top-notch service as highlights of your getaway.  We look forward to hosting you again!

Summary: We stayed here with our 2 kids - a one year old and a 3 year old. They had a lot of fun on the activities hotel offered. We liked the spacious room - we had a two bedroom suite with a little kitchen and sitting area.  The interior does look a bit outdated, but the space definitely makes up for that.  Hotel is in a great location, not far from Fashion island shopping center.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!  It is fantastic to find the resort suited your needs for a family getaway because of the daily activities offered and spacious villa.  We hope to have the privilege of serving everyone again!

Summary Heading: Rooms in need of updating and cleaning
Summary: If you are staying here as part of the promotional package with the 90 minute timeshare presentation, expect to get one of the least desirable rooms (i.e., not renovated, a low floor, and no view) - to quote one of the timeshare salesmen - "a room in the dungeon." The rooms were pretty filthy. The first few minutes in the hotel room my husband sat on the couch and stood up with wet/ruined shorts thanks to some mystery fluid spilled on it. The front desk staff did not seem too sorry about this incident, though they did send a replacement cushion. I felt treated like a second class guest since I was not a vacation club member. I would not stay here again. Btw - even the "renovated" rooms have the same bathroom and kitchen tiles/countertops, which in my opinion are in need of
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.  We are sorry to find your recent family visit failed to exceed expectations due to the overall villa.  The feedback on your stay has been shared with resort management and we thank you for your comments.  We hope to have the opportunity to host you again at Marriott Vacation Club.

Summary: Marriott never fails to amaze in all areas of hospitality and amenities at a moments notice.  No attention to detail is overlooked.  Great resort for families or couples who just want the best of all comforts.  Shuttle services are beyond reproach and are available daily to all major centers surrounding the resort. No worries when it comes to onsite activities, including first run movies, pools, outdoor games, and hikes.
Manager Response: Hi Joe!  Thank you for your five-star review.  We are pleased to know you found your recent family visit top-notch as a result of the attention to detail present throughout the resort in addition to the daily activities offered.  We look forward to the next opportunity to exceed expectations at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!

Summary: This is a great property. Centrally located between Corona Del Mar and Laguna Beach. On the pacific coast highway across from Crystal Cove State Beach. Lots of shopping nearby. Great pools at property wit bar and grill service. The downside of this timeshare is that's the only restaurant. The villas have full kitchens, so we just bought breakfast and lunch fixings at grocery store down the road. All villas are 2 bedroom, 2 baths.
Manager Response: Hi Patty!  Thank you for your five-star comments on Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.  It is exciting to realize you found the resort ideal for a family visit due to the convenient location and pools.  We look forward to welcoming everyone back on future Newport Beach getaways!

Summary: A friend has a Marriott timeshare so invited us to stay went for a week.   The place was huge villas were gorgeous what a great place to stay!   It's not on the beach so hence the minus one star but decent ocean views and easy to get to most of what Newport has to offer.  Kids love the pool and the beach nearby.  Would definitely return.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  It is wonderful to know you found Marriott's Newport Coast Villas perfect for a family visit to Newport Beach evidenced by the spacious villa and pool area.  We look forward to your return!

Summary: My family and I took a 10 day vacation in California.  We stayed in San Diego for the first part of our trip and at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas at Newport Beach for the second part (from August 25, 2015 through August 29, 2015).  Near the end of our trip, my 13 year-old son was complaining of bug bites which we assumed was just a mosquito bite or two.  After we checked out and were at the airport returning home, he continued to complain.  We checked out his back which had a number of clusters of bites and a few areas of linear bites.  We did a bit of research online and these bites looked like they could be bed bug bites.  When we were back home, I called the 2 facilities that we stayed at and informed them.  They were both very polite and professional in taking all of our
Manager Response: Thank you for the feedback on your recent stay at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.  We are sorry to hear your vacation was marred by pest concerns and hope your son is doing better.  We take these issues very seriously and address as soon as possible when brought to our attention.  We apologize for any lack of follow up regarding this.  We hope to have the opportunity to host you again.

Summary: Was here with friends for a girls weekend, but I know my kids would have LOVED it. I was a little surprised that trees were not kept shorter so the unit we were in could see the ocean.  The resort was perfectly located close to restaurants and beach. The units were clean and spacious.
Manager Response: Hello Jamie!  Thank you for your five-star review.  It is fabulous to find the resort served as a suitable host for your girls weekend due to the well-kept yet spacious villa.  We look forward to hosting everyone again at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!

Summary: This property has seen its day.  They need to fire all housekeepers and start fresh.  I agree with previous review.  Our carpet had nail clippings, rocks, etc.  I kept stepping in stuff which was gross.  The grounds are not clean.  Trash in places and someone in management needs to pay some attention to the overall cleanliness.  For non time share owners, this is $359+ per night.   Don't bother asking for an ocean view, few and far between.  I'm disappointed as we've been searching for s great property to stay in Newport.  We are still searching after this visit.
Manager Response: Hi Ann.  Thank you for the feedback on your visit.  We are sorry to read your recent stay failed to meet expectations because of concerns with both housekeeping and the overall grounds.  We are interested in finding out more.  Please email us at customer.care@vacationclub.com with your preferred method of contact and include your TripAdvisor Username. As an alternative, you may reach us directly by calling 800-860-9384. We look forward to hearing from you soon.

Summary: Being in the location that it is and check in area seems to give you a more luxurious feel, don't expect this for the whole rest of the property or your experience.  The property does have potential to meet this high quality standard though, with a few fixin's.   The beds is something to get used to since its not my own bed but after the first night they were comfy. However, the linens felt a bit damp or sticky.   Sound proof - definitely not. Being on the second floor I was surprised at how much noise you can hear above you, beside you and outside of your room.  It is muffled so you cant distinguish what is actually being said but it is loud enough to be disturbed.   Trash - littered all throughout the property. Empty water bottles, trash left out and animals got into it (you
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.  While we are glad you found the grounds well-manicured and bed comfortable, it is disappointing to learn your overall experience failed to impress as a result of both housekeeping and grounds-maintenance concerns.  The feedback on your visit has been shared with the management of the resort and we thank you bringing there concerns to our attention.  We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back so we may truly exceed expectations.

Summary: This place is the best.  I stayed here for business and brought my family.  The rooms have 2 bedrooms, living room, dining room, and full kitchen.  The staff is amazing and the property is breathtaking.  Three different pools and activities for all every day.  I highly recommend visiting.
Manager Response: Thank you for the five-star review!  It is terrific to know you found Marriott's Newport Coast Villas perfect for your recent business trip as a result of the spacious villa, above & beyond service from associates, views, pools and daily activities.  We thank you for the recommendation and look forward to continuing to serve you for many years to come!

Summary Heading: Awe-inspiring views and super Marriott service
Summary: We returned to Newport Beach by trading one of our Marriott vacation weeks. The first time we visited this resort, we were staying on a special "introductory" package since we had never stayed there before. We loved the place, but spent so much time sightseeing, we did not have much time relaxing in the resort itself. This time we planned to do things differently.  We arrived on a Saturday, staying for a full week. The place is very popular and stays full so they are one Marriott vacation resort that is a stickler for their 4pm check in. You can request an early check in, but that is not going to happen. Take that into account when planning your arrival. They will however give you keys to use at the pool area if you need to wait so that is wonderful. They will also take your
Manager Response: Thank you for the five-star review!  It is fantastic to read your first visit to Marriott's Newport Coast Villas exceeded expectations mentioning the well-appointed villa, pools and activities as highlights of your experience, among other standouts.  We look forward to welcoming you both back on future getaways to Newport Beach!

Summary: Stay here for 1 night just to check it out.  This is a great location for a family vacation.     Walk to Crystal Cove, short drive to Laguna Beach, Balboa, and Huntington Beach. Great restaurants only a few minutes away in great beach towns.  Most of the rooms are 2 bedrooms for family.  It is clean and service was good
Manager Response: We appreciate your TripAdvisor review, Tom.  Thank you for choosing Newport Coast Villas on your recent trip to California.  We do hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Location amazing! shuttle to crystal cove and beachcomber restaurant. Shakes at ruby's shake shack. Short drive to Corona del Mar for dinner. Golf at pelican Hill if you've got lots of cash and lounge at the main or quiet pools at the villas after.  There are good and bads. Our unit had hotpoint appliances and fridge froze our fruit and microwave needed extra minute or two cook time. It a very busy place so high floor good. We were in 4744 away from street and facing Canyon. It was quiet very nice...
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, Cherie.  It's great to hear your family loved the convenient location in Newport.  We thank you for your feedback and look forward to your next stay at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.

Summary: I come here once a month and love it each time. The staff is great, the rooms are better than the average vacation club rooms, and the views are amazing. It is in a good location for getting around Newport Beach although you will likely need a car or taxi/car service. I look forward to each visit. I have stayed at all the nearby Marriott properties as well and I prefer staying here.
Manager Response: We are happy to be your home away from home in beautiful Newport!  Thank you for your review and we look forward to many more visits.

Summary: We have been to this property several times and will continue to go back. It has everything you can want for families... swimming pools, hot tubs, fitness center, tennis courts, poolside games, fire pit, propane grills, and more. The rooms are fully furnished with full kitchens. We also like that it's further south than Newport proper go get away from the crowds and traffic. I would recommend requesting a room on the upper part of the property by the pool and tennis courts.
Manager Response: Thank you for your TripAdvisor review, Jackson.  It's a  pleasure to read about your family's recent visit to Newport Coast Villas.  We hope you will join us again soon on your next vacation to California.

Summary: We decided to swap our two platinum weeks at the Playa Andaluza in Spain for ten days at Newport, which we were told was something superior. Except that it wasn't.  Certainly, the area has lots to offer and the property as such is beautiful, but something somehow must have got out of hand at one point. We were charged extra for a daily room service that hardly took place. The same tissue that wasn't ours remained languishing near the sofa for the whole of our stay. The pool was barely in walking distance; there's no proper onsite restaurant; the bar closes at 9, and the marketplace is tiny and poorly stocked.   You do need a car to get around, but when we returned the rental car and handed the key and documents over to the receptionist, nothing happened and it was still there
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.  We are sorry to hear there were a few issues that detracted from your overall visit.  We would be happy to follow up with you about your stay.  Please email us at Customer.Care@vacationclub.com or call 800-860-9384.  Thank you again for visiting and for your review.

Summary: We have stayed here 3 times as "snowbirds".  It is in a great area of the coast to see many things.  The nearby beaches are nice.  These units are all 2 bedrooms and roomy - we invited friends to come for a week to share the enjoyment.  Staff is very helpful and all desired amenities are here.
Manager Response: We appreciate your TripAdvisor review, Tom!  Marriott's Newport Coast Villas is a great place to escape in the middle of winter and we are glad you enjoyed your time.  We look forward to your next stay with us in California!

Summary: It's a decent hotel with all the amenities. To begin with getting there was rather complicated as the streets signs were hard to read.  From a family's perspective it's the perfect place  with plenty of space. There are endless activities for kids to do. You cannot escape the extraordinary views and surroundings, ideal for chilling by the people and enjoying the beautiful sunset. Although the rooms are very spacious, the layout is a bit outdated and they should really invest in the interior design by updating it. It would have been ideal to allow people to smoke on the room balconies but the smoking area was close to our bungalow so that wasn't an issue. Didn't get to stay there long enough to enjoy all the facilities as I was there for a friends wedding which I must say is the
Manager Response: Thank you for your TripAdvisor review, Sammy.  We are delighted you and your friends had a wonderful visit to Newport Coast Villas.  Currently, interior villa renovations are taking place to update the look and feel of the inside of the rooms.  We hope on your next visit, you will have a chance to stay in one of our newly renovated units.  Thank you again for your review!

Summary Heading: Hotel of Choice when back home
Summary: I love it here, Huge villas with a full kitchen and washer and dryer. Quick drive from John Wayne down PCH. A run into CDM or Dana Point for food and nightlife as well and the views are awesome overlooking the pacific. Perfect location in South OC.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas! We are delighted your villa was spacious and met expectations for a comfortable stay and the location of the resort was perfect for hitting local attractions in the area. We look forward to having you again during your next visit to Newport Beach!

Summary Heading: One of the best spots in Southern California
Summary: 1. Booking Experience: Tried to book 2 weeks for our family vacation this summer for a long time...The hotel website kept showing no availability since Mar (6 months before our scheduled arrival).  Despite the massive size of the property but being a Marriott Vacation Property it was packed with time share owners during this hot season.  Then i tried to book via a third party broker (Concierge Reality) who were very professionals and reliable. They found a suitable 2 bedroom apartment which accommodates a family of 8 members @ reasonable rate of USD 445/night  The bad news that i could not register my reward points with Marriott because the deal was with one of the time share owners via the said broker  2. Check In Expertise: Despite arriving at late night, the check in
Manager Response: We appreciate your review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas! It is great to know the location of the resort was perfect for hitting up the local beaches and shopping, such as Fashion Island, and your two bedroom villa was comfortable for your family. We look forward to having you all for another West Coast vacation again at Newport Coast Villas!

Summary Heading: Perfect location for Family Vacation with Young Children
Summary: This was our first time in Newport Beach, California. We were offered the opportunity to stay 3 nights for a reasonable price if we agreed to listen to a sales presentation. We invited our son and daughter-in-law with their 15 month old and 4 year old to join us. The setup was perfect for our family vacation. Our unmarried son joined us for one full day so it was a true family reunion. Crystal Cove Beach is beautiful but not within walking distance. The Marriott provides a shuttle hourly to the beach and back, which worked for us. The variety of pools and activities for kids made our grandson and son and daughter-in-law very happy. Jeff checked us in and was very friendly, and interested in doing anything to make our stay positive. When our villa was not going to be ready until
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!  It is fantastic to read you found the resort ideal for a family getaway mentioning the pools, activities and the above & beyond service from associates like Jeff as standouts.  We thank you for the recommendation and look forward to hosting everyone again at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!

Summary Heading: Marriott's Newport,is the best Family Get away!💖
Summary: BEST💖 Place for Family Get away! So much things to do, very clean , it includes lots of things you will have at home,laudry,kitchen,refrigerator ,lots if activities fir kids etc super close to the beach love it!
Manager Response: Hi Letty!  Thank you for the five-star feedback on Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.  It is fabulous to know you found the resort perfect for a family getaway due to the well-appointed villa and multitude of activities.  We look forward to hosting everyone again soon!

Summary Heading: Best So Cal location for a family vacation
Summary: This is a amazing location for a family vacation in So Cal. Second year in a row and we are staying for a 2 weeks . Walk to Crystal Cove, short drive to Laguna Beach, Balboa, and Huntington Beachs. Great restaurants only a few minutes away in great beach towns. This year we went to the OC fair, which was a blast. Can't say anything bad about the location.  We are longtime Marriott timeshare owners with Platinum hotel staus, so we have high expectations as it relates to the resort. We have been to over 10 Marriott resorts to compare to. The rooms are typical 2 bedroom villa's and well maintained. This is a big resort and it feels big. We have been too other large properties that didn't feel large, thanks to the staff and management. The main pool can be crowd on busy days, with
Manager Response: Hello Michael!  Thank you for your feedback on Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.  It is terrific to hear you cite the resort as your favorite for a family vacation in the area due to the well-maintained villas.  We look forward to seeing everyone again soon!

Summary Heading: Excellent in every respect, clean, friendly staff and wonderful location.
Summary: We are Marriott brand loyal, and this resort didn't disappoint. We were allocated a great room  in building 2400, with a view of the ocean. I wanted to point out to anyone disappointed in not getting an ocean view, only 30% of villas have one. So I guess we got lucky, as rightly they save the better location villas for resort owners given this is a timeshare location. That said, the resort is lovely so you don't have to venture too far to find a great view.   There is a nice pool bar, which serve great snacks and drinks. All drinks are served in disposable plastic cups. I would have preferred my cocktails in plastic glasses. (As the grand vista location in Orlando).  We opted for the chicken nachos on a couple of days to bridge the gap from breakfast to dinner - which was a
Manager Response: Thank you for your five-star review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!  It is thrilling to read your stay exceeded expectations as you found the resort well-kept and the associates accommodating.  We thank you for the recommendation and look forward to welcoming everyone back on future Newport Beach getaways!

Summary: Marriott has this routine down. A superb facility for families (though not exclusively so) that is conveniently located to activities, sight-seeing, and shopping. There is a great walk on the ocean about a 1 mile walk from the property. However, you don't need to leave the property to relax and enjoy yourself. All the services are there. The one weakness is the skimpy selection at the Marketplace. This place needs to be tripled in size and stocked with grocery items that people would need for meal preparation in their villas. Otherwise, it's a 3 mile drive to the nearest store (it happens to be Trader Joe's). Highly recommended.
Manager Response: Thank you for the feedback on Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!  It is fabulous to see you found the resort perfect for those visiting the area mentioning the overall facilities as a highlight of your stay.  We thank you for the recommendation and look forward to serving you both on future getaways to Newport Beach!

Summary: Perfect for us. Allowed us to spread out while giving us convenient access to Newport, Laguna, corona del mar and Irvine.  Pool and game room were nice escapes for the kids.    We got a great last minute rate in a pinch.  I would stay here again when visiting my family in Newport.
Manager Response: Hello Thomas!  Thank you for your review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.  It is terrific to know the resort suited your needs mentioning the amenities such as the pool and game room as highlights.  We look forward to hosting everyone on future getaways to Newport Beach!

Summary: This was our first experience in Newport Beach.  This resort did not disappoint.  The amenities and service were outstanding.  We are staying for a week next summer so it was really nice to check everything out.  My only complaint was their choice of coffee for the in room coffee pot.  I just have a note to myself to remember coffee next year.  Very clean and great location.
Manager Response: Thank you for your five-star review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!  It is thrilling to find expectations were exceeded throughout your recent stay with family mentioning the amenities and service as highlights.  We look forward to hosting everyone for many years to come!

Summary: This timeshare is one of their premier properties. And in my opinion, it certainly lives up to it. The landscaping is absolutely beautiful with some imports from Italy. Their fountains are also exceptional. The timeshare sits up on a bluff and overlooks the Pacific. The staff are very helpful. Once we were on the property we were hard pressed to leave since it was so relaxing. This was our third visit. The villas are beautifully appointed. I would have no hesitation in recommending this vacation spot. Make sure you go to the Beachcomber for breakfast. Okay, so we did leave the property. :-)
Manager Response: Hi Ilene!  Thank you for the five-star TripAdvisor feedback on Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.  It is exiting to read you found your family getaway top-notch because of the well-manicured grounds, accommodating service from associates and well-appointed villa.  We thank you for the recommendation and look forward to serving everyone again!

Summary Heading: If disabled, DO NOT plan to stay here!
Summary: We travel extensively and, when booking this vacation, I called many times to double check on wheelchair accessibility of the grounds and the suite we were booking.  I started in Sept 2014 for an Aug, 2015 stay.  Upon arrival, I was told that there were no accessible villas anywhere near the pool, games, lobby, etc.  They had placed us in a villa at the farthest place from the main pool.  Then they offered another but it was at the other farthest end of the location.  Oh yes, they offered a shuttle, but the w/c shuttle was not going to be always available and you have to walk/push to the shuttle stop. OR they said we could drive. Well when I vacation we did not want to have to put the w/chair in and out of our car, nor did the person who is independent and paralyzed, want to
Manager Response: Hi Lynn.  Thank you for your review.  It is disappointing to learn your overall stay failed to meet expectations due to villa assignment concerns.  The feedback on your visit has been shared with resort management and we thank you for your comments.  We hope to have the opportunity to host you again at Marriott Vacation Club.

Summary: First stay at this MVC property, booked through private company and called a week ahead to request view and renovated room. Pleased with room and view, however the service and organization of things needs attention. Front desk staff are on point and professional but others in the property are mostly teenagers who could care less about customers.   Paid for several activities for our two kids, very disappointing as no guidance given, no organization. Most disappointing was s'mores activity around fire pits-adults were sitting drinking around them and kids could not even get to roast marshmallows. Two teenagers sitting in the dark expecting people to see them to know where activity was, and people cutting in front of others with no interjection from Marriott staff.   Beware of
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of Marriott’s Newport Coast Villas! We are sorry to hear your overall visit to the resort did not exceed expectations. Your feedback regarding food and beverage, activities, and resort associates is appreciated and will be shared with the resort management team for improvements in guest experience. We look forward to finding you your perfect Marriott Vacation Club Resort in the future!

Summary: Stayed there three nights in late July. What a setting! Resort people were extra friendly and helpful. They went out of their way for us. The location is perfect. We did not have an ocean view but we were very satisfied with how close it was to the beach and restaurants. We will be back!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas! We are glad your three night visit to the resort was accommodated by great associates and a comfortable villa. We look forward to having you both again at Newport Coast Villas!

Summary: It was our first time the Newport, CA  area visiting from the East Coast. We have stayed at other MVCI properties and enjoyed each one. We were fortunate to stay in a 4th floor renovated unit in the 3600 building with gorgeous views of the ocean and pool. Perhaps by staying up high, we had the benefit of no insects. We ate on our patio every night and never noticed a fly, mosquito or anything.   The kids loved the pools and the s'mores fire pits. There is lots to to in the local area - Crystal Cove beach, Balboa Beach, and Laguna. Just wished we lived closer. We would be back more often!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, Karen! We are delighted your time at the resort was spent exploring the local beaches and relaxing in your newly renovated villa with a view. We look forward to having you for another beach getaway at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!

Summary Heading: VIEW OF THE GIANT BIRD OF PARADISE TREES - NO OCEAN IN SIGHT
Summary: We signed up for a  4 day/3 night stay in a 2 bedroom villa.  We were quoted an "ocean-view - if possible."  Well, I guess it wasn't possible because all we got was a view of giant bird of paradise trees - no ocean, no pool, only foliage.  But it was a nice, functional unit with no problems.   It was not one of the newly refurbished units, but it was fine.  Our daughter and her family stayed with us one day and night.  They all loved the pools and hot tubs.  I think they tried everyone of them!  The kitchen was in perfect working order and quite "friendly."  I shopped at the local Bristol Farms Market grocery store, and though very expensive, I put on an impressive dinner for 6 people, breakfast, and sandwiches for lunch.  Everything in the condo worked perfectly and we had no
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas! We are glad that you and your daughter's family had a wonderful time enjoying each other's company poolside and in your well-appointed villa. We look forward to having you for another relaxing beach vacation again at Newport Coast Villas!

Summary: We are staying here now, stayed here before, beautiful property . This time around called front desk multiple times as there is a very loud family upstairs . Security came around and said family upstairs apologized as they have 3 young kids. I just wish they recognized that they had 3 young kids at check in and don't put them on second floor. It ruins someone else's vacation!!! They are bouncing around until 11 pm like a circus and up at 7 am. Perhaps they need to train the front desk staff to make an effort to just put a family with young kids on the first floor. It doesn't even need to be discussed ..... Just an automatic...... Really unfortunate for us!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of Marriott’s Newport Coast Villas. We are sorry about the noise from the guests above your villa during your visit. Your feedback will be shared with the resort management team for future improvements in villa assignment. We look forward to truly exceeding your expectations next time at Marriott Vacation Club!

Summary: We arrived at Marriott Newport Coast Villas on June 28, 2015, stayed in a two bedroom suite, Full Kitchen, Multiple BBQ Grille's on site. Breathtaking views form our Balcony in the room. enjoyed the Pools, and Sauna's.  We rented our own car and had parking in front of our Villa.  The King size Bed in my suite was like heaven, luxury bathrooms including a hot tub in my room. We shopped at local supermarket Pavilion fresh everything, dined at Sol Cochina Mexican Restaurant for lunch food was delicious, many nice food place to eat.  1 hr drive to Hollywood, LA, and 30 min Drive to San Diego.  The staff was super nice, excellent customer service, wonderful stay,We had an awesome family vacation here and would defiantly do this again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, Naomi! We are pleased your villa with a view was comfortable and accommodating, and your family was able to travel around and see the sites during your visit to the West Coast. We hope to have you all poolside again soon at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!

Summary: We come to the Newport Coast Villas nearly every summer and it is fantastic. While it is across PCH from the beach, the property is beautiful and many rooms have a good to wonderful view of the ocean. If you are wanting seclusion and no kids, this is not the place for you. The pools, barbecues and fire-pits are family magnets and there are kids in plenty.   This is a great property and one of the nicest MVCI properties I have been to. Try to get a 3rd or 4th floor room as the views are much better.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas! We are delighted to know you and your family had a great vacation, spending time poolside and taking in the beautiful view from your well-appointed villa. We look forward to hosting you again during your next visit to Newport Beach!

Summary: Where to start?   The boil-down is this, if you are a person who enjoys luxury, has discerning tastes, and who cares about your health and well being move on immediately, this place is not for you.   Let's begin with issues I take with the staff here-  My mother made the reservation we stayed on, she is an elite member with the Marriott and her Marriott guest profile states in no uncertain terms that she will not accept a handicap accessible room- she likes a soak in a tub to unwind, it's important to her, and it's in her profile for a reason- it matters.  Lo and behold, she checks in and they've booked her into what?   A handicap accessible suite.  She informs them that this is unacceptable and that if anyone had bothered to look, it's clearly stated in her profile that she
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, Katherine. We are sorry to hear your overall visit to Marriott’s Newport Coast Villas with your family did not meet expectations. Your feedback regarding the front desk team, food and beverage, and pest control is appreciated and will be shared with the resort management team for improvement in guest satisfaction. Thank you again for your feedback and for visiting Newport Coast Villas.

Summary: The picture is misleading, this is not "on" the coast, and would be a long walk if you chose to walk it.  If you drive to the beach parking it is $15 per day.  This may have been a beauty in its day, but a fading one today.  It is noisy, very, very noisy.  We were on the ground level and between hearing every person that walked by, the maintenance people are making lots of noise by 9am.  No soundproofing in evidence.  Little other things, the shower had no soap holder, sounds minor and it is, but try just holding on to your soap all shower long.  It was irritating.  Also, no food on the premises other than a little market place (about as big as a walk in closet).  I want to vacation first class, I want a quiet room with a view (we had none), and beach access.  We were 0 - 3 on
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of Marriott’s Newport Coast Villas! We are sorry the noise level and villa did not meet your expectations. Your feedback is helpful and will be shared with the resort management team for future renovation ideas and improvements. We look forward to finding you your perfect Marriott Vacation Club Resort in the future!

Summary Heading: Another great stay at Newport Coast Villas
Summary: This was our second summer coming to this resort and it was every bit as terrific as last year. We were there during 4th of July week and the weather was sunny and warm (not hot) and dry and crisp. Perfect!  The villa was beautiful as the vacation club villas always are. There were activities for our 12 and 14 year old that they enjoyed. The basketball court as well as the new beach volleyball court and fire pit were all enjoyable. The resort is bigger than most but because our kids are a bit older, it worked for us as there was literally something for everybody. The only thing that was less than enjoyable was the long walk and climb up the stairs to the recreation area.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas! It is wonderful to hear your Fourth of July week visit to the resort was spent taking in the beautiful weather and finding fun activities for every member of the family to participate in. We hope to see you again soon at Newport Coast Villas!

Summary: I stayed here with my family of 5, we were staying in one of their 2 bedroom condos/suites. It was a family reunion. We were taking up 4 of these condo's all in a row. It was wonderful!!!  Pros:  - super close to the beach  - the rooms are sooooo big, with large flat screens in the living room and each of the bedrooms  - washer and dryer IN YOUR ROOM!!!! This was so amazing with having young children.   - These rooms were clean and super quiet. We never had any issues with neighbors (my loud and very fun family) or people upstairs.  - I never had a chance to visit the pool area, but my sister and brother and their families did. They loved it!   - the grounds are immaculately kept. There was a fun area right behind our condo area for the kids to play with a great view of the
Manager Response: We appreciate your five-star review, Gwen! It is great to know your well-appointed villa was spacious and exceeded your expectations and the adults were able to spend some time taking in the view and relaxing while the kids had a blast playing around the resort. We look forward to having you all again during your next visit to Newport Beach!

Summary: Let me start with the pros: Beautiful location-very close to the beach-shuttle service there and back-close to shopping Various fun activities for a family: Shuffle board, ping pong, video games, movies, pools, children activities, volleyball, basket ball, tennis, etc...  Fully equipped rooms, well appointed and clean (love the in- room washer and dryer) Kitchen had everything we needed to mix meals. All kitchen supplies were clean and in good working condition.   Cons: Rooms are noisy. We were on the second story and we heard EVERYTHING the people upstairs were doing- at all hours of the night, after the first night we were ready to go home! Did not get the type of room per our request-even if you request an ocean view count on even a peek a boo is considered a view... Other
Manager Response: Thank you for your TripAdvisor review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.  While we are happy your family enjoyed the location and the well appointed villa, please accept our apology for not exceeding your expectations.  Your feedback is appreciated and will be shared with the resort management team.  We thank you again for your review and for visiting us in Newport.

Summary: Make sure you carve out some time in your vaca to sit poolside, it has a beautiful view. Close to the beach, with a shuttle service to take you down to Crystal Cove... which I highly recommend. Save your money and dine in your room or splurge and go out for some fine newport coast dining... eating on the resort is... well.. blah.
Manager Response: We are pleased you enjoyed your visit, Amber!  Thank you for your review and for your feedback on your stay.  We hope you will return soon to Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!

Summary: I have been staying in this resort every summer for the last seven years, that would say it all.  I like every thing here, but location is the most.  Usually I plan my stay nine months before check in date due to high demand on this resort.  This year, many things have been modified especially the magnetic key card.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, Salah!  We are glad you enjoyed trip number seven and look forward to many more to come!

Summary Heading: Good property, made for nice vacation
Summary: Had heard for years about this vacation club property and finally were able to reserve a week.  Arrived early and were told our villa was not ready which is understandable.  Went shopping for groceries and had lunch and then went to check the building in which our villa was located.  We had requested and were told that we would have a villa that would be on the first floor and close to the main pool.  It definitely was on the first floor, looking directly at a wall with four flights of stairs to the pool.  We requested a change and received a villa in a much better proximity to the pool.  From there things got much better.  The staff definitely lived up to what we have come to expect from Marriott.  From Walter who maintained the pool, to Edgar in security, to CarolSue the
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas! We are glad your villa was comfortable and was located near the pool for easy and quick access to the water. Thanks for the shout out to Walter, Edgar, and Carol Sue! We look forward to having you for another great vacation again at Newport Coast Villas!

Summary: Very nice space within the condo. Nice fire pit, several pools, and lots of hotel activities. We came on a Wednesday and they were grilling free hot dogs and showing a free movie (Frozen) they had a volleyball court and tetherball by the fire pit, as well as several pools scattered around the grounds. However, the beds were not comfortable nor equal to Marriott standards. Resort was too spread out for me. We were there for three nights and by the end of our stay we still did not know our way around. The staff was friendly but slow to respond. With the number of pools that they have they need a lap pool with roped off lanes. Although I gave it three stars I would probably not stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of Marriott’s Newport Coast Villas, Brooke! We are pleased you enjoyed activities such as movie night and the recreational volleyball and tetherball areas. We are sorry to hear about your uncomfortable bedding and the response time from the front desk associates. Your feedback is appreciated and will be shared with the resort management team. We look forward to truly exceeding your expectations next time at Marriott Vacation Club!

Summary: Most people seem to love this Resort so maybe we are in the minority here but for us, I'm afraid,  this Resort  definitely wasn't all good. Lots of things were good- staff in particular.  Mireya had prepared the appartment beautifully and Housekeeping had put a board under the mattress as requested;Berit was  helpful in advising us in appartment request as we hadn't been here before.  Jeramie from maintanance, sorted our blocked sink and Art zoomed me round on his buggy when our parking pass blew away and waited whilst I got another! We arived after our flight was very delayed- at 1.30 am. Our sat nav directed us wrongly and we found the resort very hard to locate in the dead of night. We didn't see the Newport Coast Villas sign until we had passed it, as it was set well back.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of Marriott’s Newport Coast Villas! We are delighted to hear about the standout associates who helped make your stay comfortable. We apologize for the confusion during your information meeting and are sorry to hear the shuttle made the resort feel vast and impersonal. Your feedback is appreciated and will be shared with the resort management team. We look forward to making your next stay five-star worthy at Newport Coast Villas!

Summary: I just spent a week here with my kids and my sister and her kids. What a great place for us all to hang out! And sharing the cost of the villa was more affordable. We enjoyed the pools and especially the fire pit where we roasted smores more than once. The shuttle to crystal cove is nice to avoid parking and walking. It also goes to fashion island. We will always try to stay here before anywhere else. Rooms are spacious and comfortable. Although Parking can be difficult in the evenings.  When you stay here you really feel like it's special and luxurious.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas, Heidi! We are happy you and your family enjoyed spending time by the pools and the convenience of the shuttle was great when trying to avoid driving to close by locations. We look forward to having you again during your next visit to Newport Beach!

Summary: I didn't want to leave!  The villa was so nicely done, and so big.  My family of 4 was able to spread out and have some alone time.  Master bedroom has king bed, big TV, large tub, huge shower with 2 shower heads, 2 sinks, big closet.  Full kitchen with everything you need.  Huge dining table with large power strip for all the electronics.  Second bedroom has full/queen bed with a sofa (with pullout), big TV.  The bathroom is accessible from this bedroom or the main living area.  Living area has huge sofa with pullout.  Nice balcony.  Washer and Dryer in villa.  The pools are great.  Many areas with gas grills for cooking out.  They have shuttles that are very convenient!  Shuttle to Mall, beaches, etc.  The shuttle to Crystal Cove saves you $15 parking fee and drops you off
Manager Response: We appreciate your review, Sydney! We are pleased your villa had great amenities such as the kitchen area and large showers for cooking and relaxing in. We look forward to having you again soon at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!

Summary Heading: Great place to relax. Wonderful weather, carefully groomed grounds, very nice rooms
Summary: I am happy we selected this resort to vacation. We needed to use our annual points or lose them and this resort was available. The two bedroom villa was great as is ALWAYS the case whenever we stay at the Marriott Vacation Club Properties. The area around this resort is beautiful, and there seems to be alot of money in the area. Just drive around and look at all the 6 figure sports cars.
