The Grocery stores in the area are certainly upscale, which we like, but probably not for everyone. There are two or three nearby and each has its own flair. We generally like to cook our own meals, and the kitchen was complete and fully modern, and in great shape. This what we always expect from Marriott, and have not been disappointed. The Marketplace in the building with the front desk was
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas! We are delighted your Fourth of July stay was great, with the well-appointed kitchen in your villa perfect for cooking meals in and nice dining options available at the resort. We look forward to having you at another Marriott Vacation Club Resort again!

Summary: My family stayed here in a 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom, suite 2 weeks ago.  The facilities are beautiful and the resort still rates 5 stars, but just barely.  For instance,  we were shocked to discover that the mid-week cleaning that used to be included in the room price would now cost us an additional $83--- that's right, eighty-three dollars.   On the plus side, we called housekeeping and they quickly and cheerfully provided us with the sheets, towels, soap, etc but we had to do the work of changing the beds, cleaning the kitchen, etc.   Also the furniture in the living room and the balcony were in seriously frayed and faded condition....really ugly.  Service quality was spotty, but the special events were quite nice.  Prices in Newport Beach are among the world's most expensive and
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas, Ed! We are pleased you and your family enjoyed relaxing around the resort, taking in the beautiful views and live afternoon music. Your feedback regarding mid-week cleaning policy and he villa's decor is appreciated and will be shared with the resort management team. We look forward to having you again on your next visit to Newport Beach!

Summary Heading: A great place for a family holiday
Summary: Very nice place, though huge. We had the opportunity to try both "old style" villas and the renovated ones. As for me, I'd prefer definately the renovated ones, not only for the refurbishments themselves and a the "new feeling" we all like, but simply due to my taste. A good place for families with kids or those who seek a quiet place in a nice neighbourhood.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas! We are pleased you enjoyed your renovated villa during your time at the resort. We look forward to having you and your friends again during your next visit to Newport Beach!

Summary: We are Marriott owners and decided to try this location for a change of pace. We knew it was large- but seeing it in person was a shock! 75 acres! I admit we didn't spend a ton of time on property as we had a lot of adventures planned, but I will detail what we did experience.  Pros: We tried out the large central pool area, and really enjoyed it. Got great service from the bar- drinks at the pool and then took food back to our room. We had a top floor villa with a canyon view- would have preferred ocean but canyon was lovely. It was very peaceful and quiet- even on our final night (7/3) when it seemed partygoers has descended in full force on the entire resort. Check in staff was very helpful.  Cons: PARKING! They say if your party brings more than one car, additional vehicles
Manager Response: We appreciate your review, Samantha! We are glad your time at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas was peaceful, complete with the canyon view from your well-appointed villa. Your feedback regarding the sales presentation is helpful and will be passed along to the resort sales team. We look forward to having you again at Newport Coast Villas!

Summary: My family and I just spent seven nights at the Newport Coast Villas in Newport Beach.  We stayed in a two bedroom villa which offered plenty of room for my family of five. We had a breathtaking view of the ocean and golf course.  Marriott goes over the top with amenities such as shuttle service to local attractions including Fashion Island.  Disney is close and only 20 minutes away.  Take the carpool lanes all the way to Disney Way without leaving the carpool lane.  I highly recommend this location instead of Anaheim.  It's in Newport which was 75 degrees while Anaheim was 10-15 degrees warmer.  We didn't want to leave.......
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, Michael! It is great to hear the location of the resort was perfect for hitting Disneyland, and the shuttle was perfect for riding over Fashion Island. We look forward to having you again at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!

Summary: I've stayed here many times with children of all ages. To start with, parking here is a breeze year-round.  You can get to and from the resort if you want or need to go anywhere.  It's close to restaurants, upscale and mid-scale shopping, a huge outdoor mall, the beach, a Costco, a Trader Joe's running, hiking and the highways leading to L.A. or San Diego.    A close 2nd is that the rooms are enormous and family-friendly, good color scheme and clean.  The master bedroom is heavenly.  I personally liked the outdoor yoga under palm tress, and views of Catalina Island from various places around the property.  They've also had various sales of local clothing in the lobby which meant I didn't need to go to the mall to find something new.  The gym is a little small for my taste, but
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas! It is great to hear the location of the resort was perfect for checking out the local area or heading to other cities in California, and yoga under the palm trees was lovely. We hope to see you again soon on your next visit to Newport Beach!

Summary: This place is beautiful.  For whatever reasons, many of the people who work here seem disinterested and clearly tired of dealing with people.  While it is physically managed well, there is not a service orientation from the front desk or really any of the people who interact with guests. Many of the people who work here are clearly young folks who are not interested in service; perhaps they just need a day job?  With the exceptions of cleaning staff, very few of the staff people smile or even return a smile.  Few say hello unless you go considerably out of your way to do so.  I am at a point in life where service ends up mattering more than anything else.  I was quite disappointed.  By contrast, almost all other regular Marriott hotels and most of the Marriott Vacation Club
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of Marriott’s Newport Coast Villas! We are pleased the resort’s setting made for  a beautiful location. We are sorry to hear the associates did not meet Marriott expectations from past visits. We appreciate you sharing your concerns and we will pass them along to the resort management team. We look forward to truly exceeding your expectations next time at Newport Coast Villas!

Summary Heading: Beautiful property...but very poorly run and managed
Summary: This is a beautiful resort with a nice view of the Pacific Ocean, however this is not an Oceanfront property. The property is very nicely landscaped. They have a decent kids play room that my 7 year old enjoyed, and several decent pools. Those are about the only positive things I can say about the resort. The villa we are in has very dingy looking carpet, and we experienced numerous mechanical and plumbing problems while we stayed there. One of the showers didn't work, and the master shower bath was severely corroded at the joints. The door to the patio from the master bedroom wouldn't open. When the maintenance crew came by to fix it, they said the door was very old and heavy, and they spent nearly 2 hours trying to fix it, replacing the hinges in the process. In the end, they
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of Marriott’s Newport Coast Villas, Mickey. We are sorry for the inconveniences you ran into with the problems in your villa and apologize on behalf of the associate who accidentally gave you last month’s activities schedule. Your feedback is appreciated and will be shared with the resort management team. We look forward to truly exceeding your expectations next time at Marriott Vacation Club!

Summary: We have twin babies and trusted Marriott for our first family vacation. This is a time share property and we booked our trip with the hopes that we would want to join and stay twice a year to visit our family in Southern California, where we are originally from. First, the original representative from Marriott promised an ocean view when we booked this stay, this never happened, even after I complained upon check in. Second, the carpets in the unit were filthy! The bottom of our feet were always black in color from the filth. We actually would not let our babies crawl around on the floor because of this, this made our trip hard because we held our babies at all times. Third, the sub floors are made of wood, which means that you have to stay on the top floor in order to have a
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of Marriott’s Newport Coast Villas. We are sorry to hear the location and cleanliness of your villa, as well as the sales presentation did not meet your expectations for your first time at a Marriott Vacation Club Resort property. Your feedback will be shared with the resort management team. We look forward to making your next Marriott Vacation Club stay exceed your expectations!

Summary: I enjoyed my visit to the Marriott Newport Coast Villas. Our villa was expansive with 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, a large kitchen and living area. There was no balcony and we didn't have a view of anything memorable. It appeared that the villas were recently remodeled and they were in great condition.   We didn't use any of the resort amenities but there was a very nice pool, hot tubes and oversized outdoor chess game and ping pong.   The property is spread out. We had to walk up a steep set of stairs to get to the lobby or drive around. If you have limited mobility I would suggest asking for a room near the lobby.   The Marriott is close to a ton of attractions which is what we spent our time enjoying. I would definitely consider returning the next time I am in the Southern
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas, Kristi! We are pleased your spacious, newly renovated villa with a view made for a wonderful stay. We look forward to having you during your next trip to Newport Coast!

Summary: We have stayed at many Marriott Vacation Villas - but this location and the views of the Pacific Coastline right out our window was spectacular.  The entire grounds were beautifully landscalped - every employee we encountered were pleasant and helpful.  Lots of activities on site for families - beautiful pool and fire pit areas along with many BBQ areas.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas, Norma! We are happy to hear the location of your villa, along with the beautiful view of the Pacific Ocean, made for a wonderful California getaway. We look forward to having you again on your next trip to Newport Coast!

Summary Heading: Very Nice Resort but Will Probably Never Come Back
Summary: We had the opportunity to use a friend's week at the resort and we were really impressed with the property, the views and the staff who very very accommodating. The rooms are dated and even though others have commented that they have an adult pool, one could never be found. There is one pool that requires children to be under direct supervision of an adult, but this rarely occurred and there were screaming children everywhere so the rule was not enforced. Oh well. If this is the type if resort you are looking for, then check it out.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas! We are pleased the associates and resort grounds helped to exceed your expectations during your beach vacation. We look forward to having you poolside again soon at Newport Coast Villas!

Summary: Parent's extended their time share for me and my family. Two bedroom condo, two large bathrooms, full kitchen, and laundry. Sleeps 8. Close to all the tourist sites, Disneyland, and a short walk to the beach. Having a full kitchen sure helped us with meals, and not having it eat out every day. Very convenient. The staff was friendly and the condo was clean.
Manager Response: Thank you for your five-star review! We are happy to hear your spacious, well-appointed villa was great for meal time and the location of the resort was in close proximity of local attractions. We look forward to having you again at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!

Summary: The resort was amazing, clean, tidy, exceptionally helpful staff.  We were made to feel very special at the resort - all in all an amazing stay loved it from start to finish and would happily stay they forever and would recommend this to family & friends.
Manager Response: We appreciate your five-star review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas! We are delighted the resort's associates were accommodating and helpful in anyway they could be during your time in Newport Beach. We look forward to meeting your expectations for another beach getaway at Newport Coast Villas!

Summary: This is a fabulous property in a great location!  There is something for everybody - adult pools, kid's pools, play area, walking paths, golf course and ocean views.  There is beach shuttle that runs regularly.  It is a short drive into Laguna where you can walk the beach and the shops.  If you're adventurous, drive into Corona del Mar, park near Ocean Blvd and Fernleaf and make your way down to the small beach via the steps.  The Cal Tech Kerchoff Marine Lab is nearby as well.
Manager Response: Thank you for your five-star review, Patrick! We are happy Marriott's Newport Coast Villas had something fun to do for all ages and the location is perfect for day trips around California. We look forward to having you again during your next trip to Newport Beach!

Summary Heading: Great Location but not a cozy beach resort
Summary: Very nice two bedroom villa with a kitchen,  many steps to climb, our room did not have a view, a very big property where one could easily get lost. If you want a nice place to stay at a great coastal southern CA location near (but not on) the beach this is for you.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas, Alfred! We are pleased your well-appointed villa was comfortable during your stay. We look forward to having you again at Newport Coast Villas!

Summary: The Marriott Newport Coast Villas offer a great vacation opportunity for the whole family. There is a shuttle which runs to the beach, and other local attractions. There are dozens of crafts and activities for children, teens, and adults in the activities center. The pools are large, beautiful, and the perfect temperature. There is a gym and spa on the property. And, the Southern California weather can't be beat. There are also BBQ grills, a beach volleyball court, tennis courts, a putting green, a sand box, and a playground.
Manager Response: We appreciate your review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas! It is great the resort's activity center has fun activities available to participate in all day and the amenities such as the spa and pool areas are relaxing and beautiful. We look forward to having you and your family again at Newport Coast Villas!

Summary: We visited this resort earlier this month for a week long family vacation.  The staff is wonderful, friendly and willing to help.  There are numerous beaches within an easy drive and the hotel has a shuttle that is free to many locations.  There really are not any bad locations from a building and room perspective.  We were at the bottom of the resort in building 1700 and I would stay in the building again.  It was an easy walk to the main pool (there are three pools but we only used the primary pool) and is remote enough to feel like you have some privacy.  Each building has bbqs near them and makes grilling an easy way to end the day.  The resort is close to a Vons grocery store which makes it convenient for buying your groceries, beer, wine and liquor.  Overall, this is a
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, Brad! We are happy the fun activities and close by beach area made for an overall wonderful family trip to Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. We look forward to having you all poolside again soon in Newport Beach!

Summary: This Resort has the worst customer service, concierge team, restaurant staff, and management team of any Marriott that my family and I have every stayed at during our frequent travels. We are loyal to the Marriott franchise and frequently stay at their hotels and timeshares. This is the worst resort. The view is fairly decent, but the resort is not on the beach. In addition, there is a lot of traffic and road noise. I asked for a room near the main area as we were traveling with my parents and young son and we were placed at a building far away from all amenities - this made getting around difficult due to the many stairs and long distances to all amenities. Our room did had a good view, but the balcony was not a pleasant and relaxing place to be because of the loud road noise.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of Marriott’s Newport Coast Villas, Missy. We apologize for the poor customer service your received during your recent stay. We appreciate your feedback and will share your concerns with the resort management team for future improvements in training. We look forward to exceeding your expectations next time at Marriott Vacation Club!

Summary: This is one of the nicest Marriott vacation club we stayed at over the last 5 to 6 years. The room was in excellent condition and the staff and services were outstanding. I definitely plan on returning to enjoy more of the area in the future. There are plenty of views, activities, and amenities on property and in the surrounding area for a enjoyable experience for almost any family or couple
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas, Dave! We are delighted to hear the resort exceeded your expectations during your stay. We look forward to having you again in beautiful Newport Beach!

Summary: What a fantastic place.  From the faculty to the people.  The manager James Marks does a great job of training his staff to be world class.  From Bunnie at the concierge  to the 2 Jens at the front desk.  The resort has tremendous views and locations and pools etc
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas, Mike! We are delighted the associates were welcoming and the pools were a great place to take in the sun during your stay. Thanks for the shout out to James, Bunnie, and both Jen's at the front desk! We look forward to having you again for another sunny vacation in Newport Beach!

Summary Heading: Nice place -Small Changes could make it better
Summary: We stayed here for a long weekend in June with another couple. We shared the 2 bedroom unit. The unit was spacious enough for us to have our own privacy. The resort grounds were beautiful. We were able to jog/walk around the resort and get a great workout. Our unit was not one of the newest models. The furniture was a little outdated, but unit was equiped with washer dryer unit. Were given a unit in building 25 which was not an ocean view. Landscaping crew doing work around resort and was very noisy. Also we were awakened every morning by cleaning crew that congregated in front of front bedroom in unit. Views from registration building are breathtakingly beautiful. Located close to PCH and easy access malls, grocers, restaurants and beach area. Would stay again and hopefully get
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of Marriott's Newport  Coast Villas! We are happy to you enjoyed your well-appointed villa and the beautiful views during your time at the resort. We hope to see you again soon at Newport Coast Villas!

Summary: Beautiful Upscale Villa  Stayed in a 2/2 that was large and spacious.  Bathrooms are updated. Unit had large living / dining area. Washer / Dryer.  Full kitchen with DW and microwave.  Bedrooms are large with plenty of furnishings.   Nice and clean.  Large balcony with view of Ocean.   Lovely Resort.  Cost exceeds others this I would consider before booking.  If you decide on this resort you will not be disappointed.
Manager Response: We appreciate your review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas! It is wonderful to hear your well-appointed villa was made special by a great view. We look forward to having you again at Newport Coast Villas!

Summary: We stayed at the Marriott Newport Coast villas for a long weekends in June.  Generally the check-in process was quick and informative.  We had a two bedroom, two bath villa with a washer/dryer and full kitchen.  The rooms were clean, but the furniture and floors were in need to a good steam clean.  I came to find out later that they are in the process of remodeling the villas, but ours wasn't one of those.  The bathrooms were clean and large.  The shower in the master suite had dual-rain shower heads and a large soaking tub.  We had a nice balcony, but the view was of the villas in front of us (not so much the ocean view we thought we were getting when we booked).  We did ask to change villas but the staff said the resort was full and could not accommodate the request.    The
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas, Mandi! We are pleased your well-appointed villa was spacious and the kids enjoyed the activity center during your time at the resort. We look forward to finding you and your family your perfect Marriott Vacation Club Resort in the future!

Summary: Stayed here as part of a vacation ownership promotion. Very large resort, but never felt crowded. Sales activities were not noticeable during our stay and didn't interfere with the trip. There are separate pools spread throughout the resort, so no matter which building you are in you have easy access. Many children's activities including movie night on the lawn. Location is great, lots to do especially if you have a car. The only negatives were noise from the room above us, room somewhat dated, very traditional decor, and the beach was hard to access- it's actually a state park and it's across PCH. Parking at the beach is 15.00 but the hotel does have a shuttle service to the beach.
Manager Response: We appreciate your review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas! We are happy to hear you and your family partook in some resort activities and enjoyed lounging by the pool. We look forward to having you for another beautiful stay in Newport Beach!

Summary: We have stayed here a few times now. We love the large rooms and full kichens. We love having a washer dryer when you have kids at the beach. This is such a family friendly location (fire pits,  grilling areas, sport activities,  pools, shuttles to the beach etc). We will be back again soon!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas! We are happy you and your family had a great time relaxing by the water and partaking in activities. We hope to see you again soon at Newport Coast Villas!

Summary: I tend to appreciate the Marriott brand for its attention to detail and customer service. But this property was a let down.    When we got there after a 17 hour flight and a 1 hour drive from LAX, I expected the villa to be ready, but this was not the case. I had even requested for the room to be ready but it still was not. I understand this, as it is out of their hands and they made every effort to get the villa ready without any other delays.  The front desk staff were good, but they failed to inform me the location of the marketplace and the cafe. As it was cold and drizzling, and they should have mentioned that the cafe was outside. The marketplace was inside and hand plenty of chairs to sit.  Regardless we had a quick bite and were on our way to the villa.   The villa had
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of Marriott’s Newport Coast Villas, Gihan. We are sorry to hear that you had some technical issues with your villa’s amenities during your time at the resort. Your feedback is appreciated and will be shared with the maintenance team for future appliance updates. We look forward to exceeding your expectations next time at Newport Coast Villas!

Summary: This is a very nice Marriott Property.  We were lucky to get a villa with a decent view.  We did not realize  how far the beach was from the resort.  And we did not realize how spread out the resort was.  There is really no decent place to eat on the property itself.  La Vista is ok for lunch, but has a limited menu, and the little shop in the lobby can't seem to get a flow going during breakfast.  The parking situation - the garage for the 2nd car is way on the other side of the resort- makes for a less relaxing vacation.  The rooms themselves are really very nice and quiet (unless you're near the basketball court).  If we're out this way again , we would definitely stay here.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas, Mary! We are happy to hear your well-appointed villa was the perfect spot to relax during your West Coast getaway. We look forward to having you again at Newport Coast Villas!

Summary: The resort is one of my favorite hotel resort in Newport,the place has a lot to offer to all ages.The view is spectacular,only 45 minutes to the airport,the staff are very nice with excellent service as expected for a high end hotel for family.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas! We are delighted the resort is your go-to stay when it comes to family fun for all ages. We look forward to having you again in Newport Beach!

Summary: This resort was beautiful, the activities were endless, and the fitness and pool areas were our favorite areas to visit. The shuttle to Crystal Cove Beach was great. Nice hike to the beach if you’re looking for exercise. Staff members we encountered were nice and helpful. The front desk staff were the only exceptions to that statement. Nice yes, helpful, not so much. Being in our late 20s with no children, this was not the best place for a quiet get away. Much more family oriented than we imagined. Thank you for the "adult only" pool. Overall, nice facility, rooms were up-to-date and clean.
Manager Response: We appreciate your review, Rebecca! We are happy to hear your enjoyed the fun activities and the adult pool area during your time at the resort. We hope to have you for another beautiful walk along the beach soon at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!

Summary: We decided to take a short getaway and one reasonably close so we wouldn't have to use much travel time to get to it.  This was perfect!  The grounds are beautiful, the views magnificent and our villa was spacious and clean.  We had a two bedroom, two bath and had our older children join us along with our younger ones who had come with us. It was a really nice family reunion since we don't get to see the older kids with their busy lives.  We just relaxed, went to the local Trader Joe's and store to get food to barbecue and some wine and enjoyed being together.  They all enjoyed the pools and jacuzzis!  Lots of activities are available to the whole family, some free, some cost extra.  There's a movie theater on the premises as well!  And the property is close to lots of
Manager Response: Thank you for your five-star review, Lisa! We are happy the resort was a great spot to get your family together for a relaxing beach getaway. We hope to see you all catching some sun by the pool soon at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!

Summary: Came in mid-May prior to most kids getting out of school.  We were here for 2 days without the kids and then 4 with the kids.  Property is scenic and spread over 70+/- acres on the hill overlooking Crystal Cove State Park/Beach and the Pacific Ocean.  Spectacular views from some spots on the property...unfortunately, our room wasn't one of them! :( Tried to sleep with the windows open, but we were right across the street from what must have been the maintenance building as large machines were firing up throughout the night.  The staff was extremely helpful and accommodating throughout our stay.  Poolside restaurant serves okay poolside fare, but it is pricey.    Additionally, BE WARNED, the property is accessible through 3 different locations off of Newport Coast Drive.  None of
Manager Response: We appreciate your review of Marriott’s Newport Coast Villas, Thomas! It is wonderful to hear you and your family enjoyed partaking in some fun outside activities during your time at the resort. We are sorry to hear about your tailgate and appreciate the feedback you provided. We look forward to making your next trip to Newport Coast Villas your best one yet!

Summary Heading: Another great trip to Newport Beach
Summary: We recently returned from our third trip to Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. Once again we had a great experience. The room and amenities were all in great shape and we saw many improvements from our last visit in 2011. Among the changes we noticed included larger TVs (probably 55-60")in the living room and master bedroom, new lobby, new activity center in the main building, new movie theatre, streaming movies to your room (three different movies each day) and more benches and chairs throughout the property for sitting and relaxing.  The room was a large two bedroom villa with a master bath, living room and full kitchen.  We participated in several activities in the activity center including Build a Buddy for $16, caricatures for $7 and ice cream sundaes for $4. We felt the
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas! We are happy to hear you and your family enjoyed participating in a few fun activities during your stay. We hope to see you for a nice dip in the salt water pool soon at Newport Coast Villas!

Summary Heading: Best family time share value in Newport Beach area
Summary: As owners of Marriotts Newport Coast Villas since 2000, we continue to marvel at our luck to sign up for a two bedroom two bath time share during the opening of this resort which has since expanded 50% with more family activities and amenities.  The grounds include a basketball court, tennis courts, 4 pools, volley ball, many barbecue pits and outdoor tables for dining, small indoor theater, play areas for young kids and young adults alike, spa and health facilities, snack bar and pool grill restaurant.  Activities include outdoor movies at night, daily specials at the swimming pool bar and grill with music entertainment, special fitness programs.  I can go on and on but, the atmosphere is like being on a cruise ship on land with daily activities.  The resort is safe for young
Manager Response: We appreciate your five-star review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas! It is wonderful to hear you enjoy the amenities that have been expanded on to the resort since your first visit. We look forward to having you for your annual Newport Beach trip next year!

Summary: We decided to stay here for one night to try the place. It is really a good vacation spot. Very family oriented resort. The only downside is the parking lot. During peak season, guest are only allowed to park 3 cars per villa. 1 car parked outside your villa then 2 car permit for your guest in their parking structure.I wasn't aware of this and unfortunately that time we had 5 cars. They will advice you to park in Newport Sand dunes which is 10-15 minutes away from the site. There is a fee of 18 dollars per car overnight. I wish they more parking spaces to avoid the hassle and worry for their guest. But other than that the facility is excellent! I highly recommend this place!
Manager Response: We appreciate your five-star review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas! It is wonderful to hear the resort could be a perfect destination spot for family-fun. Your feedback regarding the parking is appreciated and will be shared with the resort management team. We look forward to having you again at Newport Coast Villas!

Summary: Marriott quality is very apparent here.  We are Marriott Vacation Club owners, and were coaxed by a very special rate for our 3-night stay.  We should have asked for a second floor unit to take better advantage of the ocean view, but were able to enjoy a glimpse of the Pacific from the balcony of our ground floor unit in building 2100.  No noise problem from unit above, and surprisingly no street noise.  The kiddie playground outside our door wasn't even and issue! My husband enjoyed the massive tub in our master bedroom, and the bed was very comfortable. We have put this on our list of places to re-visit in the near future.  We understand the property is refurbishing the rooms, using an airy decor.  That will be a great improvement from the overly-formal look in our room, and
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, LInda! We are glad you and your husband enjoyed a nice relaxing getaway with beautiful views and quiet peace. We look forward to seeing you again at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!

Summary: Loved the resort, up above the coast in Newport Beach.  Plenty of space in the rooms.  The main pool actually had three pools, so it did not feel cramped, and there was a separate pool as well.  Few rooms have ocean views so be prepared for what you get.  The only downside was the restaurant.  We've been to a number of Marriott Vacation Clubs and this was not the best for onsite food.  Really a snack bar at the pool, don't expect anything better than a hot dog type meal.  Really best if you need lunch at the pool.  We had the taco tuesday, supposed to be like food truck tacos.  It was bad.  you get what you pay for, but it was just not worth it.  So use it like a pool side snack bar, and save eating for your suite's kitchen, or going out to a restaurant.  Plenty of activities in
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas! It is great to hear there was no shortage of prime poolside real estate during your time at the resort. We hope to see you during another fun activity soon at Newport Coast Villas!

Summary Heading: One of the best Marriott time share resorts
Summary: Highly recommended. Ask for an ocean view...the 4500 block is quite excellent. If you can get this resort with Marriott Vacation Club points, grab it.  This resort is beautifully situated on a hillside overlooking the Pacific Ocean. Nice variety of age groups use this facility.
Manager Response: We appreciate your five-star review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas! We are pleased you were able to take in the beautiful views of the Pacific Ocean during your resort getaway.  We hope to see you again soon in Newport Beach!

Summary Heading: Beautiful setting, great location, fantastic rooms...but
Summary: We are Marriott Vacation Club owners at a different resort.  As all other MVC resorts, the rooms are immaculately clean, laid out perfectly, have wonderful amenities such as pools and fitness rooms, in suite full kitchens with stove/oven, dishwashers, full refrigerator and washer/dryer.  All the rooms at Newport Coast Villas are two bedrooms and two full baths.  Perfect for our family. The complex is huge, but all villa balconies face the ocean with spectacular views.    Convenient location to the beaches, Laguna Beach, Corona del Mar, 30 minutes at most to Disneyland.  The only negative we had is that you can hear people's footsteps on the floor above.  So much so that I had to complain, which still didn't alleviate the problem.  It sounds like a herd of elephants or a track
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas! We are so pleased to hear you enjoyed your spacious villa with a view during your stay. We hope to see you again soon for a beautiful stay in Newport Coast!

Summary: This was our second visit to this property.  We loved it the first time and if possible we loved it more the second.  The ocean view was unreal.  We have been to probably 20 or more of the Marriott properties and this ranks number 2 after only Marbella in Spain. Staff was extremely pleasant and helpful.  No problems.  Lots of things to do in the area and the beautiful beach is within walking distance.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas, Janet! We are so happy your second visit to the resort was just as amazing as your first time around. We look forward to having you for another wonderful stay at Newport Coast Villas!

Summary: This place is a wonderful family vacation club.  Close to beach, Disney, fashion island, restaurants, shopping centers, etc If no plans to go out, chilling by the pool is more than enough. Kids games and arcade is excellent.  The Resturant by the pool is very good  If in CA again, sure will spend some time here..
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas, Osama! We are pleased the resort was convenient local attractions. We hope to see you poolside again soon!

Summary: This is a very beautiful property, one of Marriott''s best. The rooms are spacious and comfortable with full kitchens, nice dining room and very comfy living room. We have a view of the ocean from our second floor villa. The resort is close to Corona del Mar and Newport Beach which have fabulous restaurant's and shopping. We love the amenities like the free WiFi and the shuttles. We will come back next year.
Manager Response: We appreciate your review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas, Alex! It is great to hear your villa with a view was spacious and well-appointed. We look forward to having you again next year at Newport Coast Villas!

Summary Heading: Great place at an awesome location
Summary: Our family has been coming back to this place for the last 3 years; perhaps because they keep asking us to return as long as we listen to their sales presentation. That set aside, this is a really nice property, the villas are huge and well equipped; two bedrooms with two bath and a nice kitchen, comfortable enough for up to 6 people.  The property has several pools, sand volleyball, b-ball, fire pits, etc. and in all of them kids are welcome. I would say that the whole place is very family friendly.  There are plenty of nearby activities such as Surfing, paddle boarding, or just an awesome beach. Best of all, the place has shuttle to take you there.  Overall good vacation place.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, Pedro! We are so delighted to hear you and your family took advantage of the fun activities offered at the resort. We look forward to having you again next year at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!

Summary Heading: Good for families. Very clean and well run.Typical Marriott experience.
Summary: This property is very well located which more than makes up for its chain hotel vibe and lack of ambiance. We went on a promo for Marriott's time share program so received a good rate. At the stated rack rate of ±$750 for a 2 br suite there may be better values in the area. Crystal Cove State Beach is easy walk across street and very beautiful, OK surf when we were there. Like all Pacific swimming, water is cold and real waves so you need to be a capable swimmer and have wetsuit / fins esp if it's cold.  Limited food options at hotel (we did not eat there) but suites have full kitchens adequately equipped and there is a Trader Joes 1 mile down road.  Some rooms have much better views than others or have been recently redone, our view was poor.  Overall a more than acceptable
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas! We are glad you enjoyed the location of the resort to the Pacific Ocean. We hope to see you again on your next trip to California!

Summary: MVC members be sure to ask for ocean view and near main pools when making reservations.  Great property with great service and views.  Good list of on site activities for the kids.  Incredibly great sleeper sofa beds - very soft and easy to setup.   We had six of us in one villa and easily could have had eight.  We will back!!!
Manager Response: We appreciate your five-star review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas! It is great to hear your large party felt comfortable in your well-appointed villa during your stay. We look forward to having you for another beautiful West Coast sunset in Newport Beach!

Summary Heading: Outside property much grander than inside
Summary: Marriott does a consistent job, service is always great. The villas here are smaller than many Marriott villa properties. One pation and small. We have lifetime executive status; we were asked what our preferences would be for a unit. We asked for a certain block of buildings and a high floor. We received neither of those things. Why in the world would they ask? To make us think they allowed that kind of service. Everytimr we visit a Marriott villa property, we are again asked to attend a presentation that will answer all our queations and teach us how to better use our ownership weeks and the Destination Club. We said no this time because the only thing we ever get at those meetings is a sales pitch. Please, be the sophisticated property you pretend to be. All pools located in
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas! We are pleased to hear you enjoyed the location and pool amenities during your stay in Newport Beach. We look forward to finding you your perfect Marriott Vacation Club resort in the future!

Summary: I was here with my family over the Mothers Day weekend and I have to say that this place is truly amazing.  Rooms: 5 of 5 STARS. Clean, Roomy, comfortable, and the views were superb!  Amenities : The gym was very well stocked, and the pools were gorgeous. The poolside bar had some delicious bites and tasty drinks and the ambiance of the place was lovely.   TIP: Use the provided outdoor grills to cook up something nice and youll enjoy the place a lot more than you think you could ever.   THIS PLACE IS AMAZING!!
Manager Response: We appreciate your five-star review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas! It is wonderful to hear you enjoyed the resort's amenities, and your well-appointed villa made for a comfortable and relaxing stay. We hope to see you again soon at Newport Coast Villas!

Summary: This property sits along the PCH overlooking the Pacific.  Surrounded by rolling hills, with homes with red clay roofs, you fell like you could be back in Italy!  The Newport Coast Villa complex has grown over the past 10 years.  Busy pool, check in on Friday takes time and patience.  Once you are in, get to the poolside bar, grab a drink and enjoy the music.  Quiet at night, views are great and lots to do up and down the Coast Highway.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas, Steve! We are so pleased you find the grounds beautiful and had time to enjoy a cocktail and  the music during your stay. We look forward to having you again at Newport Coast Villas!

Summary: So let me start with the good...the property grounds are amazing. The views (if you have an ocean view) are amazing. I have had one suite that was really updated and modern - but the view was to the road. This last time we stayed I had a less modern but still nicely equipped suite with an amazing view of the pacific - which is really what you are after if you stay there right?  And now on to the bad....1st time we stayed there, we were given a room that faced a very busy road. Not a big deal but it was loud, not as loud as the jackhammering that was taking place on the cement outside of the building though. We were only there for 1 night so we didn't bother to complain but for the cost it felt a bit wrong to put people in the one building with all of this going on.  This past
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas! We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed the grounds of the resort. We apologize for the confusion with the charge put on your credit card. We would be happy to speak with you about your time at the resort. You may contact our customer care at Customer.Care@vacationclub.com or 800-860-9384. We look forward to hearing from you.

Summary: We had a great time at the Marriott Newport Coast Villas on Memorial Day weekend.  Though the weather wasn't great, we still used the pool once and drove to Crystal Cove for a walk.  They do have shuttles there also.  Lots of activities or if you use the remote pools, it's much more relaxing.  Fun for all!
Manager Response: We appreciate your review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas! It is great to hear you enjoyed your Memorial Day weekend with us at the resort. We look forward to having you again during your next stay in Newport Beach!

Summary: We stay at Newport Coast Villas every couple of years.  It's such a great facility in a wonderful area with easy access to Newport Beach, Laguna Beach and other SoCal beach towns.  The villas are well maintained, extremely comfortable, and well appointed.  The facilities include three pools, two fitness centers and lots of activities.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas! We are happy you enjoyed your well-appointed villa and amenities offered at the resort. We look forward to seeing you poolside at Newport Coast Villas soon!

Summary: I would highly recommend this hotel.  We stayed in the 2 bedroom villa, which really sleeps 6.  It's spacious, with a full kitchen and 2 bathrooms.  I love the location, very centrally located to Laguna Beach, Fashion Island and Balboa Island.  Get up in the morning, and take a great walk to the beach, from your front door.  Pelican Hills is across the road, and has great dining options.  Enjoy !
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, Susan! We are delighted you enjoyed your spacious villa and the location of the resort to surrounding cities. We look forward to having you again soon in Newport Beach!

Summary Heading: Premier Location at an Affordable Yet Exceptional Resort
Summary: You won't regret any number of days spent on this idyllic spot. Whether you like walking along or near the beach or hiking in the foothills of southern California, this is the place to stay. It's one Marriott's top locations in their field of vacation villas. The views and villas will not disappoint.  We'll be back this coming September.
Manager Response: Thank you for your five-star review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas! We are happy to hear that you enjoyed the beauty of Newport Beach while during your stay at the resort. We hope to see you taking in the beautiful view soon at Newport Coast Villas!

Summary: Great views! You get to eat breakfast and see the waves coming in! Tons of pools for everyone to enjoy. This is a great family friendly resort plus the Romaric gateway! Rooms big and inviting. Felt just at home. Will be back!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas! We are happy to hear you felt at home during your stay at the resort. We hope to see you poolside at Newport Coast Villas soon!

Summary: This is a very lovely property however r I found the rooms too be a little small.  Bathroom boxy! And tight!  This was a large banquet event with round tables of 8!  Dinner was served to 5 of our table and it took another 40 minutes to serve the last 3 raw steaks!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed the resort's grounds during your stay. We hope to see you again soon in Newport Beach!

Summary: This resort is amazing, the villas are spacious and the views are unbelievable. Has three pools so if you want quiet away from the kids pool you can find a quiet place to swim. Has a resort game room and a theatre room. All villas have fully stocked kitchens, all you have to do is grocery shop. There are outdoor BBQ's and an outdoor eating area. Golf course right next to the resort. Enjoy, we did!
Manager Response: We appreciate your review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas! We are pleased to hear you were able to enjoy the amenities offered at the resort during your stay. We hope you have some time to take in the unbelievable view from Newport Coast Villas again soon!

Summary: This resort was breathtaking. We stayed in a two bedroom two full bath condo with a full kitchen and living room. The location looked over the Pacific. There were six pools with plenty of recreation as well.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, Chantal! We are delighted you enjoyed your villa with a view during your stay at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. We look forward to having you again on your next trip to Newport Beach!

Summary Heading: Relaxed luxury, spacious suites. Easy access to surrounding areas.
Summary: We visited on a promotion and were disappointed that our villa faced the main road vs. having any kind of interesting view. One would think that they would cater to people they wish to sell to. None the less, it was quiet (except for the traffic noise). The villas were pretty occupied yet it never felt crowded. There are a lot of buildings and a lot of walking to go through the complex. We were surprised that there were not more pools and hot tubs available. Close to Laguna and Huntington Beaches. I wish there would have been more information provided about local things to do. The shuttle to the local beach ended too early to use it for enjoying the sunset there and parking was not cheap.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas! We are happy you enjoyed your well-appointed villa and location of the resort to surrounding areas. We look forward to seeing you again at Newport Coast Villas!

Summary: We stayed at the beginning of November 2014 for four days.  It was off season as far as pricing and by the time we split the villa with another couple, where can you find a hotel room for $150 a night per couple.  We tried for an early check in since we had to be at the wedding rehearsal/dinner at 4:00pm and check in is 3:00pm.  The gentleman that helped us was EXCELLENT.  I drove him nuts for an hour and he came through.  Not only was the villa available early but it was gorgeous.  We had views of the Pacific Ocean.  The villas are very spacious and the kitchen was fully equipped.  My only slightly negative comment would be that instead of a stackable washer and dryer a full size set would have been wonderful.  But I was pleased just to have the access in our unit to these
Manager Response: We appreciate your review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas, Anne! We are happy you enjoyed your time at the resort for your daughter's wedding. We look forward to having you all again at Newport Coast Villas!

Summary Heading: Great stay, beautiful view, beautiful facility, beautiful suites
Summary: I love this facility. the suites are beautiful, well designed and have perfect views. You must have a car to drive to the neighbouring villages for dining and sightseeing. Spending the whole week inside this facility would be too much for me. One of the best facilities in the south California region. Will go there every year.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of Marriott’s Newport Coast Villas! We are happy to hear that you enjoyed the view from your well-appointed villa. We look forward to making your annual stay at Newport Coast Villas special!

Summary Heading: Enjoyed our stay but felt that the main pool area was getting a bit tired.
Summary: Generally very good location for a vacation.  We thought the main pool area was a bit tired and overly busy even though just the end of May.  We used the Canyon pool which was a bit less crowded / noisy. We didn't have a car so used the resort shuttle to get around - this worked well and thanks to the drivers for going above and beyond to make our life easier. For us, not having a restaurant or bar in the main building was a let down.  It would be good to have somewhere to go in the resort in the evening after a day at the beach without having to travel.  We have such facilities in our home resort in Marbella (Spain) and it makes for a better vacation experience. The market place on sight was also less than we have come to expect from Marriott. The apartments themselves were
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of Marriott’s Newport Coast Villas, Alan! We appreciate you feedback of the resort amenities and will pass them along to the resort management team. We look forward to seeing you again at Newport Coast Villas!

Summary: The suites are well appointed and very comfy.. All the comforts of home while being on vacation, plus free parking. The shuttle bus is available, but limited service, limited hours, and limited routes. Great to use as "home base" for sightseeing.... Close to the Reagan and Nixon presidential libraries, the Getty Villa and Getty museum, to name a few points of interest. Easy to get to from either John Wayne or LAX. Just be prepared for traffic.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of Marriott’s Newport Coast Villas, Alan! We appreciate you feedback of the resort amenities and will pass them along to the resort management team. We look forward to seeing you again at Newport Coast Villas!

Summary: We are Marriott timeshare owners, but we truly love the Newport Coast Villas.  All the rooms are 2 bedroom, 2 bath, complete with a kitchen.  The villas are very comfortable for 2 couples--or a family.  There are many activities on the grounds, plus there are tons of things to do in the area.  I only wish this destination was not a 6+ hour drive for us!
Manager Response: We appreciate your five-star review of Marriott’s Newport Coast Villas! We are happy to hear that your villa gave you a homey feel and the resort was in close proximity of your sight-seeing landmarks. We look forward to making your future trips to Newport Coast a relaxing getaway!

Summary: Second time staying at this property.  Love all of it.  Service is great, location is great, property itself is awesome.  Stellar views. Would love to stay here again...hopefully soon.  Great spot for families looking for a place to get away to.
Manager Response: Thank you for your five-star review of Marriott’s Newport Coast Villas! We are delighted that you two had a great time enjoying the on-site activities. We look forward to seeing you during your next vacation at Newport Coast!

Summary Heading: Close to Perfection But A Few Faults
Summary: I could really praise this resort and as a owner I'm very proud of my ownership but I have to point out one concern.  I had requested a bath robe during my week long stay and I can understand that they aren't available but the front desk person told me she would call me back but never did and that's unacceptable.  A small issue but they lost a star for it on my rating.
Manager Response: We appreciate your review of Marriott’s Newport Coast Villas, Jennifer! We are happy to hear that your second time at the resort was just as great as your first! We will be ready to book your next getaway at Newport Coast!

Summary: We have just returned from another excellent stay at the Marriott Newport Coast Villas!  We are owners there and this was our 9th visit.  The villa was perfectly located and the view outstanding.  The stay was made even better with the help of Andrew at the front desk.  He helped us add another day at a great rate!!  The staff is always helpful and friendly.  I think some folks are expecting this to be a hotel with hotel like amenities (i.e. multiple restaurants) and they are sometimes disappointed. They need to understand that this is a vacation ownership property and not a hotel.  We love it!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas, Gail! We are delighted that you enjoyed your ninth stay at the resort. Thanks for the shout out to Andrew! We look forward to having you again soon at Newport Coast Villas!

Summary: I had some business meetings in Newport Beach and was able to book a villa for the weekend.  It was conveniently located as it took only 10-15 minutes to get to my meetings but also in a quiet setting with great views of the Pacific.  The villas are nicely appointed as are most Marriott properties.  Everything from the pools to the fitness facility was first class.  There are great restaurants and shopping within a 10 minute drive.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, Gail! We think it is wonderful that your stay at Marriott’s Newport Coast Villas never disappoints. Thank you for the shout out to Andrew. We are happy you love your resort and look forward to seeing you for your tenth stay at Newport Coast Villas!

Summary: We spent 6 nights here in early May.  Absolutely no complaints.  We asked for ocean view but understood that those are reserved for owners.  If we were owners we would expect that consideration.  We did have a room that looked out on the canyon but the side view from our balcony was a lovely one of the ocean and golf course.  Our concierge, Nancy, who had emailed us in advance to offer assistance, was perfect.  She did her job of talking about the timeshare presentation with no pressure.   We look to forward to returning.
Manager Response: We appreciate your review of Marriott’s Newport Coast Villas. It is great to hear that even though you traveled for business, you were still able to unwind with a view of the ocean. We hope to see you again for pleasure in Newport Coast!

Summary: This hotel has Beautiful views,we were fortunate to get a room with a view of the ocean, there's  alot of activities you can enjoy that are free, but check in took longer than expected, we pre checked in at 11 and we didn't get a room till 4 but overall a pleasant stay
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of Marriott’s Newport Coast Villas! We are delighted that your six nights at the resort were full of West Coast bliss. We look forward to seeing you again soon in Newport Coast!

Summary: We arrived at the Marriott early and our rooms weren't ready but we were assured that they would be ready in a 2 hour window. (we had 3 suites) That was not the case but they were ready 2 hours before the 4 o'clock check in. That was our only complaint because my father in law expressed clearly that at least 1 needed to be ready before our arrival because we had 4 children 3 and under. The rooms are large and clean with 2 balconies. The master has a spa tub and two sinks exposed to the room, not my favorite but it was fine. The shower and toilet were separated and the shower had two shower heads. Something was also wrong with the temp. in the room it would be freezing in the living room and 2nd bedroom but hot in the master.  The other bedroom had only one bed but seemed larger
Manager Response: We appreciate your review of Marriott’s Newport Coast Villas, Nadia! We are happy you and your friends had a great getaway for the Bachelorette Party. We hope to see you girls again soon in Newport Coast!

Summary: Our party of six spent three nights mid-week at this resort.  The two bedroom unit itself was spacious and clean.  Well furnished with a functional kitchen and very nice, clear flat screen TV's.  We were in the 3300 building, fourth floor which is right across from the registration building.  The fourth floor was actually the second floor, since they count two floors as parking.  Even though the room was nice, it could not make up for the constant noise outside our balcony.  The first morning a service crew was working on the air conditioning system while playing their music directly below our unit at 8:00 am.  The second morning the landscapers were in the small plaza across the street mowing and blowing for most of the morning.  They saved the most noise for our last morning.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of Marriott’s Newport Coast Villas. We are sorry to hear about your issues with maintenance noise during your stay at the resort. We will pass on your feedback to the maintenance team for future department improvements. We hope to find you and your family your perfect Marriott Vacation Club resort in the future!

Summary: Surprised by pre-check in survey and follow up. Having never been here before,with an active family we wanted a room near the pool which they honored. Our room was nicely furnished and clean- no water view, but we were happy anyway. Not sure why they put out pre-check in surveys, because guests are disappointed when they do not get their requests. We  said we would be arriving at noon, due to flights, but still did not get an available room until after 4:oopm. Children's activities get a so-so rating. One day the staff on the Sandbox just talked among themselves in the kitchen and hardly interacted with the kids.- next two days were much better. Also, please use WASHABLE paint when having crafts with young children. Kids shirts were ruined with paint activity. Could have used
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback of your stay at Marriott’s Newport Coast Villas. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your well-appointed villa. We will pass along your check-in experience with check-in to the resort management staff for future improvements. We hope to see you again soon in Newport Coast!

Summary Heading: It Didn't Have To Be So Dissapointing!
Summary: As a long time Marriott Rewards member, and a repeat guest at Marriott Vacation Clubs (Maui, Arizona, So Cal), I am truly saddened to write this review but feel that MVC staff dropped the ball. We stayed for three nights over the very busy Easter weekend.  From the minute we checked in, I knew something was amiss.  Our front desk rep was overly perky, and talked really fast about our wonderful room on the 4th floor (that’s only because the first floor is the underground garage). While our newly renovated room was very nice, nothing else was.     I have never before cried with disappoint over a hotel choice, until my stay at Newport Coast Villas.  This property has so much to offer for most guests.  We just weren’t those guests.  Our unit was recently refurbished, and the unit
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.  We are sorry to hear the view from your villa did not meet your expectations.  Your feedback on the pre-arrival process is appreciated and will be shared with the resort management team.  We hope to see you again at  a Marriott Vacation Club Resort so we may truly exceed your expectations.

Summary Heading: Decent for family; not so great for business.
Summary: Marriott's Newport Coast Villas, as I was advised at the front desk, is not a hotel, but a vacation rental location.    There are no restaurants besides the pool bar on a very vast premise; if you don't want to eat in the rooms (which do have well-appointed kitchens) or on the available bbq's, for anything more than simple food you'll have to jump in your car and head over to Newport Beach's vast selection of restaurants.    The rooms are appointed Marriott style (nothing special) and are very spacious and the price/size ratio is excellent, at least in May (off-season?).  I had forgotten toothpaste - at most hotels a simple request would have had a teeth cleaning kit show up - here, it was necessary to purchase one from the "Marketplace" - which of course was out of stock, thus
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, Kieth.  We apologize for the problems you encountered during your visit and appreciate you bringing them to our attention.  Marriott's Newport Coast Villas is a timeshare resort and offers a unique experience for owners and guests.  While the resort is geared towards family travel, business travelers tend to like the free parking, no resort fee and free internet service.  Thank you again for your review and we hope to host you again so we may truly exceed your expectations.

Summary: noisy  awful view parking stinks way over priced not impressed at all . Stayed at Villa vacation club by Marriott in October 2014 myrtle beach it was perfect this one is a HUGE let down will probably leave and rather go to Hilton property
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, Dorothy.  We are sorry to hear you did not like the view you received.  Your feedback is appreciated and will be shared with the resort's management team.

Summary: We rented a 2 bdrm. villa from a timeshare owner at the Newport Coast Villas. Our villa was on the 2nd floor overlooking the golf course and ocean.  The view from our balcony was just beautiful! The villa was clean with a well appointed kitchen.  The master bedroom had a king bed/master bath with the same view as the balcony and the 2nd bedroom was a queen with attached bathroom.  The unit has a washer and dryer which is always a plus. The resort has several well maintained pools, hot tubs, tennis courts, exercise room, beautiful outdoor BBQ  with tables and chairs overlooking the ocean.  We barbecued a few nights and ate on the beautiful balcony.  It was just lovely.  We didn't use the other facilities that it offered as we were always going out to explore the area.  Although
Manager Response: Thank you for your five-star review!  We are delighted you enjoyed your visit and look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: Greatly enjoyed our 1 wwek stay.  Tremendous view of ocean. Would definitely visit here again. I rated 4 out of 5 stars because: 1. Limited on site restaurant services  2. Concierge services not "up to par" with what we are accustomed to at other Marriott vacation club properties.  They gave very limited insight to area activities and attractions and seemed to be more interested in promoting the time share presentations.
Manager Response: We are happy to hear you had a great visit, Jeffrey!  Thank you for your feedback and we look forward to seeing you again!

Summary Heading: Beautiful resort in great area of California and near everything!
Summary: We just returned from a week stay - we have stayed here before but it's been about 5 years.  The rooms have all been updated and are very nice.  We stayed close to the main pool which was nice.  The only problem that I have with this hotel is how big it is and that's it's not on a beach.  If you're not close to a pool you have to drive to one which is hard with little kids.  So, request a room near a pool if that's important to you.  We spent equal times at the resort and away.  It's so easy to get to nearby attractions like Disneyland or the beach.  This is a great place for families because of the nice big rooms and pools.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, Jill! We are pleased you enjoyed your visit and appreciate your feedback on your stay.  We look forward to seeing you again soon at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!

Summary: My in-laws joined our family of three on a vacation to this resort this last week and it was great!  Many of the bad reviews for this hotel are due to lack of research, in my opinion.  I am not a Vacation Club owner and still had a great time at this resort!  There is NOT a restaurant onsite nor is there room service. This hotel WILL have lots of kids at the pool and running around in/out of the rooms.  This hotel is designed for families which is why they are all two bedroom suites, with full kitchens.  If you are looking for a luxury romantic hotel I would probably recommend a different place.    This hotel is GREAT if you have kids and want things for them to do.  There are several pools (we didn't even make it to them all), a kids rooms, a teen room, playground, sand boxes,
Manager Response: Thank you for your five-star review!  We are happy to hear Marriott's Newport Coast Villas was just right for your recent family vacation.  We look forward to seeing you soon!

Summary Heading: Spacious Apartment with Fabulous Ocean View
Summary: We spent one night at this place, and we are eager to return.  The completely equipped apartment was delightful, and we had an incomparable view from our large balcony (#4942).  The only disappointment is that we were kept waiting until exactly 4:00 p.m. before we were permitted to go to the unit.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!  We are happy to hear you enjoyed your villa and your time at the resort.  We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary Heading: For adults decidedly mediocre - beware the insulting hard sell
Summary: This is not so much a review of the property (which is generally attractive, expansive and adequately maintained with plenty to do for the young ones in the family) as it is the entire experience of a guest who is NOT an owner (that is participant in the Vacation Club program) We should have taken our first clue from the friendly front desk reception agent who proudly announced that 95% of the property was occupied by owners. And that owners NOT guests had first choice of rooms. We were given a dark lower floor room with upstairs neighbors who must have been professional bowlers. The noise continued all night as did the clatter from the service closets outside our room. There no restaurant on property only a small market place so be prepared for that reality. But the real slap
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting Marriott's Newport Coat Villas.  While we are pleased you enjoyed the resort, please accept our apologies for the sales presentation.  This is not typical and we would like to speak with you further about your experience.  You may contact us direclty at Customer.Care@vacationclub.com or by calling 800-860-9384.  We look forward to hearing from you soon.

Summary Heading: Fantastic Mega-Compund Perched Above Crystal Coive
Summary: Everything was excellent.  My mom and dad came out to visit my brother and I and we all stayed comfortably in our roomy Villa.  The highlight of the weekend was seeing a gray whale from the beach.  He came in so close about a 100 meters from shore.  It was awesome.  I read they like to come in that close to roll on the sand and get a back scratch.    The resort is huge but the shuttles run all over the place like ants.  Staff in shuttles and golf carts asked us for rides whenever they saw us.  The weather was perfect so usually we declined.  One driver picked us up the first day and told us all about the property so that really helped us get our bearings.  His name was Mark and he must have been working there for a long time because he knew everything about the place and had
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, Mike!  We are happy you had a great visit with the family and enjoyed your time at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.  We look forward to seeing you all again soon in beautiful Newport Beach!

Summary: We stayed at this resort some weeks back but I have held off writing the review as I wanted to try to be as fair as possible. However, even after waiting this time, I am still upset and angry over our decision to choose this hotel and over the complete waste of our time and money.  I think it is important to note that the positive reviews are most likely written by people who have timeshare units at the resort and maybe have been upgraded over the years - there appears to be a big difference, certainly in terms of level of service and the rooms you are assigned. As "hotel guests", we felt like second class citizens at the resort, and the management seemed to find our presence more of an annoyance than a paying client. We were told from check-in that resort "owners" get priority
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.  While we are disappointed to hear your stay did not exceed your expectations, we appreciate your feedback on your recent visit.  Please know, your comments will be shared with the appropriate managers and we thank you for bringing your concerns to our attention.  Thank you again for visiting and for providing us your feedback.

Summary: Great place for a girls weekend with a 2 bedroom suite.  The service at the poolside restaurant was terrible and the food quality definitely does not match the quality of the resort.  (This is the only reason I'm giving this place 4 stars) Pools were awesome.  Location great.  It was extremely clean and the maid service was awesome.
Manager Response: We are happy you had a great girls weekend, Anna!  Thank you for your review and for visiting Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.  Your feedback on food offerings is appreciated and will be shared with the food & beverage managers.  We look forward to your return!

Summary: I first came to Newport Coast Villas in December for my cousin's birthday. We only stayed for about 3 nights as we were going to Catalina Island. The property is located just off the Pacific Coast Highway which gives it a good view of the ocean. The grounds are well-maintained. The villas are well-equipped with a full kitchen, complete with all the cooking pans and utensils. The porch is generous that we were having our breakfast there with a good view of the ocean. But if one would want to dine out, the restaurants are just within 10 minutes of the property. The beds are very comfortable that sometimes you would just want to sleep in.  Our villa had 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. The master's bathroom had a jetted tub in it and the showers are rain showers. There are several pools
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and great pictures, Miranda!  We are pleased you had a great 3 night stay in December and thank you for sharing your feedback.  Please come see us again soon at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!

Summary Heading: Love this resort! Can't wait to return!
Summary: This resort is exceptional! The staff is friendly and helpful. Our suite had everything you could ever ask for. Large living room, full kitchen and laundry. Two full baths this was a big help since we are a family of four. The views for this resort are phenomenal! I couldn't take enough pictures. We had a fabulous time and can't wait to return!
Manager Response: Thank you for the TripAdvisor love!  We look forward to seeing you again soon at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!

Summary: The property is located just above Pacific Coast Hwy and many of the rooms have a view of the ocean.  The grounds are well maintained and there is golf course just below the Villas that adds to the beauty.  We stayed four nights and the villa was very large with lots of space.  All the units are two bedrooms with fully equipped kitchen that has all the basic pots, pans, plates, utensils etc.  Around many of the units are barbeque grill areas with 3 separate grills each so that many people can cook at the same time and dine as there were at least four tables too.   The décor inside the villa was nice, well maintained and clean.  The beds were firm and very comfortable.     There are four pools around the property and the two main pools are just below front desk lounge area.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, Chuck!  We are pleased you enjoyed your stay with us this month at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas and look forward to your return.

Summary Heading: Gorgeous property and excellent for families
Summary: We stayed here over our kids spring break and the same room type in July would have been double what we paid.  The weather was fantastic, the room was 2 bedrooms, a large living area with a pull out couch, a kitchen, and two bathrooms.  The bed was super comfortable!  We are not owners and maybe that is the reason we had daily maid service.  What I did not want to do is hear a time share presentation.  I was afraid to receive my "gift" from the concierge for that reason (I am a bit jaded since having to listen to these talks in the past). I received 2 phone calls and 2 emails prior to our stay so I was pretty sure they wanted to convince me to hear a presentation regarding vacation ownership.  Since we were only there for two nights, I didn't want to spend any time doing
Manager Response: Thank you for your TripAdvisor review!  We look forward to seeing you again at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!

Summary: We recently stayed here and had a lovely visit.  We got in at night, and the buildings aren't very well lit (nor are the numbers on the buildings) so get REALLY good information from the front desk about where your building is.  The view is pretty and peaceful, nestled between the canyons and the ocean.  The resort is up the street from the beach, so about a ten minute walk.  The beach is very different, down a set of stairs.  This is the west coast, so no humidity or bad hair.  The resort has lots of activities, and great information about surrounding attractions.  The villa has everything you need - Marriott really does think of everything.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience on TripAdvisor!  We are pleased you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you again at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!

Summary: This resort is just perfect.  The property is beautiful, the accomidations are wonderful, and the staff is helpful.  This is right next door to the Crystal Cove State Park, so the area is not overdeveloped.  I would highly recommend going here!!
Manager Response: We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay!  Thank you for your review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!

Summary Heading: Marriott Villas on Newport Coast is a gorgeous beach experience
Summary: The Marriott Newport Coast Villa offers a beautiful setting for family vacations. It has the feel of a Tuscan villa straight out of Italy. The rooms are all two bedroom and sleep 6-8. The decor is contemporary and comfortable.  The bedroom fronting the hall gets a lot of foot traffic noise.  Ask for a view.    There are numerous pools, a basketball court, putting green, sand volleyball courts, arcade and movie theatre. It reminded me of being on a cruise but land bound. We received an activity schedule for the whole week. Lots to do for all ages.  I took Mixology 101 and learned some fun bar tending techniques for $16. I also enjoyed he painting class, but thought it was over priced at $30.   The kitchens were well stocked with needed pots/pans and untensils.  There is only one
Manager Response: We appreciate your five-star review!  Thank you for your feedback and please come see us again at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!

Summary: As Marriot timeshare owners we have been to a number of their resorts. This one is in a great location and the rooms are adequately equipped (though some of the buildings are having their interiors reappointed).    We have visited this Marriot a number of times and we have the same complaints every time. Their parking system is terrible and they will tell you they enforce it, do not believe it.  There are too many cars and instead of reserving one spot per unit they have a system requiring guests beyond the one car per unit to park in the overflow lot, which no one apparently does.   The other issue is the trash receptacles. People seem to want to leave mounds of trash on the outdoor trashcans instead of taking the 5 second walk to the trash room (which is on every floor).
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!  We are pleased you enjoyed your stay and appreciate your feedback.
