Please know, your comments about the parking and trash will be shared with the resort leadership team.  We hope to see you again soon and thank you again for your review!

Summary: I usually wait until getting home before posting a review but how can I pass up on this opportunity, afterall it's past midnight and all I can hear is a little kid running around on the 3rd floor as if he or she were training for a full marathon. We are Marriott owners and have stayed at other resorts and sad to say this is by far our worst. Don't get me wrong the location is wonderful, staff is okay, not the best. Forget about midweek cleaning not unless you pay additional and well it's pretty understaffed. There were too many preteens and kids roaming around without parent supervision, in addition to that there was minimal to no staff on duty to monitor people at the pool, it was pretty chaotic if you ask me... If you plan on coming here, ask for a room on the 4th floor if you
Manager Response: Hi Sandra.  Thank you for your review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.  We are sorry to find your overall visit failed to meet expectations and apologize for any inconvenience.  We look forward to serving you again at Marriott Vacation Club.

Summary: The Marriott Villas in NewPort Beach were very clean, well kept with contemporary styling. Also very spacious( 2 bedroom/2 bath). Beautiful landscaping and well spaced buildings. The staff was very courteous and friendly.  We checked in very early and our room was not ready. Which we thought might happen, but it would have been nice to have been offered a complementary beverage during our 2 hour wait.  Room service is limited. We tried to order some meals from their grill, but could not get through on the phone. So we ended up with Pizza Hut pizza delivered to the room ( which actually ended tasting quite good!).  We had visited this resort on a promotion which required we attend a 90 minute talk about joining the Marriott Vacation club. The talk ran over the 90 minutes, but I
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!  It is wonderful to know the resort met your needs throughout your recent California getaway because of the well-kept, modern and spacious villa, service-driven associates in addition to the well-manicured grounds, among others.  We hope to have the opportunity to host you both again and provide a five-star experience!

Summary: We stayed in villa 4532 on the 3rd floor ...amazing views overlooking the ocean and the golf resort. Lovely accommodation that sleeps 6 comfortably away from the main pool and a great quiet spot. Very short walk to the gym another heated pool and bbq area. Perfect if you have older or no children at all. Staff are polite accommodating and not intrusive but nothing is too much trouble. Well done Marriott
Manager Response: Thank you for the five-star TripAdvisor feedback on your recent stay!  It is fantastic to know you found the resort perfect for your spring break getaway with family because of the spacious villa and service-oriented associates.  We look forward to welcoming everyone back to Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!

Summary: This is a gorgeous property.  We traveled with another couple and they used the 2nd bedroom.  The villas are close to many CA beaches, San Diego Zoo, Disneyland, etc.  The views from our room were outstanding. The villas themselves were very nice.  There are 3 pools (2 smaller and one main pool area with 3 individual pools and pool bar). I would recommend to anyone who wants a beautiful, relaxing vacation.
Manager Response: Hi Debb!  Thank you for the five-star TripAdvisor review.  It is fabulous to know you found your overall California getaway top-notch mentioning the overall villa, views and pool areas as highlights of your stay.  We thank you for the recommendation and look forward to hosting you both again at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!

Summary: We recently stayed at the Marriott Newport Villas for two nights, and I wish we would have stayed longer. It was very clean and nice location. Plenty of space for my family as well. Beds are pretty comfortable and nice bathrooms and kitchen area was well equipped. The food in the store in lobby area was very expensive though. The staff was very helpful as well. The pool area was nice. We went to the hot tub a couple of times and it stated quiet hot tub, but kids were coming in and out with no parents with them and being loud. It would have been nice for the families with smaller children to be supervising their younger children better or pool staff to be more attentive to this area. Great location. We loved going to Crystal Cove Beach which was right down the way. We also loved
Manager Response: Thank you for the five-star comments on your recent visit with family!  It is fabulous to read you found your stay top-notch as a result of the comfortable and well-appointed villa in addition to the accommodating associates and pool area.  We look forward to hosting everyone at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas on future getaways to the area!

Summary: If Marriott was trying to market to potential buyers, they have failed.  The property was beautiful but our villa was invested with ants.  We spent most of following day trying to resolve the issue, and then offered the option to move next door. It wAs a total hassle and waste. The property is also loud and filled with hillbilly spring break folks.  This is a "skip it" property for us. Thanks, but no thanks.
Manager Response: Thank you for the feedback on your family visit to Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.  It is disappointing to learn a pest problem put a damper on your overall stay.  Your feedback on your experience has been shared with the management of the resort and we thank you for your input.  We look forward to hosting you at any Marriott Vacation Club resort.

Summary: We always enjoy this place. Our last visit was a couple years ago and I forgot to enter a review.  We ask for top floor with our advanced timeshare reservations. Usually get a nice view and quiet with no pounding feet above us. As for the cost, I cannot comment, because we are Marriott time share exchange visitors. Looks like a great family place, with pools and activities, but we usually go just my spouse and I. Lots of nearby neat beach towns to visit and tour……plus golfing is great nearby too. We enjoy being near the ocean but don't always go. We do use the on-site outdoors BBQ grilles to eat in at times.  Friendly staff. We will be back.
Manager Response: Hello Dennis!  Thank you for the five-star feedback on Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.  It is thrilling to know your visits consistently exceed expectations due to the amenities like the grills and the service-oriented associates.  We look forward to hosting you both again real soon!

Summary: It was great! There were movies playing on  T.V. and they give you a list of the channels and movies. There were several pools and a bar beside them. also lots of kids activities in the kids club but you have to pay. There are also tennis lessons that cost money too. The resort was huge -Kiki age 9 p.s. don't get lost
Manager Response: Thank you for the five-star TripAdvisor feedback on Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!  It is great to find expectations were exceeded because of the pool areas, activities offered and overall facilities.   We look forward to hosting everyone on future getaways to Newport Beach!

Summary Heading: Villas with a view are only available to timeshare holders
Summary: I booked a villa based on the photos featured on the website, with the expectation that I would receive a villa with a view. When we received our villa it was on the ground floor and overlooked a parking lot and was still the full rate of $400 per night. When I asked to be moved to a higher floor or to a villa with a view of some sort - ocean, pool, canyon - I was told those are reserved for timeshare owners and are not usually available for regular guests. The villa is large - it has two bedrooms with pull out sofas, 2 bathrooms and a full kitchen and would be great for families or large groups. However if you are booking as a regular guest and not a time share owner you will likely receive a villa with dated furnishings and no view whatsoever.
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.  We are disappointed the view you received did not meet your expectations based on the photos available online.  Your feedback is appreciated and will be shared with the resort's management team.  Thank you again for visiting and providing your TripAdvisor review.

Summary: lovely setting and so many things to do for all ages! Had a great time when we went the week after thanksgiving, as it was not crowded but he weather was lovely. If you can get a villa on the lower part , where we were, it is farther but very quiet. One of the gas BBQs outside the vlila did not work, but nobody else BBQ'd so the other one did just well.
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting the week after Thanksgiving!  We are happy to hear you enjoyed your visit and hope to see you again at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.

Summary: This was my second time at this resort, and I was so satisfied with my choice each time.  Our room on the third floor had a great view of golf course and pacific ocean.  My husband  and I enjoyed walking down to the beach while my boys were playing basketball with other guests.  It was a wonderful weekend trip!
Manager Response: We are pleased you had a great stay, Kellie!  Thank you for sharing your feedback and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Wonderful location just above Crystal Cove state beach and only a couple minutes to Laguna Beach and Newport Shopping Centers. Marriott provides free shuttle to several locations including crystal cove which allows for disabled access to the sand! The Villas are spacious and well appointed. Tons of activities for all ages. Highly recommend.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recommendation of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!  We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: My husband and I, as well as his sister and brother-in-law, just got back from one of the best vacations we have ever taken.  We are Marriott owners and love Marriott properties.  Newport Coast Villas is, by far, the nicest we have experienced yet.  We loved every thing about it from the reception we received upon check-in to the moment we left.  Our villa overlooked not only the Pacific Ocean, but a gorgeous golf course as well.    The comfort and beauty of the villa were exceptional as was every single employee we came in contact with.  I cannot say enough good things about this fabulous resort.  Orange County is blessed to have it within their borders.  As it was our first trip to Southern California, we had not idea what to expect.  We fell in love and will be back for sure.
Manager Response: We are pleased your family enjoyed their stay at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!  Thank you for sharing your experience on TripAdvisor and we look forward to hosting you again soon!

Summary: My wife and I stayed for three days on tail end of our trip and wow.  The rooms were very large and has everything that you need.   We overlooked the golf course and the ocean and felt the breeze in the daytime when we opened the doors. The property has three pools.  I would say that the main pool is the loudest but, that is where the events happen.  The pools are saltwater as well.  The property is amazing and clean with lots of activities for kids and adults.  We booked a room for next Spring!
Manager Response: Thank you for the five-star TripAdvisor feedback on Marriott's Newport Beach!  It is terrific to learn you had a relaxing stay, finding the spacious villa, pool areas, well-kept facilities, and multitude of activities standouts of your visit.  We look forward to hosting you both next spring!

Summary: We have been to this resort 4 or 5 times.  It is always clean, good staff and wonderful grounds.  Walking down to the beach is easy and Newport is a 3 minute drive.  Great place to just hang for a few days
Manager Response: Hello Dean!  Thank you for the five-star review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.  It is thrilling to see you find the resort continuously top-notch due to the well-kept facilities, accommodating associates and well-maintained grounds.  We look forward to welcoming everyone back again soon!

Summary: Have stayed at a number of MVC properties; most in the Orlando area.  So my expectations were not super high upon arriving at the Newport Coast property. Upon arriving you can see that the level that the property operates at is much higher than typical MVC.  The location is superb. The rooms, while a little dated in décor are functional, large and clean. The common areas are nicely appointed and the pool area is on par with a nice resort. Great base of operation to explore the south coast.  Will definitely stay here again when in Newport.
Manager Response: Thank you for the five-star TripAdvisor feedback on your recent stay with family.  It is fantastic to learn expectations were exceeded throughout your getaway as you found the rooms well-appointed, spacious and well-kept.  We look forward to welcoming everyone back on future visits to Newport Beach!

Summary Heading: Great family option in Orange County
Summary: We have stayed at the Marriott NCV 5 or 6 times over the past 4 years.  We are not  time share owners but can usually find good deals from owners renting their weeks or directly from Marriott as a "hotel".  The property is well maintained and the staff is very friendly.  It is great for families since all units are two bedrooms.  They claim that the units sleep 8 which is a stretch but doable with small kids (Two sleeper sofas. One in 2nd bedroom and the other in the living area).  There are always lots of kids around playing in the park (basketball, putting green & new sand volleyball court) and around the pools.  The kitchens are well stocked but the appliances are very low quality.  Oven take forever to get up to temperature and the dishwasher & washer/dryer are very LOUD!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!  It is fabulous to find you cite the resort as perfect for families visiting the area because of the well-maintained facilities, accommodating associates and well-appointed villa.  We thank you for your loyalty and look forward to hosting everyone again real soon!

Summary: The 2 BR villa was nice but they only have a poolside grill that is only open for lunch, weather permitting. The Pelican Hill resort across the street was great for dining. Surprised Marriott didn't have a real restaurant
Manager Response: Hi Rusty.  Thank you for the feedback on your stay with friends.  While we are glad you enjoyed your visit due to the overall villa, we are sorry the lack of a full-service restaurant option failed to meet expectations.  Marriott Vacation Club offers a different type of experience to owners and guests than what is typically provided at full-service Marriott hotels and resorts.  We hope to have the opportunity to host you on a future getaway at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!

Summary Heading: A great place to stay in Newport Beach, CA
Summary: If you can, plan a trip to Southern California and stay at the Marriott, Newport Coast villas.  My wife and I are owners there and frequent the property staying 6 or 7 times a year.  All the villas are two bedroom and two bathroom with all the amenities one would expect from an upscale resort.  There are five pools on the property along with Tennis courts and two fitness centers.  Included in the main fitness center is both a steam room and sauna.    The property is spread out with the tallest building 5 stories.  Many feature stunning ocean views, especially from the higher floor rooms.  For those in shape, the hills within the property are great exercise but there is also a shuttle which goes around the area frequently as well.  The only real down side to this property is
Manager Response: Hello Eric!  Thank you for the TripAdvisor review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.  It is wonderful to know you have found the resort perfect for a getaway to the area because of the well-appointed villa and amenities like the pools, tennis courts and fitness center.  We thank you for your loyalty and look forward to your next visit!

Summary: We come at least once a year which isn't enough. The property is well maintained and all of the staff is helpful and friendly.  We always have had a two bedroom villa because we enjoy the extra space. I'm not sure if they even have a one bedroom.  The location and views are perfect. The only reason that I didn't give it a higher rating is that they do not have a full service restaurant. The pool bar does a great job, but not a full days menu.
Manager Response: Hello Bill!  Thank you for the TripAdvisor review of Marriott''s Newport Coast Villas.  It is terrific to know you continuously enjoy your visits because of the well-maintained grounds and accommodating associates.  We look forward to your return!

Summary: We stayed in room 1733 for 5 nights over Spring Break. The two bedroom wheelchair accessible villa was clean and spacious. Wheelchair access was perfect with a roll in shower, grab bars and plenty of floor space. We are not owners and had a rate of $260 with daily cleaning. At this price this place is a steal. We had a nice 3rd story view of the ocean over the trees. We were able to see beautiful sunsets if standing just right on the balcony. If you are able to secure a rate under $300 I say this place is perfect but you should be aware it is not right on the beach. The property is across the PCH from the beach and is a 10-15 min walk to get down to the water. Parking across the street at Crystal Cove is $15 a day. We were never given the hard sell others talk about to become
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, Barb!  It's great to hear your family enjoyed their visit at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas over Spring Break!  We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary Heading: Good but a little disappointing in some areas
Summary: One important aspect to note is that this is a timeshare property first and foremost. Therefore, regardless of your Marriott reward elite status, some of your expectations may fall short. Our one request was a top floor with an ocean view but neither was honored even on a midweek two night stay. Check in was 4:00 PM and check out was 10:00 AM with no option for a later check out. The room and property were both very nice with a full kitchen and laundry facilities (more of an at home feel rather than hotel / resort amenities). We were also offered $250 to attend a 90 minute timeshare presentation but opted not to spend our vacation time on something that usually turns out to be a high pressured sales pitch.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!  We are pleased you enjoyed your visit and appreciate all the great photos you shared.  Certain Marriott Rewards benefits including priority late check-out and room upgrades are not available at Marriott Vacation Club resorts.  We apologize if this took away from your overall visit and appreciate your feedback.  We hope to see you again soon on your next trip to Newport Coast!

Summary: I loved our villa.  The view was so beautiful that it honestly made me think about moving to the area.  We were in the 5th building third floor and we had a canyon/water view.  The sunsets and sunrises were really special.  We did have a walk to the pool but it wasn't bad, and the pools were great -- games like shuffleboard, fire pits, towels.  I loved this place.  If I hit the lottery, I would consider just living in one of these villas full time.  My husband wasn't with me, so they didn't hassle me to do the timeshare presentation.  It's a good thing b/c I was so smitten I may have bought one without him!
Manager Response: We are happy to hear you enjoyed your time with us in Newport!  Thank you for your review and we look forward to your next visit at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!

Summary: Upon arriving, I couldn't help but notice how well maintained the resort appeared. Everything was super clean. We checked in without any delay and were assigned our room even though we arrived a couple of hours before check in time.   We were assigned room 2811. This room was on the first floor of the building without any view and the building was near the main drive in entrance to the resort. I would have preferred something higher up with a view but that was my only complaint about the room. Everything else was very good. The room was spacious with 2 bedrooms and bathrooms with plenty of room for my wife and I and my sister-in-law and her fiance. The kitchen was well supplied with cooking utensils, dishes and silverware. Like the rest of the resort, everything was clean and in
Manager Response: Thank you for your TripAdvisor review, Mike!  We are glad you chose to visit Marriott's Newport Coast Villas on your recent trip to Disneyland and are happy you had a great time.  We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: Marriott is updating the villas. The older one might have a perfect view of Pacific , but the view inside the villa is dated. The grounds are beautiful and the location couldn't be better.  We were unhappy with the shabby room assignment and requested a different villa. Moving was a unpleasant experience. Lucky for us, Tanner helped with all the luggage and exhibited the customer service that one expects from Marriott. The managers on duty were also very pleasant and turned a bad experience into a good one.The updated villas are beautiful and modern.
Manager Response: Thank you for the TripAdvisor feedback on your getaway to Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!  It is wonderful to know you both enjoyed your recent stay due to the well-manicured grounds and accommodating customer service from associates like Tanner.  It is disappointing to learn the villa upkeep failed to meet expectations and we apologize for the inconvenience.  Please know your comments on the villa maintenance have been shared with the management of the resort and we thank you for your input.  We look forward to hosting you in the future and truly exceeding expectations!

Summary: This resort has so much to offer!  Our 2 bedroom was 3250, overlooking the ocean!  We were close to the elevator, so did hear traffic in the morning, but not in the evening.  It is NOT on the beach, but you can either walk or take the shuttle to a point where you can get to the beach.  The area has so much to offer!   I enjoyed the gym one morning.  There is plenty of room for many people & many things to choose from.   The resort has a FREE shuttle to Crystal Cove, Laguna Beach, Fashion Island, Crystal Cove Shopping Center at scheduled times.  We rented a car & used many Travelzoo & Groupon coupons.  As long as you drive at NON prime times, the driving was fine using a Garmin or other direction device.  I don't like city driving with 12 lanes of traffic, so was glad to see it
Manager Response: Hi Karen!  Thank you for the five-star TripAdvisor review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.  It is thrilling to learn expectations were exceeded on your stay due to the amenities such as the fitness center and complimentary shuttle.  We look forward to hosting you both the next time you visit Newport Beach, CA!

Summary: I have been here twice. First my husband and I brought our 2 children over Thanksgiving to visit family. This resort is wonderful! So last summer I came back bringing my daughter, Mother and 2 nieces. They have everything you need in the Villa. Everyone there is so nice and helpful. The pools are great. The outside food and bar. Things for the kids. Also you don't have to worry about driving around, they have shuttle buses to all the beaches just watch the times. They have a small market if you need items. I will never go anywhere else when visiting California. The rooms also had washers and dryers in them, nice.
Manager Response: Hello Susan!  Thank you for the five-star comments on your family vacation to Newport Beach, CA. It is exciting to read you found your getaway wonderful due to the well-appointed villa, accommodating associates and pool areas.  We look forward to welcoming everyone back for a third visit to Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!

Summary: We decided to come to this resort from the recommendation of our friends. We decided to check it out for ourselves, and we were not disappointed! From the moment we checked in, a beautiful ocean view view greeted us in the lobby. The registration went smoothly and the person registering us was very helpful and kind.   We were traveling with out two children age one and five, and honestly this resort was perfect. We did not have to really go anywhere else for entertainment. There are huge pools that are scattered across the resort. One huge (warm) pool in the middle of the resort and others located at different points. Also, there are play areas for the kids as well as basketball courts and tennis courts. If by some reason you get tired of the resort, a courtesy bus will provide
Manager Response: Hi Anna!  Thank you for the five-star TripAdvisor review of your recent vacation to Newport Beach.  Wow!  It is terrific to read comments like yours as you found the resort ideal for your family getaway because of the child-friendly amenities like the pools, basketball court and tennis courts in addition to the spacious villa.  We thank you again for the kind words and look forward to serving your family again at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!

Summary: What a perfect week at one of the most perfect places we have ever stayed!  This was our 5th visit to this most magical Marriott property, located on the mountainous coast south of Newport Beach.  We were extremely fortunate to stay in a full ocean view room and enjoy a glorious week of temperatures in the 70s.  This property is so well-maintained that you don't need to be in a newly refurbished unit in order to be surrounded by lovely decor and all the amenities one could hope for.   The pools and hot tubs are wonderful.  The newly located children's rooms in the main building are delightful and full of activities. At check in we were helped by Daniel, the rooms manager and he was so helpful with any of our special needs.  Excellent service and much appreciated!  The grounds
Manager Response: Hello Linda!  Thank you for the five-star review of your fifth visit to Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.  It is exciting to find you describe your recent getaway as perfect due to the well-maintained facilities, amenities like the pool and hot tub areas, activities for children and the attentive service from associates like Daniel!  We look forward to seeing everyone again on a future getaway to Newport Beach!

Summary: This place is a true slice of heaven.  We continue to return, year after year, and create more family memories.  Great access to Laguna Beach, Disneyland, and lots of other SoCal attractions and venues.
Manager Response: Hi Erik!  Thank you for the five-star TripAdvisor comments on your yearly getaway.  It is fabulous to learn your expectations are continuously exceeded each visit.  We thank you for your loyalty and look forward to serving your family again next year at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!

Summary Heading: Beautiful resort, but recreational opportunities fill up fast when busy
Summary: We stated here from February 15-22, 2015, using the resort as a base for all of our trips in and around the Los Angeles area.  This was our third trip here, and we really enjoy the convenience for access to Disney, the beach cities and general Los Angeles.  Location: The Resort itself is situated about 400 metres off the Pacific Coast Highway.  It's a short walk (on a long hill) down to the state park, and Crystal Cove is about another 500 metres south on the highway - the resort offers a shuttle on an hourly basis that picks up/drops off at Crystal Cove.  As a warning the resort is rather hilly, which can be problematic for some guests - in our case my son has a prosthetic leg, so found some of the walking tiring, but not impossible.  Those with wheelchairs should be aware that
Manager Response: Hello Duncan!  Thank you for the feedback on Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.  It is fantastic to find your overall visit met expectations.  We thank you for the recommendation and hope to have the opportunity to host your family on a future California getaway.

Summary Heading: After some kinks worked out, it was PERFECT!
Summary: When we opened the door to our room, we had the worst old refrigerator smell ever.  Don't know what happened.  But after realizing it wasn't going to go away we asked for another room, and an hour or so later they switched us.  That was slightly frustrating.  We were tired.  But the rest of the trip was great and the new room smelled awesome.  We were situated on the quiet Grotto pool area, which we LOVED.  My kids were about the only ones in the pool all week.  I could watch the older ones from our balcony and be close enough.    The bed did hurt both our backs, but we are sensitive to that.  The wifi was REALLY spotty, which made it hard for my husband to work.  The Coral Cove area across the street was great!  We loved being so close to Trader Joes and stocking up on whatever
Manager Response: Thank you for the five-star review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!  It is thrilling to see you found your getaway perfect because of the pools and amenities like the basketball court and tetherball area.  We apologize for the difficulties encountered with both the Wi-Fi as well as the villa upon check-in.  Your comments on both have been shared with the resort management and we thank you for your feedback.  We look forward to hosting your family again soon!

Summary: We stayed here on a referral from a friend who is a member of the Marriott time share program, and we were blown away by the property! Everything is so beautiful and kept really clean. We couldn't see the ocean from our room but it looks like a lot of them do have ocean views, and we were able to catch an amazing sunset from the pool one night. We stayed in the room more than we often do on vacation just because the room was so comfortable and huge! It had a full kitchen, two bedrooms, two bathrooms and a small private patio. We aren't in a place right now where we were able to buy into the timeshare program, but we did buy 4 more nights for next year. Also, the timeshare presentation we sat through was very personable and the guy wasn't pushy at all. We really enjoyed talking
Manager Response: Thank you for the five-star TripAdvisor review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!  It is fantastic to read expectations were exceeded throughout your recent stay as a result of the well-kept facilities as well as the both comfortable and spacious villa.  We look forward to hosting you both on a future visit!

Summary: My husband and I visited this property for a few days.....What a disappointment it was from the check in desk to the room we were given.... I do realize they are starting to up- date the rooms. They need to send all their employees to the Ritz Carlton Sarasota, for CUSTOMER SERVICE TRAINING... this resort has that service down pat...... Please keep in mind this property has lots and lots of Villas and lots of empty ones at this time !!!!!!! We were given a room that had not been renovated, the furniture was scratched, the carpet was WELL worn, it was a cold weekend and you had to run the heat at 80 just to keep the chill out, ants were on all the counters everyday we were there even though brought ant traps, the granite on the counter tops was so old and stained.....I do not
Manager Response: Hi Karen.  Thank you for the feedback on your recent stay with friends at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.  We are sorry to find your visit failed to meet expectations as a result of the overall villa condition.  Your input on villa upkeep has been shared with the resort management and we thank you for your comments  We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back to any Marriott Vacation Club resort and provide a five-star experience.

Summary: We stayed at Newport Villas for a week using Vacation Club Points.  The resort is large which gives it a somewhat corporate feel but as usual with Marriott, everything is in first class condition.  We had a second floor apartment which had a wonderful view along the coast.  The apartment was very spacious and just what you would expect from a Marriott Vacation Club.  Newport Bay is a wonderful area with great shopping, smart restaurants and a beautiful coastline. We ate in some great restaurants - try Babette's at Crystal Cove for it's lively atmosphere and Pelican Hill Grill for fabulous outdoor dining while watching the sunset.  Easy to book tours into LA and we also enjoyed the whale watching trip.  Great place to stay overall.
Manager Response: Hello Duncan!  Thank you for the five-star TripAdvisor review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.  It is fabulous to read you found your stay excellent as a result of the top-notch accommodations, up to the Marriott vacation Club standard such as the well-kept facilities and spacious villa.  We look forward to welcoming you both back on a future getaway to Newport Beach, CA!

Summary Heading: Perfect location for a vacation stay in southern California
Summary: We have stayed at the Marriott's Newport Coast villas at least 5 times in the last few years, the most recent stay was February 2015.  The consistency of excellence has been maintained throughout every stay.  It is well located near the corner of the PCH right between Corona del Mar and Laguna Beach.  You're right up the hill from the Crystal Cove beach area.   There are restaurants close by, a grocery not far and everything you need is right in the resort.  The Marriott Newport Coast Villas are two-bedroom, two bath condominiums with a living room, dining room and full kitchen and two balconies or porches.  If you get a villa in building 4800 you can see beautiful sunsets!  There are other buildings from which you can see sunsets, but that's the most recent one where we stayed.
Manager Response: Hello Margaret!  Thank you for the five-star TripAdvisor review of your stay with family.  It is wonderful to learn you found the resort ideal for families visiting the area as a result of the both well-maintained grounds and amenities.  We look forward to exceeding expectations again at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!

Summary: We stayed here the week after Thanksgiving. Perfect weather. They listened to our request and gave us the perfect quiet villa with an unobstructed view of the golf course and ocean. The pool area has an upscale resort feeling with the ocean view. Be sure and go across the street to the beach and walk along the waters edge. Lots of great restaurants nearby as well as shopping.
Manager Response: Hi Kristin!  Thank you for the five-star TripAdvisor review of your stay at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.  It is terrific to find your overall visit met expectations because of the upscale pool area and ocean views.  We look forward to serving you both on a future getaway to Newport Beach!

Summary: My family went here for my birthday staycation.. I loved that it's only 30 miles from our house... The place is very luxurious with a good price tag... Considering pelican hill is just across the street from us.... We were checked in by my hubby quickly while me and the kids were in the van.... We had three kids aged 1,3, and 6 and they loved the place. They had enough space to run around the villa... The villa needs an update though but it remained clean...all the things u need we're there. All u have to buy is drinking water and of course food to cook...the pool was huge... There were towels available.... There was a grill cafe on site which served chicken tenders and my kids said it was the best chicken tenders ever....the giant chess board was amazing too... They had a mini
Manager Response: Thank you for the five-star feedback on your home away from home, Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!  We thank you for choosing to celebrate your birthday with us and are thrilled to hear you found the resort ideal for families as a result of the amenities such as pool area, giant chess board, theater and mini-golf course.  We thank you for sharing the photo from your vacation and look forward to hosting your family on a future visit!

Summary: Had perfect weather during our week at Marriott. We got into a newly refurbished room. Love the decor. Had bed made every day which was really nice. Don't remember they did this before!went to the wine meet and greet which was fun and the coffee and donuts breakfast..which show cased some area activities. We ended up going on two of them. One Dave's dolphin and whale watching. Only saw 2 whales and no dolphins which was disappointing, but what can you do? The ride was beautiful. We actually got sunburned. The other adventure was the guided bike ride with Liam. What a kick. Saw places like the botanical library and some beautiful home sites as well as a great lunch at a little Mexican restaurant on Balboa island. A very fun day.
Manager Response: Hi Karen!  Thank you for the five-star feedback on Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.  It is thrilling to find you loved your overall visit due to the villa decor and activities offered.  We look forward to hosting everyone again soon!

Summary: We are week owners here and every year we can't wait for our vacation. It's got tremendous views of the ocean (you need to request that specifically very early). It's such an amazing check-in experience in the lobby with the ocean in view.  The rooms are beautiful 2-bed, 2-bath villas with a full kitchen and living room. The master suite has a great king bed and view, plus an oversize tub, twin vanities and separate commode. Even the secondary bedroom is large, with a queen bed, coffee table, sitting area and TV. French doors open from the living room to a patio with a view. The living room sofa pulls out, so there is bed space for up to 7 people. There's also a washer and dryer in each villa.  There are three pool areas. The main one (great ocean view) has three separate pools,
Manager Response: Thank you for the five-star TripAdvisor review of your family stay!  It is thrilling to learn you found Marriott's Newport Coast Villas perfect for your getaway with family due to the overall resort upkeep and the accommodating service from associates.  We look forward to hosting everyone again next time!

Summary: Service is awesome, much better than other Marriott Vacation Clubs I have visited. Our villa is all remodeled and very comfortable.  The pools are very nice and great for kids. There is an adult pool that is quiet and great to just read a book.
Manager Response: Hi Lisa!  Thank you for the review on your getaway to Newport Beach, CA.  It is fabulous to know you enjoyed your overall stay at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas because of the awesome service, comfortable villa, pool areas and beautiful views.  We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you both back and provide a five-star experience!

Summary: We are here now. My husband hurt his foot/on crutches. Customer assist was not able to free a parking spot so we can park outside our room. I had to drive an unfamiliar car (uninsured) to parking garage. We are Gold Marriott card holders so beware!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We are sorry to hear about your experience parking and apologize for any inconvenience.  We thank you for your loyalty to Marriott and hope to have the privilege of hosting you again at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.

Summary: We're Marriott timeshare owners so we're used to the high quality of Marriott timeshares.  Used Marriott destination points for a two night stay.  Rooms were very spacious and well furnished.    No restaurants within walking distance.  Only food service is at a poolside bar.  The Marketplace in the lobby has a limited quantity of food for taking to your room.  However; there is a nice Trader Joe's about a five minute drive to the south for buying groceries to prepare meals in the room.
Manager Response: Hi Gary!  Thank you for the five-star feedback on your recent getaway.  It is thrilling to see you found the resort a beautiful place to stay for those visiting the area due to the spacious and well-furnished villa.  We thank you for your loyalty to Marriott and look forward to hosting you both again at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!

Summary: When we first arrived, we fell in love with the place instantly. The location, slightly raised and with sweeping views across the Ocean, is simply magnificent. The property is beautiful, oozes class and has so much to do. The heated swimming pool is such a godsent with the cooler temperatures. The actual apartment was spacious, elegant, comfortable and with every amenity you could think of: washing machine, tumble dryer, dishwasher and even a food processor! We usually dine out  but all we wanted to do this time was stay in. The beds were so comfortable and having three TVs ensured that everyone could have down time in the privacy of their own room. Everything would have been perfect if the following had not happened. Firstly, we were never allowed to forget that we were in a
Manager Response: Thank you for the TripAdvisor feedback on your stay!  It is fantastic to read you found your visit near-perfect as a result of the classy facilities, elegant villa and comfortable beds.  We thank you for sharing the photo from your vacation and hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back to Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!

Summary: We had 10 people ranging from teenagers to grandparents.  The property is very attractive.  We had 2  two bed two bath condos.  Decor is modern and pretty.  It is across the street from the ocean, so higher floors have better views.  It is large and quite spread out.  Getting from our room to the pool involved quite a few stairs, which worried me for my 76 year old father.  We took the free shuttle to Crystal Cove beach.  It is a 5 minute drive.  (If you drive it is $15 to park and $1 per person on their shuttle) We ate at the Beachcomber which was delicious and right on the water.  Put your name in as soon as you get there.  The wait can be a couple of hours.  Hang out on the beach and play until your buzzer they gave you goes off to let you know your table is ready.  If your
Manager Response: Hello Linley!  Thank you for the feedback on your family get together in Newport Beach, CA.  It is terrific to find you enjoyed your visit due to the attractive overall resort and modernly-decorated villa.  We hope to have the pleasure of hosting everyone again at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!

Summary Heading: Brillant location, huge property and lots to do!
Summary: This is a very big place, huge in fact, it is typical in styling for a Marriott Vacation Club and you get all of the things you can expect with a MVC, 2 Bedrooms, 2 Bathrooms, Full Kitchen, Dining and Living Room. The rooms are lovely, again this is now the norm for MVC but this is not what makes this place so great, if you have never been to this part of the world it is fantastic, Newport Beach, Laguna Beach, Balboa Island, Crystal Cove, Huntingdon, all beautiful beaches that you would be happy to spend a week around but they are all so close together and easy to get to that you can have a different one everyday.  We did not use this as a base to go to Disney however if that was your plan it would be a good one, this is not overly close to Anaheim but close enough, in my
Manager Response: Thank you for the five-star review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!  It is fabulous to read you found your experience up to Marriott Vacation Club standards as a result of the well-appointed villa.  We look forward to hosting the family next time you visit Newport Beach, CA!

Summary: We were in town for business for the week and I wanted something different than the normal hotel for a week. And let me say that I would highly recommend this place if you are working anywhere within an hour drive!  The staff were very helpful and the grounds were maintained liked a high end resort.  2 points I would like to focus on: -Traffic around here is not bad at all, in general LA traffic is the worst in the world but this is just far enough away that the traffic is light -Food...within in a 10 minute drive you have so many great choice in Newport and Laguna Beach!!!  I give this place 2 thumbs up!
Manager Response: Thank you for the five-star feedback on your recent business stay at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!  It is wonderful to know you recommend the resort for its service-driven associates and well-maintained grounds.  We thank you for sharing the picture of the sunset from your trip and look forward to hosting you the next time you visit Newport Beach, CA!

Summary: Great place to unwind relax and chill. lots of space with 75 acres of property. Spectacular views. Ample shuttle transportation on and off premises. Market place on sight  convenient for breakfast and snacks. Our villa was spacious and more than accommodating. Everything we needed was there. AM aqua aerobic classes were invigorating. The Gym was great,included free sauna and steam rooms. Rooms were authentic and HOT!(the way they are supposed to be). They pools are magnificent, heated and are salt water filled. 2 whirl pools were so  relaxing. Towels are conveniently  located at pool side and  generously available.  Overall the Newport Beach Costa Villas are a piece of heaven on earth. Also thank you to Jesse Hawk for his sincere assistance.
Manager Response: We are pleased to hear you were living the dream at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!  Thank you for your review and please visit us again soon!

Summary Heading: Excellent stay at Marriott Newport Coast Villas
Summary: We had yet another great stay at this location.  The staff is excellent.  We owe special thanks to the pre-arrival specialist Bunnie.  She worked with us to accommodate our needs.  We especially appreciate the continuously running movie stations and the additional on-site activities.  We will return in the near future.
Manager Response: Thank you for your TripAdvisor review and kind words for Bunnie!  We are pleased you had a wonderful visit and look forward to seeing you again at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.

Summary: Found this Gem while searching for hotels in Anahiem. Drive is short and the stay is amazing. Very clean, quiet, and comfortable. Will definitely come back when traveling to LA or surrounding cities. The scenery is great!
Manager Response: Thank you for your TripAdvisor review!  It's wonderful to hear you had a great time at the resort while visiting Los Angeles.  Please visit us again soon at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!

Summary: Everything was great with the villa, the only thing that was wrong with the villa and was found on accident was the bottom of the comforter had a stain in it, I only noticed it as I was tucking the sheets back in. One minor nuances was the toilets (I know) the arms would get stuck so they would keep running just had to make sure the arms were completely down before you walked away otherwise you would here it all night. The pool area was OK, certain things needed the usual maintenance, like paint on the signs. Just small things nothing over whelming. Over all excellent stay, staff was great with check in,check out was a tad slow but nothing terrible. I highly recommend this place. Especially for long stays.
Manager Response: Thank you for your five-star review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!  We are pleased you had a great visit on your quick stay and hope to see your family again soon!

Summary: We stayed in the Newport Coast Villas over Christmas.  Our family members ranged from ages 11 to 81 in three different units.  We all had a great time.  The facilities were beautiful and clean.  Lots of pool and activities to keep everyone occupied. The units were well stocked for cooking and the layout had provided good separation between bedrooms.  We spent a lot of time at the Crystal Cove State Park.   It is a steep walk down the hill but the Marriott provided a shuttle for the days the children didn't want to walk back up. The beach was quiet.  We enjoyed looking in the tide pools and relaxing. You could walk down to the State Park for facilities including The Beachcomber Cafe where we enjoyed a delicious lunch one day as well as a more economical Shake Shack, both has
Manager Response: We appreciate your five-star review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!  Thank you for your feedback and please visit us again soon!

Summary Heading: Phenomenal property and thank you Robertha
Summary: From PBX and Yupa from Housekeeping for assisting us with everything---above and beyond and so much appreciated excellent customer service!!!!!!!!!! Also appreciated the local hikes to the beach and magnificent views of the ocean and beautiful kitchen accommodations!
Manager Response: Thank you for your TripAdvisor review, Bruce!  We look forward to hosting you again soon at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.

Summary: I can't stay away from this resort. Its a favorite and since I am a timeshare owner the off season rates feel like a steal.  They were so awesome they were even able to accommodate a fabulous ocean view.  It was a magical getaway in January and of course crazy CA weather had me lounging at the pool one of the days! Cant say enough good things about this dreamy place.
Manager Response: Thanks for the love!  We are pleased to be one of your favorite resorts and look forward to your next stay at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!

Summary: Living in the city, needed a quick getaway. spent 3nights in this resort with no worries attached. We stayed at the 4300 building;  Positives Quite 2 pool options great layout (villa 2B2B) location (great options to dine out/activities/shopping) Views BBQ locations are close and kitchen is well equipped.  Neg main pool to crowded and it closes early no real access from hotel to the beach alertness at the front desk
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!  We appreciate your feedback about your recent visit and are pleased you enjoyed your time at the resort.  We hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Lovely property; challenges at check-in time
Summary: As other reviews point out, this is a gorgeous property that has easy access to the nearby beach towns. Definitely a plus. Tip: Try not to arrive between 2 and 3 p.m., when the front desk shifts are changing. I was the 9th person in line at 2 p.m., and after I was checked in, the gracious associate offered to walk me to the entrance and point me in the direction of the building in which I would be staying. I declined, noting that there were now at least 10 people in line behind me, waiting to check in. She insisted because "my shift is over and I am leaving, too." I was dumbfounded and asked if I heard right -- "there are 10 people in line and you are leaving?" She said yes. In fact, two people left the check-in desk, leaving just two people to accommodate the needs of 10
Manager Response: Thank you for your TripAdvisor review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!  We are pleased you enjoyed your time at the resort and the local area.  Your feedback about the check-in experience is appreciated and will be shared with the resort's leadership team.  Thank you again for your review and we look forward to your next stay.

Summary: This place is super nice!! We had two bedrooms each with it,s own bathroom Beautiful ocean view and all the amenities. Every morning we would open our door and let the sun shine in to wake us up, highly recommended!
Manager Response: Thank you for your TripAdvisor review and recommendation!  We hope you will visit us again at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!

Summary: Spent a week here as an exchange through Interval International.  We were very impressed with the property and the service, especially that we were contacted before our visit to ask if we had any special requests, including our preference for villa position.  We were allocated exactly what we requested and had a villa with a wonderful view of the hillside and the ocean. The villa had two bedrooms and two bathrooms and was very spacious with a lovely balcony.  New televisions were being delivered whilst we were there and are enormous. Every staff member we met was friendly and efficient and the activities organised were great.  We loved the cheese and wine evening where we met the staff and got a feeling that they really were trying hard to give every guest a good time.  There is
Manager Response: We are pleased you enjoyed your visit to Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!  Thank you for your review and our team looks forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: Came down for the weekend from Los Angeles to hang out with some friends that were in town from the Bay Area.  Condo had everything we needed.  The pool area was kind of crowded but to be expected when the weather is nice.  Did dinner both nights in the area took Uber for about $9.00 each way (Fig and Olive).  We would stay here again if the opportunity arises.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, Matt!  We hope you will join us again soon for another weekend getaway at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!

Summary: Stayed with friend who is an owner for 4 nights. Absolutely amazing. Service was excellent. Super location... the view was stunning. The pool was gorgeous - minor complaint was the loud unsupervised kids in quiet pool. The pool bar and menu was typical but hot and fresh! The villa was very spacious with comfortable beds. The furniture was attractive and the decor modern and comfy. The balcony was spacious view a just perfect view. We spent a ton on time out there. This resort NEEDS an on sight full service restaurant. They have a shuttle that takes you around, but with such a beautiful property- why leave ??
Manager Response: Thank you for your great TripAdvisor review!  We are pleased you enjoyed the resort and had an amazing time with your friends.  Please visit us again soon at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!

Summary: Very clean and quiet resort.  Weather wasn't great but the area had plenty to do.  Easy drive up the coast or into LA.  Reasonable supermarket and restaurants nearby.  This was a very nice place would come again.
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!  We are happy you enjoyed your time at the resort and look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary Heading: One of the finest facilities I have visited
Summary: I have spent a number of different weeks in many Marriot resorts over the years, but have found none that are better located with such as fantastic view as this one.  Close to great restaurants, yet, away from the bustle enough to enjoy some peace and quiet.  Within walking distance to Crystal Cove State Park, which offers a beautiful area to walk and enjoy the ocean.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, Doug!  It's really great to hear that Marriott's Newport Coast Villas was one of your favorite resorts stays.  We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: We have stayed here at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas several times.  The location and property is just great!  We are owners here as well.  We stayed in 2 different rooms this trip, as our flight back to Boston was cancelled due to the weather and we had to switch rooms.  Our first room we had asked to be in an "upgraded room".  In August we had also stayed in a newly refurbished room.  This room was already very warn.  The drawers in the kids room would not shut when filled with clothes.  The quality of the cabinets in the kitchen and in the master bath were not very good.  There are NO drawers in the cabinets in the bathroom!  As much as I love this property, I was very disappointed in the quality.  Also the living room furniture was not very comfortable.  My husband and I
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!  We appreciate your feedback on your recent visit and hope you will return soon on your next trip to California.

Summary: We come to this Marriott several times a year. Clean, updated, grounds are beautiful.  I recommend staying here without reservation. The shuttle will drive you places and come get you. There is no restaurant which would be nice but there are so many fabulous restaurants in Newport near Fashion Island, Chrystal Cove Center where Traders Joes in located and Laguna Beach. Try the Driftwood Kitchen or The deck in Laguna and don't miss The Beachcomber on the beach, breakfasts are great. Check Opentable fir reservations.  Love the area. Great beach walks. The pools are Marriott are wonderful and the main pool does have a snack bar and bar. Live music often. The services available are great, just ask.
Manager Response: Thank you for your great TripAdvisor review, Candice!  We are pleased you have enjoyed your time at the resort and look forward to your next stay at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!

Summary: This was my second time staying here. The property has beautiful views! Unfortunately it was not pool weather but the pool area is absolutely beautiful!  The beach is right down the road and beautiful. We did day trips (LA, San Diego, Disney). However there are lots of cute towns close by (Dana Point, long beach) My husband and son went to the Rose Bowl so my daughter and I went shopping at Fashion Island which is super close!  There are lots of good restaurants close by as well. It is in a great location. My only complaints were that the AC unit in the master bed room was ridiculously loud. Also I would highly recommend a top floor. We were on the second floor and complained and tried to move our room (honestly they could have cared less which is really disappointing I have
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!  We are pleased you enjoyed your time with us while in town for the Rose Bowl.  Please accept our apology for not being able to change your villa and the service you received from the front desk.  Your feedback is appreciated and will be shared with the appropriate managers.  Our team looks forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: I've stayed at the Marriott Newport Coast Villas 5-6 times... I've been there with my family and most recently with a group of adults.  Either way was fabulous!  Great location... grounds are gorgeous and accross the street from the State Park with the beach!  Grounds are beautiful... construction on the main walk-through area so that was a little hinderance but no big deal!  Lots of restaurants and shopping close by!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us again at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!  We are happy your recent visit was five-stars and appreciate your feedback.  Our team looks forward to your next visit!

Summary Heading: Everything you stay in Orange County for!!!!
Summary: The ocean views, the amenities, the villas/condos, the property, the service are all top notch. The access/closeness of beaches, ocean, activities, entertainment, restaurants, shopping is incredible. We have found that we hate to even leave the property as it seems like heaven on earth......
Manager Response: We are pleased you chose Marriott's Newport Coast Villas on your recent visit to Orange County!  Thank you for your review and we look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: This hotel was perfection for our family of five. The two bedrooms are situated far apart which is nice. Huge kitchen, dining area and bedrooms. Love having laundry in-room.  Went to two pools that were both great. The kids activities and the staff were excellent. Partial ocean view was enough.  The hotel is also very close to Crystal Cove State Park which had tons to explore. Great location for access to restaurants.   Two things on my wish list for future would be: (1) Kids Night Out every other night and (2) Poolside drink service  All in all, we miss it terribly.
Manager Response: Thank you for the love, Melynda!  It's great to hear your family had an awesome visit this month at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.  We look forward to hosting you again soon!

Summary: Just spent a fantastic holiday weekend at the property, the first of what will be many to come I hope.  The location was very close to the John Wayne Airport for easy arrivals/departures.  The views from the hillside overlooking the Pacific were great and the people fantastic starting from check-in until departure.  The units had beautiful granite countertops with stainless steel appliances and 55" LG tvs in the bedrooms and living room.  We were not brave enough to try the pool but plenty of others did.  The are gas grills located throughout the property for those that may get tire of eating out all the time and if you truly wish to be lazy check out the onsite movie theater.    BTW, if you are looking to buy into Marriott's timeshare program than this is a great place to
Manager Response: Thank you for your TripAdvisor review, Larry!  We hope to see you again soon at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.

Summary: Traveled to this resort for my 50th birthday. Love this resort plan to come back to this location again. Don't give in to the time share sales team unless you plan on using the resort multiple times. I normally go to Hawaii during January but this year on the advice of a friend I went to Newport Beach Marriott villas, it's not as nice as the Marriott kanopli beach on Maui but for a close resort only one hour flight time away it's a great option. .
Manager Response: Thank you for spending your birthday with us, Bob!  We are glad to hear you had a great celebration and appreciate your feedback on TripAdvisor.  Please visit us again soon at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!

Summary: I just got back from a 3 night stay at this resort. We stayed with another couple who invited us because they viewed a timeshare presentation and they were able to get a deeply discounted room. We stayed in the guest room. This room is small and has a bathroom but no bathtub. The main "King" room has a nice king bed and a large bathroom with tub. The small bedroom has a queen bed. This was one of the most uncomfortable beds I have ever slept in. You can imagine how tired I am now after not sleeping for the past 3 nights. I even placed a blanket underneath the fitted sheet to try and soften the bed. It didn't work. When we checked in, we asked for a high floor room. The front desk attendant told us that those are reserved for timeshare owners. The resort wasn't at capacity by any
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!  We appreciate your positive review and feedback you have provided about your stay.  Please accept our apology the bed did not exceed your expectations.  We always want our Guests to have a comfortable nights sleep and will share your comments with the resort management.  We look forward to your next stay with us at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.

Summary: Excellent location on the Newport Coast. A short ride from Laguna Beach and Newport Beach. The property has complimentary Shuttle bus service to Laguna Beach, Fashion Island and the nearby Crystal Cove State Park. The villa was well appointed and large enough to accommodate two couples. The views of the Pacific Ocean and Pelican Hill Golf Course are spectacular. The grounds were impressive and extremely well manicured. The pool area was large and included quiet pools. Pelican Hill Resort was located across the road and offers two World Class Golf courses and a Spa.
Manager Response: Thank you for your five-star review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas! We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay and hope to welcome you back soon on your next vacation to Newport Beach.

Summary: This is one of my favorite Marriott properties  It is the best thing than going to Hawaii. Beautiful ocean views.  Great restaurants near by.  Perfect get away with girlfriends.  Great shopping with even a shuttle to take to Fashion Island Shopping Center.  Beautiful grounds. Music by the main pool.  Perfect setting for a great vacation with family and friends.  Large 2 bedroom units. This was my 6 trip there.  i still love it and one of my favorite places to vacation.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, Norma!  We are glad to hear you had a great girl's getaway at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas in April.  Please visit us again on your next visit to Newport Beach!

Summary Heading: Great Location, but villa and sales pitch sorely lacking
Summary: The location of these villas is fantastic, but the very high pressure, unprofessional sales pitch set the tone for our stay and I'm sure, this review, as well. We purchased the introductory 3 night stay and added 3 more nights at full price as we were flying from Pennsylvania and wanted a few extra days in southern California.  With regard to the villas themselves, the pool, exterior decor and landscaping is beautiful and very visually appealing.  I had requested an ocean view twice by phone, but was placed in a villa on the first floor with a garden view. I really wasn't upset by this as I figured that members got all the ocean views. The garden view, however,  has shrubs directly adjacent to the balcony, so people walking by are within a foot or two of your balcony and there
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.  We are disappointed to hear about your experience at the sales gallery.  The behavior you described is not up to the Marriott standards of service our guests have come to love.  We would like to personally follow up with you regarding your review.  Please email us at customer.care@vacationclub.com with your preferred method of contact and include your TripAdvisor Username. As an alternative, you may reach us directly by calling 800-860-9384. We look forward to hearing from you soon.

Summary: This is my 8th trip to this resort. I am never disappointed. The rooms have 2 bedrooms, a washer & dryer, beautiful views and a full kitchen. They are also furnished beautifully. Very upscale Don't hesitate to book a vacation here.
Manager Response: Wow, trip number 8!  Thank you for choosing Marriott's Newport Coast Villas as your destination of choice in Newport Beach.  We look forward to your next stay with us and appreciate your TripAdvisor review!

Summary: Our 2 bedroom condo was recently renovated and extremely comfortable and quiet. We found the check in staff extremely accommodating and the property itself is beautiful.  The beach is a short walk (across the highway) and Crystal Cove is beautiful with lovely walks. Wonderful pool area for children and a quiet pool for adults. We could not fault this resort.
Manager Response: It's great to hear you had an amazing stay at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!  Thank you for your five-star TripAdvisor review and please visit us again on your next vacation to California!

Summary: Choose this resort after depositing our Starwood/Westin timeshare in Kauai into Interval International. Marriott's Newport Coast Villas are comparable to Westin Villas 2bdrm/2 bathroom Villa overall with the exception of the villa's finishes and kitchen appliances. Some of the common areas needed sprucing up some, but the general appearance of the resort was nice. The decor in the villa was pretty dated, but everything was clean and the villa contained everything it was supposed to - kitchen was stocked with dishes, flatware, pots and pans. We are a family of 6, so we made multiple trips to the nearby Pavillion's , Albertson's & Trader Joe's. (IF you are not familiar with the area, there is an annoying toll road nearby. Just put into your GPS or phone app that you want to avoid
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting us again at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!  Our team appreciates your detailed review and tips for fellow travelers.  We hope to welcome your family back again the next time to you visit southern California!

Summary: We have stayed at this beautiful,friendly,elegant, and accommodating 2bedroom condo twice in the past two years and have been delighted as grandparents and as a couple. The layout of units is so conducive to either a couple or family or extended family together. Ongoing activities for all ages daily available. The location across from state historical Crystal Cove is gorgeous and accessible...the shuttle service of the Marriott is incredibly timely,efficient,friendly and comfortable. Only down side is if you are interested in fine restaurant on property, only a pool bar...but good food. Many fine places to dine are a short drive away.
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!  It's great to know your visit in January was enjoyable and your family enjoyed the spacious villa.  We look forward to your next stay with us in California!

Summary Heading: If your not a timeshare owner don't go...
Summary: We are Marriott Gold rewards members and have stayed at several Marriott Vacation Club resorts. This a huge disappointment to us. There was a broken tile in the kitchen where someone obviously dropped something that kept popping up. We all lived in fear we were going to cut a toe off because of it. We had a torn sheet put on our master bed. There was a Silly String on the ceiling and on the chandler.I had to call and complain to the manager to get our room "cleaned." Our villa looked out at the canyon so do think you will have a view of the ocean. Very disappointed and will never go back.
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.  We are disappointed to hear about the problems you encountered with your villa and thank you for bringing it to the attention of the management team.  Your feedback is appreciated and we hope to host your family again so we may truly exceed your expectations.

Summary: All of the units are 2 bedrooms and very spacious.  Great for kids with the Sandbox room which has lots of activities.  Outdoor Ping pong, chess, great pools for kids and adults.  Enjoyed being close to everything
Manager Response: Thank you for your five-star review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas! We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay and hope to welcome you back soon.

Summary Heading: South Coast Ca at its best
Summary: This was a vacation exchange for a timeshare we own in Kauai. Didn't expect it to rival being in Hawaii but I think it did!  The property sits above the Coast highway. I think most of the villas have some ocean view- ours looked over a canyon, golf course, and then the ocean.  Very lucky and made a difference. The villa is typically Marriott, nothing special. The property is huge.
Manager Response: Thank you for your TripAdvisor review!  Hawaii is a hard destination to live up to, so we are happy your visit with us exceed your expectations.  Our team looks forward to seeing you again at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!

Summary: This is one of the finest Marriott Vacation Club properties anywhere.  The suites are spacious, well appointed, and uniquely laid out. On a hillside above the ocean, many have views of the pacific or surrounding hillsides.  Nice pools, plentiful gas grills, and even an outdoor firepit.  A convenient 10 minute walk to Crystal Cove state park for great oceanside walks.  Located near the restaurants of Crystal Cove, Corona del Mar, Newport Beach, and Laguna.The only downside is, because it is a timeshare, there are limited bars and restaurants on property.  (use the ones at Pelican Hill located just above the property).  But this is a minor inconvenience for its other positives.
Manager Response: We appreciate your review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!  It's wonderful to hear you enjoyed another great stay with us in California.  We look forward to seeing you again soon on your next vacation to Newport.

Summary: This is our third visit, exchanging our timeshare through Interval.  You always expect return visits to be smoother but our room wasn't ready.  Thanks, Mason Malone!  for fixing all and getting us into an even better room with ocean view. Excellent location, friendly staff, and fun activities.  We'll be back for a longer stay.
Manager Response: We can't wait to have you back, Deborah!  Thank you for your great TripAdvisor review and sharing your feedback with us.  We look forward to your next stay at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!

Summary: We have stayed there 5 times with our family and its great every time.  We originally did the lengthy time share presentation but since have utilized redweek to buy weeks off existing owners.  Its in a wonderful spot in between Newport and Laguna.  Kids love the pool and we love that all rooms are 2 bedroom suites.
Manager Response: Thank you for your TripAdvisor review, Bryan!  We are glad to have your family back again and look forward to your next vacation at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.

Summary: Positives * Amazing location with beautiful views. * This is a beautiful property * Can walk to a wonderful beach * Rooms are really big and nicely decorated * front desk staff was really friendly and helpful  Negatives * This was a relatively loud hotel.  The fan in the room is not nearly loud enough to block any of the noise.  We were awake for a long period due to the noise.  You should probably download some type of white noise app for your phone,  which I did at 1 am. * Front desk is understaffed.  The wait in the lobby can take a while.    * Time share sales staff in the lobby can be a bit aggressive.  You may want to avoid them.  Overall I would recommend this location.   Just be prepared for a few issues.
Manager Response: Thank you for your TripAdvisor review, Stephen!  We appreciate your feedback and are happy to hear your overall stay.  We hope to welcome you back soon to Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.

Summary: We had a 2-bedroom unit reserved at USD $450/night for 5 nights over Christmas.   Upon arrival, we were given the very worst room in this massive complex:  bottom floor, overlooking the highway.   When I phoned reception around 5 p.m. to change rooms, I was told to phone back at noon the next day.  When I walked over to reception, I was told there were 2 specific rooms we could switch to the next day .... but we would have to check out at 10 a.m. and then re-check in again at 4 p.m.!   We determined that these other 2 room options were also both on bottom floor, overlooking the highway.   Overall, we got different stories from staff who were utterly uninterested in making our stay better.     When we reported noise from our neighbors above, we were told that Security would pay
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.  We are sorry to hear about your disappointment with your recent visit due to the conflicting information you received.  We would like to learn more about your visit as this is not typical for the resort.  Please email us at customer.care@vacationclub.com with your preferred method of contact and include your TripAdvisor Username. As an alternative, you may reach us directly by calling 800-860-9384. We look forward to hearing from you soon.

Summary: As a encore presentation guest paying 1300.00 we were given room 3431 road noise and the loudest rudest neighbors above us! Toaster broken, freezer made noise all night, road noise awful! We requested top floor and were told on check in yes it's on the top floor not true! We had to go to the top to get any results, than the fire alarm battery went off at 4am, had to go to a supervisor for that. We own at Diamond Resorts, and a smaller time share in gulf shores we have no issues! Would never buy or stay here at Marriot Newport Coast again poor insulation from top to bottom, aesthetically beautiful but functionally failing!
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.  While we are pleased you enjoyed the resort, please accept our apologies for the sales presentation.  This is not typical and we would like to speak with you further about your experience.  You may contact us direclty at Customer.Care@vacationclub.com or by calling 800-860-9384.  We look forward to hearing from you soon.

Summary Heading: Great location, clean, quiet, friendly staff
Summary: Accessible to main coastal highway, close to restaurants and beaches. Resort sits on a hill which makes the views spectacular. Lowest buildings are the 2000s-3000s, higher level are the 4000s and highest level are 5000s. We stayed in 4535 and got the ocean, golf course and mountain views. Got in at noon and our room was ready. Had free hot chocolate pre-Christmas night with Santa. Has a small theatre; we watched Polar Express; served popcorn. Staff was friendly and helpful especially Gina from Peru. Has shuttles which go to the Fashion Mall and beaches. Provides 2 guest car passes. Guests park in designated parking area close to the lobby. Highly recommended...

From the pictures you can tell that this resort is on a hillside. I would still call it family friendly-but you will either need a car or take the shuttles with little ones or elderly visitors.  That being said we did an impromptu visit to Newport/Balboa Island for 4 adults and it was fantastic!  Our view was incredible and our weather was delightful for the time of year. You will need to plan ahead as they do adhere to their check-in times--there quite a few folks walking around and having lunch waiting for rooms. It does not have that Marriott feel of pampering that you get sometimes--no valet, did not see any help offered for baggage help, they did give directions but the resort is pretty wide spread and if you get off track it is a trek back to the lobby/check-in so pay

This place is beautiful but needs more restaurants. The room we got smelled like smoke bad I guess the people that stood in it before smoke a lot when they should have not. Over its a beautiful resort and staff is super nice! loved it!

Such a beautiful , great location and hotel . Family setting with games and  multiple pools  and hot tubs . Wonderful staff , great units and very affordable including the coffee shop Happy to have found this great home away from home !

The villas are situated on a hillside overlooking the Pacific Ocean will all the ammenities you need! The lovely units are spacious two bedroom, two bathroom units with several swimming pools and activities going on everyday. It sleeps eight people so it is a perfect place for a family. The shuttle takes you to Laguna Beach and Fashion Island.
Manager Response: Thank you for your five-star review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas! We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your family enjoyed their stay.  We look forward to your next vacation with us in Newport!

Summary: Marriott knew what they were doing when they created this coastal hillside vacation community.  Everything you want is here for a fun, family stay, couples getaway or golf vacation.  Centralized main building has it all (pools, recreation, fitness, games, movies, etc) save for an upscale restaurant but the local area is filled with great restaurants including an hour shuttle to Crystal Cove and beach side eats.
