The pool area is very large with a beautiful overlook to the Pacific and games for children.  Communal barbecuing areas and a great kitchen allow you too cook your own food.  Suites contain two bedrooms and two pullout couches so you can sleep quite a few people.  Very nice property and a great stay!
Manager Response: Thank you for the great photo and TripAdvisor review, Ashley!  We hope you will return soon to Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!

Summary: As our kids have grown from babies to tweens, our experience has only gotten better.  The recently-added movie room and play areas near the pools are awesome.  And we have always loved the basketball courts, putt putt golf, and playgrounds.   We have been coming to this resort every summer for 8 years, and absolutely love it!  We are never disappointed. It is a destination in and of itself, in addition to offering easy access to theme parks, science center, beach, and other local attractions.  Grocery stores are nearby and the BBQ grills are fantastic.  We cooked almost every night we were there because it was more appealing to relax and unwind than it was to go out to dinner.  The place is really that inviting.
Manager Response: Thank you for the fantastic TripAdvisor review!  We are so happy to be a part of your family's traditions and appreciate your kind words.  Our team looks forward to your next visit with us at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!

Summary: We stayed three nights on a Marriott offer requiring a 90 minutes sales presentation for the Marriott Vacation Club. It was not a heavy handed sales pitch and the weather was bad so we really didn't mind. If you intend to visit in June or early July be aware of the weather. June Gloom is no fun as the sun doesn't burn off the fog until early after noon. The is no restaurant on the property but there are many good restaurants in the  area. Unfortunately, none within walking distance.  Ruby's Shqke Shack is a great place not far down the PCH. If you are not traveling with kids you should be careful of when you book. School had just recessed and the pools were very crowded with children. Our two bedroom villa was very spacious and well maintained. The wi-fi is spotty. As compare to
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!  We are happy to hear your stay with us was enjoyable, even through the cloudy weather.  Your feedback on areas of improvement is important to us and we will share this with the appropriate managers.  Our hope is to welcome you back soon on your next vacation in California!

Summary Heading: Lots of space for family vacation
Summary: We stayed here for a vacation to the beach and Disneyland and it was great. The villas are large and had plenty of space for a family of five. The view overlooking the ocean is fantastic and the drive to Disneyland was only about 25 minutes. We stayed for a week and loved the dishwasher and washer/dryers in the rooms. The rooms were clean when we arrived and everything was working properly. We only used the pool and tennis courts, which were nice. You are given just small amounts of laundry and dishwasher detergent so if you're going to use them, make sure you bring extra. My only gripe would be that if you arrive back at the villas too late in the evening, it can be tough to find a parking space close to your building. Aside from that, thumbs up all around.

This resort is outstanding in so many ways.  First of all the location is ideal.  The view from the rooms is outstanding.  We stayed on the 4th floor overlooking the golf course with a beautiful view of the Pacific ocean.  Directly across from my room are multi-million dollar properties that share my view and my world.  Marriott really makes you feel comfortable from the moment you arrive until you check out.  As an owner I always get a kick out of getting my final bill and except for a few miscellaneous charges that I may have put on the room - the bill is zero.  Was it free?  Absolutely not but I purchased a timeshare at a decent price and have agreed to pay the yearly maintenance fee and feel I've not only gotten a bargain but a lifestyle that moves me into the world of the

We booked our stay at the Marriott New Coast Villas with Vacation Candy and had a wonderful experience working with them. The Marriott was wonderful! We loved our villa and the proximity to the 'canyon pool' -- hot tub, fire pit, gym facilities and tennis courts were all close by! We had a gorgeous view of the ocean. They offered a shuttle, to Crystal Cove beach, that ran every hour -- it was nice to not have to deal with parking! Our villa was about a 5 minute drive to Trader Joes, 10 minute drive to Whole Foods (Fashion Island) and about 10 minutes, or less, to Pavilion market. It's a phenomenal location! Great restaurants, like Javier's, are close by! I LOVED the salt water pools on the property! We have blondies in our family that tend to get green hair from chlorine
Manager Response: Thank you for your five-star review, Bev!  We appreciate your great feedback and hope to see you again soon at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!

Summary: We were very happy with this Marriott timeshare 2/2 villa. Although a top floor was requested, we were happy to have a bottom floor with a beautiful view of the ocean. We enjoyed coffee and breakfast every morning on the porch. The villas were completely stocked with all the basic kitchen necessities and the local grocery shopping was easily accessible. The unit was spacious and clean.  There was zero timeshare sale pressure from anyone. The staff was responsive and quick to handle any requests. The pool was heated and comfortable. The kids area had plenty of optional enjoyable activities. We used this beautiful resort as a hub from which to enjoy day trips but really enjoyed the Newport Beach area so much we will return next year.

Summary Heading: The walls and ceiling are paper thin!
Summary: When you first check in you think that the lines and running past the timeshare people are going to be the worst of your stay. Well then you're mistaken because then you're awoken by noisy neighbors running above you and their screaming babies at 6 am. It ruins your whole day and you're restless and can't enjoy yourself because you're soooo sleepy. I complained and they relocated us after a few calls to the front desk. There isn't any room service either so you need to grocery shop because the Hotel Market is ridiculously expensive! I wouldn't go back and pay 300.00 a night because it's not worth it!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, Chante.  We are sorry to hear the noise from your neighbors was a nuisance to you during your stay.  Our team takes noise concerns seriously and hope the second villa worked out better for your family.  We will share your feedback with the appropriate managers and thank you for bringing this to our attention.  We hope you will visit us again at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas so we may truly exceed your expectations.

Summary: We booked three nights here as a special offered by Marriott (of course the obligatory timeshare spiel was required). When we arrived, the main entrance was very inviting and elegantly appointed. The front desk service was very good and quite helpful. We toured the pool area and found it to be suitable with several pools so it didn't feel overcrowded.   We went to our villa, a 1-bedroom unit with a full kitchen. The unit was comfortable and had updated furnishings but was somewhat dark. The bed was comfortable and the entire unit was very roomy.   The resort does not have a restaurant which was a downer for us. If you're on a romantic getaway, cooking is not always at the top of your to-do list. There's small bar that serves food as well by the pool but the hours are very short.
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.  While it is disappointing to hear the resort did not exceed your expectations, we appreciate your feedback on your stay with us.  Please know, your feedback will be shared with the appropriate managers.  Thank you again for visiting and providing your TripAdvisor review.

Summary: I have been coming to this resort each year since it opened and have to say the each time gets even better.  Where to start?  -Amazing resort property across from a pristine nature preserve and beach!  -Some of the best views of any Marriott resort property with whale watching from your balcony.  -Genuinely friendly, helpful, prompt, and polite staff and management.  -Excellent salt-water filtered pools (no harsh chemical smell/feeling).  -Spacious villas with balconies, full kitchens, 2 bedrooms and 2 baths plus 2 sofa sleepers.  -Superior location to the beach, Laguna, Newport Beach, TJs, good restaurants, and more.  -Tons of on-site activities and good suggestions for local events and must-sees.   -Great hiking trails within walking distance.  -Make sure you have a meal at
Manager Response: We are happy to be your little piece of magic, Kassey!  Thank you for your wonderful TripAdvisor review and we hope you will return to see us again soon!

Summary: My wife and I spent a couple days at this property and had my son and his family join us for the day.  It was a great time and the resort was perfect for us and our 16 month old grandson to experience his first dip in the pool.  There is a 'tide pool' swimming pool just deep enough for that first swim.  We were offered an opportunity to return and we will!  In spite of the 90 minute sales pitch we'll need to attend, the deal was effectively a pay one night get two free on a summer holiday weekend.  You can't beat that at this property.  This time the kids will be staying with us.

I have had the pleasure of staying at a decent amount of Marriott Villas and this ranks as one of the top.  The location is phenomenal and while the grounds are extremely hilly it is easy to get around. The rooms were in great shape and large as you would expect.  It was close to John Wayne airport and Disneyland was a breeze to get too.  While the time of year was bit cold to be laying around the pool, we were still able to get in and I could only imagine it when it is warmer.  You are so close to so many beaches and restaurants it was. I would recommend this for both families and couples a like as you could do totally different things depending on who you go with.  What a wonderful place, I hope to return soon.

Overall, this place is great! They have nice pools, friendly staff and activities for kids! The downfall, they have ONE restaurant/bar and it closes at 7 pm. The other issue we have is they over charged us and charged us twice. They resolved it pretty quickly, but not before causing us a headache. Their response to all that was simply "sorry" which I found a little lax considering. Also, they do try to sell you on a time share but they aren't jumping down your throat, which is good.
Manager Response: We are glad your family had a great stay with us in June!  Thank you for your feedback and providing us your TripAdvisor review.  We are sorry to hear about the double charge that had to be corrected and will share your comments with our front office manager.  We hope to see you again soon on your next vacation in California!

Summary: We have been coming to the Villas for 6 years and will probably come the rest of our lives. My kids love the free activities, the park, the pools, the giant chess set and the arcade. My wife and I enjoy all of the above and the shuttle service to Crystal Cove, the community barbecues, the gas for pits and the central location between Laguna and Newport beaches. The grounds are amazingly manicured and clean. It is truly a wonderful family vacation spot.

This is our second vacation at this resort and it was perfect for us to visit a different place everyday.  Newport Coast and Laguna, San Diego,  LA, Santa Monica/Venice Beach, Anaheim.  The villas are clean, well kept and quiet with gorgeous ocean views.  Beds, towels and pillows were the standard for Marriott Vacation properties, no complaints.  You can not walk anywhere so you definitely need a car but there is everything you need in 3 to 5 minutes drive and great restaurants all around.

Summary Heading: Lovely resort - just not for us .......
Summary: Hubby and I are early 60's, active (hiking, cycling, swimming) but we do like to return to our accommodation at the end of the day and be able to sit on the verandah to read,take in the view, have a glass of wine etc. While this is a lovely looking complex, with well designed, comfortable, and well equipped apartments this was just  not possible for us.    The complex is designed and caters for groups, families and children. There are numerous activities going on throughout the day (think of a cruise ship itinerary only on land, most for families and children) We did not find one designated quiet area, there is no adult only pool and depending on where your apartment is you can have noise from the various recreation areas scattered around the complex.  Even though we were there
Manager Response: Thank you for providing your TripAdvisor review, Jenny.  We apologize the resort was not the right fit for you and your husband due to the resort activities.  The resort does get many visitors with children, especially during the summer.   We are also sorry to hear the front desk was unable to grant your room requests and will share your feedback with the appropriate managers.  Thank you again for your TripAdvisor review and for visiting us at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.

Summary: The Marriott Newport Coast Villas are like their own city.  This place is huge!  Everything is very clean and well maintained.  I really liked the pool area.  There are multiple pools, hot tubs, food, a bar, music, games, and an amazing view.  The rooms are large and have everything you need in them.  The views from the rooms facing the water/golf course are pretty good.  They do have a problem with customer service and with parking.  We found service lacking a few different times, primarily with communication and flexibility.
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!  While we are pleased the resort exceeded your expectations, we apologize you did not receive the service Marriott is known for providing.  Please know, we will share your comments with the appropriate managers and thank you for bringing this to our attention.  We look forward to your next stay with us and thank you for your TripAdvisor review.

Summary Heading: LACK OF RESTAURANT is the ONLY negative about this property.
Summary: A restaurant was promised to Newport owners in the sales presentation 10 years ago.  We love absolutely everything about this resort, and own 3 weeks, but it won't have the luxury feel of a world class resort until this happens.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing us your feedback on TripAdvisor, Natalie!  We are pleased to hear you have enjoyed Marriott's Newport Coast Villas over the years and most recently in February.  Your feedback about on-site dining will be shared with the appropriate managers as we continue to plan the future of the resort.  Thank you again for your review and for being a part of the Marriott Vacation Club family!

Summary: This was our second trip to this resort, we absolutely love the area. I have to admit we did not spend a lot of time at the resort during the days, there is so much to do around it.  For the reviewer who says no ocean view unless you are an owner:  we are owners and still got stuck on the second floor after requesting a top floor nearly a year in advance.  So I don't know who gets to stay in the top floors. We did get an ocean view though after some email exchange about a month in advance.  The villa was very clean, it was ready early.  We are owners because of the kitchens; we cook as a hobby and like to shop at the Trader Joes down PCH just a few miles. The dishwasher in our unit was not cool, most of the glasses wouldn't fit in the top rack and the bottom rack did not slide
Manager Response: We always appreciate hearing from our owners on TripAdvisor!  Thank you for your review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas and providing us your feedback.   Our team looks forward to your next stay with us in California!

Summary: The accommodations are very comfortable. Also, the pool area is beautiful as is the landscape. The views are scenic overlooking the Pacific Ocean.  The service is very good and the neighbourhood is charming.

Overwhelming! I felt a little overwhelmed when I walked into the resort. By the resort is walking distance to the Crystal Cove State Preserve and beach. This hotel was spectacular. The 2 bedroom villas are very spacious and comfortable. We enjoyed the fire pit, all the pools, sand box and views. Fashion Island, Newport Beach and Laguna Beach are a short drive along the coast which made this an exceptional stay.

Two bedroom villas are lovely and spacious. If you are not a time-share owner, you will not get a view of the ocean. We managed to at least get a second floor suite. That said, we were treated well!  Pools are wonderful! DJ's playing fun, family-friendly music making poolside a pleasant atmosphere. Many activities for kids. Crystal Cove beach is a shuttle ride away.  Beautiful property.
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!  As an avid TripAdvisor reviewer, we truly appreciate your feedback on your stay with us.  Our team hopes to see you again soon on your next vacation in California!

Summary: I travel frequently and this hotel is one of my favorites for the family. There are a wide range of free activities (Zumba is my favorite), the property is well-maintained, and the location is fantastic (right down the street from a beautiful beach and a short drive from beautiful Newport/Laguna Beaches). The apartment was fully stocked (utensils, washer/dryer, etc), the bedrooms were big, and the balcony offered a beautiful view of the sea. I would love to return!

Summary Heading: A great time was had by all!
Summary: Great property with killer views. Not right on the beach, but an easy walk to Crystal Cove State Nature Preserve. Lots of free activities, plus good gym facilities, pools, hot tubs, tennis, fire pit, basketball, video arcade, poolside grill and bar.   The all 2-bedroom units have a great floor plan for either a family or two couples and the washer/dryer in the unit is a plus. Kitchen is well equipped, but you need to bring your own foil, baggies, spices, etc.  Close to lots of tourist attractions - Crystal Cove, Balboa Island and Peninsula, Disneyland - but away from all the beach noise and traffic. Highly recommend.
Manager Response: We love it when everyone has a great time!  Thank you for your five-star review and we hope to see you again soon at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!

Summary: We enjoyed our visit and especially our ocean view room.  (Select building 4100 or 4200, upper floor and not a corner unit--windy on corners.). Clean, well-maintained grounds.  Shuttle transportation available to beach park as well as resort locations.  Friendly, professional staff.  They could offer more for children, though.  No fountains or children's pool, as at other Marriott resorts.  Food and drinks available only at the main pool.  Many dining options nearby.  Nice exercise area.

The resorts sits less than a mile from Crystal Cove Beach. Pelican Golf is across the street within walking distance too.  People complain that there is no real dining option but the poolside grill serves up good sandwiches. There are many great dining options nearby. The resort runs shuttles to several of these places. The shuttle service is limited. But parking is free and they offer two additional guest parking passes.  The accommodations are generous. The master bath has a large bath and separate shower. The kitchen is stocked with basic cooking supplies but you will need to bring spices. For those with large families they have units that accommodate up to 8. The second bedroom has a queen and sofa bed with a firm foam bedding.  The towels are surprisingly plush for
Manager Response: We are glad to be your perfect beach getaway!  Thank you for the five-star review and we hope to see your family again soon at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!

Summary: This is the type of property we should have been staying at all along, is what I said when we checked in. It has everything - proximity to beach and pch, seclusion and resort-feel, homey vacation-timeshare-like amenities but the ease of a normal hotel. Don't mind rolling our luggage up the elevator ourselves on a cart for all that we get jn return for an excellent value at this hotel. View is amazing from our room even though it is furthest from the ocean on map and all suites have patios.  Even a turtle-shaped towel thing on our bed!🐢No complaints whatsoever.

Been there 3 times now and love it more each time! Great property, lots to do for adults and children.  Great getaway not far from home but really feel like you are on vacation.  Pool is great and grounds are beautiful.  Can't wait to go back again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the love, Daleen!  We are pleased to hear your visits with us have been exceptional and we look forward to seeing your family again soon!

Summary Heading: Property is Great, service not so much.
Summary: I get a feeling that if you're not a Villa owner then you don't receive the same treatment. That would be the only downside of the property is the sub par service received especially by housekeeping. There is not good communication between them and the front desk and the housekeepers can have a bit of an attitude. Also the 11am check-out time stinks!  The property itself is gorgeous, rooms are nice and roomy. The views from every point on property are nice! The grounds are just great. They should really re-consider their 4PM check- in and 11AM check-out though!
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting Marriott's Newport Coast Villas, Patty!  We are happy you enjoyed the resort and the beautiful grounds.  Our team is sorry to hear about your housekeeping experience and will share this with the appropriate managers.  Please know, we strive to treat each guest the same, no matter if they are an owner with us or not.  Thank you again for your review and we hope your travels will bring you back to see us again in the future!

Summary: This place was amazing. I loved the rooms: great open plan, good separation for each bedroom. Fabulous views. Close to great shops and restaurants. A definite yes!  We used to live in Newport and when we return visit this will be the place we choose. I wish I had not waited so long to try it.

Summary Heading: Beautiful hotel in a beautiful location
Summary: Well appointed room, very clean and comfortable. Good service from the concierge staff. Close to the beach and shopping, restaurants. This was our second visit and we will return. The views of the ocean are lovely. Well maintained property.

Summary Heading: Great Resort- But Do Not Expect to Eat by Pools
Summary: This was our first visit to this Marriott Vacation Club Resort.   The facility was excellent and the people were always friendly and helpful.   It pays to stay in a newly renovated room on a high floor. The Starbucks, Pizza Hut and general store combination worked great and was well stocked on essential items.   We will go back.  BUT just do not expect any service, food or drink by the pools.  Two people handle all three pools and although they hustle there is no way for them to keep up.   It was faster for me to walk all the way back to the room and get each of us a beer and walk back.  Once when we were starving, we go up and moved to a table near the bar.  We could still not get anyone to wait on us.  Maybe we are just spoiled by the service at the pool in Lihue.  But
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!  We sincerely appreciate your feedback on your stay with us and are glad to hear you had an enjoyable vacation.  Our team will share your comments about the pool food service with the appropriate managers and thank you for bringing this to our attention.  We hope your travels will bring you back to see us again soon!

Summary: The pools are nice and chairs comfy.  The views amazing, lots to do on site and activities for the kids.  I loved our unit in the 4500 building sitting on the balcony and having coffee in the morning when it's snowing back where I live cannot be beat and I savored every moment.  I found the front desk staff to be very nice but the working staff housekeepers and grounds people rarely smiled or said hello and the housekeepers have to walk around alot they are not given rides in the numerous golf carts driven around like they do at the Marriott in Scottsdale. I would definitely stay here again, they do have a  shuttle for shopping and beach but I was not given a schedule.  Our room was nicely appointed.
Manager Response: Thank you for your TripAdvisor review!  We appreciate your positive rating and feedback for the housekeeping team.  We hope you will visit us again soon at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!

Summary Heading: Nice location and wonderful hotel resort
Summary: We traded a Marriott timeshare week from our home resort to stay at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas. We were very happy with the result.  The property is quite large, running along the coast with beautiful views of the Pacific. Our two-bedroom, two-bath, villa (essentially, a very large suite) was quite spacious and comfortable. There was a full kitchen, a nice dining room, a soaking tub in the master bedroom, and a lovely balcony with a table and four chairs, looking out towards the ocean.  The shower in the master bathroom was quite large. There were shower heads at either end, and let's just say it would be wasted if only used by one person at a time. Do with that what you will... but I certainly have no complaints about the arrangement!  The living room area was nice, and
Manager Response: Thank you for your TripAdvisor review Jess!  While we are happy to hear you enjoyed your villa, our team apologizes you did not receive the service Marriott is known for providing.  Please know, your feedback will be shared with the appropriate managers at the resort so we may address these concerns appropriately.  Thank you again for your review and we look forward to your next stay at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!

Summary Heading: Best Location for the Price you pay!
Summary: Marriott Newport Coast Villas is located at 23000 Newport Coast Drive, Newport Beach, Ca. 92627 While we had a nice enough 2nd floor villa in the 4300 building with an ocean view, I  enjoy staying onsite. It was so clear that you could see Catalina which is 26 miles plus in the ocean. We stayed at the Newport Coast Villas for 3nights this past week. It was nothing less than spectacular. The grounds are beautiful, the staff was attentive and the area magnificent. Where these other reviewers are coming from with less than five stars was due to weather (not Marriotts fault) or because they were on a lower floor. This is a typical Time share of Marriott, they do it best and thats why we are owners. Thanks Marriott for a wonderful time!! We will be back. Helpful hint: Ask for an
Manager Response: We are excited to hear you had a spectacular stay last week at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!  Thank you for your five-star review and for sharing your experience with fellow travelers.  We look forward to your next visit to Newport Beach!

Summary: Stayed at the Newport Coast Villas for 5 nights this past week.  It was nothing less than spectacular. The grounds are beautiful, the staff was attentive and the area magnificent.  Where these other reviewers are coming from with less than five stars was due to weather (not Marriotts fault) or because they were on a lower floor.  This is a typical Time share of Marriott, they do it best and thats why we are owners.  Thanks Marriott for a wonderful time!! We will be back.
Manager Response: Thank you for your five-star review Mike!  We are happy to hear you enjoyed your recent stay and appreciate the beautiful photo.  We look forward to our next visit and thank you for being a part of the Marriott Vacation Club family!

Summary Heading: Nothing wrong with this place but nothing great either.
Summary: While we had a nice enough 2nd floor villa in the 4400 building with an ocean view, I just did not enjoy staying onsite. For whatever reason, there were dreary clouds over the villas for most of the week, and the weather was quite cold. And the ocean view is a distant view of the ocean rather than a closer beach view.  Newport Coast is not the same as Newport Beach.  You can get to the beach but you will not feel like you are at a beach resort.  You are high up on a hill overlooking other villas and a highway and then you can see the ocean.  The beach itself was not that visible from our villa windows.  Also our villa's balcony was closed in on one side by the next villa.  Others have both sides closed in, and some are totally open.   I would recommend inquiring about that when
Manager Response: We appreciate your TripAdvisor review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!   It is unfortunate the weather did not cooperate during your stay as this is not typical for the area.  Your feedback on areas of improvement is appreciated and will be shared with the appropriate managers at the resort.  Thank you again for visiting and we hope to see you again in Newport Beach!

Summary: We had an ok time at the Villas. The room was very nicely done, but very dark inside. We were on the first floor with zero view unless you consider a back road and thick trees blocking the golf course a view. That was quit disappointing. Glad there was an elevator right by the room to big up luggage. What We was really surprised about, no restaurant on property. Every other big resort like this we've seen have at least a couple full service restaurants so we didn't have to leave to find a good dinner. The timeshare presentation was ok. We didn't feel high pressured or lied to.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!  While we are happy you enjoyed your villa, our team apologizes for not exceeding your expectations during your stay.  Generally, Marriott Vacation Club resorts have limited full-service restaurants as many of our owners choose to utilize their kitchens.  We appreciate your feedback and thank you for visiting us in Newport Beach.

Summary: Shared a two bedroom suite with friends and had a wondful time.  The kitchenette came fully equipped with utensils including coffee maker, toaster, microwave and range.  We had absolutely beautiful views from the third floor of the Pacific Ocean along with the three swimming pools and recreation area.  All the staff we're very helpful with anything we needed.  the only negative was the organization at check-in created bottlenecks in temporary parking and could have been a bit more efficient, but all was forgotten after two leisurely days visiting with friends and lounging at the pool!  I would definitely recommend this to a friend and will be returning in the future!  My map said to turn on Tuscany Road, but you need to turn right on Provence Road to get there from Newport
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!  We appreciate your five-star review and hope you will join us again soon for some more sunny weather!

Summary Heading: Lovely property, but better with some tweaks
Summary: Newport Coast is a lovely SoCal retreat located in an upscale area. The villas are built on a hill overlooking the ocean which provides many opportunities for great views. However, there is a lot of plant growth blocking those views so although our villa should have been able to have a clear shot of the water, it didn't. Being on a hill, casual walking can be a challenge. A shuttle circles the resort but not on a schedule. A different shuttle does make runs to close in attractions. Offsite activities are plentiful but finding out about them was not easy as travel info was located on a lower floor, not lobby level. Our villa was very nice, well equipped, full kitchen and comfortable. The pools offer water activities for families of all ages. Overall we really enjoyed our stay but
Manager Response: Thank you for your review Carl!  We are happy to hear your family enjoyed their stay with us in May on their southern California retreat.  Our team looks forward to your next visit to Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!

Summary: Great location for visiting Newport Beach, Laguna Beach and Crystal Cove State Beach and shopping center.  Hotel has a shuttle that runs to all the aforementioned locations throughout the day and early evening.  If you do not mind walking Crystal Cove State Beach is about a 20 min. fairly easy hike to the cliffs over looking the ocean and another 15 walk down to the actual beach...all absolutely worth it!  Be sure to take water with you. Paths are nicely laid out and maintained.  Good for jogging and biking.  There are 5 pool areas.  The main pool area is nice as it has 3 separate pools, one for children and families, a quiet pool where you can swim laps without worrying about being jumped on by a small child, and the third for playing water polo or more active games.  The main
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed TripAdvisor review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!  It is great to hear your family had an excellent stay and enjoyed the spacious villas.  We look forward to your next stay and tahnk you again for your review!

Summary: Wonderful amenities, playing pool and ping pong by the pool in the late afternoon... Beautiful sunset views.  Landscaping was gorgeous.  Recommend a breakfast at the close-by Beachcomber Restaurant, and order the beignets. Loved it!
Manager Response: Thank you for the five-star TripAdvisor review Susan!  We appreciate your kind words and hope you will return to Marriott's Newport Coast Villas soon!

Summary: We only stayed here for two nights while we were apartment hunting in Orange County, so we didn't really stay very much at the property or get a chance to explore the on-site amenities. We had a room on the third floor of our building, so we had a beautiful view of the ocean. It definitely seems like a great property to take your family or maybe to go with a group of friends. My only complaint was the vent in our room made this weird wind-blowing noise that seemed a little loud and unusual. It wasn't constant, but it would come and go quite frequently. As for the location, it's a bit far from a lot of the main attractions in Orange County which makes it a great retreat if you just want to relax and stay on-site. If you want to check out the attractions in Orange County, I would
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us during your apartment hunt Mandy!  We are glad you enjoyed your short visit and hope you will visit us again soon at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!

Summary Heading: A stunning property! - with one BIG caveat!
Summary: This is possibly one of the most stunningly beautiful properties we have ever been to, comprised of 40 buildings on many acres of lush, beautifully landscaped hills situated high above Crystal Cove on the south end of Newport Beach. Each building has from 2 to 4 floors with 4 or 6 rooms on each floor - you do the math - this place is HUGE!!!!! The rooms we stayed in (more on that later) were both newly renovated and VERY nicely appointed. All of the 'villas' on this property are two bedroom, two bath units with fully stocked full kitchens (even a stove and range with cookware AND dishwasher), dining table for 6, full-size living room and large balcony. It even comes with a washer and dryer. There is a large HD TV in both of the bedrooms and another in the living room, and the
Manager Response: Thank you for your TripAdvisor review Gary!  We apologize for the inconvenience of being on the second floor, but are happy to hear the top floor villa worked out for your family.  As always, our front desk team will make every effort to honor your villa requests when available.  Thank you again for your review and please visit us again on your next vacation in Newport Beach!

Summary: We stayed in the 4200 building and LOVED it!  Fairly close to the little park and not far from the pool and game room.  We also enjoyed the free shuttle to Crystal Cove beach and renting chairs.  The view was wonderful from our room.  These villas are perfect for larger families.  Master bedroom has a view but guest room does not.  Pull out sofa comfortable (according to my son).  Grocery stores close (Vons Pavillion and Trader Joe's to the south)  to stock up the kitchen.  Service was also very good- very nice staff.  We will return!
Manager Response: We are happy to hear you loved your villa!  It's also great to hear that the pull-out sofa was was comfortable for your son to slep on during your stay!  We hope you can visit us again soon and thank you for your review!

Summary: We are Marriott Vacation Club owners at Grande Vista in Florida.  Came here on a package, meaning we had to go to 90 minute presentation.  We had a lovely and very knowledge rep, Lisa, who explained everything thoroughly regarding going on Marriott's points program.  She answered our questions to our satisfaction THEN her "supervisor" came in to close the deal.  This poor supervisor had no customer service manners at all.  She was rude and appeared mad when, after giving us the pitch, we decided not to go with her advice to go with the points program.  oh my!  She was not a happy supervisor. Lisa, on the other hand was gracious and professional. We chose not to spend $18,000 to switch to points.  We are platinum elite Marriott Rewards customers a d we love staying at Marriott
Manager Response: Thank you for the five-star review Mary!  We are happy to hear Lisa took good care of you during your presentation.  Our team apologizes that another associate was rude to you during the presentation and will follow up on this with our sales managers.  Thank you again for your review and being a part of the Marriott Vacation Club family!

Summary Heading: Great resort with lots of amenities
Summary: As Marriott timeshare owners for several years, we finally got two units and were able to spend a week at the Marriott Newport Coast Villas. The resort is well maintained (ask for the refurnished rooms) and all units are two bedroom, two bath with nice balconies, and all that you need to cook, rest, relax and swim. Some free classes like beach walks and yoga...one of the few timeshares with a nice outdoor place for ordering lunch and early dinner by the pool. Patios throughout and barbque grills...several pools and hot tubs, gym and spa. Only a few negatives...we asked months in advance for a view and asked up until and including arrival...no luck...asked for rooms next door and got them...kind of...they were around a corner. The sales pitch we had was another story. Very
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!  We are glad your experience was positive and that you enjoyed your villa at the resort.  Our Customer Care team would like to learn more about your sales presentation as this is not typical for our owner updates.  You may reach the Customer Care team by email customer.care@vacationclub.com or by calling 800-860-9384.  Thank you again for your review and we look forward to speaking with you soon.

Summary Heading: Favorite Place to stay in SoCal
Summary: If this is possible, we loved this place even more than before when we went to stay there in 2009 and 2011.  This has become more family friendly than ever with the King Triton's Cove that provides daily kids activities, and literally a kids center indoors from the kids playground.  My kids practically dragged me here every day.  Since I spaced out our Disney trips to every other day, the other day was spent in the Cove where they had a room full of toys (legos and train tracks with Thomas is what swayed my son), a larger area for games and big screen tv and also a section for crafts.  The Cove also allowed you to rent out 2 dvds, 2 books and 2 games (including puzzles) a night so my kids were more than thrilled.  The view was gorgeous and it was the perfect spot for our family
Manager Response: We are glad Marriott's Newport Coast Villas is your favorite SoCal resort!  Thank you for your five-star review and we look forward to your next visit to Newport Beach!

Summary: This was our second visit to this property.  The weather was perfection and we spent a good deal of time by the pool, enjoying the live music on Friday and Sunday afternoons.  The views are stunning and the staff was very helpful.  We drove to Laguna Beach, Balboa Peninsula, Huntington Beach and took in the sights.  Unfortunately these spots are overcrowded on the weekends.  Do yourself a favor and plan on hitting the beaches on a weekday.
Manager Response: We agree that the views are breathtaking!  Thank you for your positive review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas, Joyce!  We hope you and your family will return soon!

Summary: We had an excellent week-long family vacation at the Marriott Newport Coast Villas. The property is beautiful and well-maintained with amazing views of the Pacific. On check-in, we informed the front desk we were celebrating our 9th wedding anniversary and they sent up a complimentary bottle of champagne! We requested and were given an ocean-view room on the 3rd floor of the 2200 building. The view was incredible and the building was convenient to the pool and children's playground. There were plenty of distractions for our 2 year-old daughter including the playground, pool, miniature golf course, sand box, and koi pond. She especially loved taking the 'bus' to Crystal Cove beach, playing in the sand, and exploring the tide pools. In the evenings, we had fun barbecuing outside
Manager Response: Thank you for celebrating your anniversary with us at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!  We are happy your family had an enjoyable vacation and hope you will join us again soon in Newport Beach!

Summary: It's our first time to the Newport Beach Area. we heard good things about it and found Great many things to love about it !  Our stay at the Marriott Newport Coast Villas (Suite 4824) started with our check in with Joanie B. she was a gem, she helped us with places to eat and see. So Much to see and do. The Resort is huge with 3 pool areas. everything was perfect ! we will return ! I do agree with some of the other comments about the need for sound improvements. we had one night where the neighbors were a problem. we were here for 7 nights.
Manager Response: We're glad to hear Marriott's Newport Coast Villas was a hit for you!  Thank you for providing your TripAdvisor review and your feedback on sound proofing.  We love to hear from our guests and will share your comments with the appropriate areas.  Thank you again for your review and we look forward to your next visit!

Summary: We have enjoyed staying here two times, may 2013 and April 2014. We would highly recommend staying here and are already planning a return trip with family. The main pool area has beautiful views  and is kept immaculate .the gym has several machines to choose from. There are many activities for children. They could use more ping pong tables--kids suggestion. The villa is spacious and kept very clean. All the staff we spoke with was helpful. Our only complaint is the people staying above us continued making noise after midnight and were up by 6:30 am making noise. They were inconsiderate, which is not the Marriott's fault.
Manager Response: We are glad to hear your two stays at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas were excellent!  Thank you for your TripAdvisor review and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Perfect location for a perfect vacation
Summary: Marriott's Newport Coast Villas are spacious, spotless, comfortable! The pools, convenient store and cafe, shuttle to local restaurants and shopping, excellent concierge service and excellent staff from front desk to housekeeping! The Villa grounds are beautiful and so is the location! Although you will need a car, it is so easy to fly in and out of John Wayne airport and rent a car, the Villas are a short and easy drive from the airport! The villas are a few minutes drive to the ocean and all that the Newport area has to offer - great restaurants, shopping, beaches - so much to explore! Through the hotel, we took a tour bus into Hollywood, Beverly Hills, Universal Studios - a fun day! We can't wait to go back!
Manager Response: Thank you for your TripAdvisor review Maddie!  We are happy your family had a five-star experience while visiting Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.  Please visit us again on your next trip to Newport Beach!

Summary Heading: Excellent looking property,  very well maintained; friendly and helpful staff,  sound proofing needs to be significantly improve
Summary: Spent our Spring break here with our eleven year olds and had a blast. Poolside, Whale watching,  Disney, Surfing and loads of beach time observing all the seals and dolphins. Staff is outstanding (Bill front desk and Antonio at conceirge).
Manager Response: Thank you for your TripAdvisor review Jeanette!  We are happy to hear your family enjoyed their villa and the local attractions.  It is also great that Bill and Antonio went above and beyond in making your stay special.  Thank you for stayikng with us and we look forward to your next visit to Newport Beach!

Summary Heading: Pretty, but removed and lacking ocean views...
Summary: We went there this past spring break for their promotional tour.  The property sits on a hillside that should overlook the Pacific.  Our 2 BR unit did not, so our stay inside the unit felt like apartment living.  We were with our two teen boys and went site seeing up and down the coast to Newport Beach, Laguna, Balboa, etc and the weather was perfect!  These towns offer fun beach side spots and great restaurant dining as well,  The beach/surf shops were a treat and the boating and marina was great value add.  We would never buy here, though, because the ocean views are so limited  even poolside, where you have to stand to catch the ocean - poolside lounging barely reveals the ocean.  Amenities were nice and they definitely cater to families offering evening events, nice sports
Manager Response: We are happy to hear your family enjoyed their stay at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!  Thank you for sharing your experience with fellow travelers and providing us your feedback about the views and restaurant options.  We hope you will visit again on your next vacation in Newport Beach!

Summary Heading: Could Hear Every Step Taken by the People Above Us
Summary: My wife and I were on a road trip from Coronado up the California coast and spent 3 nights here. The resort is very large with many multi-storied buildings. We stayed in building 2800 on the second floor. This turned out to be a big problem because, as we were soon to find out, we could hear every move and step taken by the people above us.   After exploring the area and pool and returning to our unit around 6:00 pm, the noise from the unit above us started. After a couple of hours of listening to the pounding and every footstep taken by the people above, we called the front desk to complain. The front desk sent a security person over to our unit to investigate. When the security person arrived, he came into our unit and listened to the noise above us. He agreed that it was very
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.  We apologize that the noise from the villa above made your stay unpleasant.  This is not typical for the resort and will be followed up on accordingly.  We would like to learn more about your stay and invite you to contact our at Customer.Care@vacationclub.com or by calling 800-860-9384.  Thank you again for providing us your feedback.

Summary: The Marriott's Newport Coast Villas lived up to all the positive reviews. The staff was very friendly and professional. The two-bed room villa was well cleaned and the view from the patio of the ocean was exceptional. The landscape around the villas was first rate. I would highly recommend this resort and look forward to my next trip.
Manager Response: Thank you for the five-star review Larry!  We are happy to hear you had a great time at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas and hope you can return soon!

Summary Heading: Great stay, don't know why it only got 3.5 stars
Summary: Spent a week there, as I came from Thailand we didn't spend time at the pool nor the beach.   The room is big and nice, with all the amenities you need. Dishwasher, microwave, oven and big fridge and also washer dryer. They also provided all the detergents need for the whole week.   It's a big resort, so it's good to know where you want to be. I have little kids, so I stayed near the tot lot, very good for them to wait for me to load/unload or cleaning up before we leave the hotel in the morning.  The staff are great, nice and helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you for the five-star review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!  The 3.5 star indication is based on hotel class and is decided by TripAdvisor.  Our guest rating is 4.5 stars based on user reviews of their stay.  We hope to see you again and thank you for your review!

Summary Heading: Lovely views at a family friendly resort
Summary: Newport Coast Villas are various buildings spread over a large area.  The higher floors usually have a great view of the coast and the ocean.  The villas are all 2 bedrooms, 2 baths.  There are two pools by the clubhouse and other pools in other areas.  The main pools get crowded during spring break and summer.  The villas themselves are spacious, with one large bedroom and another smaller one, a full kitchen, a living room area, dining table for 6, two tubs and a walk in shower.  There are TV's in the living and bedrooms, as well as a DVD player.  (Note that it is a DVD player; it does not play Blu-Ray discs.)  At popular times, parking may be a little issue, but they will send carts to ferry you from your villa to the clubhouse or parking garage.  There are barbeques outside,

Gorgeous Tuscan style setting makes you feel like you're in Italy. The front desk staff was so pleasant and helpful. A bottle of wine was delivered to our room on my husband 's bday. What a nice surprise!
Manager Response: Thank you for celebrating your husband's birthday with us at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!  We are thrilled to hear you had a great time on vacation and hope you can join us again soon!

Summary: Marriott Newport Coast villas are beautiful.  We are a family of five with three small children.  The villas provide a perfect place for a large family to stay comfortably.  We thought our room was very clean upon check in but found the last guest's underwear under the sofa.  We also requested a week ahead of time top floor ocean view and did not receive either.  We were on ground floor and the room and the walking in the room above us was very loud.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your feedback with us on your recent stay!  While it is great to hear your family enjoyed their vacation with us, our team apologizes for the cleanliness and villa location issues you encountered.  Please know, your feedback will be shared with the appropriate managers for further review.  We hope to welcome you back soon to Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!

Summary: I have stay here for several times with my family and we love the place. It have great pools, a nice game center and the surroundings areas are beautiful. Rooms are comfortables but they need a upgrade. Newport beach is a beautiful place to stay and laguna beach is near. Is a great place to go with family and friends. Rooms are big and beds are great. Kitchen is fully equipped. They have a great service.
Manager Response: Thank you for your positive review Sammy!  We are happy to hear your family enjoyed their vacation with us at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.  We look forward to your next visit with us!

Summary Heading: HOTEL GOOD FOR FAMILY WITH GRANDCHILDREN!
Summary: I had requested a renovated room on the highest floor with a view of the ocean and early check-in....did not get that!....check in was at 4pm but had to wait an additional 20 minutes to get the keys...was bothered at check-in with Time Share Babble which was annoying!!!!........The room was large and neat when we got there but we had a view of the street and small view of ocean..... :-(....(disappointed) .They only have 1 restaurant on the property( need more) at the bar by pool area...and a small market in lobby...At least my grandchildren (2 & 4) had a great time with all the activities planned!!!!!!!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!  We are happy to hear your grandchildren had a great time enjoying the many activities at the resort.  Your feedback on areas of improvement is also appreciated and will be shared with the appropriate managers.  Please visit us again on your next trip to Newport Beach!

Summary: This was our first trip to the west coast with the kids and we were very fortunate to book this property for the week.  The grounds were amazing, the rooms were in 5 star shape.  The service was excellent - from check in to check out.  The kids (ages 14, 12, 8) had a great time.  The location was perfect - centrally located to LA and San Diego with easy access to Laguna Beach (must go) and whale watching (newport beach).  If we ever go back to the west coast, we are for sure staying at this resort.  Only negative - kids club was under construction (teens).

The grounds are beautiful in a wonderful part of town! Great spacious accommodations able to accommodate a large family. Lots to do for kids of all ages-pools, ping pong, movie theatre, putting green, basketball, play ground etc. Highly recommend and hope to go back.  Just an FYI, they will give you the timeshare push upon checking in. We just turned down the tour and moved on. Overall great place to visit.

We have stayed at the Newport Coast Villas three different times.  We found that the hotel staff is very helpful and courteous.  The two bedrooms, full kitchen, two full bathrooms, living room, and veranda are well appointed and very spacious and comfortable.  The view of the Pacific Ocean is delightful.  The swimming pool and bar serving drinks and food is very nice,  They even have live music at the pool!  Of course going to Newport beach is wonderful too.  We really recommend the "villa" for a comfortable get away.

Our first stay at Marriott Newport Coast Villas was back in 2011 and it was a memorable stay. The location was super-perfect, overlooking the ocean, close to Fashion Island Mall and the naturally preserved beach. A super-large grocery shopping is 2 min drive.. Opposite to the resort there is a luxury golf course and resort where you can have a great gourmet meal (Pelican Hill Resort). There is a fire pit where many of the guests gather around during sunset for some gossip and social networking.. I would always come back..

Summary Heading: Great stay with Family in March
Summary: We stayed at this location for 4 nights the last week of March.  My 3 kids loved the pools and outdoor activities available for them to use such as the giant checker board.  The property is very nice and we specifically chose this location because of the ability to cook within the units knowing that we wanted to eat breakfast and some dinners in. Lots of places to choose to get a few quick groceries. The outdoor grills to cook on were perfect for what we were looking for.  The grill we used by our unit even had planters with an assortment of herbs to use for cooking growing in it.  Loved that the location was in walking distant to crystal cove state park if you are looking for outdoor activity within walking distant.  We took the family for a walk down to the beach and explored

After extensive research we chose to vacation in Southern California for our Spring Break in lieu of Florida.  We found that in March it was a little less expensive in terms of airline tickets and lodging.  We found this resort on the internet and couldn't have been more pleased with the choice.  We arrived before the stated check in time and the person at the desk was more than accommodating with an early check-in.  As a result, we got to enjoy the pool for an extra day.  We stayed in a freshly renovated/updated villa, which was very well done(clean, new, modern).  With 4 children ranging in ages from 5 to 14, the villa was the right size.  The amenities were fantastic.  The pools are large and heated (as they stated on the website).  There were always enough towels and chairs.

This is a beautiful property  with gorgeous views of the pacific ocean up above Crystal Cove State Park.  We are a family of 5.  Our "kids" are  17, 19 and 23.  I can't fit them all in one bed like i used to!!  So finding a hotel at a reasonable cost is hard to do for the 5 of us.  Our unit/condo at the Marriott was perfect.  As you enter, there's a closet with a washer and dryer in it, a full size kitchen, a bedroom, bath, living room and master suite.... and our unit had a beautiful view of the Pacific ocean that we could enjoy from a small deck.    We stayed here so we could explore colleges, go to Disney and enjoy the beach.  Even though it was about a half hour from Disney, it was a welcomed retreat after a long day at the park.  This is part of a vacation club, but we

Third time here, had a fun and relaxing holiday despite the cool weather.  So many things to do and see in this area. This time we had 2 units with our families, lots of space for adults and kids, super clean BBQs, and cool fire pit.  The Tues afternoon social was a great place to meet people and the Marriott staff over wine and cheese.  So impressed with the service and helpfulness of each and every staff member. Thank you, Joanie, for "dropping everything" to help me print something I needed for a critical work deadline.  Whatever you're doing Marriott, it works! We are definitely coming back and have put this place in our "favourites".

Summary Heading: Beautiful views with relaxed atmosphere away from the bustle of LA
Summary: We had a great time the coastal villas.  We had a great view of the ocean. Beautiful!  Pool/ hot tubs are very nice.  Wish there were restaurant accommodations besides the pool option.  There are restaurants fairly close( 5 minute drive), lots of good options. Loved the State park across the highway for runs and walks on the beach.  Room was great sized( lighting a little low) but very comfortable.  Wish there was a walking path or stairs down to the basketball court and putting green from the 3000 building.  Very awkward layout and walking paths. We enjoyed our stay here and would love to come back!

We really enjoyed our time at the Marriott resort.  The location is tremendous, as it's close to Laguna Beach, Balboa Island and Crystal Cove State Park.  The amenities and offerings were great as well, as they had things to do all over the property.  They even offered daily activities for families and kids (and adults) that really made this hotel a great choice.  We thoroughly enjoyed the pool area and loved how massive the rooms were.  It offered our family of 5 a chance to spread out, and gave mom and dad a private room too!  The only downside of this property would be the cost/night and the high cost of some of the food/drinks at the pool.  For example, a smoothie for $8?  Burgers for $15?  C'mon Marriott, that's a little much.  Overall, however, we really enjoyed our stay

Summary Heading: A great place to stay for a family
Summary: Two bedrooms, two bathrooms, plus a sofa that folds out as a queen-sized bed.  A great place to stay - lots of room, including nice views, kitchen, washer/dryer....perfect!  Convenient off the Pacific Coast Highway.  Great for college campus tours, visits to Disneyland and Disney California Adventure.  Great pools to enjoy the sun.    Sure beats staying at a regular hotel, and getting either two rooms, or trying to squeeze into a suite.

Great location and great views.  Units are new and provide convenient parking and all amenities.  Easy access to state parks and short drive north to Newport or south to Laguna.  Look forward to staying here again.

We are a vacation club owner at this resort so we stay once every few years. It's such a fantastic resort with every amenity you can think of. Every villa is spacious with 2 bedrooms/2baths. The interiors are nicely done.  The  property itself is really beautiful. The resort pools are gorgeous. One of our favorite features is the large fire pit where you can relax and roast marshmallows. Trader Joes is just down the road which is really handy. The resort's location can't be beat. For this trip, we were in room 4641 which was perfect. The view from the balcony was breathtaking, perfect for a glass of wine and a good book. :-)

Another great Marriott Vacation Club property with a view of the Pacific ocean and Catalina Island.  Property was very clean, staff is friendly, professional and courteous.  Lots of places to visit and things to do within 10 minutes how this outstanding property.  Steve Ramsthel
Manager Response: Thank you for the five-star review Steve!  We are happy to hear you had a great time at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas and hope you will return soon!

Summary: The property is beautiful! The views are breathtaking.   Our stay was a 10! The pools are very nice and so are the villas.  Couldn't have been more pleased. The services especially the shuttle was wonderful.  We spent one of our days at Crystal Cove stats park.....very enjoyable beach and tide pools... Highly recommend !

This resort is in a beautiful area overlooking the pacific ocean. It is across the street from Crystal Cove Beach. We spent a relaxing afternoon walking down the beach and watching whales. There are plenty of shops and restaurants in the immediate area, although we chose to cook and eat in. I own at a Marriott resort, but not this one, and traded through Interval International. I was given a second floor room in the 4400 building with a picturesque view of the ocean. I signed up ahead of time for a paid daily tidy-up service and one mid-week cleaning. This was done wonderfully. This trip was half business and half vacation, so I did not get a chance to participate in many resort activities. But, I walked past the main pool and activity center and it seemed there were activities
Manager Response: Thank you for the five-star review Robin!  Please visit us again at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!

Summary: Beautiful, fabulous rooms, awesome location, helpful staff. Great salt water pool by our unit. Gas fire pit was lovely. Partial view of gulf from balcony was nice. Rooms had plenty of room, comfy beds. Great locations for beach, shopping and access to freeway for traveling about CA.  This place is one of the best resorts we have stayed. I would recommend it to everyone and can't wait to come back. Fabulous time. I ❤️ CA.
Manager Response: We are so glad you had a great time with us in California!   Thank you for choosing Marriott's Newport Coast Villas and we look forward to your next stay!

Summary: We stayed here at the same time last year (March, 2013).  This year, we were given a different room.  The room we had was in the 4700 series, and we backed up to a canyon.  It was very quiet and away from most of the resort, which is what we wanted.  If we came back to the room too late, we struggled to find parking.  Fortunately, there is a shuttle that will take you to and from your room.    However, on one of the nights, we called for a shuttle and waited around 15 minutes before deciding to walk.  Luckily we found an employee driving a cart around and asked him to shuttle us to the main entrance.  They never sent a shuttle, but all's well that ends well.  Beautiful property, lots of amenities, and lots of things to do.
Manager Response: Thank you for your five-star review Brandon!  We appreciate your feedback about the shuttle and will share this with the appropriate managers.  We look forward to your next stay at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!

Summary: We had never stayed here before but will be back for sure. So perfect. Beautiful resort, lots to do, gorgeous views from everywhere. The staff is so attentive and just so nice. Really a great place for children and adults. The rooms are spacious, very modern and clean. For activities you take your pick - the pools, outdoor chess, pool, ping pong,shuffle board,  everyday activities and music poolside, tennis, basketball, tetherball, firepit and smores. Really nice gym. Great grills by every building and all so well maintained. You never run out of things to do and really never need to leave the resort, although there is so much to do in the area the week flies by. We will be back next year for sure!

This was the first time I visited and stayed at this Marriott resort-I was so excited, and I was not disappointed. The grounds are beautiful. The activities, that we participated in, were lots of fun. Our 2 bedroom unit was a lovely "home for a week". It's close proximity to the pool and activities were perfect. Love the intimate movie theater, where we enjoyed two delightful movies. Our patio view of the ocean was breathtaking from morning to sunset. We especially enjoyed the resort proximity to Crystal Cove- a great hike to the beach and wave action. The sunsets were incredible. The staff was friendly and helpful. The surrounding area was fun to explore and we found some perfect restaurants. We made memories that will last a lifetime!
Manager Response: Thank you for the five-star review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.  As your first Marriott stay,we are honored to have exceeded your expectations!  Please visit us again on your next trip to Newport Beach!

Summary Heading: YOU MUST BE CRAZY TO GIVE A BAD REVIEW
Summary: NOW this may come as a shocker but I personally did not stay in these Villas in New port but I work for a company and we have a rental baby furniture for the elite and many of our consumers stay in Marriott Newport Coast Villas and just the entrance is AMAZING the view and the entrance is magical looks like something out of a story book fairy tale absolutely breath taking ,the staff that i always speak to is always pleasant has a smile on face and is up to par with his customer service , any other location would not offer a service to another company to accommodate the guest but there customer service help us out and take the items and bring them to guest not only assuring the guests are well accommodated and comfortable and also assure their safety and privacy so no one out of

Summary Heading: Beautiful expansive grounds with limited views of ocean
Summary: We are owners of a Marriott time share in Palm Dessert and traded our unit for this Newport Coast location.  Just off Pacific coast highway it was a beautiful location and the units, as always are clean and well appointed.  The trees out side most of the units seem to have all grown so tall that the views of the ocean were very limited.  Other than the tall and thick trees, thee setting, service and comfort of this location were outstanding,

This resort is our top resort so far.  It was beautiful grounds with lots to do.  They have 5 pools and several hot tubs, pool tables and many other things to do on the resort.  The resort also has a shuttle that takes you to several places if you do not want to drive.  The rooms were very good, not the best we stayed at but for sure great.  We loved this resort and hated leaving.  The only thing I would wished for was for the restaurant at the pool to stay open later.
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!  It is great to hear you had a wonderful time on vacation and enjoyed the many resort amenities.  We look forward to your next visit to California!

Summary Heading: Try to get a top floor unit
Summary: I have just checked in here for a week long stay.  Once again, for the third year running, I have no view, despite most of their rooms having a view.  This year, I can see bushes and the people walking by my unit can see directly into it.  Last year, I have a view of bushes.  Why they continue to place me on the first floor when I would prefer a third (top) floor, I have no idea.  They must reserve those upper floors with nicer views for people they think are likely to buy into their timeshare club.  If you're coming here, definitely request an upper floor and pray that you get it.  Another thing that would be nice about an upper floor is you wouldn't have to hear everyone running around above your room.  As others have noted, the sound abatement between floors is poor.  I won't
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.  We apologize for not being able to provide the room location you requested.  Please know, owner reservations do receive preference over preview reservations when assigning rooms.  We would welcome the chance to personally respond to your concerns and invite you to contact our Customer Care team at customer.care@vacationclub.com or by calling 800-860-9384.  Thank you again for your review and we look forward to speaking with you soon.

Summary: We arrived at the tail end of the winter storm and was rainy but forecast for rest of week looked good and it was.  Got to the property around 5 so room was ready since check in was at 4.  I had requested something in either the 4000 or 5000 buildings as I hoped for a view and didn't need to be too close to main lobby or pool.  We received a nice second floor (top floor in our building) and a corner room.  Had view of two holes at Pelican Hill and ocean.  We were very impressed by the property.  Had a Spanish or Italian villa ambience and we liked that is was spread out, although we recognize this might not be ideal for those with mobility issues.  Property was very clean, had nice pools, including a more secluded Canyon Pool closer to our villa which we loved.  Room was slighly

My husband and I have traveled all over the US and internationally.  I think this has been the most disappointing stay we've experienced at a hotel.   I planned a weekend getaway for my husband's 40th birthday.  I chose Marriott's Newport Coast Villas, because a couple of us could stay in the same villa and we had friends joining us. I also read some of the reviews and they were mostly positive.   When I initially called they assured me our room would be on the 3rd floor with an ocean view and that we could do an early check in.  I called a few days before our stay, I was then told that they didn't do early check ins.  When we arrived, I was disappointed that we were staying on the 2nd floor not the 3rd floor I had been promised when booking.  But, even worse when we arrived for
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting Marriott’s Newport Coast Villas.  The experience you described is not typical of our resort and we apologize for not meeting your expectations.  We would like to personally respond to you and invite you contact our Customer Care team at Customer.Care@vacationclub.com or at 800-860-9384.  We look forward to speaking with you soon.

Summary: Usually we Spring Break from Minnesota to Florida and were looking for something different.  This is a great resort with plenty of activities if you want them and our suite is plenty to room the family of 5.  Basketball, putt putt golf, tennis and a bunch of pools all in excellent condition.  The PCH is very close and handy getting to all of the OC beaches.  We would definitely come back.

My parents own 2 weeks. Contrary to the sales pitch it does NOT get you better service or better rooms. Platinum with Marriott?  You get the worst room available at 4pm. Just like everyone else. After 6 years they have never been ready before 4pm despite very genuine phone calls to check on the availability. Today we are moving which translates To moving out of our room and spending all day waiting for a room to be ready. If "all their rooms are designed to be equal" why is it impossible to get two rooms close enough for a baby monitor to reach between? Service here is lip service. They sell used cars and do not stand behind their brand. When it comes time to deliver they stall, falter, apologize but at the end of the day they do not come through. I was an avid Marriott customer
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting Marriott’s Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.  We take your feedback seriously and appreciate you bringing your concerns about your room location to our attention.  We would like to personally respond to you and invite you contact our Customer Care team at Customer.Care@vacationclub.com or at 800-860-9384.  We look forward to speaking with you soon.

Summary Heading: Fantastic vacation. Want to go back!
Summary: This was an amazing place to relax and enjoy. Views of the ocean every time you looked out, great resort amenities, and shuttle service to beach, restaurants and shopping areas if you didn't want to drive. Staff was friendly and helpful. Good location to enjoy things in San Diego or Los Angeles if you wanted to travel further.

Summary Heading: Nice property but a couple of problems
Summary: This is quite a lovely property, with a great location near the ocean, wonderfully appointed rooms, and generally excellent service. However, our trip was marred by two issues. First, the internet was painfully slow. So slow, we could not watch streaming videos on Amazon.  Second, I was very disappointed in how the hotel handled a computer charger that I left behind. I called the day after I checked out to report the left behind charger ($70 cost). I was told that it took a couple of days for items left behind to be processed, but if I left my name and phone number, I would be advised as to whether the left behind item was found. I never received a call back. Very disappointing for an upscale property.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.  We sincerely apologize the associate you were speaking with did not follow up about your charger.  Our customer care team would be happy to look into this for you.  You may reach us at Customer.Care@vacationclub.com or at 800-860-9384 at your convenience.  Thank you again for your review and providing us your feedback.

Summary: Just returned from a fabulous 4 days at the Newport Coast Villas.  This is at least the 4th time I've chosen to stay here!  The views are spectacular, the villas are clean, spacious and quiet.  the pool area is beautiful, the staff is extremely friendly, beautiful grounds - and the perfect location.. up above Crystal Cove is so perfect.  We'll return yet again.  Be sure to request a villa on an upper floor so that you can take in the incredible view!
Manager Response: Thank you for your five-stare review Heidi!  We are happy to hear you and your friends love visiting Marriott's Newport Coast Villas and hope you can return soon!

Summary: We stayed here in late February 2014 and found it wonderful, with only a couple of minor  problems. When contacted by the resort for our preferences, we requested an upper floor unit with ocean view. Our unit was beautiful, but it was obvious that it hadn't yet been refurbished. The guest room had a double bed rather than a queen, and it was very uncomfortable. We called and requested a replacement, and housekeeping placed a board under the mattress instead. The sofa was definitely ready for replacement as well.  Other than that, the unit was spacious and well appointed, with a great view of the ocean and Catalina Island. The staff was friendly and helpful, and the free shuttle service was an added bonus. We enjoyed the pool and hot tub areas, as well as the free entertainment.
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!  We appreciate your feedback about the villa and apologize the bedding was not comfortable in your unit.  We will share your comments with our facilities team so they may address this accordingly.  We hope to see you again on your next trip to Marriott's Newport Coast Villas!

Summary: From reservations to check—in their staff are extremly accomodating..someone called and email me the wk prior to my arrival to make sure they knew what I what was expecting. The property is beautiful and my room was exactly what I needed to celebrate my 65th BD with four girlfriends..
Manager Response: Happy 65th birthday!  We are so happy you had a great celebration with your friends at Marriott's Newport Coast Villas.  Please come visit again soon in Newport Beach!

Summary: We recently stayed at Marriott's Newport Beach Villas and had a fantastic stay. It's located on the cliffs above the Pacific and offers spectacular views of the ocean and the golf course. There are several heated pools on the premises and even tennis courts. They have activities for children as well as a kids pool. There are numerous stainless steel gas bbq grills for use in front of the villas so that you're able to cook outdoors and soak in the weather and views. The villas are even larger than I'd expected with all the comforts of home. There's a full size kitchen, complete with oven, stove, microwave oven, toaster and full size fridge. We used the oven broiler one night to cook several lobster tails we got from the grocery store. There's a six seat dining table and the

Looking at the Marriott's web site this property appears to be stunning, and thankfully it is just as beautiful in person!   You do have a sense that you are in Italy overlooking all the red tile roofs,  except you have views of the Pacific and Catalina Island right in front of you.    Now to find just the right villa within the property:  After studying the resort map for hours I came up with 3 options for our building location,  but I was assigned to a different one.  I was bummed at first,  but actually the hotel agent put us in a much better building than the ones I had picked!  I requested being close to the main building (reception, shuttle, easy walk to pools, etc)  and building 3200 was perfect!  Reading other reviews,  I requested a higher floor so as to have the view

Very nice property with views of the ocean.  Convenient location close to shopping, golf, Disneyland, and hiking.  All rooms are two bedrooms with full kitchen and laundry, and is your typical Marriott time share villa.  There are many activities on site such as swimming, basketball, tennis, ping pong, pool, putting, etc.  The property is well maintained and is located on a hill so be prepared to get some exercise when exploring the grounds.  The only draw back is the lack of parking near the units.  If you return late in the evening, you will most likely have to park in the structure and either walk to your unit or call for a free ride in a golf cart.

This is the 4th time we've stayed here.  The Newport Coast Villas is our favorite resort in California. We're staying a newly renovated villa, in the 2300 building, and it is beautiful. The rooms are spacious and clean. Everyone at the Marriott is friendly and accommodating. We like staying near the main pool, fitness center and sauna. The beach is only a few minutes away.
